item.text: 'dul ba tha pa bzhugs so//
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ bi na ya k+Shu dra ka bstu/ bod skad du/ 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi
gzhi| bam po dang po/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phran tshegs kyi gzhi'i sdom ni/
so phag chan pa chos gos dang / /shing tshad dang ni gnas brtan lus/ /rgyus pa 'gyod pa 'byung ba nyid//
phran tshegs gzhir ni yang dag bshad/ /bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ so phag sen mo bcos pa dang / /lhung

bzed yan lag me long skyes/ /lam phran chu tshags mon sran sde'u/ /rkang pa bkru dang gos mdud do/ /sdom ni/ so phag dang ni sa dkar dang / /nya phyis dri yi lag ris dang / /ka ba dang ni skud pa gnyis/ /lag rgyan dang ni sor gdub
rgya| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /drug
sde nyid rnams snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs
pa dang / yangs pa can gyi bar dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i bar gyi bar skabs de na/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi skyed
mos tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa/ bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa dga' ba'i tshal dang 'dra ba de dag na de dag gi rtsal ba
dang / gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra'i cha byad sna tshogs dag dang / khrus kyi yo byad sna tshogs dag kyang bzhag pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras
pa| dga' bo nye dga' bo/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi 'di dag dang / skyed mos tshal gyi dga' ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
rnams dper mdzad na/ re zhig de dag gi skyed mos tshal ci 'dra ba blta'o/ /zhes de rnams glod nas de dag gi skyed mos tshal du zhugs so/ /de dag gis
de na rtsal ba'i yo byad mda' bo che dang / drang ba dang / 'phang rdo sna tshogs dang / gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra'i cha byad sna tshogs dang / pi wang dang
gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / skad snyan la sogs pa sna tshogs dang / khrus kyi yo byad so phag dang / bkru ba'i phye ma dang / mgo bkru ba skyu ru
ra sna tshogs mthong ba dang / de rnams kyis phan tshun smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa du ma 'di dag
yod na/ ci/ re zhig brtsal bar bya'am/ 'on te gar bya'am/ glu blang ngam/ rol mo'i sgra bya'am/ khrus bya/ kha cig gis smras pa/ bdag cag bkrus nas
ring zhig lon gyi/ je khrus bya'o/ /zhes de dag glod nas so phag dag gis drud cing drung nas khrus bya bar brtsams pa dang / bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas
de dag la mkhas pas/ khrus la zhugs pa de rnams kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba 'di lta ste/ sil snyan yan lag lnga pa skyes bu mkhas pas legs par dkrol ba'i
sgra lta bu byung ngo / /skye bo'i tshogs phal po che lam de nas 'gro bas/ sgra de thos pa dang / de rnams rna ba byo ste yud tsam bsdad nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /yangs
pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi skyed mos tshal na/ gar mkhan rnams gar byed pa bltar 'dong ngam/ de ltar bya'o/ /zhes ltad mo la yid 'dun pa de dag myur bar
chas te skyed mos tshal du dong nas de dag nang du zhugs pa dang / drug sde rnams kyang phyir byung ngo / /de dag gis de rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /phyogs gang na gar mkhan rnams gar bgyid/ de
rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyod kyis bye brag mi phyed de/ gar mkhan gar byed pa la sgra 'di lta bu 'byung ngam/ 'phags pa dag /'o na 'di su'i sgra lags/ shes ldan dag /kho bo cag lus drud nas
khrus byas pa yin no/ /'phags pa dag /ci/ dge sbyong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir tam/ bkren pa/ khyed kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan la dge sbyong kho bo cag 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir to/ /

khyed kho bo cag gi rjes su ston pa yin nam ci/ ma smra bar dengs/ khyed la gnod pa byas sa re zhes de rnams kyis de dag bsdigs pa dang / spa gong nas dong ste yangs pa can du zhugs nas lam po che dang /
srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu 'phya bar brtsams so/ /dge slong rnams kyis skabs de thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang
cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams so phag dag gis lus drud de khrus byed pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis so phag gis lus drud de khrus mi bya'o/ /'drud na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur

ro| |bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so phag gis lus de khrus mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag rkang pa ser ga byung zhing dri ma dang bcas bzhin bsod snyoms la 'jug pa de dag bram
ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /khyed zhabs ser ga byung zhing dri ma dang bcas na/ ci ste dri ma sbyang bar mi bgyi/ de rnams kyis
smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /ci 'phags pa/ khyed dri ma'i 'dam bcangs pas dag par 'gyur ram/ de rnams cang mi smra bar 'dug ste bsod snyoms la rgyus
nas gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de ltar na/ snga ma ni/
bcas pa'o/ /'di ni/ gnang ba yin te/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis rkang pa so phag gis drud par gnang ngo / /lus gzhan ni/ ma yin te/ 'drud na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom
ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos bgo sa/ lhung bzed thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms
kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de rnams kyis bram ze zhig sa dkar gyis so ris gsum byugs nas slong mo la rgyu zhing de'i bslangs pa yang mang du rnyed par mthong ngo / /drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/
dga' bo nye dga' bo/ thabs 'di ni/ bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang de ltar bya'o/ /zhes de rnams phyi de nyin sa dkar gyis so ris gsum byugs nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa ma dad pa

rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya zhing / gus par smra'o/ /gus par smra'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa/ khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang
dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni/ gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni/ phyag bya ba yin na/
de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra ba byed kyi/ phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa/ bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi/ dge slong du ni/ ma lags so/ /de lta lags pas
bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyi/ bzod par gsol lo/ /zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams so ris gsum 'dri ba las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis so ris gsum 'dri bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong
so ris gsum 'dri na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so ris gsum mi byug go /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag sman pas bsgo yang lus sas mi
skud pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de ltar na/ snga ma ni/ bcas pa'o/ /'di ni/ gnang ba yin te/
de lta bas na/ sman pas bsgo ba ni/ ma gtogs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/ de rnams kyis bram ze g+hi wang gi thig le byas pa
zhig skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis bskor cing ston mo'i bsngags pa brjod pa mthong ba dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo/ thabs 'di ni/ bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang
'di ltar bya'o/ /legs kyi/ de ltar bya'o/ /zhes de rnams phyi de nyin g+hi wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa dag byas nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag
dag gi mthong nas 'phya zhing gus par smra'o/ /gus par smra'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang
dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni/ gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni/ phyag bya ba
yin na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra ba byed kyi/ phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag /bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi/ dge slong du ni ma lags so/ /de'i
slad du bdag cag mi 'tshal gyi/ bzod par gsol lo/ /zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni/ dge slong dag g+hi wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis g+hi wang gi thig le dag gis
brgyan par mi bya'o/ /brgyan na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gis g+hi wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan par mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge
slong zhig 'phral bar rma byung ba de sman pa'i drung du song nas bzhin bzang / bdag la sman ston cig /'phags pa/ rma'i than kor g+hi wang gis bskus shig dang / khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /des
smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa/ khyod kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dag /sman pas bsgo ba ni/ ma gtogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so phag gis lus drud par mi bya'o/ /zhes bka'
stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams nya phyis kyis 'drud par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nya phyis kyis drud bar mi bya'o/ /'drud na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams dris byugs te gzhon nu rnams kyi nang du dong nas
smras pa/ gzhon nu dag /nged kyi dri ji lta snoms shig /de dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan/ ci/ khyed dris byugs sam/ byugs so/ /gnas brtan/ khyed dris byug tu rung ngam/ rung yang rung / mi
rung yang rung ste/ nged kyis ni/ byugs so/ /de dag 'phya smod kha zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs
gang cung zad ci byung ba ni/ dris nyug pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis dris byug par mi bya'o/ /nyug na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams
kyis dri byug par mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong nad pa zhig sman pa'i drung du song ste bzhin bzang / bdag la sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ dris byugs na/ khyod 'tsho
bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhin bzang / ci/ kho bo 'dod pa spyod dam/ 'phags pa/ khyod kyi sman ni/ 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis 'tsho bar mi nus so/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi /sman pa'i lung gis dri bcang bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag /dris byugs nas dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug cing / bram
ze dang / khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos ston par byed/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su yang 'gro bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas dge slong dri 'chang ba'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong dri 'chang bas dris byugs nas dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dug par mi bya/
bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par mi bya/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su 'gro bar mi bya'i/ nam sos par gyur pa de'i tshe khrus byas nas dri ma med
par gyur ba dang dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dug par bya/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par bya/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya'o/ /dge slong
dri 'chang bas kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la dri 'bul ba
na/ dge slong rnams 'gyod nas mi len pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe na/ mu stegs can rnams yon
gnas lags/ da ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bas/ da ltar khyed yon gnas lags na/ gal te khyod kyis ma bzhes na/ ci/ bdag cag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu dge
ba'i lam rgyags ma mchis par mchi'am/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes shig /de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/ /skabs de/
dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas de dag nyid kyi mdun du bor ba dang / de dag gis smras
pa/ 'phags pa dag /bdag cag gis rin thang bzhin du nyo nyo na/ khyed kyis blangs te dor ram/ skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ blangs nas dor bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la dri'i lag ris byug par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas dbu
skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten dag la dri'i lag ris nyug go /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /ci/ bdag cag gis mchod rten ma mthong ngam/ bdag cag gis ni/ khyed kho na la phul
te/ dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten dag la ni/ sngar phul lags so/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blangs
nas gnas khang la byug par bya'o/ /de rnams kyis gnas khang gi sgo la byugs pa dang / de dag dri gtsang khang yin no/ /snyam nas phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang du byug par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis drang thad du byugs pa dang / nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngas dang nye ba'am/ rkang pa dang nye bar byug par bya zhing / dri zhim po thams cad mig la phan pas dus dus su bsnam par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs 'jigs lta'i tshal ri dwags kyi nags na bzhugs so/ /ji tsam na rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs byed kyis khang bzang pad+ma ris byed du bcug nas bcom
ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs te bcom ldan 'das khang bzang pad+ma'i ris su dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bsham pa la bzhugs so/ /nye dga'

bo zan za ba'i tshe lag pas ka ba la bsnun pa dang / khang bzang pad+ma ris g.yos par gyur to/ /'brim mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ rgyal bu rtogs byed kyis khang bzang pad+ma ris tshon brgya rtsa
gcig gis bkra bar byas pa/ khyed kyis gzhig gam ci/ nye dga' bos smras pa/ bkren pa/ rtogs byed 'di la lhag par chags pas dus byas nas gar skye gtol med do/ /khyed kyang 'di la lhag par
chags pas dus byas nas yi dwags wa ba can rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag kha zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag ka ba la lag pas bsnun pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis lag pas ka ba la bsnun par mi
bya'o/ /bsnun na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ka ba la lag pas bsnun par mi bya zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams khu tshur dang / gru mo dang / phrag
pa dang / mgo dang / rtsib logs dang / rgyab dang / rked pa dang / brla dang / pus mo dang / byin pa dang / rkang pa dang / dbyug pa dang / bong ba dang / gzhan gyis bsnun par byed pa nyes dmigs de
nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis kyang bsnun par mi bya'o/ /drug sde rnams rtsig pa dang / sa dang / gzhan la snun par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ gzhan la yang gang dag gis bsnun par mi bya'o/ /snun na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin

gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams snga dro mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de rnams kyis bram ze zhig tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs te slong mo la rgyu zhing / des bza' ba

dang / bca' ba yang mang du rnyed pa mthong nas drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo/ thabs 'di ni/ bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang de lta bu bya'o/ /zhes de dag phyi de nyin tshangs pa'i
skud pa thogs te bsod snyoms la zhugs pa ma dad pa rnams kyis mthong nas/ 'phya zhing gus par smra'o/ /gus par smra'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa/ khyed kyis gus

par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni/ gus par smra bar bya
ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni/ phyag bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra bar byed kyi/ phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag /bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi/
dge slong du ni ma lags so/ /de lta lags pas bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyi/ bzod par gsol lo/ /zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom
ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong
gis tshangs pa'i skud pa gdags par mi bya'o/ /'dogs na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/ de dag gis bram ze dri dang / me tog
gis brgyan pa tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcings pa zhig dus ston zos nas dbang po tshim ste khyim nas byung ba mthong ba dang / de dag gis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo/
thabs 'di ni/ bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang 'di bzhin bya'o/ /zhes de dag phyi de nyin tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcings nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams

kyis mthong nas 'phya zhing / gus par smra'o/ /gus par smra'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyi smras pa/ bkren pa/ khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang dag
yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni/ gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni/ phyag bya ba yin
na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra ba byed kyi/ phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag /bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi/ dge slong du ni ma lags so/ /de lta lags
pas bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyi/ bzod par gsol lo/ /zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa 'ching ba las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis tshon sna lnga pa'i
skud pas lag pa bcing bar mi bya'o/ /'ching na/ 'gal chabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcing bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang /

dge slong nad pa gzhan zhig sman pa'i drung du song ste bzhin bzang / kho bo la nad 'di lta bu byung na/ sman ston cig ces byas pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ skud pa la gsang sngags dag gis bzlas
brjod byas te lag pa la bcings na/ khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa/ khyod kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin pas/ gnang bar
'gyur ro/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ sman pa'i lung gis skud pa bcing bar bya'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i lung gis skud pa bcing bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams lag pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo la 'ching ste nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lag pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo la bcing bar mi bya'o/ /de rnams lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung pa la 'ching ste nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung pa la bcing bar mi bya'o/ /de rnams lag pa g.yon pa'i rtse mo la 'ching ste nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa
g.yon pa'i rtse mo la bcing bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang lag pa g.yon pa'i dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams nad sos par gyur nas skud pa bab bab tu 'dor ba
mi ma yin pa rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa dag /nged kyis sos par byas na/ da ma gus par byed pa lta/ skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ bab bab tu dor bar mi bya ste/ gal te nad ma byang na/ chos gos kyi mtha'am/ rgya cang la bcing bar bya'o/ /'on te thams cad kyi thams cad du sos par gyur na/ ka ba'i
ser ga'am/ rtsig pa'i gseb tu gzhug par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams
snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi rgyan slo ma'i nang du bzhag pa drug sde rnams kyis
rkang rgyan dang / lag rgyan dag thogs nas smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo/ ji ltar mdzes sam/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyed mgo ni/ byi/ mchan khung ni/
spun na/ 'di la lus mdzes pa ci zhig yod/ gdon mi za bar dge sbyong khyod 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir bar gyur to/ /zhes byas pa dang / de rnams cang mi smra bar 'dug go /skabs de/
dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dag
gis bdag nyid brgyan pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan gyis bdag nyid brgyan par mi bya'o/ /brgyan na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gtsug lag khang du ma byin par len pa rnams kyis/ dge 'dun gyi mdzod dang / gang
zag gi gnas khang dag nas brkus so/ /dge slong gzhan dag cig gi yang stor na/ bdag cag gi stor nas ji tsam lon pa ma tshor ro/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi /rgya bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gser

dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa dang / sor gdub rgya rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag bcangs so/ /de nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas lag pa brkyang ste smras
pa/ bzhin bzang / nad med cig /nad med cig /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ 'di ci lags/ bzhin bzang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya gnang ngo / /de dag 'phya smod kha zer zhing / dge sbyong
shAkya'i bu rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul nyams shing tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/ 'di ni/ de ltar rgya la tha snyad 'dogs shing / rgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid brgyan par
byed do/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel
las byas pa'i rgya bcang bar mi bya/ sor gdub rgya yang bcang bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang rgya lnga po ra gan dang / zangs las byas pa dang / 'khar ba las byas pa dang / ba so las byas pa dang / rwa
las byas pa bcang bar bya'o/ /drug sde rnams kyis rgya la skyes pa dang / bud med nyal po byed pa bris pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci dge sbyong khyed
'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir tam/ gnas skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgya ni/ gnyis te/ dge
'dun gyi dang / gang zag gi'o/ /de la dge 'dun gyi ni/ dbus su 'khor lo bris la/ glo gnyis su ri dwags/ 'og tu gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i ming bri bar bya'o/ /gang zag gi ni/
rus pa'i keng rus sam/ mgo'i thod pa bri bar bya'o/ /sdom ni/ sen mo 'breg dang byi dor dang / /a mra dang ni skyu ru ra/ /lhung bzed brgyad po bkag pa dang / /rjes su gnang ba gnyis yin no/ /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong

gi dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul ba de'i tshe des 'breg mkhan gyi mi la smras pa/ kye skyes bu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song la/ 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu bregs shig /de

rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stong pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo/ rgyal
bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na 'chag cing 'dug pa des de rgyang ring po nas mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang / 'ongs pa legs so/ /'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod zla ba lta bur gnas na/ ring mo zhig lon
te gang nas 'ongs/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyim bdag gis 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu bregs pa'i slad du 'dir btang ngo / /des smras pa/ sen mo legs par 'breg shes sam/
'phags pa/ 'di nyid bdag gi bzo lags so/ /blta'i tshur/ de nyid nye bar 'ongs pa dang nye dga' bos lag pa brkyang ngo / /'breg mkhan gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci 'dra bar breg /

bzhin bzang / 'bru'i rtse mo ltar bregs shig /des 'bru'i rtse mo ltar bregs pa dang / des smras pa/ da ni/ ra ba'i lcog lta bu dang / spu gri'i so dang / ste'u ka dang / zla ba ches pa ltar gyis shig /des
de ji lta ji ltar bsgo ba de lta de lta bur byas pa dang mjug tu smras pa/ bkren pa/ khyod ko cung zad kyang mi shes pa zhig /'di kho na ltar mnyan par gyis la song zhig /ces des

de nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang ngo / /de nyid ma nub nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du song ba dang / mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ kye skyes bu/ khyod kyis 'phags pa mang po ji snyed
cig gi mgo dang kha spu bregs/ bdag gis 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu ga la bregs/ dge slong gzu lums can nye dga' bos bdag bsgor nas sen mo 'bru'i rtse mo dang / ra ba'i
lcog dang / spu gri'i so dang / ste'u ka dang / zla ba tshes pa lta bur gyis shig ces pa'i rnam pa thams cad bdag gis bgyis pa dang / de nas 'di skad ces/ bkren pa/ khyod ko cung zad kyang mi
shes pa zhig/ 'di kho na ltar mnyam par gyis la song zhig ces mchi nas da gzod kho na shor na/ ci zhig bgyi/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
la rab tu byung ba rnams la nye bar zhi ba med pa lta zhes 'phya ba la zhugs so/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams sen mo 'breg pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis sen mo breg par mi bya'o/ /'breg na/ 'gal tshabs
can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sen mo breg par mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams sen mo ring po ring por 'dug pa bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag gis
mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ ci ste sen mo ring po ring por 'jog /bzhin bzang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa/ ci/ khyed sen mo bcangs pas dag par 'gyur ram/
skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snga ma ni/ bcas pa'o/ /'di ni/ gnang ba yin te/ de lta bas na/ gnang
gi/ sen mo rnam pa gnyis po spu gri'i so dang / ste'u ka lta bur breg par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhes bya ba thams cad de kho na bzhin no/ /khyod sen mo 'chos shes sam/ 'phags pa/ ji lta
bur bgyi/ ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyis shig ces pa'i rnam pa thams cad bdag gis bgyis pa dang / de nas 'di skad ces/ bkren pa/ khyod ko cung zad
kyang mi shes pa zhig /'di kho na ltar mnyam par gyis la song zhig /ces mchi nas da gzod kho na shor na/ ci zhig bgyi/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
ba la rab tu byung ba rnams la nye bar zhi ba med pa lta zhes 'phya ba la zhugs so/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams sen mo dag byi dor byed pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis sen mo dag byi dor mi bya'o//
byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gis sen mo dag byi dor mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong tshon rtsi'i las dang / lhung bzed kyi las
byed pa rnams kyi sen mo dri ma chags la mdog mi sdug par gyur cing / de rnams sen mo de 'dra ba kho nar bsod snyoms la 'jug go /bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras
pa/ 'phags pa dag /khyed ci'i phyir sen mo 'di lta bu dri ma chags shing mdog mi sdug /de dag gis bsnyad pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci'i phyir dri ma mi dbyi/ bcom ldan
'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa/ khyed ci dri ma'i 'dam bcangs pas 'dag par 'gyur ram/ skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri ma dbyi ba'i phyir sen mo bzhar bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /rgyal po gzugs can
snying po'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ dus kyis gsar thog 'bru gsar pa'am/ /'bras bu gsar pa gang ci yang rung / de dag dang por dge 'dun la 'bul lo/ /de'i 'og tu bdag nyid za'o/ /de'i blon po rnams
kyis a mra'i shing thog dag phul ba dang / des smras pa/ song la 'phags pa rnams la phul cig /de dag gis bgad pa dang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ci la dgod/ de dag gis smras pa/
lha/ ci khyed da ni/ 'phags pa rnams la dang por 'bul snyam dgongs kyi/ bdag cag gis ches sngar 'phags pa rnams la phul bar ni/ ma lags sam/ des smras pa/ gal te de lta na/ ngas 'phags

pa rnams la stong gi kun dga' ra ba nyid phul lo/ /lha/ legs te rjes su yi rang ngo / /des phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stong gi kun dga' ra ba phul nas der dus ston kyang btsugs so//
de ji ltar yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dus ston la lta bar 'ongs pa a mra'i shing thog smin pa rnams kyis tshim par gyur pa de ltar shing thog rgyas par gyur to/ /de dge 'dun la phul
lo/ /zhes dge slong rnams kyis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du zos so/ /ji tsam na mtshams kyi rgyal po zhig la a mra dag dgos par gyur nas des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la pho nya
btang ste/ grogs po/ bdag la a mra dag dgos kyi/ bskur ba'i rigs so/ /zhes byas pa dang / des pho nya de la smras pa dang / kye skyes bu/ ngas stong gi kun dga' ra ba de/ 'phags pa'i dge
'dun la phul gyi/ song la 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams la slong shig /de 'od ma'i tshal du song ba dang / drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ rtag tu kun dga'

ra ba'i sgo mi stong par byed pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo 'od ma'i tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug go /de de'i drung du song nas phyag 'tshal te des smras pa/ rgyal po che ge mo zhig gis a
mra'i ched du khyed kyi thad du btang na de'i slad du a mra dag stsal ba'i rigs so/ /des smras pa/ kye skyes bu/ song la a mra ji tsam dgos pa de tsam longs shig /de song nas a mra'i shing rnams kyi
drung du bltas na mi snang ste/ de slar log nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ma mchis so/ /nye dga' bos de khrid nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs te kun dga' ra ba thams cad bskor nas smras pa/ kye skyes
bu/ shing 'di la 'dzegs shig /des 'dzegs nas ma mthong ba dang / nye dga' bos smras pa/ kye skyes bu/ shar gyi yal gar song / lho dang / nub kyi yal gar song / de thams cad du song
nas skyo bar gyur te babs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci kun dga' ra ba 'di lo 'di la 'bras bu ma chags sam/ bzhin bzang / ji ltar lo re lo re zhing shing thog yod pa de ltar 'di 'bras bu
chags so/ /'phags pa/ ci rlung dang char pas blags sam/ bzhin bzang / rlung dang char pas ma blags kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so/ /
de slar log nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol pa/ lha/ 'phags pa rnams kyi zhal nas/ kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so/ /zhes gsung ngo / /des

smras pa/ legs te/ nga la longs spyad pa nyid dgos so/ /zhes byas pa dang / mi de slar song ngo / /ji tsam na dus ston la bab pa'i tshe yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dus nas de dag gis smras
pa/ 'phags pa dag /ci/ stong gi kun dga' ra ba 'di lo 'di la 'bras bu ma chags sam/ bzhin bzang dag /ji ltar lo re lo re zhing shing thog yod pa de ltar 'di 'bras bu chags mod kyi/ 'on
kyang kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so/ /'phags pa dag /gang na yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad a mra smin pa dag gis tshim par 'gyur ba
de khyod kyis 'bras bu ma smin pa kho nar 'chos te/ gang kho bo cag la gnod pa byas pa ni/ ma legs pa zhig byas so/ /des smras pa/ 'di rgyal pos yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la
byin pa ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul te/ de lta bas na/ kho bo cag gis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin zos so/ /khyed ci gtogs zhes byas pa dang / de dag 'phya/ smod/ kha zer
par byed do/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams a mra dag
za ba las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis a mra dag bza' bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong a mra dag za na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong gis a mra dag bza' bar mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag /dge slong rnams la/ shing sa ha ka ra'i shing tog dag 'bul ba na/ dge
slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur pa zhes bya ba
nas 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro'am/ bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar sngar bzhin no/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi /mtshan nyid grub pa yin no/ /zhes byas nas bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /de la mtshan nyid grub pa ni/
'di dag yin te/ tshig gu chags pa rnams so/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can gzhan dag cig /dge slong rnams a mra'i shing tog smin pa dag 'bul ba na zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du
'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu mchi'am/ bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar thams cad snga ma bzhin no/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ mtshan nyid bye brag phyed do/ /zhes byas te bza' bar bya'o/ /de la mtshan nyid bye brag phyed pa ni/ 'di dag yin te/ sha zhugs pa rnams so/ /

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong nad pa zhig /sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzang /
bdag 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs na/ sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ je mar 'thung la snum par gyis shig dang / bkru sman sbyin no/ /des mar 'thungs pa dang / skom pas gnod par gyur
to/ /sman pa 'ongs te dris pa/ 'phags pa/ bde bar 'dug gam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / bdag skom pas gnod do/ /skyu ru ra chongs shig /ces byas pa dang / des lag tu blangs te 'dug go /
yang sman pas dris pa/ 'phags pa/ skom pa dang bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzang ma bral lo/ /sman pas smras pa/ de'i tshe skyu ru ra ma bcangs sam/ bzhin bzang / yod de/ 'di yin no/ /'phags
pa/ khar chongs shig /bzhin bzang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa/ khyod kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /skabs de zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ khar bcang ba'i bar du zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /des khar bcug nas 'dug go /yang sman pa de 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa/ skom pa dang bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / da
dung ma bral lo/ /sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ de'i tshe skyu ru ra khar ma bcangs sam/ bzhin bzang / bcangs te 'dug pa 'di yin no/ /des smras pa/ 'phags
pa| mur cig /gzhan du na skom pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa/ khyod kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /
skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mur bar bya'o/ /mur mur nas bor gyi/ ma mid pa dang / skom pas je
gnod par gyur to/ /yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa/ skom pa dang bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / shin tu gnod do/ /'phags pa/ de'i tshe skyu ru ra ma mur ram/ bzhin
bzang / mur nas bor ro/ /'phags pa/ ci'i phyir ma mid/ bzhin bzang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i zas bkag go /'phags pa khyod ni/ nad pa yin la/ khyod kyi ston pa ni/
thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dag
gnang gi /'bras bu lnga dus su yang rung / dus ma yin par yang rung / nad pa yang rung / mi na bas kyang rung / bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras
bu lnga dus su yang rung / dus ma yin par yang rung / nad pa yang rung / mi na bas kyang rung ste/ bza' bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis 'bras bu lnga gang dag yin pa mi shes pa
dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyu ru ra dang / a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / pi pi ling dang / na le sham mo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da
ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba/ longs spyod chen po zhig gnas pa de/ gcer bu rnams la rab tu dad do/ /
des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa
las/ dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos mnabs/ lhung bzed bsnams te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms
kyi phyir zhugs nas rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing / khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i khyim ga la ba de logs su gshegs pa dang / khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das rgyang
ma nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang chung ma khrid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mchis brang 'di sems
can zhugs par gyur na/ ci zhig tu btsa' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / rigs gsal bar byed par
'gyur| lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /des bcom
ldan 'das la bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nad med cig ces gsungs nas bsod snyoms bzhes te gshegs
so| |de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na gcer bu pa zhig 'dug pa des bsam pa/ gang bdag cag la bslang ba'i khyim gcig pu zhig yod pa de yang dge sbyong go'u ta mas kha drangs kyi/ song la
dge sbyong go'u ta mas ci lung bstan pa blta'o/ /snyam mo/ /de der song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag /dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'ongs par gyur tam/ byon to/ /des ci zhig lung bstan/ 'phags pa/ bdag
gis de la chung ma bstan te/ ci zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhes bgyis pa dang / de bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar
'gyur/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsung ngo / /gcer bu pa de rtsis mkhas pa zhig ste/ rdo
rgyus kha dog dkar po blangs nas brtsis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du lung bstan pa de thams cad de kho na bzhin du mthong nas des bsam pa/ gal te rjes su bsngags na ni/ khyim bdag
'di dge sbyong go'u ta ma la dad par 'ong bas/ de bas na/ 'dir cung zad cig ni/ bsngags par bya/ cung zad cig ni/ smad par bya'o/ /snyam du bsam nas/ lag pa dkyogs/ bzhin bsgyur ba
dang / khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci ste lag pa dkyogs/ bzhin bsgyur/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag /'di la cung zad cig ni/ bden/ cung zad cig ni/ rdzun no/ /
'phags pa/ gang ni/ bden/ gang ni/ rdzun/ khyim bdag /bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni/ bden no/ /rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba gang
yin pa de ni/ bden no/ /gsal ba ni/ me'i ming yin pas/ sems can skal ba chung ngu de btsas ma thag kho nar khyim mes tshig par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur
ro| |zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni/ rdzun te/ khyim bdag /khyod kyis mir gyur pa la lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar gyur pa 'ga' yod pa lta mthong ngam/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung
ngo| |zhes zer ba de bden te/ gang gi tshe 'di bza' ba yang med/ bgo ba yang med pa de'i tshe gdon mi za bar dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i thad du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad
spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer ba de ni/ rdzun te/ re zhig dge sbyong go'u ta ma la yang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i dgra
bcom pa nyid med na/ de'i nyan thos la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khyim bdag shin tu bzang po mi dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ 'di la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ gcer
bu pas smras pa/ khyim bdag /bdag cag ni/ rab tu byung ba ste/ bslab pa blangs pa yin pas/ khyod nyid shes so/ /zhes smras nas song ngo / /shin tu bzang pos bsam pa/ 'di yang dor ro/ /
snyam nas sman ma yin pa sbyin par brtsams pa dang / sems can de srid pa tha ma pa zhig pas sman ma yin pa de yang de la sman du gyur to/ /des de'i dku g.yon pa mnye bar brtsams pa dang / mngal
na 'dug pa de dku g.yas par song ngo / /shin tu bzang pos dku g.yas pa mnye bar brtsams pa dang / de dku g.yon par song ste srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can zag pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du bar
ma dor rgyun chad cing dus byed par 'gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/ /khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma de dku mnyes pas ngu bar brtsams pa dang / khyim
tshes dag gis thos nas rings pa rings par song ste dris pa/ shes ldan/ khyim bdag gi chung ma 'di ci ste ngu / shin tu bzang pos smras pa/ gdon mi za bar 'di bu btsa' ba'i dus la bab bo/ /
zhes byas pa dang / de dag dong ngo / /shin tu bzang pos bsam pa/ bdag gis 'di 'dir gsad mi nus kyi/ dgon par bkri'o/ /snyam nas des de dgon par khrid nas ci nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta

de ltar brtsal nas des de sbas te khyim du khyer nas mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / phu nu dang / khyim tshes rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /kho bo'i chung ma shi'o/ /de dag gis ngu bar brtsams nas de
dag ngu zhing de gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams kyis khyogs brgyan nas bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod du khyer ro/ /gcer bu pa dag gis thos nas de dag dga' mgu rangs

nas gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag bsgreng ste rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu rgyu zhing smras pa/ shes ldan dag nyon cig /dge
sbyong go'u ta mas khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas

nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa de ni/ shi nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du khyer ro/ /re zhig shing gang la rtsa ba nyid kyang
med pa de la yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma 'byung bar lta ga la 'gyur/ skabs 'di lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ mi rig pa'am/ rnam
par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pu/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla
med pa/ gnyis mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis gnas pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslab pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil legs par gnas pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas goms par mdzad pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi bsnyengs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par
spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ drug la rtag tu gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis
phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' ba/ grags pas phyogs bcur khyab pa/ stong la dbang
bsgyur bas khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis nyin lan gsum/ mtshan lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs shing / su ni/ nyams/ su ni/ dar/ su
ni/ nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni/ skobs su chud par gyur/ su ni/ gnod par gyur/ su ni/ nyam nga ba dang / skobs su chud pa dang / gnod par gyur/ su ni/ ngan song la gzhol/ su ni/ ngan song
la 'bab/ su ni/ ngan song la bab/ gang ni/ ngan song las drangs nas mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la dgod/ gang zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya/ gang zhig gis bskyed pa ni/ yongs su
smin par bya/ gang zhig smin pa ni/ grol bar bya zhes ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /yang smras pa/ chu srin gnas kyi rgya mtsho ni/ /dus rlabs 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams
la| |sangs rgyas dus las mi 'da'o/ /ji ltar ma ni sdug pa'i bu gcig la/ /lta zhing de yi srog kyang srung ba ltar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gdul ba'i skye bo la/ /de bzhin gzigs shing de yi rgyud
kyang srung / /thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyud la gnas pa yi/ /thugs rje'i ba drus pa gshin be'u stor bzhin/ /srid pa bgrod dka' 'khyams par gyur pa yi/ /gdul ba'i sras rnams skyo mi mkhyen
par tshol// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs shig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag byung nas kha cig ni/ 'og tu 'gro/ kha cig ni/ steng du 'gro ste/
gang dag 'og tu 'gro ba de dag ni/ dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus gzhom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu
bur can dang / chu bur rdol ba dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer ba dang / a chu zer ba dang / ut+pal ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas
pa chen por song ste/ tsha ba'i dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni/ bsil bar gyur nas 'bab/ grang ba'i dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni/ dro bar gyur nas 'bab bo/ /des sems
can de rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun bcad pa dang / de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag ci/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes zhes zer ro/ /de
dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa gtong ste/ de dag gis sprul pa de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems shing shes ldan dag /bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin/
gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang sems can 'di sngon ma mthong ba zhig ste/ 'di'i mthus bdag cag sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun chad do/ /zhes zer ro/ /de dag sprul pa de
la sems mngon par dang bas dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du sems can rnams snod du gyur pa lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba 'dzin to/ /
gang dag steng du 'gro ba de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs
ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod

nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu che dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong
pa dang / bdag med pa zhes bya ba yang sgrog go /tshigs bcad gnyis kyang sgrog ste/ brtsam par bya zhing dbyung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bstan la 'bad par bya/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen
bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/ /chos 'dul 'di la gang zhig ni/ /bag dang bcas par spyod byed pa/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal gyi ni mthar byed 'gyur//
de nas 'od zer de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro ste/ de gal te bcom ldan 'das las
'das pa lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun du nub par 'gyur ro/ /dmyal bar skye ba lung ston par
bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni/ long bur nub par 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor
nub par 'gyur ro/ /mir skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mor nub par 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid du lung ston par bzhed na ni/
phyag g.yon gyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni/
lte bar nub par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni/ /zhal du nub par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdzod spur nub par 'gyur ro/ /
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni/ gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ rnam
pa sna tshogs tshon ni stong dag gis/ /bkra ba'i tshogs dag zhal gyi nang nas byung / /nyi ma shar bar gyur pa ji lta bar/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /tshigs su bcad de yang
gsol pa/ sangs rgyas rgol bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs/ /rgyal ba dgra thul 'gro mchog rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyu ma mchis par pad+ma'i rtsa lag dang / /dung ltar dkar ba'i 'dzum ba ston mi mdzad//
da ltas nyid kyi bstan blos dus mkhyen nas/ /rgyal dbang nyan po nyan par 'tshal rnams kyi/ /the tshom skyes pa thub pa skyes mchog gi /gsung mchog bzang zhing bstan pas bsal du gsol/ /rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab ltar brtan pa/ /zung thub rnams ni glo bur 'dzum mi ston/ /mgon po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa de/ /skye bo'i tshogs 'di nyan par yang dag 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga'
po| song la dge slong rnams la/ dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa dur khrod du rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed kyi/ khyed las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig dur khrod du rgyu zhing
'gro bar spro ba de/ chos gos dag so so nas longs shig ces sgos shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun pa/ de ltar 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas dge slong dag gang na ba
der song ste phyin nas dge slong rnams la/ dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa dur khrod du rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed kyi/ khyed las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig dur khrod du rgyu
zhing 'gro bar spro ba de/ chos gos dag so so nas longs shig ces bsgos pa dang / dge slong thams cad 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor
dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/ grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra
bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog pa glang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / glang po che glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs
kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze
bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo dmag mi'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sa mkhan 'gron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/
ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshong dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams kyi rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los bsgyur ba bu stong gis
bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yum 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs
kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nor sbyin gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thag bzang ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin

sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho mi g.yo ba lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po che'i rgyal po drags pa med pa lta
bu| dbang po shin tu dul bas spyod lam mi nyams par gshegs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ sku 'od 'dom
gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa gsum dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag

pa bzhi dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ nyan thos chen po kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang / rta thul dang / rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / bzang po dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu dang / 'od srung
dang / grags pa dang / gang po la sogs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po gzhan dang / srog chags brgya stong phal mo ches bskor nas bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du gshegs so/ /sangs rgyas
gshegs pa la phan yon bco brgyad yod de/ bco brgyad gang zhe na/ me'i 'jigs pa med/ chu'i 'jigs pa med/ seng ge'i 'jigs pa med/ stag gi 'jigs pa med/ gzig gi 'jigs pa
med/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa med/ rkun po'i 'jigs pa med/ la gcan pa'i 'jigs pa med/ gru btsas kyi 'jigs pa med/ sho gam gyi 'jigs pa med/ bsel rngan gyi
'jigs pa med/ mi'i 'jigs pa med/ mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa med/ dus dus su gzugs bzang po dag mthong bar 'gyur/ sgra snyan pa dag thos par 'gyur/ 'od
chen po dag mthong bar 'gyur/ kun shes pa lung ston pa dag thos par 'gyur/ chos kyi longs spyod dang / zang zing gi longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas gshegs pa ni/ gnod pa

chung ba yin pas/ lha dang mi brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring du phyi bzhin 'brang ngo / /bsil tshal logs nas rlung dag kyang langs so/ /rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig dang / bram ze'i khye'u

byis pa gnyis shig rgyal po'i khab nas phyi rol tu byung ste rtse zhing 'khod do/ /de gnyis las rgyal rigs kyi khye'u ni/ dad pa dang ldan pa yin/ bram ze'i khye'u ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /bram ze'i khye'u
des rgyal rigs kyi khye'u la smras pa/ grogs po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma'i bu khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal
yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan na/ de ni/ 'chi ba'i dus byas
nas bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du khyer na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rdzun du ma gyur grang / rgyal rigs kyi khye'u des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ zla ba skar ma'i tshogs bcas sa la

ltung yang srid/ /sa 'di ri dang nags bcas mkha' la 'gro yang srid/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni skam par 'gyur srid kyi/ /drang srong chen po rdzun gsung 'gyur ba srid pa min/ /bram ze'i khye'u des/ grogs
po| de lta na bsil tshal gyi dur khrod blta zhing 'dong ngo / /zhes smras nas de gnyis dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs pa mthong ngo / /rgyal rigs kyi khye'us bcom ldan

'das thag ring po kho nas mthong nas yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ thub pa the tshom bram zhing rgod pa mi mnga' ba/ /ri dwags rgyal po lta bu'i sgra skad mchog sgrog cing / /the tshom med par pha rol
smra bas mi brdzi ba/ /'di ltar skye bo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing gshegs/ /bsil tshal phyogs su kha ba'i tshogs lta bu'i/ /bsil ba'i ngad can rlung ni langs par gyur pa na/ /shAkya thub pa'i
rdzu 'phrul brtag pa'i don gyi phyir/ /lha tshogs mang po gnas nas 'ongs pa nyid du nges/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma'i bu khye'u skye
bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du

byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan na/ de ni/ 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du phyung zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bsil tshal gyi dur khrod
du gshegs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ don med par bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du mi gshegs pas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma la brten te/ gdul ba'i don chen po zhig mdzad par 'gyur gor ma chag gi/ bltar 'gro'o/ /snyam nas de btsun mo dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang /
pho brang 'khor dang / ljongs kyi mis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ba dang / rgyal rigs kyi khye'u des/ rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po thag ring po kho nas mthong nas yang
tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ ma ga d+ha yi mnga' bdag rgyal po'i gtso bo 'di/ /'di ltar 'khor bcas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ba las/ skye bo'i tshogs kyis 'byor ba phun sum tshogs par ni/ /
bdag gi snying la nges pa'i blo dag skyes par gyur/ /skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas gshegs shul phye ba dang / bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad cing skye bo rnams
kyi gung la bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pa gcer bu bdag gis mthong nas bsam pa/ 'di ltar/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma bzhin 'dzum pa byed cing / skye bo mang po'i gung
la 'dug pa las na/ sems can 'di ma shi bar nges so snyam nas des khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la smras/ khyim bdag/ sems can skal ba chung ngu 'di ni/ ma shi'o/ /des smras pa/ 'phags
pa/ de ltar gyur na/ skabs 'di la da ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag/ kho bo ni/ bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par blangs pa yin gyi/ khyod nyid shes par gyis shig /des bud shing gcer te

chung ma'i ro de me'i phung po'i nang du bcug ste bsregs pa dang / de'i lus thams cad tshig na/ lto'i nye 'khor de bzhin du 'dug go /de nas lto'i nye 'khor de rdol nas pad+ma byung ste/ pad+ma de'i snying po las
gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig byung ngo / /de srog chags brgya stong dag gis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar chen po skyes par gyur pa dang / gcer bu pa dag gis rgyags pa
dang | nga rgyal dang / khengs pa dag nyams so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /gzhon nu longs shig /des gcer bu pa'i gdon du bltas pa
dang | des smras pa/ khyim bdag/ me phung rab tu 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na/ thams cad kyi thams cad du tshig par mi 'gyur ram/ de skad ces smras pa dang / des ma blangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed/ gzhon nu longs shig /des bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas ma yin skabs ma yin par bdag mi bsko yi/ blang
ngo / /snyam nas des the tshom med par me phung gi nang du zhugs te blangs so/ /rgyal ba'i bka' yis me yi phung por zhugs gyur te/ /de yis gzhon nu me yi nang nas blangs pa/ /rgyal ba'i mthu yis
me ni zhi ba nyid gyur cing / /kha ba'i tshogs ltar bsil ba'ang skad cig de la byung / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho
byed/ khyod nyams pa'i gnod pa dag tu ma gyur tam/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag rgyal po'i pho brang du btsas shing rgyal po'i pho brang du skyes par gyur kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin
gyi rlabs kyis zhugs kyi phung po tsan+dan sa mchog lta bur bsil bar gyur pa 'di lta bu ni/ sngon chad ma myong lags so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la bka' stsal
pa| khyim bdag/ gzhon nu 'di longs shig /de log par lta ba la phyogs pas re zhig len par mi byed cing / gcer bu pa de nyid kyi gdong du lta bar byed do/ /des smras pa/ khyim bdag/ mang du smra ci
dgos| mes ni/ thams cad 'tshig pa yin na/ gzhon nu shin tu skal ba chung ba 'di ma tshig pa las na/ 'di khyod kyis khyim du khyer na/ khyod kyi khyim yang tshig cing khyod kyi srog gi bar chad du
yang 'gyur bar nges so/ /des bdag las gces pa med do/ /snyam nas de ma blangs pa dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa
rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu longs shig /des gus par sgrim pa dang bcas pas lag pa brkyang ste de blangs nas kun tu brtags te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ khye'u 'di/ 'di ltar me'i nang nas skyes pas/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming me skyes zhes bya bar gdags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas ci nas kyang sems can brgya phrag mang po de dag gis thos nas khyad par rnyed par
'gyur ba de lta bur chos bstan pa mdzad pas/ kha cig gis ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni/ phyir mi 'ong
ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni/ rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas par gyur to/ /kha cig gis ni/ dro bar gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / kha

cig gis ni/ rtse mo dang / kha cig ni/ bzod pa chung ngu dang / 'bring bskyed par gyur to/ /kha cig gis ni/ nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis
ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur to/ /kha cig gis ni/ skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag yang dag par blangs te 'khor de dag las phal
cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par gyur to/ /de rgyal po gzugs can snying pos khye'u me skyes ma ma brgyad po/ pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do/ /de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang / zho dang /

mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/ skyed par byed cing / rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed
do| |de'i zhang po zong thogs te yul gzhan du song ba des/ ji ltar bdag gi sring mo la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar
'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung
bstan pa thos nas des zong bsgyur te rin blangs nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ba dang / des 'di ltar bdag gi sring mo de 'chi ba'i dus la bab bo/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bsam pa/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis de'i bu khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/
dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de/ rdzun du ma gyur tam snyam nas des khyim tshes dag la dris pa/ bdag gi
sring mo la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'ur 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs
pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan par thos so/ /thos nas bdag kun tu dga' ba las/ de yang 'chi ba'i dus la bab po/ /zhes thos na/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de/ rdzun du ma gyur tam/ de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ zla ba skar ma'i tshogs bcas sa la ltung yang srid/ /sa 'di ri dang nags bcas mkha' la

'gro yang srid/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni skam par 'gyur srid kyi/ /drang srong chen po rdzun gsung 'gyur ba srid pa min/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rdzun du mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar khyim thab

des de ji lta ji ltar 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byas pas 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas de'i khye'u dbang thang chen po can mer bsregs kyang ma tshig pa mthu bo che zhig /da ltar rgyal po'i pho brang na
gso zhing 'dug go /zhes smras pa dang / de khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i gan du song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag /khyod kyis mi rigs pa zhig byas so/ /ci zhig byas/ gcer bu pas bslus nas
khyod kyis nga'i sring mo la sems can zhugs pa/ ji lta ji ltar 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byas pas/ 'chi ba'i dus la bab par byas so/ /de'i khye'u dbang thang can mer bsregs kyang ma
tshig pa mthu bo che zhig /da ltar rgyal po'i pho brang na gso zhing 'dug pa des ni re zhig ci byar yang med de/ 'di ltar/ yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na/ de lta na legs
'on te mi len na/ ngas khyod gnyen du yang mi brtsi/ rabs yig kyang 'dor zhing / lam po che dang / srang dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bdag
gi sring mo bsad do/ /chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o/ /zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing / rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go/ zhes smras pa dang / des de thos nas
skrag ste/ de skad smra ba dang sbyar na/ bdag la de ltar byed par nges so/ /snyam nas de rgyal po'i gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ lha/ bdag gi nye du po'i mchid nas/
da yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na/ de lta na legs/ 'on te mi len na/ ngas khyod gnyen du yang mi brtsi/ rabs yig kyang 'dor zhing / lam po che dang / srang dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang /
bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad do/ /chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o/ /zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing / rgyal po'i gnod pa yang
byed du gzhug go /zhes mchi bas/ de'i slad du lhas gzhon nu me skyes bdag la stsal ba'i rigs so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag /gzhon nu me skyes ngas khyod las blangs pa ma yin
gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga la gtad pa yin pas/ khyod la gal te gzhon nu dgos na/ gzhon nu'i ched du bcom ldan 'das la sngar zhus shig /de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas zhabs gnyis
la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi nye du po'i mchid nas/ da yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na/ de lta na legs/ 'on te mi len na/ ngas khyod gnyen du yang mi brtsi/
rabs yig kyang 'dor zhing / lam po che dang / srang dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad do/ /chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam
'dre bar mi bya'o/ /zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing / rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go/ zhes mchi bas/ de'i slad du gzhon nu me skyes bdag la stsal ba'i rigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gal te
khyim bdag shin tu bzang po gzhon nu me skyes ma thob na/ khrag tsha ba skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par gzigs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la rgyal po gzugs can snying po la/ nga'i bkas a rog gya zhes byos la 'di skad ces/ rgyal po chen po/ khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la gzhon nu me skyes byin cig /gal
te khyim bdag shin tu bzang po gzhon nu me skyes ma thob na/ khrag tsha ba skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro/ /zhes kyang sgos shig /tshe dang ldan pa
kun dga' bos/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po gzugs can
snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod la rgyal po chen po a rog gya zhes bka' stsal te/ rgyal po chen po/ khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la gzhon nu me skyes byin cig/ gal
te khyim bdag shin tu bzang po gzhon nu me skyes ma thob na/ khrag tsha ba skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro/ /zhes kyang bka' stsal to/ /rgyal pos
smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po chen po a rog gya
zhes smras te song ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu 'di ngas bskyed de yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa yin pas/ dam tshig bcas la sbyin par bya ste/ nyi ma re re la yang dus gsum gsum
du nga blta ba'i phyir gtong na/ sbyin par bya'o/ /des smras pa/ lha/ khyod kyi spyan sngar mi gtang na/ gzhan su'i thad du gtang bar bgyi/ gtang bar 'tshal lo/ /rgyal pos de rgyan thams cad kyis

brgyan te glang po che la bskyon nas btang ngo / /'di ltar 'jig rten pa rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ ji srid du pha gson pa de srid du bu'i ming mi sgrog go /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag shin tu

bzang po 'chi ba'i dus byas nas gzhon nu me skyes pha'i khyim na gnas par gyur te/ de sangs rgyas la mngon par dad/ chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / chos dang / dge
'dun la skyabs su song ngo / /des khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos phyogs gang du bdag gi ma bsad pa'i phyogs der gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug nas yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar
te phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul nas 'di ltar/ gnas brtan dag gis kyang mdo sde dag la/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dku mnyed pa'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /zhes nye bar sbyar to/ /khyim
bdag shin tu bzang po'i mi zho shas 'tsho ba yul gzhan du dong ba dag gis/ khyim bdag shin tu bzang po ni/ 'chi ba'i dus la bab bo/ /gzhon nu me skyes ni/ rang gi khyim na gnas te/ de sangs rgyas
la mngon par dad/ chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang de dag gis tsan ra nas mchog
pa'i lhung bzed gcig /rin po che dag gis bkang ste khyim bdag me skyes la skyes su bskur ro/ /des kyang de shing ring po'i rtse mo la btags te bzhag nas 'di skad ces/ 'di sus kyang skas dang /
ya gad dang / kyo btang dag gis blang bar mi bya'i/ 'di ltar/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gang dag rdzu 'phrul che ba'am/ mthu che ba de dag las 'ga' zhig gis len na/ des ni/ 'di ci bder
khyer la rag go /zhes dril bsgrags pa yang byas so/ /gzhan mu stegs can rnams nang par sngar langs nas chu ngogs dag tu nye reg byed du 'dong ba de dag gis de mthong ngo / /
mthong nas kyang khyim bdag me skyes la smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ci yin/ des de dag la rgyas par bsnyad pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag/ khyod shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams la mngon
par dad pas/ de dag nyid len par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras nas dong ngo / /ji tsam na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de dag gis de mthong nas/
de dag gis kyang khyim bdag me skyes la smras pa/ khyim bdag/ 'di ci yin/ des de dag la de kho na bzhin du rgyas par bsnyad pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag /bcom ldan 'das kyis
dge slong dag gi yon tan ni/ bcab par bya/ skyon ni/ bsgrag par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal na/ ci/ lhung bzed tsam gyi ched du bdag nyid bstan par bya'am zhes smras nas dong ngo / /ji tsam na
tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu pa de phyogs der 'ongs te khyim bdag la smras pa/ khyim bdag/ 'di ci yin/ des ji lta bu yin pa smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu pas bsam
pa| bdag gis thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rnams spangs shing bor la/ bsal cing sbyangs pa byas na/ khyim bdag gis bdag mu stegs can dang / rdzu

'phrul 'gran par chad kyi/ de'i phyir 'di'i yid mgu bar bya'o/ /snyam nas des lag pa glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang ste lhung bzed de blangs nas des de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song ngo / /de la dge slong gis
smras pa/ gnas brtan/ khyod kyis tsan+dan sa mchog pa'i lhung bzed 'di ga las mchis/ des ji ltar gyur pa de brjod pa dang / dge slong dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan/ khyod lhung bzed tsam gyi ched du

khyim pa'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan du rung ngam/ de tshe dang ldan pa dag rung yang bla/ mi rung yang bla ste/ byas zin pas da ci byar yang med do/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis khyim pa'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan par mi bya'o/ /rnam par ston na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
ro| |gzhan yang lhung bzed rnam pa bzhi po/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dang / gzhan yang lhung bzed rnam pa bzhi po/ ra gan

dang | zangs dang / 'khar ba dang / shing las byas pa dag las/ 'di ltar lhung bzed snga ma bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ ma blangs pa yang blang bar mi bya la/ blangs pa yang gtang bar bya'o/ /lhung

bzed phyi ma bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ ma blangs pa ni/ blang bar mi bya zhing / blangs pa na/ sman phor du longs spyad pas spyad par bya ba yin no/ /'di ltar lcags dang / sa'i lhung bzed gnyis
ni/ byin gyis brlab tu rung ba dag yin no/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag me skyes lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas rgyal po'i khab dang / tsam pa dag
gi bar na sho gam gyi gnas shig yod pa de'i sho gam pa 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas de gnod sbyin gdug pa zhig tu skyes pa dang / des bu'i rmi lam du 'di skad ces/ bu/ khyod kyis gnas 'dir
gnod sbyin gyi rten 'dzugs su chug la/ der dril yang gyis la thogs shig dang / gang gi tshe der su dag zong las sho gam mi 'jal bar 'gro bar byed pa de'i tshe dril de sgra 'byin par byed cing / de
dag phyir ldog pa las sho gam chod par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bstan to/ /des gnyen bshes dang / nye du dang / rtsa lag dag la rmi lam de bzlas nas nyi ma dang / tshes grangs dang / yud tsam dang /
gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / dus shis pa la bab pa'i tshe gnas der gnod sbyin gyi rten 'dzugs su bcug nas der dril yang byas te btags so/ /grong khyer tsam pa na bram ze zhig gis/ rigs
mnyam pa las chung ma blangs ba dang / bram ze mo de bsam pa/ bdag bram zes thabs de dang de dag gis bsgrub pa'i nor dag spyod cing / las ci yang mi byed par 'dug pa ni/ bdag gi tshul
dang mthun pa ma yin no/ /snyam nas de tshong 'dus su song ste ras bal nyos nas sel gyis zhag par byas shing bkal te tha ga pa mkhas pa la kaR+sha pa Na stong ri ba'i ras zung cig 'thag tu bcug

go /de nas des bram ze la smras pa/ ras zung 'di kaR+sha pa Na stong ri ba lags kyi/ tshong 'dus su bzhud la gang dag kaR+sha pa Na stong gis 'jal ba la ni/ stsol cig /gal te des mi 'jal na/ tshong 'dus ma

yin no/ /zhes bsgrags nas gzhan du bzhud par mdzod cig /des de khyer te tshong 'dus su song ba na kaR+sha pa Na stong gis nyo ba su yang med nas des tshong 'dus ma yin no/ /zhes bsgrags te ras zung de
gdugs kyi rtsa ba'i nang du bcug ste 'gron po dag dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo / /ji tsam na tsam pa'i bar gyi sho gam gyi gnas su phyin pa dang / sho gam pas 'gron po de dag la sho gam
bcad pa na/ de dag gis sho gam phul nas dong / de nas dril sgra 'byin par byed nas sho gam pa dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /dril 'di ltar sgra 'byin pa las na/ 'gron po dag gis sho gam
legs par ma phul gor ma chag gi /yang sho gam gcad do/ /zhes de dag gis 'gron po dag yang phyir bkug ste btsal na/ sho gam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med do/ /de dag dang pa dang / yang dril
sgra 'byin pa nyid du byed nas de dag gis 'gron po dag yang phyir bkug ste btsal na/ sho gam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med par gyur nas 'gron po dag nged la khyed cag chom po byed par sems sam

ci na/ yang dang yang du phyir 'gugs par byed ces smod par byed do/ /de dag gis 'gron po de dag tshoms gnyis su byas te bkye ba dang / tshoms gang gi nang na bram ze de med pa dag ni/ de bzhin dong ngo /
tshoms gcig shos 'dong ba na/ dril de de bzhin du sgra 'byin par byed nas de dag gis de dag kyang de bzhin du tshoms gnyis su byas shing byas shing bkye ba dang / tha
mar bram ze de gcig pu nyi tshe lus par gyur nas/ de de dag gis bzung ngo / /des bdag la cung zad kyang med kyi/ tshol cig ces smras pa dang / de dag gis btsal nas ci yang med nas btang ba na/
yang dril de sgra 'byin pa nyid du byed do/ /de dag gis bram ze de yang phyir bkug nas smras pa/ kye bram ze/ lha'i byin gyi rlabs ni/ de ltar gyur na/ khyod bden par smros shig dang / kho bo cag
khyod la sho gam mi len to/ /des smras pa/ bden par mi len tam/ de dag gis smras pa/ mi len to/ des gdugs kyi rtsa ba'i nang nas ras zung de phyung ste bstan to/ /de dag kye ma/ lha'i byin
gyi rlabs ni/ 'di 'dra'o/ /zhes ngo mtshar chen po skyes bar gyur nas de dag gis de'i ras ya gcig phye ste lha la bstan to/ /bram zes smras pa/ kye khyed cag na re/ sho gam mi len to zhes zer
na| thams cad 'phrog gam/ de dag gis smras pa/ bram ze/ nged cag len par mi byed de/ lha'i byin gyis rlabs de lta phu mdzad pas/ nged kyis lha la bstan par zad kyi/ longs la song zhig /

des de blangs nas yang gdugs kyi rtsa ba'i nang du bcug ste song nas khad kyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to/ /des tshong 'dus su ras zung de bkram pa na der yang kaR+sha pa Na stong gis nyo ba su yang med

nas des rgyal po'i khab kyi tshong 'dus kyang tshong 'dus ma yin no/ /zhes bsgrags so/ /de na gzhon nu me skyes glang po che la zhon te rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung ste tshong 'dus kyi nang nas rang gi khyim du

'gro bas de thos pa dang / des shes ldan dag /bram ze de ci'i phyir tshong 'dus ma yin no/ /zhes sgrog par byed pa dri bar bya'i/ bos shig /de dag gis de bos nas me skyes kyis smras pa/ bram ze/ khyod

ci'i phyir tshong 'dus 'di tshong 'dus ma yin no/ /zhes sgrog par byed/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag ras zung 'di lta bu kaR+sha pa Na stong gis nyo ba su yang med pa'i phyir ro/ /des smras pa/ blta'i/ khyer
te shog /des de nye bar bstan to/ /me skyes kyis smras pa/ bram ze/ de tsam ni/ ri mod kyi/ 'on kyang ras gcig ni/ spyad zin pa zhig /gcig ni/ ma spyad pa zhig pas/ ma spyad pa gang yin pa 'di ni/

kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya ri/ gang spyad pa 'di ni/ nyis brgya lnga bcu ri'o/ /bram zes smras pa/ ci/ 'di de lta bur 'gyur ram/ me skyes kyis smras pa/ bram ze/ khyod kyis mngon sum du bstan gyi/ ltos shig/

ces des ma spyad pa de steng gi nam mkha' la bor ba dang / de skyengs shing 'dug go /spyad pa bor ba na/ de ma thag tu phyir lhung ngo / /bram ze ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa/ khyim bdag/ khyod ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/
mthu che ba zhig go /me skyes kyis yang ltos shig /ces smras nas/ des ma spyad pa gang yin pa de/ tsher ma'i steng du bor na/ ma thogs par song ngo / /gcig shos de bor na/ tsher ma la thogs
nas bram ze de/ ngo mtshar chen po des mngon par dad par gyur nas smras pa/ khyim bdag /khyod ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba zhig pas/ khyod rin ji tsam gyis bzhed pa de

tsam gyis snoms shig /des smras pa/ bram ze/ khyod mgron yin gyi/ khyod nyid la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir kaR+sha pa Na stong nyid sbyin par bya'o/ /zhes des de la kaR+sha pa Na stong byin pa dang / bram zes de

blangs nas song ngo / /me skyes kyis de dag las gang spyad pa de ni/ khye'u zhig la byin/ ma spyad pa ni/ khrus ras su byas so/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzang
gi thog na blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing 'dug pa'i tshe/ me skyes kyis khrus ras khang pa'i steng du skam du bcug pa rlung gis nam mkha' la khyer nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i steng
du lhung ba dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /rgyal po la 'os pa'i gos 'di lta bu ga las 'ongs/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po nga las nu byung ba'i tshe ni/ dgung bdun du ring po che'i
char bab bo/ /zhes thos nas/ lha la yang na bza'i char bab pa las na/ ring po mi thogs par rin po che'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag me
skyes lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan la/ 'di yang lha'i gos nam mkha' las 'ongs pa zhig na/ de 'ongs dang sbyin par bya'i/ zhog cig ces bsgo'o/ /de dag de
skad smra ba'i tshe nyid na me skyes 'ongs pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu/ khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan la/ nga la yang lha'i gos nam
mkha' las lhung ba 'di lta bu yod kyi/ de khyod khyer cig /des lag pa brkyang ste smras pa/ lha/ g.yar snga brim gyi/ tshur stsal zhes brtags na/ ji tsam na bdag gis khrus ras yin par mthong nas cung
zad bgad de smras pa/ lha/ 'di bdag gi khrus ras bser mas 'tshal nas 'dir mchis pa lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu/ da khyod kyis lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur tam/ lha/
