'gyur ba'i gnas yod par 'gyur srid kyi/ thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o/ /snyam nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ bdag la stsol cig dang / bdag gis de la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos
smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi lag nas dbul ba bsngags pas/ rang gi lag nyid nas dbul gyi/ de ston cig /de'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan nyin mo spyod pa'i phyir shing
ljon pa zhig gi drung na nye bar brten cing 'dug go /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de ni/ shing ljon pa zhig gi drung na nye
bar brten cing mchis kyi/ bzhud cig /de de'i gan du song ste bltas pa dang / re zhig na/ de shin tu mi sdug pa mthong ba dang / de ma dad pa skyes nas mi dga' ste/ bzhin phyir phyogs nas
gos 'phangs te phyir song ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/ gang dag nga yi gzugs la rtog /sgra la'ang rjes su 'brang byed pa/ /'dod pa'i
dbang du gyur pa yin/ /skye bo de dag nga mi mthong / /gal te nang ni shes gyur cing / /phyi rol dag la mi lta ba/ /nang gi 'bras bu mthong ba gang / /de gnyis sgra yis khrid par 'gyur/ /gal
te nang ni mi shes shing / /phyi rol rnam par mthong gyur pa/ /phyi rol 'bras bu mthong ba gang / /de yang sgra yis khrid par 'gyur/ /gal te nang yang mi shes shing / /phyi rol dag kyang ma mthong
ba| |kun tu rmongs pa'i byis pa dag /de yang sgra yis khrid par 'gyur/ /gal te nang yang rab shes shing / /phyi rol dag kyang mthong ba yi/ /brtan po shes rab phyogs pa de/ /sgra yis khrid
par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis
las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ mdog ngan zhing lus chung la skad snyan par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /rigs kyi bu snyan pa bzang
ldan nyid kyi/ las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pa/ snyan pa bzang ldan nyid kyis las
byas shing bsags pa dag /gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i
khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang /
skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge
slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/ ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba
'jig /'jig rten du byung ste/ des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das
pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /rgyal po mdzes ldan gyis de'i sku la mchod pa dag byas nas mchod rten 'khor yug tu dpag tshad re re yod pa/ gnam 'phang du dpag
tshad phyed dang gnyis pa zhig byed du gzhug par brtsams nas de'i lag gi gla mi dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la/ dge ba'i bsam pa can/ las byed pa la brtson pa zhig bskos so/ /de
na yang gla mi gzhan zhig yod pa des mchod rten ha cang chen po rtsom pa de mthong nas lta zhing shes ldan dag /rgyal po 'dis 'di lta bu'i mchod rten chen po byed du gzhug par brtsams
pa| nam tsam zin par 'gyur ma shes so/ /zhes 'phya bar brtsams pa dang / de la lag gi glas smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje/ ci'i phyir 'phya bar byed/ gal te mi nus na/ las bya ba thong
zhig /de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / lag gi gla des de phyir dbyung bar brtsams so/ /des de la bzod pa gsol nas yang las bya bar brtsams pa na/ mchod rten de ma zin nas
des yang 'phya bar brtsams pa dang / lag gi gla des de phyir phyung ngo / /yang shin tu 'bad de bzod pa gsol nas las bya bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na mchod rten blta bas mi ngoms
pa| srog chags 'bum phrag mang po dag gi mig dang / yid 'phrog par byed pa zhig zin par gyur to/ /de nas gla mi des de mthong nas 'di ltar las byed pa na/ bdag gi 'di la dpyas
pa ni/ ma legs pa zhig byas so /zhes 'gyod pa skyes nas 'di la rnam pa thams cad du mchod pa bya'o/ /zhes des de'i gla rngan ci thob pa de las gser gyi dril bu byed du bcug nas sems
mngon par dad pas mchod rten de la btags so/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe de'i dus na gla mi gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong snyan pa bzang ldan 'di nyid yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi mchod rten gyi las byed pa na/ dpyas pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas ni/ mdog ngan zhing lus chung bar skyes so/ /yang dad pa skyes nas gser
gyi dril bu byed du bcug nas mchod rten la btags pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des ni/ skad snyan par gyur to/ /de nas yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams
cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ des tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad sgras khyab par
gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /rigs kyi bu snyan pa bzang ldan nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /ces bya ba'i
bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ sten pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams

kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste/ de wA ra NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/ /wA ra NA si dang / drang srong smra ba'i
bar na a mra'i shing ljon pa zhig yod pa de la/ bya ko ki la pho zhig gnas pa des gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung wA ra NA sir bsod snyoms la gshegs pa de'i tshe/ de la
shin tu rtog cing sgra snyan pa khyad par can phyung nas de bzhin yang dang yang du bltas pas sems tshim par gyur nas dad pa skyes so/ /des dus gzhan zhig na skad 'byin cing yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dga' ba dang / bde ba skyes te/ a mra'i shing ljon pa de nyid la 'dug go /'dug ma thag tu bya khra zhig gis srog dang phral te 'chi
ba'i dus byas nas las drug la mkhas pa'i bram ze zhig tu skyes so/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bya ko ki la gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong snyan pa bzang ldan 'di nyid yin te/ des yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la sgra snyan pa phyung ste bskor ba byas pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad sgras khyab par gyur to/ /de nas yang dge slong rnams
the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin
pas| bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis te bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag snyan po rnams kyi
mchog tu bstan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni/ smon lam gyi dbang gis te/ gang du smon lam btab can/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung de nyid kyi gsung

rab la dge slong zhig rab tu byung bar gyur pa de/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /de na 'dis kyang tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na/
yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas de'i 'og 'chi ba'i tshe 'di skad ces/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar tshe ji srid par tshangs
par spyod pa spyad na/ yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob ste/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la
bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye rgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed cing / ji ltar mkhan po 'di
bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das des skad kyi gtang
rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces btab pas smon lam de'i dbang gis/ da ltar nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra
bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ ngas dge slong skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan te/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par
smin pa ni/ nag pa zhes bya ba nas dge slong dag khyed kyis da ltar bslab par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal
byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ji tsam na dge slong dag chos 'don pa nyid na rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshogs gtor ba bzhin 'don la/ mu stegs
can rnams ni/ skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don to/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ nang par sngar langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro'o
des mu stegs can rnams skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don pa thos nas/ des bsam pa/ mu stegs can rnams kyis chos 'dul ba ni/ nyes par smras pa yin yang / 'di skad kyi gtang
rag gis gzhung 'don la/ bdag gi 'phags pa rnams ni/ gzhung 'don pa nyid na rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshogs gtor ba bzhin 'don pas/ 'di nyid bdag gi bya ba yin no/ /snyam nas
de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag
mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'di ltar re zhig mu stegs can rnams kyi chos 'dul ba ni/ nyes par smras pa lags kyang / de dag
skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don par bgyid la/ 'phags pa rnams ni/ gzhung 'don pa nyid na rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshogs gtor ba bzhin 'don pas/ de la gal te bcom ldan
'das kyis 'phags pa rnams kyang skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don par gnang na legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /
khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ khyed kyis skad kyi gtang rag
gis chos 'don par gnang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos 'don par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams skad kyi gtang rag gis lung 'bog
par byed/ 'don par byed/ kha ton byed/ yongs su 'dri bar byed do/ /ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba na das thos nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/
ci| khyed kyi gtsug lag khang 'dir rol mo mkhan gyi brang btab bam/ skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| dge slong gis skad kyi gtang rag gis lung 'bog par mi bya/ gdon par mi bya/ kha ton mi bya/ yongs su dri bar mi bya'o/ /'di ltar/ ston pa'i yon tan yang dag par bsgrag
pa dang / rgyud chags gsum pa gdon pa dag ni/ skad kyi gtang rag gis gdon par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag gis de dag gdon par bya'o/ /zhes bka'
stsal pa dang / gzhon nu zhig skad kyi gtang rag mi shes nas des gzhung dag bton pa nyid na/ rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshogs gtor ba bzhin bton par gyur nas dge slong dag gis smras pa/
tshe dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skad kyis gtang rag gnang gi/ skad kyi gtang rag gis thon cig /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag gis skad kyi gtang rag mi shes so/ /
skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skad kyi gtang rag bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag
bslab par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams khyams dang / gnas khang dang / sgo khang dag na skad kyi gtang rag slob par byed pa na/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gtsug
lag khang du 'ongs pa dang / des thos nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /gtsug lag khang 'di rol mo mkhan gyi brang ma lags na/ khyed kyi da dung yang rol mo mkhan dag ma gtang ngam/ skabs de
dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dben pa'i phyogs su skad kyi gtang rag dag bslab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig 'greng ste lhung bzed kyi snod nas lhung bzed 'byin pa dang / dge slong dag gis de
la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ 'greng ste lhung bzed ma 'byin cig /des smras pa/ ci nyes/ de dag gis smras pa/ lhung ste chag par 'gyur mod/ gzhan ci nyes
par 'gyur/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis 'greng ste lhung
bzed dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du gzhug pa dang / bkru ba dang / bskam pa dag la yang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/ /sdom la/ lam phran dang ni snod gsum dang / /phying ba dra bar mi bya dang / /
gding ba dang ni mi 'bral ba/ /drang srong chen pos rjes su gnang / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi phu dag na chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi nags ri dwags kyi gnas
na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs ldan gyi khang bzang pad+ma can tshon brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa byed du bcug cing ras gsar pa kha tshar ring po can dag gis 'chal bar
bting ste/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa'i tshe bcom ldan 'das khang bzang pad+ma can du gshegs bzhed pa na/ ma gshegs pa
dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs ldan gyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gshegs su gsol/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs ldan gyis ras
rnams bsdus pa/ mu stegs can rnams kyis thos nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ bkur sti de lta bI gnas ma yin no/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge
slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /gal te bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis lam phran dag tu yang
ras gsar pa/ kha tshar ring po can dag bting zhing / 'phags pa dag /bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gshegs su gsol zhes zer na/ mu stegs can rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i
phyir mi rtag pa yid la bya bas zil gyis mnan cing 'dong bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi phu dag na chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs
rung gi nags ri dwags kyi gnas na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig lhung bzed lag na thogs te song ba dang / de phyogs gzhan zhig tu bsgyel nas lhung bzed de sa la lhung ste chag nas de'i
bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis lhung bzed lag na bkur
bar mi bya bar lhung bzed kyi snod du bcug ste bkur bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lhung bzed lag na bkur bar mi bya bar lhung bzed kyi snod du bcug ste bkur bar
bya'o| |zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams lhung bzed kyi snod du bcug ste lag pa nyid na khyer te 'dong ba na nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur pa'i
skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhung bzed kyi snod lag na bkur bar mi bya bar lung thag btags
te mchan khung gis bkur bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams don
mthun dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ngo / /ji tsam na bram ze zhig na nas de sman pa'i gan du song ste smras pa/ kye bdag nyid chen po/ kho bo'i nad kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sman ston
cig /des smras pa/ jo bo/ a ru ra gsol dang snyun gdangs par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ lam ga 'di na a ru ra ga la yod/ des smras pa/ bram ze/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong 'di
dag ni| mkhas pa lags pas/ 'di dag la khyod kyis bslangs na/ 'di dag la mchis par 'gyur gda'o/ /de dge slong rnams kyi drung du song ste dris pa/ 'phags pa dag la a ru ra
lta mchis sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ bram ze yod na/ de cir dgos/ bdag la sman pa'i mchis nas/ a ru ra tshol cig ces mchis na/ gal te mnga' na/ bdag la stsal du

gsol/ dge slong des de'i mdun du lhung bzed kyi snod phye ba dang / de nyid na snyung bu yang 'dug cing de nyid na gri'u dang / de nyid na 'brang bu dang / de nyid na sman dag 'dug pa bram zes mthong nas
smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /khyed ni/ kun tu spyod pa mi gtsang ba yin te/ 'di 'dra ba za ba bas ni/ bdag shi yang ches bla'i/ mi tsang ba za ba ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/
dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod gsum bcang bar bya ste/ lhung bzed kyi snod dang / sman snod dang / bar bur snod rnams
so| |dge slong dag gis de dag gis lung thag mnyam par btags pas/ de dag gis mchan khung rlo bar gyur pa dang / ma dang pha dag 'phags pa dag /ci/ khyed rdza rnga thogs te 'gro'am zhes co
'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mnyam par gdags par mi bya bar ci rigs par gdags
par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis ras ma phra mo dag btags pas de dag lan par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras ma zheng chen po dag gdags par bya'o/ /de dag gis zheng
chen po btags pa dang / de dag nyid zhum nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dkyil phying bu dang sbyar te skabs skabs su srubs bya rog rkang dag drub par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig gis phying pa zhig rnyed nas des bsam pa/ bcom ldan
'das kyis chos gos gsum dras te btsang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal gyi/ dra'o/ /snyam nas des gri'u dang / khab dag khyer nas shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyang phyogs der gshegs te gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ dge slong / 'di ci yin/ des gsol ba/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis chos gos gsum dras te bcang bar
bya'o| |zhes bka' stsal pas/ bdag gis phying ba 'di rnyed nas chos gos su 'dra ba lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa la gus pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams
la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ lnga po 'di dag ni/ dra bar mi bya ste/ be'u ras thams cad dang / la ba thams cad dang / phying ba thams cad dang / klam thams cad dang /
seng ba thams cad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig bya ba zhig gi ched du gtsug
lag khang gzhan du song ba dang / de der nam sros par gyur nas gnas mal gyi zhal ta byed pas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ gnas mal dag nos shig /des smras pa/ bdag gis gding
ba khyer te ma 'ongs so/ /gnas mal gyi zhal ta byed pas smras pa/ gal te de lta na/ khri brling ba nos shig /des khri brling ba mnos nas nyal ba dang / de grang ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen bzhin du
mtshan mo 'das nas na bar gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis gding ba med
par 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /'gro na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gding ba med par 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams deng
nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas/ de'i nyen kor gyi gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro ba dang / 'chag tu 'gro ba dang / grong gzhan tu 'gro ba de dag tu yang gding ba khyer ba na/ gnas brtan rgan
po rgas pa nyam chung ba rnams dang / nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa rnams nyam thag par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas 'gro ba der yang gding ba med par 'gror ma
gnang ngo / /zhes ma gnang ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis nyen kor dang / nyin
mo spyod du 'gro ba la gding ba bkur bar mi bya'o/ /grong gzhan du 'gro ba na/ deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas 'gro na/ der yang bkur bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong gzhan dag gding ba med par grong
gzhan du deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas 'gro ba na/ de rnams la bya ba'i rnam pa de lta bu dag byung nas de nam sros par gyur pa dang / de dag bslab pa la
gus pas nub mo phyir dong ba na/ seng ge dang / stag dang / chom rkun pa dang / g.yon can dag gis bgrod par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba
dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te de ltar bsam ste dong ba dag der nam sros par gyur nas de nyid du gnas par bya ste/ 'di ltar tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa dag
las gding ba brnyas te nyal bar bya'o/ /gal te rnyed na/ de lta na legs/ gal te ma rnyed na/ bla gos bzhi ltab tu byas te bting la yun thung du ni/ nyal/ yun ring du ni/ mi nyal bar
mtshan mo 'da' bar bya'o/ /dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge slong zhig las gding ba brnyas pa dang / de la rmi lam gyi gnod pa byung nas des mi gtsang bas ma rung bar gyur pa de bzhin
du dge slong de la phyir dbul bar brtsams pa dang / des ma 'dod pa'i skabs de zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bkrus te sbyin par
bya'o| |dge slong des bkrus te byin na/ 'on kyang de len par mi byed pa'i skabs de zhes bya ba'i bar du yang snga ma bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ri ba'i rin sbyin
par bya ba'am/ de'i sems mgu bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gtsug lag khang gzhan dang / grong gzhan dag tu deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas chos gos gsum po dag med par dong ba dang /
de rnams der dong ba dag la ji tsam na bya ba'i rnam pa de lta bu dag byung ste/ der nam sros par gyur to/ /de dag bslab pa la gus pas mtshan mo phyir dong ba na/ seng ge dang / stag dang / chom rkun
pa dang / g.yon can dag gis bgrod par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te de lta bu'i
bsam pas dong pa rnams der nam sros par gyur na/ de nyid du 'dug par bya zhing / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag las chos gos dag brnyas te byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de rnams chos
gos dag brnyas nas ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snga ma rang gi sems kyis phyung la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /lnga po 'di dag ni/
sems bskyed pas 'grub ste/ gso sbyong dang / dgag dbye dang / chos gos byin gyis brlab pa dang / chos gos dbyung ba dang / gang zag mgron du bos pa'o/ /dge slong de dag gis chos gos
dras shing kha dog ma bsgyur ba dag rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dras shing kha dog ma bsgyur ba dag rnyed na/ dras shing kha dog ma bsgyur ba dag byin gyis brlab par
bya'o/ /ci ste kha dog ma bsgyur cing ma dras pa dag rnyed na/ lhan thabs kyis glan la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /gal te rnyed na/ de lta na legs/ gal te ma rnyed
na| de bzhin byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /tha na khyim pa'i gos la yang byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal
mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong dag cig gding ba med par yul gzhan du dong ba dang / der dong ba de rnams 'gyod par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams
kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ngas chos gos gsum dang 'bral bar ni/ gsungs kyi/ gding ba dang ni ma yin te/ de lta
bas na/ bsam bzhin du bzhag ste 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /brjed pa la ni/ ltung ba med do/ /sdom la/ chu tshags la ni rnam bzhi dang / /snod rnams dang ni gcig tu za/ /gos gcig gis ni
za ba dang / /sgren mor khrus ni byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /lho lam nas dge slong bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba gnyis shig mnyan yod du dong ngo / /de gnyis lam du chu zad nas skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa na/ rdzing bu zhig gi drung du phyin nas de
gnyis las gcig gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis myur du chu rtogs shig dang btung ngo / /des brtag par brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na chu ma dag par gyur nas des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/
bskal pa 'bum phrag stong dag tu/ /gang zhig mthong bar rab dka' bas/ /bdag gis chu dag 'thungs nas ni/ /de nas 'dren pa blta bar bya/ /gcig shos kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ gang
zhig sems can rnams la ring nas thugs rje zhing / /srid pa kun la chags pa gtan nas spangs gyur pa/ /de yi bstan mchog 'di la bslab pa yis/ /srog nyid spang gi srog chags gsad par bya ba
min/ /de nas gang gis chu 'thungs pa de ni/ song ngo / /gang gis chu ma 'thungs pa des ni/ brtson 'grus brtsams te shing ljon pa zhig gis drung du 'dug nas des ji srid du lus kyi mthu yod pa de

srid dge ba'i phyogs dag byas shing gang gi tshe lus kyi mthu dang bral ba de'i tshe 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid
ni| skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis skyes pa'o/ /des mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i
ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas pas skyes par mthong ngo / /de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir bdag
yongs su gnas pa bsten te bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni/ bdag tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyi/ bdag yongs
su gnas pa ma bsten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor g.yo zhing dri ma med pa
thogs te do shal dang / se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba dag gis thu ba bkang ste kha dog shin tu 'das
pas| mtshan mo la bab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang / 'di ltar sngon dge slong lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge slong lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos nas sngon dge slong lha'i bus stan de nyid la
'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa
bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/ /des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang
ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams
pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho
ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag go/ zhes lan gsum ched du
brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /yang smras pa/ khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i/ /ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i/ /mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni/ /mya ngan 'das
pa'i shul yang thob par gyur/ /shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni/ /de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing / /go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste/ sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha
rol brgal bar gyur/ /'gro ba lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po/ /srid pa stong du mthong ba rab dkon pa/ /thub pa da ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis/ /de nas 'dud
byas do shal rab 'phyang bas/ /zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas/ dgra thul g.yas nas yongs su bskor byas te/ /lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha'

la song / /de na sngon dge slong lha'i bu tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang / zhing pa lo tog 'byor pa lta bu dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang / nad pa nad thams cad las yongs
su thar pa lta bur gyur te/ cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong gcig shos de yang khad kyis mnyan
yod du phyin to/ /de nas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab ste rkang pa dag bkrus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa la/ dge slong / khyod da gzod gang nas 'dir 'ongs/
dbyar gang du gnas zhes yang dag par dga' bas yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la khyod ga las 'dir 'ongs/ dbyar gang du gnas zhes
yang dag par dga' ba mdzad pa dang / des gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag lho phyogs nas da gzod 'dir mchis te/ lho phyogs su dbyar gnas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| dge slong khyod la grogs dge slong lta yod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ mchis so/ /de gar song / /des ji ltar gyur pa gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka'
stsal pa/ nga yi bstan lam gus gang / /des ni nga mthong ci zhig phan/ /des ni nga la bltas na yang / /mthong ba ma yin mchod pa min/ /nga yi bslab la gang slob pa'i/ /dge slong des ni nga mthong
ste| |shes rab dman pa khyod kyis kyang / /sangs rgyas mngon sum ma mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku las bla gos phye nas yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ ltos shig
dge slong lus 'di la/ /gtsang zhing gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /sngon gyi las kyi rnam smin dang / /pha dang ma las byung ba'o/ /gang gis chos nyid ma mthong ba/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des mi mthong /
gang gis chos nyid mthong gyur pa/ /de yis thub pa chen po mthong / /gzhan yang / brtan zhing dge ba'i blo gros can/ /bslab pa rjes su srung byed pa/ /de yi dang por nga la ni/ /gzugs kyi sku dang
chos skur mthong / /bdag nyid chen po 'od srung gi /bslab mtshams 'das pas da dung du/ /e la'i 'dab de klu yi ni/ /skye gnas dag las ma thar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/
nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams chu tshags mi 'chang ba las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis chu tshags nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chu tshags
nye bar bzhag par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag chu tshags du yod mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu tshags ni/ lnga ste/
chu tshags gru gsum dang / bum tshags lce'u can dang / ril ba zhabs tshags can dang / dbyangs tshags dang / bsal tshags rnams so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na
rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong phan tshun zhe 'gras pa gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo / /de dag las gcig la ni/ chu
tshags yod/ gcig shos la ni/ med do/ /gang la yod pa des chu btsags te 'thungs pa dang / gang la med pa des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ chu tshags g.yor cig /des ma ster nas
de phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis zhe
'gras pa dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /gal te de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na/ gcig la gcig bzod pa gsol te dong bar bya'o// //'dul ba phran
tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po lnga pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong
gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang / de dag las gcig la ni/ chu tshags yod/ gcig shos la ni/ med nas de la des dris pa/ khyod la chu tshags yod dam/ des smras pa yod do/ /sbyin
nam mi sbyin zhes ni/ ma smras so/ /de dag las gang la chu tshags yod pa des ni/ chu 'thungs pa dang / gang la med pa des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ chu tshags g.yor cig /des smras pa/ tshe dang
ldan pa khyod kyis bdag la chu tshags ni/ /dris kyi/ sbyin nam mi sbyin ma dris pas/ de byas pa khyod la kho bos chu tshags ci'i phyir sbyin/ mi sbyin gyi/ song zhig /des de la ma byin par de phongs
par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'gro bar 'dod pa'i dge slong gis gal te chu tshags med na/
dge slong grogs po la khyed la chu tshags yod dam med dri bar bya'o/ /gal te yod do/ /zhes zer na/ bdag la sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes brjod par bya zhing / gal te sbyin no/ /zhes zer na/ 'gro
bar bya'i/ /gzhan du na 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na
dge slong gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo / /de dag las gcig la ni/ chu tshags yod/ gcig shos la ni/ med pa dang / gang la med pa des de la dris pa/ khyod la chu tshags yod dam med
des smras pa/ yod do/ /bdag la g.yar ram mi g.yar/ g.yar ro/ /de dag dong ba dang / ji tsam na lam kar 'gron po dag cig 'ongs nas gang la chu tshags
yod ba de'i bya ba gang yin pa de 'gron po de nyid las grub ste/ de phyir ldog par brtsams pa dang / gcig shos des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis bdag la chu tshags khas blangs pa
g.yor cig /des smras pa/ de lta bas na/ de ni/ bden na/ des na bdag gis chu tshags pa'i slad du byin gyi/ thams cad kyi thams cad du byin pa ni/ ma yin no/ /zhes ma byin pas de
phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gang la chu tshags med pa des/ dge slong
grogs po la khyod la chu tshags yod dam med ces dri bar bya'o/ /gal te yod do/ /zhes zer na/ des ji bdag la sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te sbyin no/ /zhes zer na/ gal
te khyod slar ldog par gyur tam/ gzhan du 'gro bar gyur na/ sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te sbyin no zhes zer na/ 'gro bar bya'i/ gzhan du na 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ chu tshags ma mchis par gtsug lag khang gzhan nam/ grong gzhan du mchir gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor mi gnang ngo / /gal te der song nas phongs par mi 'gyur
na/ gnang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis bcom
ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ chu tshags gcig gis gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing mchir gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor/ gal te der song nas phongs par mi 'gyur na/ gnang ngo / /btsun pa/ chu
tshags gcig gis mang po rnams sam/ dge 'dun dag ljongs rgyu mchir gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor/ gal te der song nas phongs par mi 'gyur na/ gnang ngo / /btsun pa/ chu tshags ma
mchis par chu klung gi 'gram nas mchir gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor/ gnang ste/ mgyogs pa la gal te chu gzhan dang 'dres par ma gyur na/ rgyang grags re re zhing brtag par bya'o/ /chu
gzhan dang 'dres par gyur na/ gang dang gang du len pa de dang der brtag par bya'o/ /mi mgyogs pa la ni/ 'gram dang 'gram du brtag par bya'o/ /de la mgyogs pa ni/ /rgyun myur ba'o/ /mi
mgyogs pa ni/ rgyun bul ba'o/ /btsun pa/ 'gram gyi nyen kor gang lags/ nye bar 'khor/ 'dom gang kho ra khor yug go /btsun pa/ chab ma btsags shing ma brtags pa 'tshal du
gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor/ mi gnang ngo / /btsun pa/ chab ma btsags shing brtags pa 'tshal du gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor/ mig gis dag go /zhes bya ste
gnang ngo / /btsun pa/ chab btsags shing brtags pa 'tshal du gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor/ gnang ngo / /'on kyang chu rung ba ni/ lnga ste/ dge 'dun gyis rung ba dang / gang zag gis rung ba
dang / chu tshags kyis rung ba dang / chu mig gis rung ba dang / khron pas rung ba'o/ /de la dge 'dun gyis rung ba ni/ gang dge 'dun mthun pas bskos pa'i dge slong gis chu btsags par
gyur pa ste/ dge 'dun gyis rung ba de la dge slong gis longs spyad par bya'o/ /gang zag gis rung ba ni/ dge slong gang tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / lta ba ma nyams pa dang / spyod
pa ma nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba ma nyams pas yongs su dag par gyur pa ste/ gang zag gis rung ba de la dge slong gis longs spyad par bya'o/ /chu tshags kyis rung ba ni/ chu tshags gang
nam yang ma brtags pa ma yin pa des btsags pa ste/ btung bar bya'o/ /chu mig gis rung ba ni/ 'bab pa'o/ /khron pas rung ba ni/ khron pa gang gi chu dag pa de las nyi ma nub kar
blangs nas ji srid nyi ma shar gyi bar du ste/ khron pas rung ba'i chu btung bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams ha cang yun ring du chu rnyog pas 'khrug pa mthong bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ glang drug gi shing rta smyig mas bkang ba 'khor ba tsam mam/ ji tsam gyis yid ches pa de tsam du brtag par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal
byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge slong rnams la sder spyad dag 'bul bar byed pa na/ dge slong rnams
mi len to/ /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe ni/ mu stegs can dag yon gnas lags/ da ni/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bas khyed yon gnas lags te/ gal te khyed kyis ma bzhes na/ ci/ bdag cag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu dge ba'i lam rgyags
ma mchis par mchi'am/ bzhes shig /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi phyir sder spyad dag blang
bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi phyir sder spyad dag blang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis de dag blangs nas mdzod du bcug ste bzhag nas de bzhin
du lhung bzed dag tu za ba dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis mthong ste smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /bdag cag gis sder spyad phul ba de dag mi gda' na/ dge slong rnams
kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag /mdzod na 'dug go /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /ci/ bdag cag gi khyim na gnas ma mchis te/ bdag cag gis khyed la
phul lam/ yongs su longs spyod na/ bdag cag la yongs su longs spyad pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i bsod nams su 'gyur ba zhig na/ khyed kyis kyang mdzod du bcug pa lta/ skabs de/ dge
slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin bdag gis byin pa'i sder spyad dag yongs su longs spyad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis sbyin bdag gis byin pa'i sder spyad yongs su longs spyad par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis yongs su longs spyad par brtsams so/ /bram ze dang /
khyim bdag gzhan rgya chen po la mos pa de dag gis/ sder spyad tshad chen po dag phul ba dang / dge slong gnas brtan rnams de dag 'khru bas ngal bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ sder spyad kyi zhal ta pa bsko bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba bsko bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bye brag med par bsko nas bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos lnga dang mi ldan pa'i sder spyad kyi zhal ta pa ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar mi bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang /
zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / sder spyad brims pa dang ma brims pa dag mi shes pa'o/ /chos lnga dang ldan pa'i sder spyad kyi zhal ta pa ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar bya/
bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar mi bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis ma yin pa dang / gti mug gis ma yin pa dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / sder spyad brims
pa dang ma brims pa dag shes pa'o/ /bsko ba ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge 'dun rnams la bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te
'dug pa dang / re zhig dang por spro bar byas te ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod/ dge 'dun gyi sder spyad 'brim par bsko bar spro'am/ gal te spro na/ des spro'o/ /zhes smra bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge
slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi sder spyad 'brim par spro ste/ gal te dge
'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ sder spyad kyi zhal ta pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sder
spyad 'brim par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ /dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun la sder spyad
'brim par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sder spyad kyi zhal ta par bsko zhing / sder spyad kyi zhal ta pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la
sder spyad 'brim par 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang ngag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sder spyad kyi zhal ta par bsko bar bzod pa gang yang cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni
gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas sder spyad kyi zhal ta pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la sder spyad dag 'brel bar 'gyur te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin
du 'dzin to/ /dge slong rnams kyis zas zos nas lhag ma 'bags bzhin du de nyid la byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhag mas 'bags pa dag lhan cig gnas pa
dang / nye gnas rnams kyis bkru bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag mas 'bags pa dag lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas rnams kyis bkru bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
dge slong gzhan dag cig la 'khor med nas/ de dag bdag nyid 'khru bar byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gi 'di sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba dag kho nas bkru
bar bya zhing / de dag gis kyang de dag la sbyin par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/
drug sde rnams lhung bzed nag po gcig tu gcig car bza' bar brtsams nas de drug car gyis mnyam du lag pa bcug pa dang / lhung bzed lag pa la thogs te/ de 'phyang bar gyur pa dang / de

dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag lhung bzed nag po cho 'phrul byed pa la ltos/ de dag gis lag pa drangs te lhung nas chag pa dang / de dag gis rta gad kyis btab pa dge slong rnams kyis mthong ste de dag gis
smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /'di lta bu mi mdzes pa byas nas gnong ste 'dug par bya ba yin na/ khyed dgod pa lta de dag gis smras pa/ ci byas/ chang 'thungs sam/ kun dong zos/ dge slong rnams
kyis smras pa/ ci de yang byed dam/ gzhan ci byas/ lhung bzed nag po ma bcag gam/ 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ ci rdza mkhan shi'am/ 'jim pa med dam/ gzhan byar zad mod/
de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong
rnams gcig tu za ba las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis gcig tu bza' bar mi bya'o/ /za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis gcig tu
bza' bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag cig 'gron po dang thabs cig chas pa/ 'gron po phyogs gcig tu zan bza' bar brtsams pa na/ dge slong de dag thams cad
la sder spyad dag mi bdog ste/ de dag re re nas zan za ba la ring zhig thogs nas 'gron po thal ba dang / chom po dag gis bcom mo/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams
kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam du zhugs pa na gal te sder spyad dag ma rnyed na/ gcig tu bza' bar bya ste/ lag pa ni/ re re nas
gzhug par bya zhing dbyung bar bya'i/ gcig car du ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lam du zhugs pa na/ gal te sder spyad dag ma rnyed na/ gcig tu bza' bar bya'o/ /zhes bka'
stsal pa dang / de na dge tshul gang dag 'khod pa de dag dang lhan cig gcig tu za bar byed pas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhung bzed
bzung la de dag dang yang lhan cig bza' bar bya'o/ /rung ba byed pa gzhan dag cig yod pa de dag zan za ba na 'gron po rnams dang bral nas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / gong bur bsgongs la byin cig /dge slong gzhan dag cig gnyen gyi khyim du song ba dang / gnyen dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag lhan cig zos nas ring
zhig lon pas/ zan lhan cig bza'i/ tshur/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyed ni/ khyim pa/ bdag cag ni/ rab tu byung ba yin pas bzar mi rung ngo / /de dag mi dga' nas mchi mas brnangs
shing 'dug go /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te yang dang yang du don du gnyer na/ gdon mi za bar
dus kyis 'chu bar shes nas gang du gzhan dag gis mthong nas mi mdzes par mi 'gyur ba der sder spyad bzung la bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams gos gcig pu dang bsod snyoms za ba bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams
kyis mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag /zan za ba 'di dag su zhig /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ dge slong shAkya'i bu yin no/ /de dag 'phya zhing shes ldan dag /ston pa ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan
pa de lta bu la ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang bral ba 'di lta bu ga la yod ces zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams gos gcig gyon pa las gyur gyi/ de pas na/ dge slong gis gos gcig pa dang zan bza' bar mi bya'o/ /za na/ 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gos gcig pa dang zan bza' bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba dang / nad pa spyor mi bzod
pa dag chos gos rnams gyon te zan bza' bar mi nus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis rdul zan 'jam po dang zan bza' bar bya ste/ 'di
la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /'on kyang gzhan dag cig gis ma nus pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis phyogs dben par bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams chu bo dregs ldan la gcer bur khrus
byed pa bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag /gcer bu pa khrus byed pa 'di dag su zhig /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ dge sbyong shAkya'i bu yin no/ /de
dag 'phya zhing shes ldan dag /ston pa ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa de lta bu la ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang bral ba 'di lta bu dag ga la yod ces zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams
kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus byed pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/
dge slong gis sgren mor khrus mi bya'o/ /byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang khrus ras bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khrus ras bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka'
stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams nyis sbyar 'chang nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chig rkyang bcang bar bya ste/ gang la nyis sbyar yod pa des ni/ chu brtags la bkru bar bya'o/ /
chos gos gsum pa rnams mi rung ngo / /snyam nas mi 'chang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs te bcang bar bya'o/ /gzhan dag cig gis
khrus ras ma rnyed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag gis khrus ras ma rnyed nas lo ma dag gis mdun dang rgyab nas g.yogs te phyogs dben pa gang na gzhan dag
gis mthong nas ma dad par mi 'gyur bar khrus bya'o/ /dge slong rnams khrus ras gcus te de dag 'gyod par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras chig rkyang la ni/
srog chags dag med mod kyi/ 'on kyang ras bshal nas bcu bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sdom ni/ mon sran gre'u dang mi rung ba'i/ /sa dang skyug cing za ba dang / /bdams shing
zas ni za ba dang / /'gyod dang 'khar ba'i lhung bzed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /tshe
dang ldan pa nam gru gang ci la yang khum 'phrig za ba zhig pas/ de'i ming nam gru khum 'khrig can/ nam gru khum 'phrig can zhes bya bar chags so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na chab khung sar zhugs
pa dang / des de na mon sran gre'u'i zha lu zhig mthong nas de la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa skyes pa/ bdag gis sa bon gyi chos ma rung bar byas so/ /snyam mo/ /
ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dag 'dun la mon sran gre'u'i bza' ba dag cig grub pa de mi za bar lhung bzed bkab ste 'dug pa dang / lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas dag gis smras pa/
mkhan po/ dge 'dun la mon sran gre'u'i bza' ba dag byung ba ci'i slad du mi gsol/ des smras pa/ bu dag /kho bos sa bon gyi chos ma rung bar byas so/ /de dag gis smras pa/
mkhan po/ ji lta bu zhig bgyis/ des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang / de dag gis kyang mi za bar brtsams so/ /de dag la 'grogs bshes rnams kyis dris pa/ ci'i phyir mi za/ de dag
gis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang / de 'khor mang po can zhig pas/ de la brten nas dge 'dun thams cad kyis ma zos so/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /sa bon gyi rigs tshos dka' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de yang rlangs pa byung na chos so/ /zhes byas nas bza'
bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye
bar 'khor gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ mi rung ba'i sa nas shing 'khrungs la/ rung ba'i sar 'bras bu dag lhags na/ yongs su longs spyod par bgyi'am/ yongs
su longs spyod par mi bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor/ yongs su longs spyod par mi bya'o/ /btsun pa/ re zhig rung ba'i sa nas shing 'khrungs la/ mi rung ba'i sar
'bras bu dag lhags na/ yongs su longs spyad par bgyi'am/ yongs su longs spyad par mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor/ gal te zhag tu ma lon na/ yongs su longs spyad par bya'o/ /btsun pa/
re zhig rung ba'i sa nas shing 'khrungs la/ mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu dag lhags na/ yongs su longs spyod par bgyi'am/ yongs su longs spyad par mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor/ yongs su
longs spyad par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gnas pa
des slong mo btab pas glang zhig rnyed do/ /de'i 'og tu ba zhig rnyed do/ /de'i 'og tu yang glang zhig rnyed do/ /de'i 'og tu yang ba zhig rnyed de/ de'i ba lang khyu longs par gyur to/ /bram ze des
thog mar rnyed pa'i glang la bkra shis kyi blo byung nas glang de yang yan du btang ngo / /dus gzhan zhig na de rgas 'khogs nyam chung bar gyur te/ de chu 'dod nas chu bo dregs ldan gyi 'gram du
song ba las 'dam du song ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang lam der song ba las des de mthong nas bsam pa/ glang 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba lta cung zad yod dam
snyam pa dang / yod par mthong ngo / /su la rag las snyam pa dang / bdag kho na la ste/ des 'dam nas phyung nas lag pas phyis so/ /de nas bzhin bzang / 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad
ni| mi rtag pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ bdag med pa'o/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ zhi ba'o/ /zhes chos tshig gsum bshad de/ nga la dang bar yang gyis shig dang / de lta na byol song
gi skye gnas las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras nas song ngo / /de yang wa dag gis zos pa dang / de wa dag gis za ba'i tshe bsam pa/ gal te 'phags pa 'dir ma
phyin na/ bdag 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su mi 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la sems mngon par dang bar byas nas dus las 'das te/ mnyan yod nyid na bram
ze las drug la brtson pa'i rigs shig tu skyes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus glang de'i gnas skabs de ji lta bu zhig yin pa bsam pa dang / ji tsam na dus las 'das par mthong ngo / /
yang gar skyes bsam pa dang / mnyan yod nyid du bram ze las drug la brtson pa'i rigs su skyes par mthong nas de khyim der yang dang yang du song zhing / des bram ze de chung ma dang bcas te
skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod do/ /de dus gzhan zhig na/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul med par song ba dang / bram ze des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci/ phyi bzhin
'brang ba'i dge tshul mi mnga' 'am/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / ci/ kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul dag rtswa ka sha la bzung ba'am/ rtswa ku sha la bzung bas 'byung ngam/ khyod lta bu
las rnyed pa gang yin pa de/ kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul du 'gyur mod/ 'phags pa/ bdag gi mchis brang 'di la sems can zhugs te/ gal te khye'ur btsas na/ de khyod kyi
phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul bgyi'o/ /bzhin bzang / nad med cig /blang ngo / /zhes smras nas song ngo / /de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu ba lang gi sha tshugs lta bu zhig btsas pa dang
de'i nye du rnams lhags te 'dus nas zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u'i ming cir gdags/ nye du rnams kyis
smras pa/ gang gi phyir khye'u 'di sha tshugs ba lang dang 'dra ba de'i phyir khye'u'i ming ba lang bdag tu gdags so/ /zhes ming ba lang bdag ces bya bar brtags so/ /de bskyed bsrings nas
chen por gyur pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /mnyan yod du bsod snyoms
la rgyu ba na/ des bram ze de'i khyim du phyin pa dang / bram ze des byon pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i smra ba kun tu spyad nas rkang pa la phyag byas so/ /chung mas
kyang de la bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo/ /khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du lta nas des bram ze la brda byas pa dang / des khye'u de la
smras pa/ bu/ khyod ngas ma btsas pa nas 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul du phul gyi/ 'phags pa dang lhan cig song zhig /sems can de srid pa tha ma pa zhig
ste| de'i phyi bzhin song ba dang des de rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te gdams ngag byin no/ /des 'bad/ brtsal/ bsgrims pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang /
mi g.yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rtogs nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad chos nyid kyis 'jig pa ltung ba/ 'gyes pa/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can du bsgoms te nyon mongs pa thams cad
spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ sems gser dang bong bar mtshungs pa/ tsan+dan dang ste'ur 'dra ba/ nam mkha' dang
lag mthil du mnyam pa/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang / rnyed pa la chags pa dang /
bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / gus par smra bar bya ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to/ /de la las las skyes
pa'i mid pa gnyis yod de/ gcig nas ni/ skyugs pa 'byin to/ /gcig shos nas ni/ mid do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i zas kyi bslab pa ma bcas pa de'i tshe ni skyug
cing mid do/ /gang gi tshe bcas pa de'i tshe ni/ skyug cing 'dor bas de lus rke/ nyam chung / shig shig po/ rod nyams par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin
du rmed pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/ kun dga' bo/ ba lang bdag ci'i phyir lus rke/ nyam chung / shig shig po/ rod
nyams par gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ gang la las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i mid pa gnyis grub pa
des skyug pa lan gnyis sam/ gsum dor te/ kha bkrus nas lhag ma mid par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /dge slong rnams zas zos nas skyugs te de dag 'gyod par gyur pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gzhan zhig zan zos te skyugs na des kha bkru bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag
rab tu phyung ba de'i tshe bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya smod kha zer zhing / dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul nyams shing / tshangs pa'i tshul
nyams te/ da ni/ ba lang bdag la sogs pa 'jigs 'jigs lta rnams kyang rab tu 'byin to/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos chen po ri rab dang 'dra ba la skye bo'i tshogs phal po che ma dad par byed kyi/ de lta bas na/ ba lang bdag yul dbus su gnas su mi gzhug
go /snyam nas tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag la bka' stsal pa/ ba lang bdag /khyod deng phyin chad yul dbus na ma gnas par mtha' 'khob kyi gnas mal dag sten cig /btsun pa/
de ltar 'tshal lo/ /zhes tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te/ shing shir sha ka'i gzhal med khang stong par
'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni/
'di lta ste/ dge slong ba lang bdag 'di yin no/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan
pa ba lang bdag gis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas sha tshugs pa lang lta bur gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ba lang bdag
nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ chu bo bzhin nye bar gnas pa/ nges par myong bar 'gyur ba yin te/ ba lang bdag nyid kyis byas pa'i
las rnams gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag/ las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma yin/ me'i khams
la ma yin/ rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dag kho na la rnam par smin
par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang / /las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba
bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen
pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /dge slong gang
gis rab tu phyung ba ni/ rgas 'khogs nyam chung ba zhig ste/ de de'i lhung bzed 'khru ba na/ dge slong gzhan zhig dang lhan cig kha ton zer ba las/ ring zhig
thogs nas de'i mkhan po des rang dgar zan zos pa dang / de kha ton la chags pas mkhan po de la 'phyas so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na zan zos nas bdag nyid kyis lhung bzed bkrus
te mkhan po'i drung du song ba dang / da dung zan za ba mthong nas de kun nas dkris pas smras pa/ mkhan po/ ci khyod glang rgan bzhin du ldad cing bzhugs sam/ des bsam pa/ 'di kun nas
dkris pas gal te cung zad cig smras na/ je thu bar 'khrug pa bskyed par 'gyur gyi/ gang gi tshe kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de'i tshe dri bar bya'o/ /snyam nas des de kun nas dkris pa dang
bral ba dang smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ ci zer/ des smras pa/ khyod glang rgan bzhin ldang ngam zhes de skad mchi mod/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod kyis nga su yin shes sam/ 'tshal
te| khyod kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ba lags la/ bdag kyang de kho na'i gsung rab la rab tu byung ba lags so/ /des smras pa/ de
ni| de lta yin te bden na/ 'on kyang rab tu byung bas bya ba'am/ byed pa gang yin pa de ngas byas te/ de lta bas na/ nga ni/ 'ching ba thams cad las grol ba yin/ khyod ni/ 'ching
ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa yin na/ khyod kyis ngag gi las rtsub mo smras kyi/ khyod kyis las de ci nas kyang bsrabs pa nyid dang / yongs su zad pa nyid dang / yongs su gtugs par 'gyur
bar nyes pa la nyes par shog cig /des nyes pa la nyes par bshags so/ /gang 'dis dge slong dgra bcom pa la glang rgan zhes bya ba'i smra ba kun tu spyod pa kun tu spyad pa'i las de'i
rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar ba lang gi skye gnas su skyes so/ /las kyi lhag ma de nyid kyis da ltar sha tshugs ba ba lang lta bur skyes so/ /yang dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis las ci zhig bgyis na/ de'i rnam par smin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa
rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang gis so/ /gang du smon lam btab lags/ 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas 'od srung de kho na'i gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te/ der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad na/ yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur to/ /gang gi thad du rab
tu byung ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu lung bstan to/ /de na 'dis smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis bcom
ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung gi thad du tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga'
yang thob par ma gyur gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/ bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye rgu'i tshe lo
brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'i gsung rab la bdag rab
tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur zhing / ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas 'od srung gis bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang shAkya'i rgyal po chen po shAkya thub pa des/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad
pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu ston par gyur cig /ces btab pa'i smon lam gyi dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog
tu bstan to/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na/ las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ gcig tu nag la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni/ gcig tu dkar/ 'dren ma rnams
kyi ni/ 'dren ma yin no/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu nag pa dang / 'dren ma rnams spangs nas/ las gcig tu dkar ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag gis
de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams 'di byin cig/
'di las byin cig ces 'dam zhing 'dam zhing zas za ba dang 'brim pa 'khrug par gyur nas skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis bdams shing zas bza' bar mi bya ste/ za na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams zas za ba na lhung bzed bzed pa las/ de lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung
bzed du lhung nas de rnams 'gyod de mi za ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /lhung bzed
bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung na/ byin len byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi nang du lhung na/ byin len byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed
bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi nang du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i nang du lhung na/ byin len byas pa zhes bya ste/
'on kyang byin len gyi sems ni/ nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo 'khar ba'i mgar pa'i drung du song nas des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / 'khar ba'i lhung bzed cig bya na/ nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ 'di nyid
bdag gi bzo lags kyi/ tshad ji tsam zhig bgyi/ chen por bya'o/ /'phags pa/ khyod la 'khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po ci 'tshal/ bkren pa/ khyod ci rin med par byed du 'jug snyam
mam| rin thang bzhin sbyin gyi/ byos shig /des bsam pa/ 'di la bdag gi 'khar ba ci zhig 'god/ bya'o/ /snyam nas des de'i 'khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po zhig byas so/ /des
smras pa/ gang 'di'i nang du chud pa gzhan zhig kyang gyis shig /des gzhan yang byas so/ /de bzhin du gzhan gang yin pa bdun pa'i bar du byas nas de rnams tshe dang ldan pa nye dga'
bos| dge tshul 'khrur bcug ste tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa las dra ba byed du bcug nas de rnams der bcug ste go rim bshams nas dge tshul gyi mgo la bkur te gang du mgron du bos
pa der 'gro'o/ /son nas de dag bkram ste 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag dang / bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci khyod kyis 'khar ba'i mgar ba'i zong bkram mam/ des smras pa/
bkren pa/ khyed ci shes/ 'dir ni/ re zhig phye dag blang ngo / /'dir ni/ snum khur dag go/ 'dir ni/ 'bras can dag go /gzhan rnams su ni/ tshod ma dag blang ngo / /de rnams kyis smras pa/
'phags pa/ gal te de ltar na/ ko/ res 'ga' tshod ma mang po dag 'byung bas/ gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang nye bar gzhag dgos so/ /zhes byas pa dang / de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /skabs
de| dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams 'khar ba'i lhung bzed 'chang ba
las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis 'khar ba'i lhung bzed bcang bar mi bya'o/ /'chang na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /kha gzar dang / tsha khug dang / phul ba'i btung
phor ni/ ma gtogs so/ /sdom ni/ rkang pa bkru ba bkab pa dang / /chol zangs dag ni gnang ba dang / /de bzhin bsil yab nyid dang ni/ sbrang ma rnams la g.yab pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams bab bab tu rkang pa 'khru ba der sbrang bu dag gis gang bar
'dug go /ji tsam na bram ze dang / khyim bdag gtsug lag khang bltar 'ongs pa de dag gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ sbrang bu zi zi mchi bas gang dang
phyogs 'di ci zhig/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis 'dir rkang pa bkrus so/ /de dag 'phya ste shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni/ gtsang sbra med de/ bab bab tu rkang pa
'khru'o/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang pa bab bab tu bkru bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang
gnas khang gi steng shar lho'i mtshams su rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis
ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rus sbal lta bur bya'o/ /rab tu 'jam par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsub por
bya'o/ /dge slong rgas pa/ 'khogs pa/ nyam chung ba de dag phyogs der 'gro mi nus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis gyo mo nye bar gzhag par
bya'o| |dge slong rnams gyo mor 'khru ba na/ de chag nas je ma rung bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chol zangs nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis chol zangs nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa'i chol zangs dag nye bar gzhag
go| bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ 'di ci zhig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis chol zangs gnang ngo / /
'phags pa/ ci/ dge sbyong khyod 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gnod dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyed kyi mgrin par rdog pas mnan te gnod do/ /de dag 'phya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong
rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa'i chol zangs dag nye bar gzhag
par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang 'jim las byas pa'i chol zangs nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /rnga mo lta bu nye bar bzhag pa dang / de ldeg nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang po che'i
rkang pa lta bur bya zhing / de'i dbus su 'bur ka dam pa'i me tog lta bur bya'o/ /shin tu 'jam por byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsub por bya'o/ /dge slong
rnams chol zangs bab bab tu 'jog nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi khang thog tu khas phul la zhog cig /gang zag gi ni/ gnas khang gi sgo lkog tu zhog
cig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ko'u sham+b+hi na sgra len gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dpyid kyi yul la bab nas dge slong rnams tsha bas rmya ste de dag
lus skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rke/ nyam chung / shig shig po/ rod nyams par gyur pa khyim bdag dang / bram ze rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyed ci'i slad
du lus skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rke/ nyam chung / shig shig po/ rod nyams par gyur/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/
khyed bsil yab mi 'chang ngam/ bzhin bzang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa dag /khyed kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin pas/ gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /
skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ bsil yab bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bsil yab bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis yu ba gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / baiDUR+Ya las byas pa/ bsrubs pa/ bkra ba
dang / nye bar bkra ba'i yu ba can gyi bsil yab dag bcangs pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas khyed kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan te gnod do/ /zhes bya ba'i
bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de dag 'phya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yu ba gser dang / dngul dang / bai
DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa/ bsrubs pa/ bkra ba dang / nye bar bkra ba'i yu ba can gyi bsil yab dag nye bar gzhag par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang bsil yab gnyis po rtswa bal ba dza las
byas pa dang / shing ta la'i 'dab ma bcang bar bya'o/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la bsil yab rnam pa sna tshogs 'bul ba na zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin
no| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ dge 'dun gyi phyir bcang bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa
brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams la sbrang ma dag za ste/ de dag gi lus sbrang mas zos pas/ 'brum bus gang ste/ de dag gis yang dang yang du phrugs pa dang / bram ze dang /
khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ khyed ci'i phyir lus 'di ltar 'brum bus gang / de dag gis ji ltar gyur ba bsnyad pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/
khyed sbrang yab mi 'chang ngam/ bzhin bzang dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa dag /khyed kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /skabs de/ dge
slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ sbrang yab bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis sbrang yab bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis yu ba gser dang / dngul dang / baiDUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa dang / rnga ma las byas pa'i
bsil yab dag nye bar bzhag pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /sbrang yab ni/ lnga ste/ bal las byas pa dang / sha na las byas pa dang /
ras bal las byas pa dang / ras ma dang / lo ma sbams pa'o/ /sdom ni/ gos mdud pa dang lus dang ni/ /'khar ba dra ba 'chang ba dang / /sgog skya dag ni bkag pa dang / /nad pa la ni
gnang ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis stongs mo bya'o//
zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de na dge slong cig skas la 'jog pa na/ 'og na shing mkhan zhig 'dug pa des/ de mdoms thang ba mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod skyes pa'i dbang po
dang ldan pas bdag gis pho lags par gdod 'tshal lo/ /de gnong nas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams gos mdud pa ma bor ba nyid du skas la 'dzeg pa las gyur gyi/ de'i phyir dge slong mkhar len byed pa gos
mdud pa bor nas mkhar lan byed du gzhug go /snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ dge slong stongs mo byed pas gos mdud pa bor nas
mkhar lan bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gos mdud pa bor nas mkhar lan bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams gos mdud pa bor nas mkhar len byed
pa na/ ma dad pa rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa/ ci stobs 'gyed dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag /mkhar len byed do/ /de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge
slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag skabs la 'dzeg pa de dag gis mdud pa por bar bya'i/ gzhan dag gis ni/ ma
yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams lus kyis khur khyer ba dang /
bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa/ bdag cag ni/ re zhig pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma'i slad du khur thogs na/ khyed su'i slad du lus kyis khur bsnams/ de
dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag /bdag cag la yang ston pa mchod pa dang / dge 'dun bshos gsol ba dang / nad pa rnams kyi rim gro dang bya ba mang po yod
do| |de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis lus
kyis khur bkur bar mi bya'o/ /khyer na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams bya
rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzeg cing 'bab pa na/ de dag 'bred cing rdeg 'chos te snad par gyur to/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis 'khar ba bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis 'khar ba bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka'
stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa'i 'khar ba/ bsrubs pa/ bkra ba/ nye bar bkra ba dag bcangs pa bram ze dang / khyim
bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas
na| gnyis kyis 'khar ba bcang bar bya ste/ rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba dang / nad pa sbyor mi nus pas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis kyis 'khar ba bcang bar bya ste/ rgan po rgas te nyam
chung ba dang / nad pa sbyor mi bzod pas so/ /zhes bka' stsal pa/ rgan por gtogs pa dang / nad par gtogs pa rnams kyang 'khar ba 'chang ba zhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rgan po dang / nad pas dge 'dun la 'khar ba'i sdom pa gsol bar bya zhing / gang la dge 'dun gyis 'khar ba'i sdom pa byin pa des 'khar ba bcang bar bya'o/ gsol ba ni/
'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang / dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung
ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pas rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug la thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smra bar bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong rgan po
rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge 'dun las 'khar ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ dge 'dun thugs brtse ba can btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse bas nye
bar bzung ste/ bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khar ba'i sdom pa stsal du gsol/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum
gyi bar du'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam
chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun las 'khar ba'i sdom pa gsol te/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis
gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khar ba'i sdom pa stsal to/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o//
las ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge 'dun las
'khar ba'i sdom pa gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khar ba'i sdom pa stsol na/ tshe
dang ldan pa gang dag /dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khar ba'i sdom pa stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs
shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming
'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khar ba'i sdom pa stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /gang la dge 'dun gyis 'khar ba'i sdom pa byin pa des 'khar ba bcang par bya ste/
'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po drug pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs so/ /dge
slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams dang / rlung nad can rnams bya rgod phung po'i ri la 'dzeg pa dang 'bab pa na 'dred cing rdeg 'chos nas snad par yang gyur/ bya ma bum dang / ril ba spyi
blugs dag kyang chag go/ skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis dra ba bcang
bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dra ba bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa las byas pa'i dra ba bcangs pa dang /
bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya bar byed do/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshon
sna lnga pa'i skud pa las byas pa'i dra ba cang bar mi bya'i/ /'on kyang tshon sna gcig pa las bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshon sna gcig las byas pa'i dra ba bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka'
stsal pa dang / rgas pas nyam chung bar gtogs pa rnams dang / rlung nad can du gtogs pa rnams kyang dra ba 'chang ba la zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan po dang / rlung nad can gyis kyang dge 'dun la dra ba'i sdom pa gsol bar bya zhing / gang la dge 'dun gyis dra ba'i sdom pa byin pa des dra ba bcang bar bya'o/ /
gsol pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'dug pa dang / dge slong rgan
po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ rlung nad can gyis rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du
gsol/ bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse ba can
rnams kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung pa'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsal du gsol/ de bzhin du lan
gnyis/ lan gsum gyi bar du'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam
chung ba'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod
cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsol to/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ dge
'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol te de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis
dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ rlung nad can ming
