'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis
dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /gang la dge 'dun gyis
dra ba'i sdom pa byin par gyur ba des dra ba bcang bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /dge slong gzhan dag cig la 'khar ba yang dgos/ dra ba yang dgos nas de dag la dge slong rnams
kyis 'khar ba dang / dra ba'i sdom pa so sor byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ 'khar ba dang / dra ba'i sdom pa gcig car du snga ma bzhin
sbyin par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra pa na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong zhig 'dug pa des
sgog skya zos nas des bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis
dge slong de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong / dge slong / khyod la chos bstan gyi/ rna ba gtod la 'dug cig /des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig
tu 'dug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan par brtsams te ji lta ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan pa de lta de ltar dge slong de bcom ldan 'das la dris gnod
par gyur na mi rung ngo / /snyam nas kha logs shig tu lta'o/ /lan gnyis/ lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces/ dge slong / khyod la chos bstan gyi/ rna
gtod cig /ces bka' stsal na/ dge slong de lan gnyis/ lan gsum du yang kha gzhan du bltas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi
spyan snga nas song ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmod par mdzad pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga'
bo/ ci'i phyir ngas ji lta ji ltar chos bstan pa de lta de ltar dge slong de kha gzhan du lta/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong des sgog skya 'tshal to/ /kun dga' bo/ dge slong dag gang gis
na| bden pa rnams kyi bar chad du 'gyur ba sgog skya za ba lta/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'tshal lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ gal te dge slong 'dis de ring sgog skya zos bar ma gyur na/ deng nyid du
'dis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ldan nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ dge slong
gis da phyin chad sgog skya dang / kun dong dang / ke'u yongs su longs spyad par mi bya ste/ yongs su longs spyad na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /yang de'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor
de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bsam pa/ dge slong 'dis de ring bden pa dag ma mthong na/ re zhig sang mthong bar 'gyur ram blta'o/ /snyam nas sems pa la zhugs pa dang / ma
mthong ngo / /des rab kyi mtha' ba'i bsam gtan bzhi ba la rnam par bltas nas dus ji tsam na mthong bar 'gyur ba sems pa la zhugs na/ 'on kyang ma mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dal ba'i mchog 'di 'dis bor nas/ /'di yis 'di na bden pa dag /nam yang shin tu mthong
bar ni/ /mi 'gyur ba yi gnas de yod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
bu| khyod sangs rgyas kyi yul la lag 'jug par ma byed cig /'di ni/ 'di nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul las 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig ba dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang
mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams
cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag
sgog skya za ba las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis sgog skya bza' bar mi bya'o/ /za na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sgog skya bza' bar
mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong zhig na ba de/ sman pa'i drung du song ste nad med cig ces byas nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang / kho bo la nad 'di lta bu zhig byung na/ sman ston
cig /sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ sgog skya gsol cig dang khyod sos par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa/ khyod kyi
sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni/ sos par mi nus so/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams la smras so/ /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ gal te sman pas dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni/ sos par mi nus so/ /zhes zer na/ bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong nad pas sman pa'i lung gis sgog skya bza'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong nad pas sgog skya zos nas gtsug lag khang la yang longs spyad par byed/ gnas mal
dang / snam phyis dang / chab khung du yang 'jug /dge 'dun gyi nang du yang 'gro/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos ston/ mchod rten la yang phyag
byed/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu yang nye bar 'gro/ skyed mos tshal dang / 'dun sa dang / lha khang dang / skye bos gang ba'i phyogs gzhan dag tu yang 'dug pa dang / bram
ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis dri tshor nas 'phya smod kha zer zhing / dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul nyams/ tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/ da
ni| rab tu byung ba rnams sgog skya za'o/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas dge slong
sgog skya za ba'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong sgog skya za bas sgog skya za bzhin du gtsug lag khang la yongs su longs spyad par mi bya/ gnas mal la ma yin/
snam phyi sar 'jug par mi bya/ chab khung sar ma yin/ dge 'dun gyi nang du 'gro bar mi bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par mi bya/ mchod
rten la phyag mi bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du nye bar 'gro bar mi bya/ skyed mos tshal dang / 'dun sa dang / lha khang dang / skye bos gang ba gzhan dag tu gnas
par mi bya'i/ phyogs dben pa gang du gzhan dag gis mthong na/ ma dad pa skye bar mi 'gyur bar bza' bar bya'o/ /gang gi tshe bya ba zin par gyur pa de'i tshe phyogs de nyid du zhag
bdun 'dug par bya'o/ /kun dong na ni/ zhag gsum/ ke'u na ni/ zhag gcig go /de nas khrus byas la chos gos dag kyang bkru bar bya zhing / bdug pa dag gis bdug par
bya'o| |de nas dri nga ba med pa dang / gtsug lag khang du 'jug par bya zhing / ji ltar bkag pa yang bya'o/ /sgog skya za ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa rnams
yang dag par blangs te mi gnas na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /phran tshegs las sgo dang po rdzogs so// //bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ chan pas 'breg dang gdugs
dang ni/ /be'u ras dang ni rgyan spel ma/ /len dang tshogs dang khrus dang ni/ /gcin dang sgo 'phar spo ba'o/ /sdom ni/ chan pas 'breg dang mdoms dang ni/ /de bzhin byin pa nyid dang ni/ /
khri dang rtsa stan gcig dang ni/ /khyim na gnas dang bgo ba min/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
so/ /gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul ba de'i tshe des 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang / kha spu bregs shig ces 'breg
mkhan gyi mi btang ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /nye dga' bos smras pa/ bzhin bzang / khyod skra chan pas 'breg shes sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ de nyid bdag gi
bzo lags so/ /bzhin bzang / gal te de lta na/ tshur shog /bregs shig /des skra chan pas bregs pa dang / nye dga' bos smras pa/ da dung bregs shig /des yang bregs pa dang /
des smras pa/ da dung yang bregs shig /des yang bregs so/ /de bzhin du ji tsam nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang nas de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces smras te/ bkren pa/
khyod ci yang mi shes pa zhig /'di kho na bzhin mnyam par byos te song zhig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis skra chan pas breg
par mi bya'o/ /dge slong skra chan pas 'breg na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis skra chan pas breg par mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge
slong dag gi mgo la rma byung nas spu gris reg pa na de dag snang ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rma'i
than kor gyi skra chan pas breg par bya zhing / lhag ma rnams spu gris breg par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'breg mkhan gyi mi btang ste zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /bzhin bzang / mdoms kyi
phyogs kyi spu 'breg shes sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ de nyid bdag gi bzo lags so/ /bzhin bzang / gal te na de lta na/ tshur shog /bregs shig /'phags pa/ ji
'dra bar breg /bzhin bzang / mdzes par bregs shig /des breg par brtsams pa dang / nye dgas smras pa/ bzhin bzang / 'di ltar byos shig /des de bzhin byas pa dang / yang
smras pa/ gzhan 'di lta bur yang byos shig /ces des de ji tsam nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang nas dge sbyong shAkya'i sras rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni/ nyams/ tshangs pa'i tshul ni/ nyams
te/ da ni/ gsang ba'i phyogs kyi spu yang 'breg par byed do/ /zhes smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par mi bya'o/ /dge slong mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu 'breg par byed na/
'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gi mdoms kyi phyogs su rma
byung ba dang / dge slong dag 'gyod nas spu 'breg par mi byed do/ /dge slong gzhan dag la yang srin bu byung ste/ de dag de'i gnod pas dge ba'i phyogs kyi bya ba mi nus pa'i skabs de/ dge
slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag la bstan nas rma'am/ srin bu'i phyir ni/ mdoms
kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'breg mkhan gyi mi btang ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /bzhin bzang / khyod byin
spu 'breg shes sam/ 'phags pa/ de nyid bdag gi bzo lags so/ /bzhin bzang / gal te de lta na/ tshur shog/ bregs shig /'phags pa/ ci 'dra bar breg par bgyi/
bzhin bzang / mdzes par bregs shig /des breg par brtsams pa dang / nye dga' bos smras pa/ bzhin bzang / 'di ltar byos shig /des de bzhin byas pa dang / yang smras
pa| gzhan 'di ltar yang byos shig /des de ji tsam nam sros kyi bar du ma btang bas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de la zhes bya ba nas dris pa/ zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma
bzhin no/ /des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / de smod par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
de lta bas na/ dge slong gis byin spu breg par mi bya'o/ /dge slong byin spu 'breg par byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u
rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis byin spu breg par mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyi brla la rma byung
zhing / dge slong gzhan dag la srin bu byung nas de dag de'i gnod pas dge ba'i phyogs bya bar mi nus par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rma byung ba'i phyir ram/ srin bu'i phyir ni/ byin spu breg par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan
yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams khri gcig la nyal bar byed cing / de dag der nyal nas ku re byed/ rtse bar byed/ ca co
smra bar byed/ rgod pa dang / 'phyar g.yeng dang / lus la rdeg par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/
nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams khri gcig la nyal bar byed pa las gyur pas/ de'i phyir dge slong gzhan dang lhan cig khri gcig la nyan du mi gzhug go /snyam
du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis deng phyin chad dge slong gis khri gcig la nyal bar mi bya'o/ /byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khri gcig la nyal bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / ji tsam na dge slong mang po rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong
ste/ ljongs rgyu ba na ri brag gcig tu phyin nas de dag gis der khri brnyas pa dang de dag gis khri dag byin no/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di dag nyung gi/ gzhan yang bsnams te spyon
cig /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ bdag cag ni/ khri re re la skye bo mang po dag nyal bar bgyid na/ khyed gzhan yang g.yor ram/ re re la gnyis sam/ gsum
gzims par mdzod cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khri gcig la gnyis sam/ gsum nyal du ma gnang na/ ji ltar nyal bar bya/ de dag gis smras pa/
'phags pa dag /khri gzhan ni/ ma mchis/ de skad smras pas cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gang dag ngo tsha shes shing 'gyod pa dang ldan la/ bslab pa 'dod pa de dag gis dran pa nye bar bzhag ste gding ba bting la bar du chos gos kyi gtur
bu'am/ lhung bzed kyi snod dag bcug la nyal bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /khri la ji lta bar rtswa stan dang / gzhan dag la yang de dang 'dra'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong mang po rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang / ri brag cig tu phyin nas de rnams
kyis khyim bdag cig las bsti gnas brnyas so/ /grang ba'i dus la bab pas de rnams kyis gos brnyas pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis 'di dag ni/ rab tu byung ba
yin no/ /snyam ste/ snying rje nye bar bzhag ste gos dag byin pa dang / gang gis gang thob pa das de gyon te nyal nas dge slong gzhan dag grang bas sbrebs par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge
slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis gang thob pa de dag nyid kyis bgo bar mi bya'i/ thams cad kyis bgo bar bya ste/
gcig rnyed par gyur pa gang yin pa des thams cad kyi steng du rgan rim bzhin ji tsam yog pa dag ba par bya'o/ /ji tsam na ri brag gzhan zhig tu song ba dang gos gcig cig rnyed nas da
dag gis steng du g.yogs pa na/ nye dgas de gyon te 'chag tu song ba dang / dge slong rnams grang bas sdug bsngal bar gyur nas smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga' bo/ bdag cag ni/ grang
bas sdug bsngal na/ khyod 'ba' zhig gyon nas 'chag gam/ des smras pa/ kho bos bkag gam ci/ khyed kyang ci phyir mi 'chag /de rnams grang ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mtshan 'das par gyur
pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chag pa gang yin pa des gang zag
gi gos bgos te bcag par mi bya'o/ /gzhan gyis 'chag na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas
sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /grang ba'i dus la bab pas dge slong rnams grang ba'i gnod pas glos phab ste 'dug go/ ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gtsug lag
khang du 'ongs ba dang / des de dag mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /ci'i slad du gcig tu brtson pa'i gsung rab la glos phab ste bzhugs shing / dge ba'i phyogs dag mi mdzad/ de
dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag/ bde ba dang ldan pa dag ni/ chos dran par 'gyur gyi/ kho bo cag shin tu grang bas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /des khyim du song nas be'u ras lnga brgya
bkur ba dang / dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa'i gos de dag bgos te phyi rol tu dong ba bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas co 'dri zhing smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /ci/
khyed babs sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ kho bo cag grang bar gyur nas bgyis kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de skad ma zer cig/ de rnams smod par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis khyim pa'i gos bgo bar mi bya'o/ /de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na/ steng du gos ngur smrig gis
g.yogs nas bgo bar bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi yang de bzhin du gyon par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi ni/ 'og tu gos bcug nas steng nas g.yogs te bgo
bar bya'i/ gzhan du na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sdom ni/ gdugs dang 'jig rten rgyang pan dang / /bsdebs sbyar de bzhin nags me dang / /gnas med par ni lam dag dang / /la
ba bgos pas mi bcag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na bram ze gos
spyod pa zhig 'dug pa des gos byas shing byas shing 'tshong bar byed do/ /dus gzhan zhig na des gos mang po rnyed par gyur nas des bsam pa/ thabs ji lta bu zhig byas na/ des bsod nams
kyang 'thob cing / rnyed pa yang 'grub par 'gyur snyam pa dang / de dad pa can zhig pas de'i blo skyes te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs la gos kyi gdan bshams
te gdugs tshod gsol lo/ /de ltar byas na/ gos kyang yongs su longs spyad par 'gyur la/ gos yongs su longs spyad pa dang / zhal zas yongs su longs spyad pas bsod nams chen po yang
'thob par 'gyur ro/ /snyam du rig nas des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rang gi khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas zhal zas
gtsang zhing bsod pa bshams te gdan dag gi steng du gos bting ngo / /de nas gdan bshams zin pa dang bcom ldan 'das spyan 'dren gyis spyan drangs na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ni/
gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms drangs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rgyu rnam pa lngas gtsug lag khang na bzhugs
shing bsod snyoms 'dren te/ lnga gang zhe na/ nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed par gyur pa dang / lha rnams la chos ston bzhed par gyur pa dang / nad pa gzigs bzhed par gyur pa
dang / gnas mal gzigs bzhed par gyur pa dang / nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'o/ /don 'di la ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms drangs so/ /dge slong rnams lam gar char pa bab nas de dag gi gos
char pas gsher bzhin du 'khod pas/ gang gi gos ci 'dra bas 'khod pa de'i de kho na lta bu'i sbra sbre byung bar gyur pa bram ze des mthong ba dang / 'khrugs nas smras pa/ bdag
gi zang 'di lta bu dag zong du mi rung bar bgyis kyi/ gos 'di dag khyed thal byung snoms shig /ces zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bram ze des ma dad ba skyes nas byin pas blang bar mi bya'o/ /de 'khrugs pa de dang bral nas yang des dad pa'i sems kyis phul ba'i skabs de/
dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ni/ bram ze des dad pa'i sems kyis phul bas blang bar bya ste/ blangs
nas kyang rung ba byas la bgo bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis blangs pa dang / bram ze des smras pa/ e ma'o 'phags pa dag /gdugs bcang pa'i rigs so/ /skabs de/ dge slong dag
gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te de lta na/ rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong dag gis gdugs bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis dge slong dag gis gdugs bcang par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gdugs kyi rtsa ba gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas shing /
gzhan yang bkra zhing nye bar bkra ba dang / bsrubs las byas la/ gdugs ni/ dkar po dang / rma bya'i mdongs dag las byas pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas
de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs gnang ngo / /'phags pa dag/ dge sbyong khyed ci 'dong pa'i
yon tan gyis gzir tam/ gang gi phyir 'di 'dra ba'i gdugs dag 'chang / de dag gis smras pa/ dgra bo rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog bas mnan nas 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir
to/ /de dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bu'i gdugs dag bcang bar mi
bya'i/ 'on kyang rtsa ba ru ta dang / lo ma las byas pa'i gdugs rnam gnyis bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs rnam gnyis bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
drug sde rnams kyis gdugs kyi rtsa ba ring po ring por byas nas/ gdugs kyi rtsa ba bsgreng ste grong khyer gyi nang du song ba dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas 'di lta
bu nor can nam/ tshong dpon nam/ ded dpon nam/ su zhig 'ong zhes langs nas rtog par byed do/ /kha cig bsur dong ba dang / gang gi tshe mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe ma dad par gyur pa'i
skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gdugs kyi rtsa ba ring po ring por mi bya'i/ 'on kyang lus kyi tshad tsam
gyi rtsa ba gdags par bya zhing / grong gi nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis grong gi nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa
dang / ji tsam na dge slong mang po dag don mthun dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang / re zhig na grong du lam byung bar gyur nas de dag gis bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grong gi
nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pas/ grong dor bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de dag gis grong spangs pa dang / don mthun rnams dang bral bas chom bos bcom
pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te grong gi dbus su lam byung bar gyur na/ gdugs glor
bsnyal nas 'dong bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bsod snyoms pa rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / char pa bab nas char chus gos gsher bar gyur pa'i skabs de/
dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsod snyoms pas gdugs kyi rtsa ba rung bar byas nas 'jug par bya ste zhugs nas
gal te char pa chad na/ gdugs khyim dang por bzhag la 'jug par bya zhing / de nas phyir blangs te 'gro bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /lho phyogs kyi yul nas kun tu rgyu 'jig rten rgyang phan pa 'char pa zhes bya ba zhig ljongs rgyu zhing mnyan
yod du 'ongs so/ /de ngal bsos nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya ga la pa der song ste phyin nas smras pa/ kye dge slong / kho bos bla ma dag las blangs pa'i yi ge cung zad yod de/
de'i phyir khyod dang lhan cig gtam bya bar 'dod do/ /des de la smras pa/ bram ze/ kho bo smra ba ma yin gyi/ song zhig/ de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / bzang po dang / rlangs pa dang / ming
chen dang / grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzang ga la ba der song ba dang / de rnams kyis kyang de kho na skad smras so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas smras pa/ kye dge slong / kho bos bla ma las yi ge cung zad blangs pa dag yod de/ de'i phyir khyod dang lhan cig gtam bya bar 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
shA ri'i bus bsam pa/ ci/ kun tu rgyu 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam/ 'on te med snyam na/ yod par mthong ngo / /su la rag las brtags na/ bdag nyid la'o/ /ci/ smra bas
'dul ba gzhan cung zad yod dam snyam na/ yod par mthong ngo / /ji tsam na tshogs pa brtags na/ zhag bdun tshun chad kyis tshogs par shes nas smras pa/ legs te/ de bzhin bya
na/ rig pa'i gnas gang du bya/ che ge mo zhig tu'o/ /smra ba'i zhal che ba bzhag ste phyogs snga ma dang / phyi ma rnam par bzhag nas phyogs snga ma sus gzugs zhes gleng pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa

shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kun tu rgyu glo bur du 'ongs pa yin pas 'di nyid kyis phyogs snga ma tshugs shig /kun tu rgyus phyogs snga ma smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bzlas nas khyod kyi 'di
ni/ mi rigs so/ /'di ni/ mi 'dra'o/ /'di ni/ mi 'thad do/ /zhes skyon brtags so/ /des yang smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus mjug tu ma phyin bar bzhag go/ lho phyogs kyi yul
nas kun tu rgyu 'jig rten rgyang pan pa 'char pa zhes bya ba zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs te de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang lhan cig brtsad nas deng du zhag bdun lon no/ /zhes kun tu sgra grags pa
dang / srog chags brgya phrag mang po dag kha cig ni/ ya mtshan skyes/ kha cig ni/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul nas 'dus pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam pa/
bdag gi smra bas 'dul ba 'dus sam snyam na/ 'dus par mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ma lus par smras pa dang / kun tu rgyu de tshar bcad do/ /de nas mngon par dad
bar gyur te smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ bdag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po 'thob na/ bdag bcom
ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te gdams ngag byin no/ /des brtsal
ba dang / 'bad pa dang / bsgrim pa byas pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste zhes bya ba nas gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma
bzhin no/ /de nas 'khod de dag 'phags pa shA ri'i bus 'di lta bu'i smra ba chen po pham par byas so/ /zhes shin tu ya mtshan skyes so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor de dag gi
bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin rtogs nas de dag dang mthun par chos bstan te srog chags 'bum phrag mang po dag gi de thos nas lhag pa'i khyad par chen
po thob pa 'di lta ste/ kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i
'bras bu zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun la gzhol zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| dge slong dag /thams cad du dge slong shA ri'i bu'am/ shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar mi 'gyur bas/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi /dge slong dag gis 'jig rten rgyang phan pa la sogs pa phyi
rol pa'i bstan bcos bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis 'jig rten rgyang phan pa la sogs pa phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos bslab par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
dge slong byis pa'am/ rmongs pa'am/ mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas pa dag gis kyang thams cad kyis khyad par med par bslab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas kyi rgol
ba tshar gcod nus pa gang yin pa de dag gis 'jig rten rgyang phan pa la sogs pa phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos bslab par bya'o/ /byis pa dang / rmongs pa dang / mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas pa
dag gis ni/ ma yin no/ /de rnams de la brtson pa nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dus gsum du byas la/ dus gnyis ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab bklag par bya zhing
gsum pa la ni/ phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos dag go /bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gsum du bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams lo dang / zla ba'i dus dag tu slob par byed nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /tshe ni/ skad cig ma yin pas/ ngas lo dang zla ba'i dus las dgongs te ma gsungs kyi/ 'on kyang nyin gcig la cha gsum du bya'o/ /dge
slong rnams gsal ba'i dus su ni/ phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos 'don la/ gzhan dag tu ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab 'don nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsal ba'i dus su
sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab gdon par bya ste/ phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos ni/ ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bram ze'i khye'u lha sbyin dang / ba lang 'byor gnyis rab tu phyung nas de dag tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
bus mdo sde 'don du bcug go /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ljongs rgyu zhing dong nas ri brag cig tu phyin pa dang / der de dag la rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung nas de gnyis der 'khod
do| |de gnyis sngon goms pa'i shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab sdeb sbyor dang / tshig dang rim par sbyar nas kha ton du 'don no/ /de dag las gcig ni/ shi'o/ /gcig shos kyis
gzhung brjed par gyur nas de la kha ton las byung ba'i rnyed pa med nas de dang / de dag tu 'khyams 'khyams nas phyir mnyan yod du 'ongs so/ /de nas ngal bsos te tshe dang ldan pa kun shes
ko'u di n+ya ga la ba der song ste phyag byas nas smras pa/ gnas brtan/ g.yar ton dpog tu gsol/ des smras pa/ bu/ legs so/ /de bzhin kha ton bslab bo/ /zhes des de dang
lhan cig kha ton bya bar brtsams pa dang / kha ton thung ngur 'don nas smras pa/ gnas brtan/ khyod kyis ring por ma bton pas gdon nongs so/ /des smras pa/ bu/ kho bos de ltar
bslab bo/ /des de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / bzang po dang / rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag
dang | lag bzang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ gnas brtan/ g.yar ton dbog tu gsol/ des smras pa/ bu/ legs so/ /de bzhin kha ton bslab par
bya'o| |zhes des de dang lhan cig kha ton 'don par brtsams pa dang / de nas kha ton thung ngur bton nas smras pa/ gnas brtan/ khyod kyis gdon nongs so/ /des smras pa/ bu/ kho bos de

ltar bslab bo/ /des de'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad
ces smras so/ /mkhan po/ g.yar ton dbog tu gsol/ des smras pa/ bu/ legs so/ /de bzhin du kha ton bslab bo/ /des de dang lhan cig kha ton bya bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na/ kha
ton ring por bton nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang ring por bton pa dang / des smras pa/ mkhan po/ dge slong de dag kun gyis ni/ gdon nongs kyi/ khyod nyag gcig gis ma nyams
par bton to/ /des smras pa/ mi blun po/ khyod nyid kyis gdon nyes kyi/ dge slong dag gis ni/ ma nyams par bton to/ /zhes des spyos nas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge
slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs cung zad gang byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams sangs rgyas
kyi gsung sdeb sbyor dang / tshig dang / rim pa sbyar nas 'don pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab sdeb sbyor dang / tshig dang / rim pa sbyar nas gdon
bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab sdeb sbyor dang / tshig dang / rim pa sbyar nas 'don na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /yul gyi nges pa'i tshig dang / skad kyi nges
pa'i tshig dang / ljongs kyi nges pa'i tshig yin na/ ltung ba med do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams rgas pa'i gnas skabs na yang rgod bag byed pa dang / dge slong de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /khyed mgo skyes kyang dkar por gyur na/ da dung
rgod bag mi gtong ngam/ de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod nas mtha' gcig tu dong ste smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga'/ lhung bzed nag po can/ kos thag pa 'di dag la mi dga' ba
zhig bya'o/ /zhes de dag de ltar glags tshol ba la brtson par 'khod pa na/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag dgon pa'i gnas su dong ste bsam gtan dang / bklag par bya ba
dag brtsams so/ /de nas drug sde rnams kyis gnas gsum nas nags mes btang ste ngos gcig tu 'dus nas bsdad pa dang / dge slong rnams nags mes tshig pa'i gnod pa byung bas
rings pa rings par 'bros par brtsams so/ /drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan dag /ci'i slad du rings rings ltar bzhud/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /nags kyi me ma mthong ngam/ gnas
brtan dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba'i gnas skabs su tshul khrims gsungs sam ci lags/ zhes cung zad bgad pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /khyed kyis kho
bo cag la bsam bzhin du ma gtses grang / bkren pa dag /khyed de ltar mi dga' bar bya'o/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis nags mes gtang bar mi bya'o/ /gtong na/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed
kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong rgan po zhig dang gsar bu zhig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang rgan po la ni/ snod mang zhing yo byad mang
la/ gsar bu ni/ ma grags shing chos gos gsum las lhag pa med pa zhig pas/ rgan pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ kho bo ngal gyi/ re zhig chos gos kyi gtur bu khyer te shog cig
gsar bu des smras pa/ gnas brtan/ bka' 'bab par mi 'gyur na/ re zhig cung zad cig gsol ba mchis so/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ 'di la su zhig gshe /smros
shig /gnas brtan/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun ma gzigs sam/ ci/ rmongs pa'i yo byad 'dis ci zhig bgyi/ bzhin bzang / gal te mi bkur ba ni/ re zhig rung
na/ 'di 'dri bar bya ste/ khyod kho bo'i mkhan po'am/ slob dpon yin nam/ ci/ gang gi phyir rjes su ston par byed/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / rgan pos bsam pa/ bkren
pa 'di/ mi dga' bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /ji tsam na/ de gnyis gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang / de na nub gcig kyang mi gnas par 'dug par mi bya ba'i khrims su bya ba yod de/ de gnyis la
gnas mal gyi zhal ta byed pas/ gnas mal dag snoms shig ces smras pa dang / rgan pos ni/ blangs so/ /gsar bu des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ kho bos gnas ma bcas kyi/
je gnas gsol lo/ /zhes de dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gan du song ste rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ gnas brtan/ bdag gi gnas mdzad du gsol/ des smras pa/
bzhin bzang / khyod su dang lhan cig 'ongs/ gnas brtan dge slong che ge mo zhig dang ngo / /bzhin bzang / de dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis bdag 'khor dang phye'o/ /zhes zer du 'ong
gi| song la de nyid la gnas gsol cig /de gzhan dag gi gan du song ba dang / thams cad kyis de bzhin spangs nas nam sros te rgan po de nyid kyi gan du song nas sgo la brdabs te smras pa/
gnas brtan phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod su zhig/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de lags so/ /khyod nad med par gyur cig /gnas brtan/ gtsug lag khang 'di na nub gcig kyang mi gnas
par mchis par mi bgyi ba'i khrims su mdzad pa mchis na/ bdag gi gnas mdzad du gsol/ bzhin bzang / dge 'dun gyis de lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba mdzad pa legs te/ gal te
ma mdzad na/ kho bos 'char gzhug pa zhig /de'i tshe ni/ kho bo snod mang zhing yo byad mang ba yin la/ da ni/ gnas brtan yin nam/ khyod ma gus pa byas kyang gnas ster ba gang yin pa de la
gnas chos shig /de spobs pa med par gyur nas cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ de'i gnas bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas med par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro bar mi bya/ dge slong gis seng ge bzhin gtum por mi bya/ dge 'dun gyis kyang dge slong rnams la gnod par 'gyur ba'i
khrims bca' bar mi bya ste/ dge slong gnas ma bcas par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro'am/ seng ge bzhin gtum por byed dam/ dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba de lta bu bcas na/ thams cad 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zham 'bring ba tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong dang yul ma ga d+har ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te grong khyer sa dkar can du
gshegs nas dkar can na gnod sbyin ba ku la'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo nam sros te mun gnag cing khad kyis cung zad char 'bab cing glog 'byung ba
na| bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag pa mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zham 'bring ba dge slong rnams ni/ ji srid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
nang du yang dag 'jog la mi bzhugs pa de srid du nang du yang dag 'jog la mi 'jug go/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i shes pa dang / mthong ba ni/ 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des bsam pa/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de grong khyer sa dkar can na sa dkar can gyi ri la gnod sbyin ba ku la'i gnas na bzhugs shing / de mtshan mo nam sros te mun gnag cing khad kyis cung zad
cung zad char 'bab cing glog 'byung na/ bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag ste/ ma la bdag der nye bar 'gro'o/ /snyam du rig nas bai DUR+Ya las byas pa'i dri gtsang khang mngon par sprul
te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa mdzad pa'i zham 'bring na 'chag cing 'dug go /de'i tshe yul ma ga d+ha pa'i mi rnams khye'u dang / bu mo ngu ba
gang yin pa de dag la de rnams gnod sbyin ba ku la'i ming gis bsdigs par byed do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong gis 'di snyam du bsam ste/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das ha cang yun ring du bla gab
med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag pa mdzad pas/ ma la bdag gis de la gnod sbyin ba ku las bsdigs so/ /snyam du rig nas la ba ldog ste bgos nas 'chag pa'i slad du 'dug ste bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ba ku la/ ba ku la/ dge sbyong / nga ni/ gnod sbyin ba ku la yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to| |mi blun po/ khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gnod sbyin ba ku las bsdigs par sems sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ bsnyengs
pa dang / bag tsha ba dang bral ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyengs pa'am/ zhum pa'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa mi mnga'o/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ma dad par gyur nas
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ chos 'dul ba 'di la 'di 'dra ba'i gang zag kyang mchis sam/ ko'u shi ka/ khyod sdod cig /go'u ta ma'i rigs ni/ rgya che ba yin
pas/ 'di yang phyis rnam par dag pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag la ba ldog ste gyon pa las gyur par
mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ mi blun po klu skyong gis la ba ldog ste bgos nas de bzhin gshegs pa la/ ba ku la/ ba ku
la/ dge sbyong / nga ni/ gnod sbyin ba ku la yin no/ /zhes zer te/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis la ba ldog ste bgo bar mi bya'o/ /gyon na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis dge slong gis la ba ldog ste bgo bar mi bya'o/ /gyon na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bka' stsal pa/ dge slong ba lang gi gnas na 'khod pa de dag gis der la
ba'i bgo ba dag rnyed pa dang / de dag la shig zhugs te dge slong rnams shig gis zos pas/ bde ba mi thob pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ la ba ldog ste gyon pas 'dug par bya'o/ /nyal bar bya'i/ bcag par ni/ mi bya'o/ /sdom ni/ be'u ras dang ni la ba dang / de
bzhin la ba'i mchog dang ni/ /sgrog mig sgrog rten mdud pa dang / /ska rags dag ni gsum yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ gal te dge 'dun la be'u ras grub na yang gnang
la/ gang zag la yang gnang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shing snga ma bzhin te/ dge 'dun la
la ba grub na yang gnang la/ gang zag la yang gnang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shing snga ma
bzhin te/ dge 'dun la la ba mchog grub na yang gnang la/ gang zag la yang gnang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig 'dug pa de/ snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir
zhugs so/ /de bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na chos gos nar nas des myur ba myur bar lhung bzed sa la bzhag nas de tshags byas pa dang / de bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas
'phya zhing dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams ni/ gtsang sbra med de/ lhung bzed bab bab tu 'jog go /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis lhung bzed bab bab tu bzhag par mi bya'o/ /dge slong lhung bzed bab bab tu 'jog na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang chos
gos bsrung ba'i phyir chos gos kyi sgrog mig gdags par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis btags pa dang / des chos gos ral nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ sgrog zungs kyis glon la thogs shig /dge slong rnams kyis sgrog zungs kyis glan nas btags pa dang / de sgrog mdud med pas/ ma chags te/ nyes dmigs de
nyid du gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdud pa bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig 'dug pa de/ snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms
kyi phyir zhugs so/ /de bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba dang / smad g.yogs bsnyil ba dang / des myur ba myur bar lhung bzed sa la bzhag ste de tshags bcos so/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag
rnams kyis mthong nas zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gos bsrung ba'i phyir ska rags rnam pa gsum po/ shur bu dang / shur bu phre'u dang /
lcag phod bcang bar bya'o// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po bdun pa/ sdom ni/ ston pa ser skya'i gnas bzhugs pas/ rgyan spel ma dang 'phyang 'phrul
can| |zla gam dang ni gser skud can/ /khra bo thams cad bkag pa yin/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas na n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe shAkya ming chen gyi
khyim gyi zhal ta pa dus las 'das pa dang / ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs/ shAkya ming chen ga la ba der song ste smras pa/ rje/ khyod kyi khab kyi zhal ta pa gum na/ zhal ta pa gzhan zhig
bsko bar gsol/ des de'i drung na bram ze'i khye'u zhig 'dug pa de la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ re zhig khyod song zhig /ji tsam na zhal ta pa gzhan zhig btang ngo / /de song nas des chos bzhin

du rigs par spyad pas/ dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes rab tu mang por phul ba dang / shAkya ming chen gyis smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes 'di ltar mang ba/ khyod kyis skye bo'i
tshogs la gnod par ma byas grang / des smras pa/ rje dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes 'di rigs pas mchis pa lags te/ bdag gis skye bo'i tshogs la gnod pa bgyis pa ma lags so/ /des ri
brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bram ze'i khye'u 'dis/ khyed 'ga' la gnod pa ma byas grang / rje/ dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes 'di rigs pas mchis pa lags
so| |'dis 'ga' la yang gnod pa ma bgyis so/ /zhes smras pa dang / des de ri brag gi zhal ta par bcug go/ /'jig rten ni/ 'byor pa 'dod cing / rgud pa dang mi mthun pa yin pas/ de la bram
ze gzhan zhig gis bu mo byin pa dang / des de nyi ma dang / tshes grangs dang / yud tsam dang sbyar nas bag mar blangs so/ /de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar
byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu khye'u zhig btsas te/ de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas rigs dang
mthun pa'i ming btags so/ /yang de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas ming zla ba zhes bya bar btags so/ /de
bskyed bsrings te chen mor gyur pa dang / de mkhas shing spyod lam dang / 'gro 'dug 'o bze bas/ ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar gyur to/ /ji tsam
dus gzhan zhig na bram ze'i khye'u de na bar gyur nas/ rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman gyis rim gro byas kyang / nad de zhi bar ma gyur nas ri brag pa
des dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes phul ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad spyad cing / skyin po gzhan dag blangs nas 'on kyang sos par ma gyur nas de de nyid du dus las 'das so/ /ri brag na gnas
pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag shAkya ming chen ga la ba der 'ongs te smras pa/ rje/ zhal ta pa de ni/ gum lags so/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /de na dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes su phul ba yod
dam/ rje/ te por mang du phul mod kyi/ des bro 'tshal ba'i yo byad du spyad na/ 'on kyang sos par ma gyur nas skyin po gzhan dag kyang bgyis so/ /dengs la de na lhag ma cung zad ci yod pa des bu
lon sobs shig /rje/ de na cung zad kyang ma mchis te/ lus par btab na/ de'i mchis brang dang / bu pho dang / bu mo mchis te/ de'i bu mo de mkhas shing spyod lam dang / 'gro 'dug 'o bze ba
lags pas/ ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi yid du mchi bar gyur to/ /ming chen gyi smras pa/ shes ldan dag /de'i chung ma dang / bu pho dag ci dgar thong la/ bu mo de 'dir

khug cig /de rnams kyis de'i chung ma dang / bu pho de dag ci dgar btang nas bu mo de ming chen gyi gan du khrid do/ /shAkya ming chen gyi chung ma rgan mo zhig kha zas g.yo ba dang / me tog 'thu ba'i
las rnam gnyis byed pa des smras pa/ jo bo/ de ni/ bdag shin tu rgas pas sug las rnam gnyis bgyid rngo mi thogs na/ zla ba 'di bdag gi ngan grogs su bskor gsol/ des de ngan grogs su
bskos so/ /des de la smras pa/ zla ba/ khyod ni/ kun dga' ra bar song la me tog thus shig /ngas ni/ kha zas g.yo'o/ /de kun dga' ra bar song nas me tog btus te/ de nas phreng ba legs
par brgyus nas ming chen gyi gan du song ba dang / des mthong nas yongs su dga' ste smras pa/ legs so/ /zhog cig ces smras nas chung ma rgan mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci'i phyir sngon ni/
me tog nyung la/ de ring mang bar gyur/ des smras pa/ sngon ni/ khyod kyi gnyen dag mchis nas bdag la slong ba na/ bdag gis de dag la stsal la/ 'dis ni/
su la yang ma stsal pa dang / bdag ni/ rgas pas mig rtul la/ 'di ni/ mig rno bas 'thu mkhas pa las gyur to/ /des smras pa/ gal te de lta na/ de kun dga' ra bar thong la der zhog
cig /des de kun dga' ra ba de nyid du bzhag pa dang / de me tog gi phreng ba bzang po rgyud par byed pas/ de'i ming phreng ldan ma zhes bya bar grags so/ /dus gzhan de khyim nas rang
gi zan blangs te kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /des bcom ldan 'das sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas shin tu bde
zhing rab tu dga' bas rtog par byed cing bsam pa/ 'di lta bu'i yon gnas yang dag pa la bdag gis bya ba ma byas pas/ des na bdag 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur par
gdon mi za'o/ /de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag las bsod snyoms bzhes na/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo/ /snyam pa dang / skabs de lta bu la/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa dang / mi gzigs pa dang / mi rig pa dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang mi mnga' bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la
ni| chos nyid kyis zhes bya ba nas/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rjes su gzung ba'i phyir lhung bzed bzed
de| sring mo/ khyod kyi gal te yongs su btang na/ lhung bzed 'dir byin cig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / des shin tu dad pas bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms de phul nas zhabs gnyis
la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bran mo dang / dbul por mi 'gyur ba shog cig /ji tsam na/ de'i pha'i grogs po bram ze mtshan mkhan zhig yod pa
des de mthong nas smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod ga las 'ongs/ ri brag de kho na nas so/ /su la gnas shing 'dug /des smras pa/ gang na skal pa chung ngu gnas pa na ste/ bdag ming chen gyi bran mor
bgyis so/ /khyod kyi pha de gar song / gum mo/ /ma dang / ming pho de dag gar dong / gar mchis ma 'tshal to/ /zla ba/ khyod bran mo'i 'os ma yin na/ lag pa rkyongs shig dang blta'o/ /des
lag pa brkyang pa dang / des bltas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang gi lag pa'i mthil dag la/ /lcags kyi 'khor lo'i mtshan yod pa/ /bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang / /rgyal
po'i btsun mor bzhes par 'gyur/ /gang gi bzhin ni rgyas pa dang / /ngang pa'i rgyal po'i gdangs 'dra ba/ /bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang / /rgyal po'i btsun mor bzhes par 'gyur/ /
gang gi rkang pa'i mthil dgal/ /grong khyer lcog dang rta babs bcas/ /bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang / /rgyal po'i btsun mor bzhes par 'gyur/ /khyod mi
dga' ba ma byed par song zhig dang / khyod bran mor mi 'gyur gyi/ khyod rgyal po'i btsun mor 'gyur ro/ /de gnas de nas skyed mos tshal du song ba dang / yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
rgyal ri drags shor du song ba/ rtas kha khyer te gcig pu ser skya'i gnas su phyin to/ /de phan tshun 'khyams pa las/ ming chen gyi kun dga' ra bar song nas des bu mo de la dris pa/ bu
mo/ 'di su'i kun dga' ra ba yin/ des smras pa/ lha/ shAkya ming chen gyi lags so/ /des rta las babs te/ smras pa/ bu mo/ rkang pa bkru'i/ chu longs shig /des shin tu myur
bar rdzing bur song ste nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis bsros pa'i chu blangs pa dang / des rkang pa bkrus nas yud tsam zhig bsdad te smras pa/ bu mo/ gdong bkru'i chu longs shig /des chu'i steng
rim lag pas bsal te/ chu ha cang dro ba yang ma yin/ ha cang grang ba yang ma yin pa blangs nas des gdong bkrus so/ /des yang smras pa/ bu mo/ btung dgos kyi/ chu longs shig
des chu rnam par glongs te chu bsil pa lo ma'i snod du blangs pa/ rgyal pos 'thungs nas smras pa/ bu mo/ /kun dga' ra ba 'di na rdzing bu gsum yod dam/ ci na khyod kyis chu rnam pa gsum
khyer te 'ongs/ des smras pa/ lha/ 'di na rdzing bu gcig kho na mchis kyi/ gsum ni/ ma mchis so/ /des smras pa/ 'o na khyod kyis chu rnam pa gsum ga las khyer te 'ongs/ des ji ltar
gyur pa brjod pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ de ni/ go'o/ /'di 'dri bar bya ste/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis chu rnam pa gsum khyer te 'ongs/ des smras pa/ lha/ bdag gis dang por chab dron po
'tshal te mchis pa ni/ lha/ mnyel sos par bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ /slad kyi ha cang dro ba yang ma lags/ ha cang grang ba yang ma lags pa 'tshal te mchis pa ni/ dro ba dang / grang ba gang
lags pa dag spyan la gnod pa spang ba'i slad du'o/ /rnam par glongs nas shin tu bsil ba 'tshal te mchis pa ni/ lha skyems pa dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ /des bsam pa/ bu mo
'di ni/ mkhas pa yin no/ /snyam du rig nas smras pa/ bu mo mdzangs shing mkhas pa khyod/ rkang pa mnye dgos kyi/ re zhig mal chos shig /des de'i rkang pa mnyes pa dang / de reg bya dang ldan
pa yin pas/ mnyes ma thag nyid du de gnyid log /de gnyid log pa dang / des bsam pa/ rgyal po 'di dag la ni/ dgra mang bas/ gal te 'di gnyid log pa la/ 'ga' zhig gis
gnod pa byas na/ nges par bdag gi rje bo la grags pa ma yin par 'gyur bas/ sgo gcad par bya'o/ /snyam nas des sgo bcad de 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na gcig nas gcig tu thos te
dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dag skyed mos tshal der lhags nas de rnams sgo phye zhes zer ro/ /des sgo ma phye ba dang / rgyal po ku co'i sgras sad nas smras pa/ bu mo/
de ci zhig /des smras pa/ lha/ mi dag cig chab sgo phye zhes mchi zhing / lha'i mtshan kyang smos so/ /des smras pa/ bu mo/ sgo 'di sus bcad/ lha/ bdag gis bkum mo/ /ci'i phyir
bcad/ lha/ bdag gi glo ba la rgyal po 'di dag la ni/ dgra mang bas/ gal te 'di mnal log pa la 'ga' zhig gis gnod pa bgyis na/ nges par bdag gi rje bo la grags pa ma
lags par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas de'i slad du bdag gis chab sgo bkum mo/ /des smras pa/ bu mo mdzangs ma mo khyod la nga'i the tshom 'di 'dri bar bya ste/ re zhig khyod ming chen gyi cir
'ong smros shig /des smras pa/ bdag de'i mngag gzhug bgyid pa'i bran mo lags so/ /khyod de'i mngag gzhug byed pa'i bran mo ma yin gyi/ khyod nges par de'i bu mo yin gyi/ khyod kyis
drang por smros shig /de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod ming chen gyi gan du song la rgyal po gsal rgyal khyod kyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /zhes
byos shig /de myur ba myur bar song ste/ jo bo/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khyod kyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /zhes smras so/ /shAkya ming chen gyis thos nas bza' ba dang /
btung ba dang / dri dang / phreng ba dag bshams nas skye bo phal po ches bskor te kun dga' ra bar song ngo / /de nas gcig la gcig byon pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun tu spyad
pas so so yang dag par dga' bar byas nas rgyal po khrus byas shing zan zos nas gtam dag byas te yud tsam zhig bsdad nas smras pa/ ming chen/ bu mo 'di khyod kyi cir 'ong / lha/ mngag
gzhug bgyid pa'i bran mo lags so/ /'di khyod kyi mngag gzhug byed pa'i bran mo ma yin gyi/ 'di khyod kyi bu mo yin gyi/ nga la byin cig /des smras pa/ lha/ shAkya'i bu mo gzhan 'di bas ches
khyad par du 'phags pa dag mchis na/ de dag bzhes su gsol/ 'di cir 'tshal rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di nyid nga la dgos kyi/ 'di nga la byin cig /des smras pa/ lha/ gal te de lta na tshul
bzhin bgyis te dbul lo/ /de bzhin byos shig /de nas shAkya ming chen gyis grong khyer mdzes par byed du bcug ste/ bu mo de rgyan thams cad kyis klubs nas glang po che la bskyon te lam po che
dang / srang dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu grong khyer ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa dang / yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la/ shes ldan dag nyon cig /shAkya
ming chen gyi bu mo phreng ldan ma/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mor phul lo/ /zhes dril bsgrags pa byas so/ /de nas de ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mor phul bar
skye bo phal po che rnams kyis kyang shes so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dpal gyi 'byor ba chen pos blangs nas mnyan yod du khrid pa dang / de'i
mas bdag gi bus bran mo chung mar blangs so/ /zhes thos te/ de kun nas dkris pa skyes nas bsam pa/ 'di ni/ nges par pha de'i bu ma yin pa'am/ bdag gi khong du don med pa zhig
bsrel te/ 'di ltar bran mo'i khyor skyes par gyur to/ /snyam nas de yang sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang / rgyal pos kyang phreng ldan ma la smras pa/ phreng ldan ma/ song la sgyug mo'i
zhabs la phyag byos shig /de song ste de'i rkang pa gnyis la bzung ba dang / de reg bya dang ldan pa yin pas/ des reg pa tsam gyis de gnyid log ste/ sad nas bsam pa/ bu zan ma'i bu
mo 'di'i reg pa 'di 'dra bas/ ko sa la'i rigs 'di rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /de'i tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la/ btsun mo dam pa/ rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang / phreng
ldan ma gnyis yod de/ gang gi tshe rgyal po phreng ldan ma dang thabs cig bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ phreng ldan ma/ rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma ni/ 'di lta bur yang gzugs bzang ngo / /zhes dbyar
tshul ma'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / des smras pa/ lha/ de bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ma rings shig dang / ring po mi thogs par mthong
bar 'gyur ro/ /de re ba dang bcas pas 'dug go /gang gi tshe rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang thabs cig 'dug pa de'i tshe yang / dbyar tshul ma/ phreng ldan ma ni/ de lta bu'i reg bya dang yang ldan pa
yin no/ /zhes phreng ldan ma'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / des smras pa/ lha/ de bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ma rings shig dang / ring po mi thogs
par mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag rgyal pos ji lta ji ltar ya mtshan bskyed pa de ltar phan tshun mthong bar spro bar gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na so ga'i dus la bab ste/ nags tshal na shing

rnams me tog rgyas par gyur cing / ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su rgyal po
btsun mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing gshegs so/ /bud med ni/ me tog dang / 'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas/ skyed mos tshal de dang de dag tu 'khyams par brtsams pa dang /
rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma ngal bas skyo zhing snyom par gyur nas shing mya ngan 'tshang la bsnyes te 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na phreng ldan mas mthong ngo / /de de'i gzugs bzang ba mthong bas/
shing gi lha mo yin no/ /snyam du rig nas mod la rkang pa la phyag byas pa dang / phreng ldan ma'i lag pas reg ma thag pa nyid du gnyid log par gyur to/ /ji tsam na rgyal pos dbyar tshul ma la
phreng ldan ma'i bsngags pa brjod par brtsams pa dang / des smras pa/ lha/ de bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de
khyod kyis mthong ngo / /lha/ bdag ma dran no/ /ngas khyod dran par bya'o/ /legs so/ /gang gi lag pa gnyis kyis khyod kyi rkang pa la bzung ba de dran nam/ lha/ de lha mo phreng ldan ma
lags sam/ de yin no/ /lha/ gang khyod reg bya dang ldan pa'i btsun mo de lta bu spangs te bdag gi drung du gshegs pa de ni/ khyod bdag la nges par byams shing thugs gcugs
pa lags so/ /de bzhin du phreng ldan ma la/ dbyar tshul ma ni/ 'di lta bu yin no/ /zhes bsngags pa brjod par brtsams pa dang / des smras pa/ lha/ bdag gis nam zhig na
mthong bar 'gyur lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de khyod kyis mthong ngo / /lha/ bdag mi dran no/ /ngas khyod dran par bya'o/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis shing mya ngan 'tshang la bsnyes te 'dug
pa gang la phyag byas pa de dran nam/ lha/ ci de dbyar tshul ma lags sam/ de yin no/ /lha/ gang khyod kyis btsun mo gzugs bzang ba de lta bu spangs te bdag gi drung du gshegs
pa de ni/ khyod nges par bdag la byams shing thugs gcugs pa lags so/ /skabs der ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la btsun mo dam pa rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang / phreng
ldan ma gnyis yod de/ de dag las gcig ni/ gzugs bzang ba rnams kyi mchog yin la/ gcig shos ni/ reg bya dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog yin no/ /zhes phyogs su sgra grags pa dang
dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang / dbyar tshul mas las ci zhig bgyis na/
las de'i rnam par smin pas/ gcig ni/ reg bya dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur la/ gcig shos ni/ gzugs bzang ba rnams kyi mchog tu gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing
bsags pas/ de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ sa'i khams la rnam
par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma yin/ me'i khams la ma yin/ rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i
phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang / /las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /lus
can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri brag cig na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma
blangs te de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod pas bu khye'u zhig btsas so/ /yang rtse
bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu mo zhig btsas te/ de dag bsrings shing bskyed nas chen por gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ bram ze de
chung ma dang bcas te shi nas bram ze'i khye'u de pha ma dang bral bas dben pa la dga' bar gyur te/ des sring mo de khrid de/ dgon pa'i gnas su song nas 'khod de/ der de dag rtsa ba
dang / sdong bu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dag gis 'tsho bar brtsams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /sbrul nag po la ni/ nyes dmigs rnam pa
lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ khro ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'khu ba dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / dug rno ba'o/ /de bzhin du bud med kha cig la yang nyes dmigs rnam pa
lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ khro ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'khu ba dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / dug rno ba'o/ /dge slong dag /de la bud med kyi dug rno ba ni/ 'di yin te/
'di ltar bud med ni/ phal cher 'dod chags lhag par che ba'o/ /de'i sring mo de nyon mongs pa dag gis gdungs nas/ des smras pa ming po/ bdag dgon pa'i rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / me
tog dang / 'bras bus 'tsho ba'i rngo mi thogs kyi/ grong mthar bzhud do/ /des de khrid de grong mthar song ste/ de bram ze zhig gi der slong mo la zhugs so/ /des sring mo dang lhan cig slong mo'i

phyir gcig car sgra phyung ba/ bram ze des thos te phyir byung nas smras pa/ drang srong dag kyang chung ma dang bcas te rgyu'am/ des smras pa/ 'di bdag gi chung ma ma yin gyi/ sring mo'o/ /'di su la byin/
su la yang ma byin no/ /gal te de lta na/ kho bo la ci'i phyir mi sbyin/ 'di ni/ dam pa ma yin pa sdig pa'i chos de spangs pa yin no/ /de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis gdungs pas smras pa/ ming
po/ ci/ bdag dgon pa'i rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bus 'tsho bar rngo mi thogs pa med snyam mam/ bdag gis ni/ nyon mongs pa spang rngo ma thogs pa'i
slad du khyod la de skad bgyis kyi/ bdag bram ze 'di la stsol cig /des smras pa/ de ni/ chos dang 'gal bas ngas khyod sbyin par mi bya'i/ khyod nyid shes par zad do/ /bram ze des de dang de'i
bsam pa shes nas 'byor ba'i dpal chen pos de bag mar blangs te rang gi khyim du bcug go /de nas des ming po de la smras pa/ ming po tshur spyon/ khyod kyis kha ba dbub par mdzod cig dang
thabs cig bzhugs so/ /des smras pa/ sring mo/ kho bo ni/ 'dod pa don du mi gnyer te/ khyod kyis gnang na/ rab tu 'byung ngo / /des smras pa/ dam zhig bca'
ste/ gal te khyod skabs skabs su bdag gzigs shing byon na/ gnang bar bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ legs te/ de bzhin bya'o/ /de des gnang nas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ngo / /
de dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin pas des slob dpon med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du byas te/ rang byang chub mngon sum du byas nas des bsam pa/
bdag gis sring mo de la 'ong ngo / /zhes dam bcas pas/ de'i phyir de'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de de'i gan du song ngo / /song nas 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bab pa
dang / glog 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams pa dang / so so'i skye bo dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul la myur du dad pa yin pas/ de shing drungs nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal
te smras pa/ ming po/ khyod kyis yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bu thob bam/ thob bo/ gal te de lta na/ khyod ni/ bsod snyoms don du gnyer ba lags/ bdag kyang bsod nams don du
gnyer ba lags pas/ de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs shig dang / khyod la bdag gis bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ sring mo/ khyod ni gzhan la rag las pa yin
gyi/ khyim thab la je dris shig /legs te/ de bzhin bgyi'o/ /des khyim thab la smras pa/ rje'i sras/ bdag gi ming po rab tu byung ba/ brtul zhugs grub pa/ bdag nyid chen por gyur te/
gal te khyod kyis gnang na/ bdag gis zla ba gsum du bsod snyoms la spyan drang ngo / /des smras pa/ bzang mo/ gal te 'di rab tu byung bar ma gyur na/ bdag cag gis mi 'dod bzhin
gso dgos par 'gyur na/ de rab tu byung ste brtul zhugs grub pa/ bdag nyid chen por gyur na lta smos kyang ci dgos/ song la spyan drongs shig /des de zla ba gsum du bsod snyoms la spyan
drangs so/ /bram ze de'i chung ma gnyis pa gzhan zhig yod pa des bsam pa/ bdag cag longs spyod thun mong las/ 'di ni/ bsod nams 'di lta bu byed na/ bdag gis ci'i phyir mi bya
snyam du rig nas de la smras pa/ phu nu mo/ khyod kyi dral gang lags pa de bdag gi ming po yang de kho na lags pas/ khyod kyis gdugs gcig bshos gsol la/ bdag gis kyang gdugs
gcig bshos gsol bar bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ legs te/ de bzhin bgyi'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sring mo de/ de'i sems bsrung ba'i phyir zas bsod pa/ reg bya phun sum tshogs
pa/ zas dman pas g.yogs te de la bstan nas phu nu mo/ khyod rjes su yi rang byos shig /bdag gi ming po la zhal zas 'di lta bu gsol lo/ /des smras pa/ legs so/ /rjes su yi
rang ngo / /de yang de'i sems bsrung ba'i phyir zas dman pa/ bsod pa dag gis g.yogs te de la bstan nas phu nu mo/ khyod kyang rjes su yi rang ba gyis
shig /bdag kyang dral la zhal zas bsod pa/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu gsol lo/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sring mo gang yin pa des rang sangs
rgyas la reg bya phun sum tshogs pa/ zas dman pas bkab ste 'bul ba gang yin pa de ni lha mo phreng ldan ma 'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dis/ gang rang sangs rgyas la
reg bya phun sum tshogs pa/ zas dman pas bkab ste phul ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ tshe rabs lnga brgya ra reg bya dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i bar du yang reg bya dang ldan pa rnams
kyi mchog tu gyur to/ /gcig shos gang yin pa des/ rang sangs rgyas la zas dman pa/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pas bkab ste phul ba gang yin pa de ni rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma
'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gang 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas la zas dman pa/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pas bkab ste phul ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ tshe rabs lnga
brgyar gzugs bzang bar gyur te/ da lta'i bar du yang gzugs bzang ba rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/ /dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par
smin pa ste gcig tu nag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas dge slong dag /'di ltar bslab par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /dus gzhan zhig na lha mo phreng ldan ma sems can zhugs
bar gyur to/ /nyi ma gang la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la bram ze mdun na 'don gyi chung ma la yang sems can zhugs par gyur te/ nyi ma gang la sems can zhugs par
gyur pa de nyid kyi nyi ma nas sdug bsngal gyi nyen to/ /ji tsam na lha mo phreng ldan ma zla ba dgu lon nas khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig btsas so/ /de'i btsas ba'i
btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed pa na/ rgyal pos smras pa/ song la 'di phyi mo la phul cig dang / de nyid ming 'dogs par 'gyur ro/ /
blon po rnams kyis de khyer te de'i gan du dong nas smras pa/ lha mo/ lha'i zhal nas gzhon nu'i ming gdags su gsol zhes byung ngo / /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ngas dang po nyid nas bu
zan ma'i bu mo 'dis ko sa la'i rigs 'di rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes ma smras sam/ blon po dag gis smras pa/ de'i don 'tshal te/ lha mos 'di ma bltams pa nyid nas 'phags skyes
po zhes kun tu spyad pas/ de'i slad du gzhon nu'i mtshan 'phags skyes po zhes gdags so/ /zhes de'i ming 'phags skyes po zhes bya bar btags so/ /gang gi nyin par gzhon nu 'phags
skyes po btsas pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la mdun na 'don gyi bu btsas nas de'i nye du dag kyang 'ongs shing 'dus nas zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i
btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed pa na/ de na kha cig gis smras pa/ 'di gang gi nyi ma la ma'i mngal du zhugs pa de'i nyin mo
nyid nas ma sdug bsngal gyis nyen cing / skyes nas kyang sdug bsngal ba kho na yin pas/ de'i phyir khye'u'i ming ma la gnod ces gdags so/ /zhes de'i ming ma la gnod ces bya bar
btags so/ /gzhon nu 'phags skyes po ma ma brgyad po/ nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse grogs
kyi ma ma gnyis la gtad de/ ma ma brgyad po de dag gis/ 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par gtso bo gtso bo
dag gis rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du bsrings shing bskyed do/ /gang gi tshe de chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge bslab ste yi ge mthar phyin nas brtag pa brgyad po/ 'di lta ste/
rin po che brtag pa dang / shing brtag pa dang / gzhi brtag pa dang / gos brtag pa dang / glang po che brtag pa dang / rta brtag pa dang / bud med brtag pa dang / skyes pa brtag pa
la mkhas bar gyur cing / dbye ba dang / bklag pa la mkhas shing / spyod pa gsal ba/ rnam pa thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas te/ de rgyal bu rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ yul gyi
dbang phyug mthu dang brtson 'grus thob pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po tshan du phab ste gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i gnyar
zhon pa dang / rta la zhon pa dang / shing rta'i thabs dang / ral gri'i thabs dang / gzhu bzung ba dang / mdun du bsnur ba dang / phyir bsnur ba dang / lcags kyus bsgyur thabs dang / zhags
pa gdab pa dang / mda' bo che'i 'phen thabs dang / 'dzin stangs dang / gom stabs dang / thor tshugs dang / rgyang nas phog pa dang / sgra grags par phog pa dang / gnad du phog pa dang /
mi 'tshor bar phog pa dang / tshabs che ba dang / dral ba dang / dbug pa dang / gcad pa'i gnas lnga po dag la mkhas par gyur to/ /khye'u ma la gnod kyang ma ma brgyad po dag la gtad de zhes

bya ba nas rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge bslab ste/ bram ze'i lta ba dang / spyod lam dang / tshul dang / gtsang
sbra dang / spyod tshul dang / ril ba bzung ba dang / sa blang ba dang / thal ba blang ba dang / oM zhes bya ba dang / b+ho zhes bya ba dang / nges brjod kyi rig byed dang / mchod sbyin gyi rig byed
dang / snyan tshig gi rig byed dang / srid srung gi rig byed dang / drang srong gargas byas pa dang / ma Tha ras byas pa dang / sa g.yo ba'i dpyad dang / bar snang gi
dpyad dang / bram ze'i las kyi mtha' drug po/ mchod sbyin byed pa dang / mchod sbyin byed du 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / klog tu 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa dang / len pa dag la mkhas
par gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 'phags skyes po dang / ma la gnod lhan cig ri dwags bshor ba'i phyir dong ba dang / de rtas kha khyer te ser skya'i gnas su phyin nas de
dang de dag na 'khyams zhing / ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyi skyed mos tshal du song ngo / /skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan
dag /'phags skyes po rtas kha khyer te khyod kyi skyed mos tshal du 'ongs so/ /de rnams mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gal te de lta na/ dus la bab pa 'di yin gyi/
'dong / de gsad do/ /de bzhin bya'o/ /zhes de rnams go bgos te dong ba dang / shAkya rgan rabs rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ gzhon nu dag gar dong / de rnams kyis
smras pa/ 'phags skyes po bdag cag gi skyed mos tshal du mchis te/ de 'gum du mchi'o/ /shAkya rgan rabs rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu dag /de glo bur ba yin pas/ de'i nyes
pa 'ga' bzod pa gyis la phyir log cig /de rnams phyir log pa dang / ji tsam na 'phags skyes po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pas gcig nas gcig tu thos nas tshol zhing skyed mos tshal
du 'ongs nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pas/ skyed mos tshal kun nas khyab par gyur pa dang / skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /
'phags skyes po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnams skyed mos tshal du lhags te/ glang po che dang / rta'i mi gtsang ba dag gis skyed mos tshal thams cad ma rung bar byas so/ /de rnams
shin tu mi bzod pa skyes nas shAkya rgan po'i tshig bcag ste 'phags skyes po gsad pa'i phyir dong ba dang / 'phags skyes pos 'di ltar ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams bdag gsod du
'ong ngo / /zhes thos nas des mi zhig bzhag ste smras pa/ kye skyes bu/ gud du 'gro'i/ khyod kyis ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams ci zer ba de/ nga la zlos shig /ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya
rnams skyed mos tshal du 'ongs pa na/ 'phags skyes po mi snang nas de rnams kyis mi de la bran mo'i bu de/ gar song zhes dris pa dang / des smras pa/ bros te mchis so/ /de dag las kha cig
gis smras pa/ de gal te bdag cag gis mthong bar gyur na/ bdag cag gis de'i lag pa gcad par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ gal te bros par ma gyur na/ de kho bo cag gis
rkang pa gcad par 'gyur ro/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ kho bo cag gis ni/ thams cad kyi thams cad du srog dang phral bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ gal te bros
na/ de ji ltar bya/ de dag gis gla mi rnams la bsgo ba/ skyed mos tshal phyag dar byos la bran mo'i bus phyogs gang du bcags pa'i phyogs de'i sa dag 'o ra la/ sa gzhan gyis
khongs shig /rtsig pa'i phyogs gang la brten pa de dag kyang zhal zhal khogs la/ gzhan gyis yugs shig /'o ma'i chus chag chag thob la/ spos chus btab ste/ dri dang me tog
la sogs pas kyang shin tu phun sum tshogs par byos shig /des de bzhin du byas so/ /de nas mi des ji ltar gyur pa dag mthong nas 'phags skyes po'i gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la
phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /'phags skyes pos smras pa/ kwa'i skyes bu/ ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams ci zer/ lha/ ji skad mchi ba lha la gsol ba'i rngo mi thogs
te/ de ni/ de dag nyid la gyur cig /kwa'i skyes bu/ de yang shes pa tsam du bya'i/ smros shig /des de dus kyis 'chu bar rtogs nas rgyas par bsnyad pa dang / des nang mi rnams la smras pa/
shes ldan dag /gang gi tshe nga yab 'das te rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe/ ngas de dag srog dang bral ba gang yin pa de kho na thog mar bya dgos kyi/ khyod kyis ji ltar gyur pa 'di thams cad
skul cig dang / ngas ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kha gdag go /de rnams kyis kyang khas blangs so/ /ma la gnod kyis smras pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /lha/ khyod kyis kyang de ni/ gdon
mi 'tshal bar bgyid 'tshal te/ dge ba rnams ni/ dam bcas pa la brtan pa lags so/ /des smras pa/ nga dus ji tsam zhig na rgyal por 'gyur ba de mi shes so/ /ma la gnod kyis smras pa/
de ltar ma dgongs shig /rgyal po bgres po ni/ ring po mi thogs par lha nyid du gshegs pas/ khyod nyid rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa bsten pas ni/ sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med
bas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la blon po lnga brgya yod pa las 'phags skyes pos blon po rnams dang dbye bar brtsams pa dang / spyod pa'i bu ring po ma gtogs pa thams cad kha phyin
to/ /blon po'i mchog de ni/ rje bo la snying nye ba yin pas kha ma phyin to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na spyod pa'i bu ring po bya ba zhig gi phyir 'phags skyes po'i gan du song ba dang / 'phags
skyes pos/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gsod pa'i sbyor bas/ spyod pa'i bu ring po la ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams la ngas sha glan par bya na/ nga nam rgyal por 'gyur ba smros shig /des smras
pa/ lha/ ci'i slad du bsod nams ma lags pa skyed par mdzad/ rgyal po bgres po ni/ ring po mi thogs par lha nyid du gshegs te/ rgyal por gzhan mi 'gyur gyi/ khyod nyid 'gyur ro/ /
spyod pa'i bu ring po/ de ni/ ngas bgam par khyod kho na la smras kyi/ khyod kyis su la yang smra bar mi bya'o/ /lha/ bdag gis ma 'tshal tam ci/ su la yang ji
ltar brjod par bgyi zhes smras te song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang na/ shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal me tsu ru di zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
rgyal bzhon pa bzang po la zhon te kha lo sgyur ba spyod pa'i bu ring po dang ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/ grong khyer zhig tu phyin nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dgon pa'i nags 'dab
bas mtha'i gnas mal/ dben pa/ skye bo sdig can dang bral ba/ mi chig rkya thub pas so sor bsten pa/ nang du yang dag 'jog dang mthun pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas/ yang spyod pa'i bu
ring po la smras pa/ spyod pa'i bu ring po/ bcom ldan 'das de/ dgon pa/ nags 'dab/ bas mtha'i gnas mal/ dben pa/ skye bo sdig pa can rnams dang bral ba/ mi chig rkya thub pas
so sor bsten pa/ nang du yang dag 'jog dang mthun pa 'di lta bu na bzhugs te/ der ngas bcom ldan 'das de la res 'ga' bsnyen bkur byas na/ ring po/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar
gang na bzhugs/ ji ga khyod kyi thos sam/ lha/ bdag gis thos te/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ shAkya rnams kyi nang na shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal me tsu ru di zhes bgyi ba na bzhugs so/ /ring

po/ shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal me tsu ru di zhes bya bar thag ji srid yod/ lha/ rgyang grags gsum lhag tsam mchis so/ /des ring po/ shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal me tsu ru di ga la ba der shing rta drongs
shig /lha/ de bzhin 'tshal lo/ /zhes spyod pa'i bu ring pos ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ltar mnyan nas shAkya rnams kyi grol rdal me tsu ru di ga la ba der shing rta khrid de bzhon pas 'gro
ba'i sa ji srid pa de srid du zhon te song nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang pas kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang chen po sgo bcad pa zhig na nyin mo gnas
pas bzhugs so/ /dge slong mang po rnams ni/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag par byed pa/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mthong ngo / /dge slong mang po
dag thag ring po nyid nas mthong nas kyang dge slong mang po dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas dge slong mang po dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa dag /bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs
rgyal po chen po/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ gtsug lag khang chen po chab sgo bkum pa 'di na nyin mo gnas pas bzhugs te/ rgyal po chen po/ khyed bzhed na/ gtsug lag khang chen po sgo
bkum pa ga la bar bzhud de/ der byon pa dang / khad kyis dal bus sgo glegs la rdungs shig dang / bcom ldan 'das chab sgo 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
gyis rgyal po'i rtags lnga po/ gtsug tor dang / gdugs dang / ral gri dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / lham khra bo dag phud de spyod pa'i bu ring po la
byin nas kha phyir lta'o/ /de nas spyod pa'i bu ring po 'di snyam du sems te/ lhas rgyal po'i rtags lnga po/ gtsug tor dang / gdugs dang / ral gri dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /
lham khra bo dag bdag la bzhag ste zhal phyir gzigs pa las na/ lha ni/ 'phrin las gsang ba zhig mdzad par bzhed pas/ bdag 'di nyid du 'dug par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas ko sa
la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gtsug lag khang chen po sgo gcad pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas khad kyis dal bu dal bus sgo glegs la brdabs pa dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo
phye'o| |de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gdong dang / kha phyis
nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ring mo zhig lags nas mthong ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis ring mo zhig lags nas mthong ngo / /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu dman pa bas kyang ches dman
pa byed/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la chos las byung ba'i dad pa mchis te/ des na/ bdag 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /khyod kyi chos 'dul ba ni/ legs par gsungs pa'o/ /nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni/ legs par zhugs pa'o/ /snyam mo/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod nga la chos las
byung ba'i dad pa ji lta bu zhig yod/ btsun pa/ bdag gis 'di na dge sbyong dang / bram ze mkhas pa/ mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can smra ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba la goms par bgyis pa/ skye bo phal
po che la byis pa'i dang bas 'bigs pa'i ngo bor bkur ba kha cig mthong ste/ de dag rang gi shes rab dang spobs pas/ gzhan gyi lta ba'i rnam pa/ 'dren ma'i ngo bo dag 'jig cing / de dag zhu ba
rtsom par bgyid de/ bdag cag shes ldan go'u ta ma de'i drung du dong la/ dri ba 'di dang 'di lta bu dag dri ste/ gal te lung ston par mi byed na ni/ brtsad par bya'o/ /gal te 'di lta bu dang 'di lta
bu yin no/ /zhes lung ston par byed na/ de lta bu de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ kye go'u ta ma/ khyod kyi 'di ni/ mi rigs so/ /'di ni/ mi 'dra'o/ /'di ni/ mi 'thad do/ /zhes brjod par
bya'o| |zhes de rnams kyis zhu ba de dag bsdogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bab par mchis pa'i rngo yang ma thogs na/ smra bar lta ga la rngo thogs te/ btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan
'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa de lta bu mchis te/ des na/ bdag 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lags/ khyod kyi chos 'dul ba ni/ legs par gsungs pa lags/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni/ legs par zhugs pa lags so/ /snyam bgyid do/ /
btsun pa/ bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/ btsun pa/ 'di na bdag gis dge sbyong dang / bram ze mkhas pa mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can zhes
bya ba nas kha cig mthong ste zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de rnams kyis zhu ba de dag bsdogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der mchis te phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhu
ba'i rngo mi thogs kyi/ gzhan du na/ bcom ldan 'das kho na'i zhal du lta pa dang / zhal du rtog par bgyid cing / bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma 'di kho nas shes par bya ba mkhyen to/ /
gzigs par bya ba gzigs so/ /snyam ste/ btsun pa/ 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags te zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ bdag la chos
las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/ btsun pa/ 'di na bdag gis dge sbyong dang / bram ze mkhas pa/ mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can zhes bya ba nas kha cig mthong ste zhes bya ba'i bar
snga ma bzhin no/ /des zhu ba de dag bsdogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der mchis te phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba yongs su ma rdzogs par zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
de dag la zhu ba yongs su ma rdzogs par zhus bzhin yongs su rdzogs par lung bstan pa dang / de dag zhu ba lung bstan pa des/ yid rangs shing mgu nas sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge slong
gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi zhing / bslab pa'i gnas dag kyang len par bgyid de/ btsun pa/ 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags so/ /zhes pa'i
bar snga ma bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/ 'di na bdag gis bram ze dang / khyim bdag mkhas pa/ mkhas pa'i nga
rgyal can zhes bya ba nas kha cig mthong zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de dag gis zhu ba de dag bsdogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas zhu ba rdzogs par zhus
