pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos yongs su rdzogs par lung bstan nas de dag lung bstan pa des yid rangs shing mgu nas bcom ldan 'das la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen
par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung bar mdzad/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de/ rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa/ dgra bcom pa nyid
thob pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang / bde ba nyams su myong pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag de'u ma rung ngo / /bdag cag rab tu de'u ma rung ngo / /
bdag cag sngon dge sbyong ma yin bzhin du bdag cag dge sbyong ngo / /snyam du khas 'ches/ bdag cag bram ze dang / dgra bcom pa ma yin bzhin du bdag cag dgra bcom pa'o/ /snyam
du khas 'che'i/ da ni/ bdag cag dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / dgra bcom pa yin no/ /snyam ste/ btsun pa/ 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags te
zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/ btsun pa/ 'di na bdag gis dge sbyong dang / bram ze skya bo/ seng
seng bo/ sha bri srab pa/ nyam chung ba/ mdog ngan pa/ dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang po'i mig gis bltar mi chags pa dag cig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems
te| shes ldan 'di dag mi 'dod bzhin du tshangs par spyod pa'am/ nad yun ring po 'ga' zhig gis thebs sam/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'ga' zhig lkog tu byas nas bcabs par
ma gyur grang / 'di ltar shes ldan 'di dag skya bo/ seng seng po/ sha bri ngan pa/ nyam chung ba/ dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang po'i mig gis bltar mi chags so/ /snyam mo/ /de dag gi
drung du mchis shing mchis nas 'di skad ces bgyis te/ shes ldan dag /ci'i phyir skya bo seng seng po/ sha bri ngan pa/ nyam chung ba/ dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang po'i mig gis bltar mi
chags par gyur/ de dag gi mchid nas rgyal po chen po/ 'dod chags kyis gnod do/ /btsun pa/ de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te 'dod pa rnams rnyed pa dang / bsten pa dang /
bsags pas/ gzugs bzang ba'am/ blta na sdug pa'am/ mdzes pa zhig tu 'gyur na ni/ da lta ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bdag/ gzugs ches bzang ba dang / ches blta na sdug pa/
ches mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bdag ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po rnams 'dod rgur rnyed pa dang / tshegs med par rnyed pa lags so/ /gang gi
phyir 'dod pa rnams rnyed pa dang / bsten pa dang / bsags pas gzugs ches bzang ba dang / ches blta na sdug pa dang / ches mdzes par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi
nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gzugs shin tu bzang ba/ dbang po rgyas pa/ bzhin gyi mdangs gsal ba/ pags pa'i mdog yongs su dag pa/ sems khral chung ba/ 'tsho ba gzhan la rag ma
lus pa mthong ste/ des na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa/ ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba spyod par nus so/ /snyam ste/ btsun pa/ 'di yang bdag
bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags te/ zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa
gzhan yang mchis te/ btsun pa/ 'di na bdag gis nor gyi slad du mchis pa rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzhi dang / 'dod pa'i ched kyi slad du ma ni/ bu dang lhan cig rtsod/ bu ni/

pha dang / pha ni/ bu dang / bu ni/ ma dang / ming po ni/ sring mo dang / sring mo ni/ ming po dang / grogs ni/ grogs dang rtsod pa dag mthong na/ skye bo dang skye bor lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de dag
rtsod cing 'gyed par gyur pa na/ ma ni/ bu'i mi snyan pa smra/ bu ni/ ma'i/ pha ni/ bu'i/ bu ni/ pha'i/ ming po ni/ sring mo'i/ sring mo ni/ ming po'i/ grogs ni/ grogs kyi mi snyan pa smra na/
skye bo skye bo'i lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ yang 'di na bdag gis mthong ba/ dge slong gnyis shig dge slong dag dang lhan cig gzhi 'ga' zhig gi slad du rtsod nas bslab pa phul te babs
bar gyur na/ de dag rnam grangs gang gis kyang sangs rgyas la mi snyan pa brjod pa'am/ chos dang / dge 'dun la mi snyan pa brjod par mi bgyid kyi/ gzhan du na bdag nyid kho na la yongs
su smod par bgyid/ bdag cag gnyis ni/ 'di na dman pa dang / ma rabs dang / dpal med pa ste/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du tshangs par
spyod pa/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba spyad par ma nus so/ /zhes mchi ste/ btsun pa/ 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags
so| |zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/ btsun pa/ 'di na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bdag dgu ma
par bgyi ba ma lags pa rnams kyang 'gums/ dgum par bgyi ba rnams ni/ gtong bar dbang na/ bdag don gyi ched du mchis pa las/ rgyal rigs rgya chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu dag
dang | bram ze rgya chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang / khyim bdag rgya chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu dag gtam mjug tu phyin pa la mi sdod par bar skabs bar skabs su bka' mchid
mchi zhing ma gus pa dang / zhe sa ma mchis par smra bar bgyi bar sems lags so/ /btsun pa/ dus gcig cig na bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs shing chos ston par
mdzad pa de na lud pa'i sgra yang mi gda'/ sbrid pa'i sgra yang mi gda'o/ /de nas mi zhig gis lud pa'i sgra phyung ba dang / yang mi zhig gis/ mi de la 'di skad ces/ kye skyes bu/ khyod kha rog
par 'dug /bcom ldan 'das sbrang ma'i rtsis tshim par mdzad pa lta bu'i chos snyan pa ston par mdzad pa ma mthong ngam zhes smras lags so/ /de skad ces bgyis pa dang / mi de cang mi mchi bar
mchis so/ /de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ de tsam du mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba lags na/ 'di na da ltar chad pa med pa dang / mtshon cha
med pa'i chos mnyan pas/ 'khor btul ba ngo mtshar to/ /snyam ste/ btsun pa/ 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags te zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin
no| |btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan 'di yang mchis te/ btsun pa/ 'di na bdag gis dge sbyong dang / bram ze kha cig mthong na/ nor med
par bgyis te tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa las/ des zla ba dgu'am zla ba brgyad 'das pa dang / rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag bor te phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
po dag 'byor cing ldan par gyur cing / rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par bgyid do/ /btsun pa/ 'di na bdag gis mthong ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
dag /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba spyod cing zhes bya ba nas srog gi mtha'i bar zhes bya ba dang / btsun pa/
'di yang bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po brgyad pa/ btsun pa/
bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan 'di yang mchis te/ btsun pa/ 'di na bdag drang srong sbyin pa dang / rnying pa de dag la yid rton cing de dag la longs spyod rnams
kyang stsol/ grags pa yang stsol ba nas de dag gi srog gi bar yang stsol na/ de dag bcom ldan 'das la ji lta ba de ltar bgyi ba bgyid par mi sems te/ btsun pa/ dus gcig cig
na bdag drang srong yid brtan pa sbyin pa dang / rnying pa dag brtag par 'tshal nas 'khor gyi nang nas byung ste phyogs dog pa zhig tu mchis nas 'di ltar 'di dag bcom ldan 'das dang / bdag
gang logs su rkang pa ston blta'o/ /snyam na/ de dag gis rnam grangs du mar sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/ chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de
logs su ni/ mgo bstan/ bdag ga la ba de logs su ni/ rkang pa bstan to/ /de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das ni/ de tsam du rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ste/ 'di na da ltar
bdag 'di dag la longs spyod rnams kyang sbyin/ grags pa yang sbyin pa nas srog gi bar yang stsol na/ 'di dag bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba de ltar bdag la bya ba byed par mi sems pa ni/ ngo mtshar
to| |snyam ste zhes bya ba nas btsun pa/ 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ bdag la chos las byung ba'i dad
pa gzhan yang mchis te/ btsun pa/ bdag kyang yul ko sa la pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyang ko sa la pa lags/ bdag gi rigs kyang rgyal rigs lags
bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs kyang rgyal rigs lags/ bdag kyang rgas pa/ 'khogs pa/ gtugs pa/ na tshod lo brgyad cu lon pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyang bgres pa/ 'khogs
pa| gtugs pa/ sku na tshod lo brgyad cu lon pa lags/ btsun pa/ bdag kyang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang skur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyang bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal
po lags pas/ btsun pa/ 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags te/ des na bdag 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /khyod kyi chos 'dul ba ni/ legs par gsungs pa'o/ /nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni/ legs par zhugs pa'o/ /snyam du sems lags
so| |de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos sna tshogs rgya cher bshad nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te song ngo / /da nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyod kyis chos sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi rnam
grangs zungs shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag /chos sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ni/ don dang ldan pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan pa
ste| mngon par shes par byed pa dang / rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par byed pa yin no/ /de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung bas/ chos sna tshogs pa'i
chos kyi rnam grangs blangs te kun chub par byas nas de lta de ltar gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya'o/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa
la ring zhig thogs pa dang / spyod pa'i bu ring po yang cung zhig bsdad nas shing rtar zhugs te mnyan yod du song nas des 'phags skyes po rgyal srid la bzhag go /phreng ldan ma dang / dbyar
tshul mas spyod pa'i bu la dris pa/ spyod pa'i bu/ lha ga la bzhugs/ grong rdal me tsu ru di na bzhugs so/ /de dag rkang gis grong rdal me tsu ru dir chas so/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
yang bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyan nas gtsug lag khang nas byung na/ spyod pa'i bu ring po mi snang nas des dge slong rnams la dris pa/ 'phags pa dag /spyod byed kyi bu ring po gar
mchis/ de dag gis smras pa/ de lha nang du gshegs ma thag tu shing rtar zhugs nas mchis so/ /zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po rkang gis song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyang ches snga ba zhig tu
rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs so/ /ji tsam na rgyal pos lam gar phreng ldan ma dang / dbyar tshul ma mthong nas des de dag la dris pa/ khyed ci phyir rkang gis 'dir
'ongs/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ spyod pa'i bu ring pos 'phags skyes po rgyal srid la bzhag ste/ de nas bdag cag lha'i gan du mchis mod/ bdag cag gzhan gar mchi/ rgyal pos
smras pa/ phreng ldan ma/ khyod kyis khyo'i rgyal srid nyams su myong zin gyi/ song la da bu'i rgyal srid nyams su myong bar gyis shig /nga yang dbyar tshul ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro

'o| |zhes byas pa dang / der phreng ldan ma snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don cing ngu bzhin phyir log go /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang dbyar tshul ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu chas
te rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas phan tshun 'khyams 'khyams pa las ma skyes dgra'i skyed mos tshal du 'dug ste/ des dbyar tshul ma la smras pa/ dbyar tshul ma/ song la rgyal po ma
skyes dgra la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal skyed mos tshal na 'dug go /zhes gyis shig /des rgyal po ma skyes dgra la smras pa/ lha/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khyod kyi skyed mos
tshal na bzhugs te lha gzigs par bzhed do/ /des thos nas sdangs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag /rgyal po de dmag mang po can yin no/ /glo bur kho nar 'ongs na/ khyed sus kyang ma
tshor ram/ dbyar byed mas smras pa/ lha/ de la dmag ga la mchis/ bus rgyal srid las phyung nas de g.yog dang gnyis su 'dir mchis so/ /des smras pa/ de rgyal po byed pa legs te/
bdag ni/ gzhon nu'i gnas na gnas so/ /zhes smras nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gang ngas rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ bkur sti med par spyan drang ba
ni| nga la rigs pa ma yin par 'gyur bas/ dengs la grong khyer mdzes pa dang / lam mdzes par gyis shig /de dag gis grong khyer de rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas zhes bya ba
nas lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal/ dga' ba'i tshal bzhin du zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas lam mdzes pa dang / grong khyer mdzes pa so sor khyad par du 'phags par byas nas dril
bsgrags pa/ shes ldan rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa dang / pho brang 'khor ba dang / yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag nyon cig /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal skyed mos tshal na 'dug

gi |de khyed lha dang lhan cig tu gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsu bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra shing rta stong phrag du ma phyi bzhin du khrid de dpung gi tshogs yan lag
bzhi pa dang / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bsur dong ngo / /de yang ma skyes dgra ring du thogs pas/ bru bas bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /skyed mos tshal dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig
na| la phug gi ra ba zhig yod pa der song ba dang / de la ldum pas/ la phug sbar gang byin no/ /de nas des la phug gi rdog ma dang / lo ma dag zos pa dang / skom
rab tu gyur nas rdzing drung du song ste chu ngoms par 'thungs nas langs pa dang / lag pa rengs shing ma zhu bas thebs nas shing rta'i lam du 'gyel ba dang / de 'khor lo dril ba'i rdul gyis kha
gang nas dus las 'das so/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgra skyed mos tshal du song ste phan tshun btsal bar bsam na/ ma rnyed do/ /des phyogs bzhir pho nya rta pa bkye ste tshol cig ces byas pa dang / de
na pho nya gcig la phug gi ra bar phyin nas des ldum pa de la dris pa/ kye skyes bu/ skyed mos tshal 'dir 'ongs pa 'ga' lta yod dam/ 'ongs so/ /de gar song / la phug sbar gang khyer
nas lam 'di nas rdzing bur song ngo / /de de'i rjes bzhin du song na/ shing rta'i lam na dus las 'das par mthong ngo / /des rgyal po ma skyes dgra la smras pa/ lha/ shing rta'i lam ga ge mo
zhig gi phyogs su dus las 'das so/ /rgyal pos kye ma kye hud ces smras nas skye bo brgya stong du mas bskor te phyogs der song ba dang / ji tsam na shi ba'i ro shin tu mi sdug pa mthong nas yang
blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'di/ nga'i yul du dus la 'das pa/ nga la snyan pa ma yin par 'gyur gyi/ khyed kyis 'di bkur
sti chen pos bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du skyol cig /nga yang 'di'i khog pa la mchod pa lhag par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/ /de dag gis kyang de bkur sti chen pos bsil tshal
gyi dur khrod chen por bskyal to/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang bcom ldan 'das ga la bder song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
btsun pa/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bdag gi yul du dus las 'das na/ de'i khog pa la bdag gis mchod pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen
po/ ci nus ci phod kyis lus la mchod pa rgya cher gyis shig /de nas rgyal pos de'i khog pa la mchod pa chen po byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
btsun pa/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ la phug gi rdog ma dang lo ma dag 'tshal nas sug pa rengs shing ma zhu bas thebs te dus las
'das lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ dpa' rgal bzhin
du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung ba dag /gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po/ las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la smin par mi
'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma yin/ me'i khams la ma yin/ rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams
ni| zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang / /las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/ /tshogs shing
dus dang ldan pa na/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ /rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba ri brag cig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de dang lhan
cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu pho zhig btsas te/ ji tsam na bskyed
bsrings nas chen por gyur to/ /des dus gzhan zhig na slong mo la song ba dang / la phug sbar gang zhig rnyed do/ /des ma la 'di re zhig khrus byas te 'ong ngo / /zhes gtams so/ /des
de de la gtams nas khrus byed du song ngo / /sangs rgyas rnams ma byung ba'i tshe 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas ngan pa dang dman pa la thugs brtse ba can/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa/
'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/ ri brag der phyin te/ de phyogs shig tu zhag lon nas snga dro
sham thabs dang / chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed blangs te ri brag tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / rim gyis khyim der phyin to/ /bram ze mo des de lus mdzes pa dang / sems mdzes
pa la sogs pa mthong ste/ de sems dang ba skyes pa des la phug sbar gang rang sangs rgyas de la phul lo/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag ni/ lus kyi chos ston gyi/ tshig gis ma yin pas/ des dang
pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha'i dbyings la 'phags te/ cho 'phrul sna tshogs dag bstan par brtsams so/ /so so'i skye bo ni/ rdzu 'phrul la myur du dad par byed pa yin pas/

des shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la gtugs pa dang / des de la snying brtse bar byas nas song ngo / /ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u de 'ongs nas smras pa/ yum/ la phug sbar gang po de stsol
cig /des smras pa/ bu/ rjes su yi rang ba gyis shig /ngas de rab tu byung ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/ bsod snyoms don du gnyer ba byon nas de la phul lo/ /zhes byas pa dang / de bkres pas
sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba skyes te smras pa/ rab tu byung ba des de zos nas ci ste lag pa rengs shing gsud de dus byas par ma gyur/ rgyal po chen po/ ji snyam du sems/ bram ze'i bu
gang yin pa de ni/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas la tshig rtsub mo smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ lo mang po lo brgya phrag
mang po/ lo stong phrag mang po/ lo brgya stong phrag mang por dmyal ba rnams su skyes so/ /las kyi lhag ma de nyid kyis lan drug tu lag pa rengs shing gsung
pas dus las 'das te/ da lta'i dus kyi bar 'di dang lan bdun du lag pa rengs shing gsud pa kho nas dus las 'das so/ /de lta bas na/ rgyal po chen po/ las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi
zhes bya ba nas las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kho na la 'bad par bya ste/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas rgyal po ma
skyes dgra/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dad nas rjes su yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nas
song ngo / /ji tsam na ma la gnod kyis 'phags skyes po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha/ yab rgyal po mdzad cing / lha dbang ma bskur pa na/ gang gi tshe nga rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe ngas shAkya
rnams kha bdag ste/ de ni/ ngas dang por bya ba yin no/ /zhes de lta bu'i khyu mchog gi tshig rlabs po che gsungs nas gcig tu chad par mdzad de/ 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par
bsgrags pa gang lags pa de dgongs sam/ da ni/ de'i dus la bab lags so/ /des smras pa/ ma la gnod/ ci/ ji snyed smras pa de thams cad bya'am/ don de 'das pa yin pas
thong / rgyal po'i bya ba dag dang / rgyal po'i byed pa dag yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ lha/ dge ba rnams ni/ dam bcas pa la brtan pa lags pas ji ltar dam bcas pa
bzhin sgrub tu gsol/ ma la gnod/ re zhig zhog cig dang / de yang mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ lha/ 'di ni/ thog mar dam bcas pa lags pas/ gdon mi 'tshal bar bgyi
'tshal te/ deng kho na gdugs kyang bzang / yud tsam yang bzang / skar ma yang bzang / bsod nams kyi gdugs kyang bzang bas/ lha/ de dag gis ngo lon ma bshams par deng nyid
gshegs pa'i rigs so/ /de nas 'phags skyes po ma la gnod kyis bslus pas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta pa'i tshogs
dang / dbung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams gsad pa'i phyir mnyan yod nas ser skya'i gzhir chas so/ /skabs de lta bu la/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/ de ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyi las chud mi za bar mkhyen nas ches
sngar mnyan yod nas ser skya'i gzhir gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lam kar shing sha ko Ta ka shun par ri 'chus shing / mi sdug pa/ lo ma srab pa/ grib ma chung ngu zhig gi drung
du skyil mo krung bcas te nyin mo'i gnas pas bzhugs so/ /rgyal po 'phags skyes pos/ bcom ldan 'das thag ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ shing lo ma mi sdug cing / grib ma chung ngu ma lags pa gzhan dag mchis na/ ci'i
slad du bcom ldan 'das de dag spangs te shing sha ko Ta ka shun pa 'chus shing / mi sdug pa/ lo ma srab pa/ grib ma chung ngu 'di'i drung na bzhugs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ rgyal po chen po/ gnyen bshes rnams la ni/ gnyen bshes kyi grib ma bsil lo/ /'phags skyes pos bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gnyen rnams la gzigs shing thugs
brtse ba mnga' ste/ kye ma/ bcom ldan 'das ni gnyen rnams la thugs brtse ba mdzad do/ /snyam du rig nas de nyid nas slar log go /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te
ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis bden pa ma mthong bar 'phags skyes po'i dmag gis thebs na/ bden pa dag mthong ba'i snod du mi 'gyur ro/ /snyam du mkhyen nas shAkya
rnams kyi nang du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ ser skya'i gzhir byon te ser skya'i gzhi'i n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams bcom
ldan 'das/ shAkya rnams kyi nang du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las 'dir byon te/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba 'di kho na na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das
ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba
dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu ston par mdzad pa dang / de thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par
chen po thob ste/ kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun la 'bab pa la bkod
do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /ma la gnod kyis 'phags skyes po mthong nas des smras pa/ lha/ ci ste slar log /des smras pa/ ma la gnod/ bcom ldan 'das nye du rnams la
gzigs shing thugs brtse ba mnga' ste/ kye ma/ bcom ldan 'das nye du rnams la thugs brtse ba mnga' bas/ rgyal po chen po/ nye du rnams la ni/ nye du'i grib ma bsil lo/ /zhes de lta bu'i
gsung 'di bka' stsal to/ /de ni/ nga'i snying la lhang zhes byed kyi/ ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams gsad pa thong zhig /des smras pa/ lha/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ 'dod chags dang
bral ba lags te/ 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams ni/ nye du la mi lta bas/ deng kho na lha'i nyi ma yang bzang / yud tsam yang bzang / skar ma yang
bzang / bsod nams kyi gdugs kyang bzang bas/ lha/ deng nyid ser skya'i gzhir gshegs shig /de mi dge ba'i grogs pos log par bzung bas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag
bzhi pa/ glang po che pa'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta pa'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas ser skya'i gzhir song ste ha cang mi ring ba zhig tu phru ma
btab nas 'dug go /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gis skyes bu gti mug can 'phags skyes po dpung
gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/ glang po che pa'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta pa'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams
dgum pa'i slad du ser skya'i gzhir mchis zhes thos te/ de'i slad du bdag de dpung dang bzhon pa dang bcas te 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du bkur ba'am/ khor yug gi slad rol
tu 'phangs pa'am/ ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer lcags kyi ra bas bskor ba'am/ lcags kyi dra bas bskor ba spro lags so/ /mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis
snga ma bzhin du bskor ba zhes bya ba'i bar nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ dpa' rgal bzhin nye bar
gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag /byas shing bsags pa rnams gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi'i
sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la ma yin/ chu'i khams la ma yin/ rlung gi khams la ma yin/ 'on kyang las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa
rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang / /las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/ /tshogs shing
dus dang ldan pa na/ /lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ /mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ 'jig rten ni/ las bdag gir bya ba/ las kyi skye gnas pa/ las kyi bsgo skal la spyod pa/ las la
rton pa yin pas/ gang gis las dge ba'am sdig pa byas pa de ni/ las de'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro/ /mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ de lta bas na/ las la gzhol bar bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
mo'u 'gal gyi bu ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas song ngo / /ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis/ skyes bu
gti mug can 'phags skyes po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/ glang po che pa'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta pa'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon
nas/ bdag cag gsod du 'ongs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas de dag gis kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/ glang po che pa'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta
ba'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas g.yul sprad pa'i phyir 'phags skyes po logs su spags so/ /de dag bden pa mthong ba yin pas/ gsod par ni/
cung zad kyang mi byed kyi/ gzhan du na de'i tshe dbyug pa dang / lcag dag gis snun cing gzhu rgyud dang / rgyun dang / 'breng ba rnams gcod pa dang / rna rgyan dag la mda' 'phen par
byed do/ /'phags skyes po'i dpung go cha zhig par byas nas ser skya'i gnas su zhugs te sgo dag bcad nas ra ba la sbrengs te 'khod do/ /de dag gis pha rol gnon pa'i mthu nye bar
bcom pa dang / ma la gnod la smras pa/ ma la gnod/ mthong ngam/ shAkya rnams kyis bdag cag brlag par byas su 'ong gi /thong la 'dong / des smras pa/ lha/ thugs ma chad
cig /ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams ni/ bden pa mthong ba lags pas/ 'di rnams srog chags grog sbur yang srog dang 'bral ba'i thugs mi thub ste/ de ni/ 'di dag gis bdag
cag gi sems can gcig kyang ma bsad pa las mngon no/ /de des bslus nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ shAkya rnams kyis kyang khrims su bcas pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag las sus
kyang 'phags skyes po'am/ 'phags skyes po'i dpung la bsnun par mi bya ste/ gang zhig snun pa de ni/ bdag gi nye du yang ma yin/ shAkya yang ma yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na shAkya sham+b+ha ka
zhes bya ba zhig ri brag cig na rang zhal ta byed cing las kyi mtha' byed pa des/ shAkya rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa ma thos so/ /de yang so so'i skye bo zhig yin te/ des 'phags skyes po
bdag cag gsad pa'i phyir ser skya'i gnas su 'ongs nas phyogs che ge mo zhig na 'dug go /zhes ji lta bu yin pa thos so/ /thos nas kyang khro bas kun nas dkris pas bskyed pa'i yid
mi bde bas/ mod la 'phags skyes po'i dpung gi thog tu drangs nas des der skye bo'i tshogs mang po zhig ni/ kha btag /kha cig ni/ tha ma ma shi tsam du byas so/ /de nas 'phags skyes
po yid mi bde nas smras pa/ ma la gnod/ khyod kyis mthong ngam/ khyod cig na re/ 'di dag bden pa mthong ba yin pas srog chags grog sbur yang srog dang 'bral bar mi byed do/ /zhe na/
re zhig 'di dag gcig gis kyang bdag cag gi skye bo mang po 'di lta bu bsad na/ gal te thams cad lhags par gyur na/ bdag cag gi sems
can 'ga' yang mi 'tsho bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dus kyis bcus pas chog gi /slar 'dong / des smras pa/ lha/ shAkya rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba bgyis
te/ bdag cag las gang gis kyang 'phags skyes po'am/ 'phags skyes po'i dpung la bsnun par mi bya ste/ gang zhig snun pa de ni/ bdag cag gi nye du yang ma yin/ shAkya yang
ma yin no/ /zhes dam bcas na/ de 'dis ma thos pas/ da ni/ 'di nang du yang mi chud pa'i gnas gang lags pa de mchis so/ /de ser skya'i gnas kyi sgor song ste 'dug nas
smras pa/ shes ldan dag /nang du 'ong gi /sgo phye zhig /de dag gis smras pa/ khyod kyis kho bo cag gi khrims su bca' ba dral bas da phyin chad khyod kho bo cag gi gnyen yang
ma yin/ shAkya yang ma yin no/ /khyod nang du lta ga la gtang / song zhig /des smras pa/ bdag gis khyod kyi khrims su bca' ba ma thos te/ 'on kyang mang du smra ci dgos/ gal
te bdag gis khyed kyi khrims su bca' ba dral na/ bdag gi 'khor phyir phyung zhig dang / gzhan du 'gro'o/ /de dag gis de'i 'khor phyir phyung ba dang / des de dag khrid nas bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das
la shAkya sham+b+ha kas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la gang la bgyi ba bgyi ba'i mtshan ma cung zad cig bdag la stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan
'das kyis de la rdzu 'phrul gyis dbu skra dang / sen mo dang / tshems dag cig gnang ba dang / des de dag khyer nas yul ba ku dar chas so/ /de rnams kyis shAkya sham+b+ha ka zhes bya ba brtson pa
dang / stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa zhig bdag cag gi yul du rgyal srid 'dod du 'ong ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang grogs bya bar brtsams pa/ shes
ldan dag /shAkya sham+b+ha ka zhes bya ba brtson pa dang / stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa zhig /bdag cag gi yul du 'ong ngo / /zhes grag gi /de'i phyir re zhig
tshur shog /'dus shig /ci/ de dang phrad cing 'dong ngam mi 'dong / de dag thams cad re zhig gi drung du 'dus te re zhig 'dug pa de'i bar du sham+b+ha kas 'khor rnams phyogs gcig tu bzhag
nas bang chen gyi cha lugs su byas te/ de dag gi drung du song ba dang / de dag gis 'ongs pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i smra ba kun tu spyad nas dris pa/ khyod ga las 'ong / des smras pa/
shAkya sham+b+ha ka zhes bya ba brtson pa dang / stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa de/ rgyal srid 'dod cing 'dir 'ong bar 'dod de/
des spring yig 'di bskur gyi/ 'khod la lhogs shig /de dag gis smras pa/ stan yang med na gang du 'khod/ des ral gri shubs nas phyung nas pha bong dum bu dum bur gshegs
te 'di la 'khod cig ces byas pa dang / de dag gis mthong nas ngo mtshar gyi mig gdangs te smras pa/ kye skyes bu/ de la khyod 'dra ba de lta bu'i mi ji tsam yod/ des smras pa/ shes
ldan dag /kho bo ni/ de'i bang chen te/ kho bos lta ci zhig nus/ de la skyes bu dpa' bo gzhan mang du yod do/ /de dag gis thos nas sdangs te phan tshun smras pa/ shes ldan dag /
gang gis bang chen 'di 'dra ba de'i mi gzhan ci 'dra ba zhig yod/ tshur/ de yong bdag cag gi rgyal por gzhug go/ zhes de dag gis spring yig bklags nas de la spring yig gi
lan byin pa/ byon pa legs so/ /sman btags te/ bdag cag bka' bzhin bgyid pa lags so/ /des spring yig gi lan khyer nas 'khor dang bcas te 'byor pa mchog dang / yul
ba ku dar 'ongs pa dang / de dag gis de bkur sti chen pos bsus nas rgyal srid la bzhag go /yul ba ku da pa rnams kyis shAkya sham+b+ha ka zhes bya ba rgyal srid la dbang bskur ro/ /zhes
kun tu sgra grags te/ rgyal po sham+b+ha ka/ rgyal po sham+b+ha ka zhes bya bar ming chags so/ /des der bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten byed du bcug ste sham+b+ha ka'i mchod
rten/ sham+b+ha ka'i mchod rten zhes bya bar ming chags so/ /de'i chung ma dad pa med pa zhig ni/ de yang de'i btsun mo dam pa yin pas/ des de'i ngo cung zad kyang mi chod pas/ des blon po rnams
la bsgo ba/ dgon pa srung ba gyis shig /de dag gis dgon pa srung ba byas pas/ da dung yang de na ri dwags dag mi gsod do/ /'phags skyes pos ma la gnod la smras pa/ mal gnod
da ni/ shAkya rnams kyis sgo rnams bcad de ra ba rnams su sbrengs nas bag brkyang ste 'khod na/ nges pa'i dus kyis 'chu bas ci zhig bya/ 'dong / des smras pa/ lha/ ci/ grong khyer thams cad
pha rol gnon pa gcig bus choms sam/ bdag rgyal po'i pho brang na spyod pas thos pa ni/ mkhas pa rnams ni bzhams pa dang / /rab tu sbyin dang bslu ba dang / kun tu spyad pa lnga pa ni/ /
dpung gis don rnams sgrub par byed/ /ces bgyi ste/ de lta bas na/ de dag la dbyen bgyi ba dgongs shig /'phags skyes pos de dag la spring pa/ shes ldan dag /nga ni/ khyed la rjes
su chags pa yang med/ khong khro ba yang med kyi/ 'on kyang / nga'o nir bya ba cung zhig yod de/ dengs byas shing thob nas myur ba myur bar 'gro'i/ /sgo phye zhig /shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/
shes ldan dag/ 'dus la ci sgo dbye'am/ 'on te mi dbye ba dpyad par bya'o/ /zhes de dag thams cad 'dus pa dang / de na kha cig gis smras pa/ dbye bar
bya'o| |gzhan dag gis smras pa/ gal te phye na/ ma legs so/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /kha cig ni/ dbye'o/ /zhes zer/ gzhan dag ni/ phye na ma legs so/ /
zhes zer bas/ de'i phyir gal te khyod 'dod na/ tshul shing brims shig dang / skye bo mang po'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de bya'o/ /zhes de rnams kyi tshul shing brim par brtsams so/ /
skabs der bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis lan du ma zhig dge sbyong go'u ta ma la glags btsal zhing glan ka btsal te phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du 'brangs kyang glags
ma rnyed kyi/ ma la da bdag gis 'di'i nye du rnams kha btag go /snyam du rig nas bdag nyid shAkya rgan po zhig tu mngon par sprul te rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas des thog mar tshul
shing blangs pa dang / shAkya rgan pos tshul shing blangs so/ /zhes thams cad kyis blangs so/ /de nas blo gcig pas 'phags skyes po la springs pa /nang du zhugs shig /de dpung gi tshogs
yan lag bzhi pa dang nang du zhugs te zhugs nas smras pa/ ngas shAkya rnams kha gdag go /ngas shAkya rnams yongs su spangs so/ /zhes smras pa'i tshig rjes chad ma thag tu/ skyes bu
mtshon gzas pa rnams kyis shAkya rnams kun nas gsad par brtsams pa dang / ku co chen po 'don to/ /shAkya ming chen gyis sgra de thos nas nye du la byams pas bskyed pa'i yid mi bde bas/
rings pa rings par 'phags skyes po'i dung du song ste des smras pa/ lha/ dam pa 'os pa bdag la dam pa stsol cig /des smras pa/ khyod dam pa ci slong smros shig /des smras pa/ lha/ bdag
gi nye du rnams la mi 'jigs pa stsol cig /'phags skyes pos smras pa/ ngas khyod kyi nye du rnams la ni/ mi 'jigs pa mi sbyin no/ /'on kyang khyod 'khor dang bcas te phyir phyung zhig /des
smras pa/ lha/ ji srid bdag chu'i nang du nub ste 'dug pa de srid du gang dag phyir 'byung ba de dag la mi 'jigs pa stsol cig /des blon po rnams kyi gdong du blta bar brtsams pa dang / de
dag gis smras pa/ lha/ ming chen 'di ni/ khyod kyi yum mes kyang lags/ yab kyi grogs po yang lags pas/ 'di la ni/ dam pa de stsal ba'i rigs so/ /des smras pa/ gal te de
lta na/ de skad cig byin to/ /shAkya ming chen nye du la chags pas bskyed pa'i yid mi bde ba/ snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis chu'i rdzing du song ste de'i 'gram na shing sA la zhig yod pa de'i
yal ga rdzing gi chu'i nang du nub pa de la/ des gtsug phud btags nas nam srog dang bral ba de'i bar du nub ste 'dug go /de na ser skya'i gnas na gnas pa'i shAkya gang dag gis tshogs pa
can gyi las ma byas pa de dag las kha cig ni/ ser skya'i gnas nas byung ste gyad rgyu bar song ngo / /kha cig ni/ bal yul du dong ngo / /kha cig ni/ grong dang /
grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i yul 'khor dang / pho brang de dang de dag tu song ngo / /gang dag gis tshogs pa can gyi las byas pa de dag ni/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shar sgor byung nas lho nas
'jug /lho nas byung nas nub nas 'jug /nub nas byung nas byang nas 'jug /byang nas byung nas shar nas 'jug pa dang / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ kye ma shAkya rnams ni/
tshig go /kye ma shAkya rnams ni/ tshig ste/ 'di na da ltar shar sgo nas nang du zhugs nas lhor 'byung / lho nas zhugs nas nub tu 'byung / nub nas zhugs nas byang du 'byung / byang nas
zhugs nas lhor 'byung ngo / /'phags skyes pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /mes po de chur nub nas ring zhig lon gyi/ ltos shig /blon po rnams kyis rings par chu'i rdzing du song nas
brtag par brtsams pa las/ de tsam na dus las 'das so/ /de dag 'ongs te/ lha/ dus las 'das so/ /zhes byas pa dang / de che thang du kun nas dkris pas smras pa/ shes ldan
dag /stan shoms shig /ji srid du lam po cher khrag gi 'od pa bab par ma byur pa de srid du phyogs 'di nas mi 'gro'o/ /skyes bu dpa' bo rnams bsad na/ khrag nyung ngu 'byung ba
'di ni/ chos nyid yin pas blon po rnams phan tshun bgro bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag /sems can 'di ni/ sdig pa'i las byed pa dang / dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin na/ 'dir
'di snyed kyi khrag cig ga las 'byung / rgya skyegs dag cig len du gzhug go/ zhes de rnams kyis rgya skyegs blangs nas rgya skyegs kyi chu bum pa brgya stong du ma lam po cher phab pa dang /
'phags skyes pos bsam pa/ bdag gi dam bcas pa rdzogs pas 'gro'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos shAkya bdun khri bdun stong bsad de/ phal cher ni/
bden pa mthong ba sha stag go /des sems can de snyed bsad nas gzhon nu lnga brgya dang / bu mo lnga brgya khrid de/ gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba phag mo'i gnas
zhes bya ba ga la ba der song ba dang / ma la gnod kyis smras pa/ lha/ khyod kyis dgra yongs su bskyangs so/ /dgra 'di dag ci ste yal bar gzhag /sod cig /'phags skyes pos gshed
ma'i mi rnams la gtad de/ 'di rnams glang po che dag gis rdzir chug cig /ces bsgo'o/ /de rnams kyis glang po dag gis rdzir gzhug par brtsams pa dang / de dag gis glang po che de
dag gan rkyal du mnan te lag pa nas lag par sbed par brtsams so/ /ma la gnod kyis smras pa/ lha/ khyod kyis 'di dag gi pha rol gnon pa gzigs sam/ mthong ngo / /lha/ 'di
dag yal bar bzhag na/ lha la gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ram/ ma la gnod/ de de bzhin te/ 'di dag ji ltar gsad par bya ba dri'i/ smros shig /des
smras pa/ lha/ dong du stsol la steng nas lcags kyi shal bas bshal du stsol cig /de bzhin byed du chug cig /des de dag dong du bcug nas steng nas lcags kyi shal bas mnan to/ /
de nas gnyis shig bros te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo / /song nas de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed kyis bkab pa dang de nyid du shi'o/ /shAkya rnams bsad pa na/
bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu shin tu bsnyung par gyur to/ /de nas skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos mi zhig la smras pa/ kye skyes bu/ khyod tshur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar song
ste 'dug la bcom ldan 'das ci gsung ba de khyod kyis nyon la/ nga la zlos shig /ces smras nas song ngo /mi de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ nga la chu lhung bzed gang byin cig /des bcom ldan 'das la chu lhung bzed gang phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis der chu'i thigs pa gnyis gsum tsam blugs pa dang / de dag chu'i nang de nas du bar thul zhing tsi ri ri zer la sgra yang 'byin to/ /dge slong rnams cho 'phrul de mthong nas yid dad cing /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/ 'phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas/ bcom ldan 'das dbu bsnyung bar gyur/
ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis sug las ci zhig bgyis na/ des nongs pa yang ma mchis/ gnod pa bgyis pa yang ma mchis par skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos bkum pa
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /tshur/ gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba phag mo'i gnas gang du skyes bu gti mug 'phags
skyes pos shAkya rnams bsad pa ga la ba de kho nar de rnams dang / bdag nyid kyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ltar 'tshal lo/ /zhes dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das
kyi ltar nyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rab tu mang po dang thabs cig gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba phag mo'i gnas gal ba der gshegs so/ /bre bo
dang rus mthun pa'i bram ze zhig gis bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye go'u ta ma/ gang gi slad du skyes
bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos/ ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya nongs pa yang ma mchis/ gnod pa bgyis pa yang ma mchis pa rnams srog dang phral ba ni/ bsod nams ma lags pa mang po
zhig bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ gang gi phyir skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos/
ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med pa rnams srog dang bral ba ni/ bsod nams ma yin pa mang po zhig bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba phag mo'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs pa dang / de na ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya lcags kyi shal bas bshal ba las
srog gi lhag ma cung zad lus pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas skad ngan bton to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyogs gcig tu gshegs nas gdan
bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya 'di rnams kyis 'di dang
lan gsum gyi bar du sgra chen po phyung ste/ sngon nya pa byed pa'i tshe/ nya 'dod pa'i phyir gang yin pa dang / chom rkun pa byed pa'i tshe grong 'joms pa'i phyir gang yin pa dang / da lta ser skya
na gnas pa'i shAkya byed pa'i tshe skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos srog gi lhag ma cung zad tsam lus par byas te 'chi ba la mngon du phyogs pa'i tshe gang yin pa'o/ /'di dag
thams cad kyi brdol ba la ni khyad par ram/ bsam pa'am/ tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med de/ mtshungs so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ shan pa 'di/ las de dang / bzo de dang /
'tsho ba des glang po che la zhon te 'gro ba'am/ rta la zhon te 'gro ba'am/ shing rtar zhugs te 'gro ba'am/ dpung bu chung dang chas te 'gro ba'am/ nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po grub nas
gnas pa lta ci ga la mthong ngam/ thos sam/ btsun pa/ ma lags so/ /dge slong dag/ legs so/ /legs so/ /ngas kyang shan pa 'di/ las de dang zhes bya ba nas nor gyi phung po rgya
chen po mang po bsgrubs nas gnas pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/ ma mthong / ma thos so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shan pa rnams ni/ sdig pa'i bsam pas rtog par byed de/
des na 'di glang po che la zhon te 'gro ba'am/ rta la zhon te 'gro ba'am/ shing rtar zhugs te 'gro ba'am/ dpung bu chung dang chas te 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur la/ nor gyi phung po rgya chen po
mang po bsgrubs te gnas par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis bya gag gsod pa'am/ phag gsod pa'am/ nya pa'am/ ri dwags bshor
ba'am/ bya ba'am/ bong bu rgyas 'tshor ba'am/ ba lang gsod pa dag las de dang zhes bya ba nas nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas pa de mthong ngam/ thos sam zhes bya
ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ba lang gsod pa de/ sdig pa'i bsam pas rtog par byed de/ des na de glang po che la zhon te 'gro
bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba nas nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /dge slong dag /re zhig byol song gi skye gnas su song
ba'i srog chags rnams kyis kyang sdig pa'i bsam pas brtags na/ glang po che la zhon te 'gro ba'am/ rta la zhon te 'gro ba'am/ shing rtar zhugs te 'gro ba'am/ dpung bu chung dang
chas te 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur la/ nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas par yang mi 'gyur na/ skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes so/ slob pas longs zhes smras pa/
tshul khrims kyi gzi brjid kyi nye bar bcom pa lta zhig glang po che la zhon te 'gro ba'am/ rta la zhon te 'gro ba'am/ shing rtar zhugs te 'gro ba'am/ dpung bu chung dang chas te 'gro
ba'am/ nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas pa lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /dge slong dag /ko sa la'i rigs 'di nas zhag bdun na sbrul
gyis bltas pa bzhin du rabs chad par 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes po yang ma la gnod dang bcas te zhag bdun na mes tshig nas cho nges 'don bzhin dmyal ba
chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ gang mgal dum la yang ngan sems mi bya na/ rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus
la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis de lta bur bslab par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
zhus pa/ btsun pa/ shAkya lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas nongs pa yang ma mchis/ gnod pa bgyis pa yang ma mchis par skyes bu gti
mug 'phags skyes pos srog dang phral/ bcom ldan 'das kyang shAkya rnams bkum pa'i tshe dbu snyun tshabs chen pos thebs par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| dge slong dag/ 'di dag nyid dang / ngas las byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ dpa' rgal bzhin nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung ba dag
yin te/ 'di dag dang / ngas las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag/ las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam
par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma yin/ me'i khams la ma yin/ rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i
phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang / /las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur
te| |tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ chu bo zhig gi 'gram na nya pa lnga brgya gnas so/ /de rnams kyis nya gnyis
shig rgya mtsho chen po na phan tshun rgyu rgyu ba las chu bo der zhugs pa mthong ba dang / de rnams rab tu dga' ba skyes nas de dag nya rgya chen pos bcus so/ /de rnams kyis de gnyis kyi lus
mthong nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag /'di lta ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ 'di dag lus che ches pas/ gal te bsad na/ sha ldom par mi 'gyur te/ de 'drul bar
'gyur ro/ /de nas kha cig gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig sgrub tu yod/ gcig ni/ bsad la/ gcig ni/ btags te gzhag mod/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ 'di yang che ste/ 'di
yang ldom par mi 'gyur pas/ sdong po la btags la gson por sha bcad cing bcad cing btsong ngo / /de rnams kyis smras pa/ legs te/ de ltar bya'o/ /de dag gis de ltar bya bar
brtsams pa dang / de dag de ltar gcod pa na rang gi skad du 'o dod 'bod par brtsams so/ /de dag mi bde ba de nya pa'i khye'u zhig gis thos nas rab tu dga' ba skyed par byed do/ /de
nas nya de gnyis de ltar bcad pa'i tshe de rnams la 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ gang bdag cag gis nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med par 'di dag gis 'di ltar bsad/ de'i
phyir bdag cag kyang gang du 'di dag nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med par gsod par 'gyur ba der skye bar gyur cig /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ nya gnyis po gang dag
yin pa de dag ni/ 'phags skyes po dang / ma la gnod 'di dag kho na yin no/ /nya pa lnga brgya gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ shAkya lnga brgya po 'di dag kho na yin te/ gang 'di gnyis kyis nya
de dag de ltar bsad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ da ltar 'phags skyes po dang / ma la gnod dag gis shAkyar gyur pa nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med pa rnams lcags
kyis shal bas mnan cing / 'o dod 'bod bzhin bsad do/ /nya pa'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na de yin te/ gang ngas nya bsad pa na/ rab tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i las
de'i rnam par smin pas/ da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang dbu snyun tshabs chen pos thebs par gyur to/ /gal te ngas yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob par ma gyur
na| nga yang las 'di lta bu dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /gzhan yang ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis las gang byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba chom
rkun lnga brgya zhig gis lam du 'gro ba dag bcom nas/ 'phrog pa'i rdzas dag khyer te/ ri brag cig tu 'joms su song ngo / /de dag gis ri brag na gnas pa'i
skye bo'i tshogs de thams cad bcom nas 'phrog go /khyim bdag gnyis shig /yang thog tu 'dzeg ste 'dug pa dang / rkun po rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gang dag 'dir
'dzeg pa de dag bobs shig /thams cad kyi thams cad du med par gyur ta re/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ ji srid 'tsho ba de srid du mi 'bab bo/ /de rnams kyis rtswa dang / shing phal mo che bcer
nas yang tog de me btang ba dang / de gnyis tsha bas sdug bsngal bskyed pas gdungs te 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed do/ /bdag cag nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med par
'di rnams kyis bsad pas/ bdag cag kyang 'di rnams nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med par gsod par gyur cig /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ khyim bdag gnyis
po gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'phags skyes po dang / ma la gnod 'di dag kho na yin no/ /g.yon can lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ shAkya lnga brgya po 'di dag kho na yin te/
gang 'di rnams chom rkun par gyur pas de dag nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med par srog dang phral ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ da ltar 'phags skyes pos ma la
gnod dang bsdongs nas shAkya lnga brgya po dag nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med par srog dang phral lo/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam
par smin pa yang gcig tu nag la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi yang gcig tu dkar/ 'dren ma rnams kyi yang 'dren ma yin no/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu nag pa dang /
'dren ma rnams spangs nas las gcig tu dkar ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong rnams kyis de lta bur bslab par bya'o/ /'phags skyes bos shAkya rnams de ltar bsad nas mnyan
yod du song ngo / /de nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po'i gzhon nu rgyal bu rgyal byed steng gi khang bzang du song nas skyes pa med par rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod
par byed pa/ 'phags skyes pos thos nas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /rtse ba'o ni su zhig /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu rgyal bu rgyal byed lags so/ /des smras pa/
shes ldan dag /de bos shig /de rnams kyis de bos pa dang / 'phags skyes pos smras pa/ rgyal bu rgyal byed/ nga ni/ dag bsad nas 'ongs na/ khyod rtse zhing 'dug gam/ des smras
pa/ lha'i dgra su dag cig lags/ shAkya rnams so/ /gal te shAkya rnams khyod kyi dgra lags na/ mdza' bo ji lta bu dag ci lags/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'di yang de dag gi
phyogs kho na yin pas/ 'di gsad par bya'o/ /zhes de dag gis de bsad de dus las 'das nas lha gya nom pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi nang du skyes
nas de'i mi'i rol mo'i sgra ma zhi bar lha'i sgra byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/ bsod nams byas pa 'dir dga' phyi
mar dga'/ /gnyi gar dga' ste de ni bdag nyid kyi/ /las rnams smin mthong de dga' rab tu dga'/ /'gro ba bzang por song ba phyir zhing dga'/ /bsod nams byas pa 'dir mgu
phyi mar mgu /gnyi gar mgu ste de ni bdag nyid kyi/ /las rnams smin mthong de mgu rab tu mgu /'gro ba bzang por song ba phyir zhing mgu /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i don ma 'jal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ gzhon
nu rgyal bu rgyal byed de/ nyes pa med cing gnod pa med par skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos srog dang bral te/ de'i mi'i rol mo'i sgra ma zhi bar lha'i sgra byung ngo / /ngas de las
dgongs nas 'di skad du/ bsod nams byas pa 'dir dga' phyi mar dga'/ /zhes bya ba nas/ 'gro ba bzang por song ba phyir zhing mgu /zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/ /zhes gsungs
pa dang / de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 'phags skyes po btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du ngom zhing rnam par ngom ste/ nga rgyal can/ mthu dang ldan pa/ dpa' bo/ brtson
'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa can gang dag yin pa de dag ngas rmeg med par byas te/ nga dang 'dra ba su zhig yod ces zer ro/ /de nas 'phags skyes pos shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya khrid pa de
dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras so/ /khyod kyis gang dag rmed med byas/ /de dag rgyal sras shAkya'i sras/ /bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin/ /khyod kyis 'dir smras ci zhig
rung / /de skad ces smras pa dang / khros nas blon po rnams la tshigs su bcad pas bsgo ba/ klu rnams bsad na klu yi bu mo dag /dug gis gang ba sprin gyis khebs pa ltar/ /'di dag la
gor rkang lag rnams chod la/ /nye du de dag nyid rjes myur du thong / /blon po rnams kyis shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dmar bu can gyi rdzing 'gram du lag pa dang / rkang pa dag bcad de/
de lag pa'i dong / lag pa'i dong zhes bya bar ming chags nas gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du mdo sde'i mgo la bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ lag pa'i dong gi rdzing
'gram na bzhugs so/ /zhes bris so// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po dgu pa/ de rnams sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ rtsub/ tsha ba/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor
ba nyams su myong ba na bsam pa/ bdag cag mi bzad pa/ dog pa/ nyam nga bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma dgongs pa lta snyam mo/ /skabs de lta
bu la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ thugs su ma chud pa'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/ de nas bcom ldan
'das thugs rje chen pos bskul nas phyogs der gshegs pa dang / ji tsam na bud med de dag thams cad sgren mor 'dug pa gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das
kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed do/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis
kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so/ /gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bcom
ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis mi shes na/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ kye ma/ lha'i
bu mo bde sogs kyis gos dag dang / chu khyer te 'ongs kyang bla na snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs bskyed ma thag tu lha'i bu mo bde sogs kyis ras zung lnga brgya dang / mtsho chen
po ma dros pa nas chu blangs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ ras yug lnga
brgya 'di dag dang / chab 'tshal te mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ song la shAkya'i bu mo 'o ni rnams dbugs phyung ste/ dbugs phyung nas rkang pa dang / lag pa
dag khrus la gos rnams skon cig /btsun pa/ de ltar 'tshal lo/ /zhes smras nas des de rnams kyi rkang pa dang / lag pa dag bkrus nas gos rnams bskon no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams kyi sdug bsngal rgyun bcad
do| |rgyun bcad nas bka' stsal pa/ sring mo dag /khyed nyid kyis las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ dpa' rgal bzhin nye bar gnas pa/
gdon mi za bar 'byung ba yin te/ khyed kyis las byas shing bsags pa rnams gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/ sring mo dag /las la gzhol bar gyis shig /ces gsungs nas
bcom ldan 'das gshegs so/ /de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dang bar byas nas dus las 'das te rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /chos nyid kyis lha'i
bu'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis yin pa'o/ /de
rnams kyis mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis she na/ bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dang bar byas pas
yin par mthong ngo / /de nas sngon shAkya'i bu mo byed byed pa'i lha lnga brgya po de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhag tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'dong ba ni/
cha ma yin gyi/ ma la bdag cag zhag ma lon pa nyid du bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / /snyam mo/ /de nas sngon shAkya'i bu mo byed byed pa'i lha rnams rna cha gdub kor dri ma med
pa| g.yo ba thogs shing / lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba rnams
kyis thu ba bkang nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te bcom ldan 'das la me tog rnams kyis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs
par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad pa dang / de rnams kyis de thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyis rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
mngon sum du byas so/ /de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas ched du brjod pa lan gsum brjod pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bdag cag la sman btags pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag cag la mas
ma bgyis /phas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang gnyen sdug pa'i tshogs kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi mes po rnams kyis ma lags/ dge
sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis ma lags te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni/ bcad/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo rnams
ni| phye/ lha dang / mi rnams la ni/ bkod do/ /yang smras pa/ khyod kyi mthu yis ngan song lam dag ni/ /shin tu mi bzad nyes mang ldan pa bcad/ /mtho ris sgo phye bdag gi bsod nams ni/ shin
tu bzang dang mya ngan 'das lam thob/ /khyod brten de ring bdag gi skyon bral zhing / /shin tu rnam par dag mig dag pa thob/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i go 'phang zhi ba'ang thob/ /sdug bsngal rgya

mtsho'i pha rol mchog tu brgal/ /'gro ba lha min lha dang mis mchod cing / /skye rga 'chi ba'i skyon dang bral ba po/ /srid pa stong du mthong rab rnyed dka' ba/ /thub pa khyod deng mthong ba 'bras bu
mchis/ /de nas se mo do 'phyang dga' skyes rnams/ /zhabs gnyis la ni 'dud pa byas nas kyang / /dgra thul pa la yongs su bskor byas nas/ /slar yang lha
yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs dong / /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ shAkya'i bu mo lnga
brgya po dag gis las ci zhig bgyis na/ des lag pa dang / rkang pa dag bkum/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des lha rnams kyi nang du skyes/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des bcom ldan
'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa
zhes bya ba nas/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ /ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo
sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i gsung rab la 'di rnams rab tu byung
bar gyur to/ /de na 'di rnams kyis slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i dge slong rnams la lag rdum/ rkang rdum zhes bya ba'i tshig kun tu spyod pa kun tu spyad de/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ lo
mang por dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /las de nyid kyi lhag mas 'di rnams tshe rabs lnga brgyar lag pa dang / rkang pa dag bcad de/ da lta'i bar du yang lag pa dang / rkang pa dag bcad
pa yin no/ /gang nga la sems rab tu dang bar byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/ lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /gang 'di rnams kyis de na lung ma nos pa dang / bklags pa dang / kha ton
byas pa des nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas pa yin no/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na/ las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste dge slong dag /khyed kyis de lta bu
bslab par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas mi de 'phags skyes po'i drung du 'ongs pa dang / 'phags skyes pos smras pa/ kye skyes bu/ bcom ldan 'das ci gsung / des
smras pa/ lha/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas/ 'di nas zhag bdun na/ ko sa la'i rigs sbrul gyis bltas pa bzhin du rabs chad par 'gyur ro/ /'phags skyes po yang ma la gnod
dang bcas te mes tshig bzhin sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsung ngo / /'phags skyes pos thos nas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems
khong du chud de 'dug go /ma la gnod kyis smras pa/ lha/ khyod ci'i phyir phyag 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ ma
la gnod/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces/ zhag bdun na/ 'phags skyes po ma la gnod dang bcas te mes tshig bzhin sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par ltung
bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs na/ nga ji ltar sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug /des smras pa/ lha/ gang zhig bram ze 'ongs pa la 'tshal ma mi stsol pa de yang phung po brgya stong du sems
na| lhas dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i gnyen bshes de snyed cig bkum pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de de skad gsungs kyang rung / gzhan gsungs kyang rung ste/ 'on kyang lha skyed mos tshal
du chab kyi nang du khang bzang ka ba gcig pa zhig bgyid du stsal te/ lha der gshegs nas dgung bdun du bzhugs la dgung bdun 'das pa dang / slar mnyan yod du gshegs par
mdzad cig /des smras pa/ de ltar byas 'gro'o/ /zhes de btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te der song nas 'dug go /nyin zhag gcig thal pa dang / ma la gnod kyis smras pa/ lha/
dgung zhag bdun las gcig ni/ thal lags/ lhag ma dgung zhag drug mchis te/ dgung zhag drug 'das nas mnyan yod du gshegs par mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba nas nyin zhag
gnyis dang / gsum nas bdun pa la/ lha/ deng kho na la mnyan yod du gshegs par mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar de bzhin du byas so/ /de na yul ngan zhig kyang byung bar gyur to/ /bud med ni/
rgyan la dga' ba yin pas/ btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyis smras pa/ phu nu mo phyag /bdag cag deng mnyan yod du 'dong dgos pas/ rgyan thogs par bya'o/ /zhes de rnams kyis rgyan thogs
par brtsams so/ /de na btsun mo'i 'khor zhig gis sngas nang tshangs can gyi steng du nor bu me shel bzhag nas rgyan thogs par brtsams so/ /ji tsam na yul ngan sangs pa dang / nyi ma'i
'od zer gyis me shel gyi thog tu bab nas me byung ba de/ sngas nang tshangs can la mched do/ /de las kyang khang bzang la mched nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor rnams ni/ bros so/ /'phags
skyes po dang / ma la gnod tshig bzhin 'bros par brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na mi ma yin pa dag gis sgo rnams bcad nas 'phags skyes pos tshig bzhin du smras pa/ ma la gnod
tshig go /des smras pa/ lha/ tshos so/ /zhes de dag de skad du 'o dod 'bod cing dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad pa
dag bka' stsal pa/ sdig pa byas pas 'dir tshig phyi mar tshig /gnyis kar tshig ste de ni bdag nyid kyi/ las rnams smin mthong de tshig rab tu tshig /'gro ba ngan par song ba phyir zhing
tshig /sdig pa byas pa 'dir smre phyi mar smre/ /gnyis kar smre ste de ni bdag nyid kyi/ /las rnams smin mthong de smre rab tu smre/ /'gro ba ngan par song ba phyir
zhing smre/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad gsol to/ /btsun pa/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di bdag gis ma 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes po de ma la gnod dang bcas te mes tshig bzhin dmyal ba mnar med par song ste/ ngas de las dgongs
nas| sdig pa byas pa 'dir tshig phyi mar tshig /ces bya ba nas/ 'gro ba ngan par song ba phyir zhing smre/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gsungs pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe 'phags skyes pos shAkya
rnams bsad pa de'i tshe shAkya'i bu mo rnams kyis de rnams kyi rgyan dag mthong nas ngu bar brtsams te de rnams kyis bsam pa/ shAkya rnams ni/ 'phags pa rnams la mngon par
dad pa yin pas/ rgyan 'di dag/ 'phags pa rnams la dbul lo/ /zhes de rnams kyis rgyan de dag dge slong rnams la phul lo/ /drug sde rnams kyis rgyan de dag thogs nas ser
skya'i gnas su zhugs pa dang / shAkya'i bu mo rnams kyis de dag mthong nas/ de bzhin du ngu bar gyur cing smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /bdag cag gis de'i slad du 'di dag phul na/ nyes
dmigs de nyid byung bar gyur to/ /zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs
pa| nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams rgyan thogs pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis rgyan spel ma dang / 'phyang 'phrul can dang / zla gam can dang / gser
skud dang / rgyan sna tshogs gzhan ci yang rung ba yang thogs par mi bya ste/ thogs na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sdom ni/ blangs pa dang ni bslab pa dang / /du ba'i ri lu sman gce'u
bcas| |lhung bzed snod dang zungs dang ni/ /mar dkar 'bru mar byug pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
ba na bzhugs so/ /ri brag cig tu khyim bdag cig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /dus
gzhan zhig na de nye du rnams kyang zad par gyur/ nor yang zad/ longs spyod dag kyang zad nas des bsam pa/ da ni/ bdag rgas pas nor bsgrub par bya yang mi nus/ bdag la longs spyod
kyang med/ bdag gi nye du rnams kyang dus las 'das pas/ song la rab tu 'byung ngo / /snyam du rig nas des chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo/ da ni/ nga rgas pas/ nor bsgrub par bya yang
mi nus/ nga la longs spyod dag kyang med/ nga'i nye du rnams kyang dus las 'das pas/ khyod la dris te song la rab tu 'byung ngo / /khyim bdag de drang po
zhig na/ de ni/ g.yo kun tu spyod cing rtag tu skyes pa gzhan la lta ba zhig pas/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ de bzhin du mdzod cig /'on kyang dus dus su bltar spyon cig /des de
bzhin bya'o/ /zhes dam bcas nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste dge slong zhig gi drung du phyin nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/ /des smras pa/ bzhin
bzang / khyod 'jigs pa med pa/ spobs pa dge ste/ legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phan yon lnga yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas ni/ rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya
ba nyid du 'os te/ lnga gang zhe na/ bdag gis rang gi don ma 'dres pa thob par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid dang /
bdag gang dag gi bran dang / mngag gzhug pa dang / bkol ba dang / rang dbang med pa dang / dga' mgur 'gror med pa yin pa de dag gis mchod par bya bar 'gyur ba dang /
bstod par bya bar 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid dang / mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa dang / bde ba bla na med pa
thob par yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid dang / bdag mya ngan las cangs pa grub pa dang / bde ba bla na med pa ma thob pa las yongs su
nyams kyang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos
skyes bu dam pa yang dag par song ba mchog rnams kyis rnam grangs du mar rab tu 'byung ba bsngags par yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid
do| |zhes bka' stsal te/ khyod kyis sems bskyed pa dge'i/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung zhig /ces des de rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/ /
de nas zhag gnyis gsum zhig kun spyad pa'i chos bslab nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang / ri dwags kyis ri dwags mi sos kyi/ mnyan yod rgya chen por rang gi spyod yul du pha'i yul du bsod
snyoms la rgyu zhing 'tsho bar gyis shig /de phyi de nyin snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /de bsod snyoms la
rgyu ba na rang gi chung ma 'dra ba'i bud med cig mthong nas des bsam pa/ bdag gi sngon gyi chung ma de la rab tu byung nas bltar 'ong ngo / /zhes dam bcas kyi/ de'i phyir bdag da gzod rab
tu byung ba yin pas dus cung zad cig bsdad la/ de mi dga' bar mi 'gyur bar de bltar 'gro'o/ /snyam nas bsod snyoms la rgyus te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
tshal du song ngo / /des dus cung zhig bsdad nas mkhan po la smras pa/ mkhan po/ bdag la sngon gyi mchis brang zhig mchis te/ de la bdag gis rab tu byung nas bltar mchi'o/ /
zhes dam bcas pas/ de'i slad du gnang bar mdzod cig dang / mchi'o/ /des smras pa/ bu/ song la khyod kyis sems srungs shig /des smras pa/ bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /zhes smras nas
chas pa dang / rim gyis ri brag der phyin no/ /des de rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ba dang / de dga' ba dang bcas shing myur ba myur bas bsu nas smras pa/ rje'i sras/ byon pa de legs so//
byon pa lags te/ ring mo zhig lon nas mthong ngo / /zhes smras nas reg par brtsams pa dang / des smras pa/ ci byed/ chos gos dag blangs nas mnyel bsor gzhug mod/ des smras
pa/ ma reg cig /ci'i slad du/ mkhan pos nga la khyod kyis sems srungs shig /ces bsgo'o/ /des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ khyod sems srung la rag mod/ bdag gis bkag gam ci
zhes des de'i chos gos dag blangs nas stan bting ste rkang pa bkrus nas bskus so/ /de nas khrus byas nas zan byin te/ de yang de nyid du zan bza' bar 'dug pa dang / des smras pa/
ci byed/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ khyod dang lhan cig zan zos nas ring mo zhig lon no/ /des smras pa/ mkhan pos nga la khyod kyis sems srungs shig /ces bsgo'o/ /des smras pa/ rje'i
sras/ khyod sems srung la rag mod/ bdag gis bkag gam ci/ bdag khyod dang lhan cig zan zos nas ring mo zhig lon pas/ gdon mi za bar bza'o/ /zhes des de dang lhan cig zan
zos so/ /de nas mal bshams nas smras pa/ rje'i sras/ gzims mal 'dir shul gyis mnyel ba'i mnyel sos shig /des rkang pa bkrus nas nyal ba dang / de yang de nyid du nyal bar
brtsams so/ /des smras pa/ ci byed/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ khyod dang lhan cig nyal nas ring mo zhig lags pas/ ma bkyon cig /des smras pa/ mkhan pos nga la khyod kyis sems
srungs shig ces bsgo'o/ /des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ khyod sems srung la rag mod/ bdag gis bkag gam ci/ khyod dang bdag lhan cig nyal nas ring mo zhig lags pas/ gdon
mi za bar nyal bar bgyi'o/ /de ma btub pa dang / des bsam pa/ mgul nas 'jus na/ bdag gi dbang du 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas des de'i mgul nas 'jus pa dang / bud med ni/ reg pa'i
dug can yin pas reg pa tsam gyis log par spyad do/ /dus ring zhig 'dug nas smras pa/ bzang mo/ 'gro'o/ /des bsam pa/ 'di dang bdag lhan cig gsang ba byas pa gang yin pa de
dge slong rnams kyis mi shes pas/ skye bo mang pos shes par bya'o/ /des na de dag gis bskrad pas slar 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam du bsam nas des smras pa/
rje'i sras/ de bzhin du ji ltar bzhud/ lam rgyags kyi zong kaR+sha pa Na dag snoms shig /des smras pa/ bzang mo/ dge slong rnams dbyig la mi reg na/ ji ltar blang / des smras pa/
rje'i sras/ bdag gis ci nas kyang mi reg pa de ltar bgyi'i/ snoms shig /ces des dbyig thum por bcug nas bcings te 'khar gsil gyi rtsa ba la btags so/ /dregs pas
ldongs pa dang / sred pas ldongs pa rnams ni/ mi byed pa cung zad kyang med pas/ des de khyer te song ba dang / rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin no/ /drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/
drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stong pa yin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa des/ de
thag ring po nas mthong nas skra spra ba'i me tog lta bu/ smin ma rab tu 'phyang ba zhig nas des bsam pa/ 'di dge slong gnas brtan zhig 'ong gi/ /bsur 'gro'o/ /zhes de bsur
song ste/ gnas brtan /byon pa legs so/ /byon pa legs so/ /zhes byas pa dang / de slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes zer nas/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas
bsam pa/ kye ma 'di ni/ rgan zhugs shig ste/ slob dpon yang mi shes/ mkhan po yang mi shes so/ /re zhig 'di ga las 'ongs pa 'dri'o/ /snyam du bsam nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs/ khyod
ga las 'ongs/ des smras pa/ slob dpon/ bdag sngon gyi mchis brang zhig mchis pa bltar mchis te/ bdag de nas mchis so/ /rgan zhugs/ legs te/ khyod ni/ byas pa gzo ba zhig
go| byas pa gzo ba ni/ mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ 'di ltar byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa
tshor bar bya zhing / byas pa chung ngu yang chud gzan par mi bya na/ chen po lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bka' stsal to/ /sngon gyi chung ma mthong ngam/ mthong lags so/ /de khams bde'am/
khams bde lags so/ /rgan zhugs/ de ni/ go na/ 'khar gsil gyi rtsa ba la 'phyang ba'o ni ci yin/ slob dpon/ des shul rgyags kyi zong du kaR+sha pa Na dag cig stsal ba lags so//
rgan zhugs/ khyod lta bsod nams byas pa zhig ste/ sngon gyi chung ma yang mthong la/ rnyed pa yang grub bo/ /slob dpon/ khyod kyi bka' drin lags so/ /des bsam pa/ 'di las gzhan yang
'byung gi/ re zhig 'di la dri bar bya'o/ /snyam nas des de la tshig 'jam po brjod pa'i tshul gyis thams cad dris pa dang / rgan zhugs de drang po'i rang bzhin can zhig pas/ des ji ltar
gyur pa bsnyad do/ /des smras pa/ rgan zhugs/ de thams cad mkhan po la smros shig dang / khyod kyi mkhan po yid dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de de ltar bslus
pas ji ltar gyur pa mkhan po la bsnyad pa dang / des kyang dge slong rnams la bsnyad/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| dge slong dag /skyes bu gti mug 'di sbyor ba nyams kyi/ bsam pa ni/ ma nyams so/ /'di phas pham pa byung ste/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ rab tu byung ma thag tu phas pham par
'gyur ba'i chos bzhi rgyas par shod cig dang / nyes pa 'dir mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong dga' ba can zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de/ rtag tu dgon pa nags mtha'i gnas mal dag na bsam gtan byed pa zhig pas/ de'i ming
bsam gtan pa dga' ba can zhes bya bar chags so/ /de gang gi tshe skyil mo krung bcas nas bsam gtan byed pa'i tshe bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis gtses so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na
skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha mo zhig gis/ de'i skyil mo krung gi steng du 'dug pa dang / bud med ni/ reg pa'i dug can yin pas/ des de dang lhan cig log
par spyad do/ /log par spyad ma thag tu zug rngus zug pa bzhin du gnod nas/ sems bskyed pa/ bdag gi mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten pas/ bdag song la 'bab bo/ /
snyam mo/ /yang bsam pa/ bdag gis bcab pa'i sems gcig gis kyang ma bcabs pas/ re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ gal te skal pa yod pa zhig tu gyur na/ gnas
so| |'on te med na ni/ dga' mgur spyad par bya'o/ /snyam du bsam nas/ lag pa g.yas pas ni/ chos gos rnams khyer/ lag pa g.yon pas ni/ yan lag skyes bkab nas/ ngom zung
gnag cing mchi ma dang bcas bzhin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor dge slong brgya stong du ma'i gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs te chos
ston to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' ba can rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dgongs pa/ gal te dga' ba can la ma smras na/ gang na khrag dron
por skyugs nas dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do/ /snyam du dgongs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' ba can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dga' ba can 'ongs pa legs so/ /
khyod ci ste ngom zung gnag /des gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag sngon ni/ dga' ba can lags kyi/ da ni/ mi dga' ba can lags so/ /dga' ba can/ ci ste de skad ces/ khyod kyis
ci zhig byas/ btsun pa/ bdag gis bslab pa ma phul bar mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten te/ de ni/ bcab pa'i sems gcig gis kyang ma
bcab lags so/ /dga' ba can/ khyod ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa la slob par spro'am/ bcom ldan 'das/ spro lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams
la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dge slong dga' ba can gyis spyad par bya ba ma yin pa spyad kyang sems gcig gis kyang ma bcabs pas/ 'di phas pham par ma gyur gyi/ dge
slong dga' bcan dang / gzhan yang rung / 'di lta bu gang yin pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa'i sdom pa byin cig /sbyin pa yang 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams nas
gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'dug pa dang / dge slong dga' ba can gyis rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byas
la| rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong dga' ba can zhes
bgyi bas/ bslab pa ma phul bar mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten te/ de ni/ bcab pa'i sems gcig gis kyang ma bcabs nas/ bdag dge slong dga' ba can dge
'dun las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa gsol na/ dge 'dun thugs brtse ba can btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse bas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag dge slong dga' ba can la ji srid 'tsho'i
bar du bslab pa stsal du gsol/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong dga' ba can thos pa'i nyen kor nas bkar te mthong ba'i nyen kor du bzhag la/
dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong dga' ba can 'dis bslab pa ma phul bar mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i
chos bsten te/ de ni/ 'dis bcab pa'i sems gcig gis kyang ma bcabs nas/ dge slong dga' ba can 'di dge 'dun las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa gsol na/ gal te dge
'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong dga' ba can la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsol to/ /'di ni/
gsol ba'o/ /las ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong dga' ba can 'dis bslab pa ma phul bar mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten
te| de ni/ 'dis bcab pa'i sems gcig gis kyang ma bcabs nas/ dge slong dga' ba can 'di dge 'dun las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis
dge slong dga' ba can la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsol na/ dge slong dga' ba can la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsal par tshe dang ldan pa gang dag
bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /'di ni/ las brjod pa dang po ste/ las brjod pa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa yang de bzhin du
bya'o| |dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong dga' ba can la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin
to| |ngas bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong gis rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong gi gus par smra ba dang / phyag
'tshal ba dang / mngon du ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyor ba dang / 'dud pa'i las bdag gir mi bya/ stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya/ gal te 'dug na yang stan ches dma' ba longs
shig /'chag sa gcig tu bcag par mi bya/ gal te 'chag na yang gom pa bsri'o/ /phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag
gi khyim dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/ gal te 'gro na/ dge sbyong mdun du gtang bar bya/ steng g.yogs gcig par nyal bar mi bya/ rab tu dbyung bar mi bya/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mi
bya| gnas sbyin par mi bya/ dge slong gi ched du gzhag par mi bya/ gsol ba'i las mi bya/ gsol ba dang gnyis ma yin/ gsol ba dang bzhi mi bya'o/ /las byed par bsko bar mi bya/
dge slong ma'i ston pa mi bya/ sngon bskos pa zhig na yang des dge slong ma la gdams par mi bya/ dge slong la tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho
ba nyams pas gleng bar mi bya/ des gdams ngag dgag par mi bya/ gso sbyong ma yin/ dgag dbye ma yin/ gsol ba'i las ma yin/ gsol ba dang gnyis ma yin/ gsol ba
dang bzhi ma yin/ nang par sngar langs te sgo dbye bar bya/ mar me'i snod bsal bar bya/ gtsug lag khang chag chag gdab par bya/ phyag dar bya/ ba lang gi lci ba gsar pa bzang
pos byug par bya/ bshang gci khang phyag dar bya/ sa dang / lo ma dag dang / chu grang mo'am/ dron mo dus dang mthun par gzhag par bya/ de nas wa'i kha phyag par bya/ dus shes par bya
ste| stan bsham par bya/ bdug pa'i snod dang / bdug pa nye bar gzhag par bya/ gal te ston pa'i yon tan sgrog par nus na/ bdag nyid kyis bya/ ci ste mi nus na/ smra ba po la gsol
bar bya'o/ /zas kyi bskos la brtag par bya zhing / zas bskos zin nas khang steng du song ste gaN+DI brdung bar bya/ tsha ba'i dus su dge slong rnams la bsil yab kyis g.yab par bya/ de
nas bsnyen par rdzogs pa thams cad kyi ni/ 'og/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa rnams kyi ni/ gong du spyod lam zhi bas dge slong gi 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste zas
bza' bar bya/ zas kyi bya ba byas nas gnas mal phug tu brtul bar bya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi dor bar bya/ dus shes par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i
