mchod rten dag phyag dar bya zhing / ba lang gi lci ba gsar pa bzang pos byug par bya/ 'du ba'i dus su gnas mal bsham par bya zhing / bdug pa dang / bdug pa'i snod gzhag
par bya/ ston pa'i yon tan bsgrag par bya/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ deng dge 'dun gyis tshes gcig lags te/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang / gtsug
lag khang gi lha rnams kyi don du tshigs su bcad pa gsungs shig /ces nyi ma brjod par bya/ ci ste mi nus na/ dge slong la bcol bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams de'i gnas khang sko bar
mi byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang bsko bar bya'o/ /rnyed pa yang mi ster nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed pa sbyin par bya'o/ /de dge
ba'i phyogs la brtson par mi byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba'i phyogs la brtson par bya'o/ /de'i spyad pa ni/ 'di yin te/ ji srid lam du ma zhugs kyi bar
du'o| |de la lam du zhugs pa ni/ 'di yin te/ zag pa zad pa'o/ /des 'bad/ brtsal/ bsgrims pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rtogs nas 'dus
byas kyi rnam pa thams cad chos nyid kyis 'jig pa/ ltung ba/ 'gyes pa/ rnam par 'jig par bsgoms te nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/
khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa/ tsan+dan dang ste'ur 'dra ba/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/
rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa la chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis
mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / gus par smra bar bya ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyang de bzhin du 'dug cing las kyang byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
de rgan rim bzhin 'dug par bya zhing ji ltar bkag pa yang rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da
ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa pi linada'i bu rab tu byung tshun chad de rtag tu na nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyad pa rnams kyis de'i drung du song ste dris pa/ gnas brtan/ bde'am/
des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag na ste/ mi bde'o/ /gnas brtan/ khyod ci na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag glo lu zhing na'o/ /gnas brtan/ sman
cung zad mdzod cig /tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag gis sngon reng bu'i du ba bsten to/ /gnas brtan/ da ci ste mi sten/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /skabs de/ dge slong rnams
kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi /dge slong nad pas reng bu'i du ba brngub par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong nad pas reng bu'i du ba brngub par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams de bzhin du brngubs pa dang ma legs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
kham phor bu kha phug la kham phor kha sbyar nas rngubs shig /'on kyang ma legs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbu gu can gyis rngubs shig /de rnams kyis smyug ma'i
sbu gus brngubs pa dang / nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smyug ma'i sbu gus brngub par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang lcags kyi sman gce'u bya'o/ /ha
cang thung ba byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang thung ngur mi bya'o/ /ha cang ring por byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang ring por mi bya'o/ /'on
kyang sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad du bya'o/ /de dag rnon por byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnon por mi bya'o/ /rtsub por byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsub por
mi bya'o/ /de bab bab tu 'jog nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bab bab tu gzhag par mi bya'o/ /'on kyang snod du bcug ste gzhag par bya'o/ /de rnams kyi snod du bcug ste sa
la 'jog pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod sa la gzhag par mi bya'o/ /'on kyang zung nga'am/ gos kyi gdang la gdags par bya'o/ /de btsas khyer nas bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mar dkar ram/ 'bru mar gyis bkrus te gzhag par bya'o/ /dgos pa byung ba'i tshe des bkrus pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bkru bar mi
bya'i/ 'on kyang mer gzhug par bya ste/ de nyid de'i bkru ba yin no/ /sdom ni/ bsags pa dang ni khrus rtsi dang / /snar blugs spyad dang btung phor dang / /khyogs dang chab khung sa dag dang / /
chu dang bkru ba'i sa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong nad pa zhig sman pa'i
drung du song nas bzhin bzang / sman ston cig /ces byas pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bsags pa'i khrus kyis khrus mdzod cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ bzhin
bzang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /khyed kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan
la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te sman pas bstan na/ bsags pa'i khrus kyis khrus bya ste/ khrus bya ba 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bsags pa'i khrus kyis khrus bya zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bsags pa'i khrus ji lta bu yin pa ma shes nas/ de rnams yang sman pa'i drung du song
ste de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bsags pa'i khrus ji lta bu yin pa ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gis kyang mi shes
ste| bdag gis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gso ba'i dpyad las/ bsags pa'i khrus zhes bya ba bton na/ de lta bu yin pa ni/ mi shes so/ /'on kyang khyod kyi ston pa thams cad
mkhyen pa yin pas/ de nyid kyis mkhyen gyi/ song la de nyid la zhus shig /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ rlung 'byin pa'i rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu gang dag yin pa de dag bskol nas khrus bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis de dag bskol te khrus byas pa dang
de rnams rtsub par gyur to/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snum bsku bar bya'o/ /de rnams kyis bskus pa
dang / ha cang snum ches pas gnas mal dag ma rung bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khrus rtsis bkru bar bya'o/ /de rnams de bzhin du rtsub bor gyur nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu'i bum pa tha ma'i nang du 'bru mar thigs pa gsum mam gnyis blug par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ga
lan+da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu gang nas rab tu byung ba de tshun chad rtag tu na nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams de'i drung du song ste/ gnas brtan/
bde'am zhes dris pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag na ste/ mi bde'o/ /gnas brtan/ khyod ci na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag cham pa bda'o/ /gnas brtan/ sman cung zad mdzod cig /tshe dang
ldan pa dag /sngon bdag gis snar blugs pa'i las byas so/ /gnas brtan/ da ci ste mi byed/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan
'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi /snar blugs pa'i las bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis snar blugs pa'i las bya'o/ /zhes bka'
stsal ba dang / dge slong rnams de bzhin du snar blugs pa dang bo nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du snar blug par mi bya'o/ /
dge slong rnams kyis lo ma'i phur mas blugs pa dang nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lo ma'i phur mas blug par mi bya'o/ /dge slong rnams
kyis chos gos kyi gras blugs pa dang / nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gos kyi grwas blug par mi bya'o/ 'on kyang snar blug pa'i spyad
kyis blug par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams snar blug pa'i spyad mchu gcig pa byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snar blug pa'i spyad mchu gnyis pa bya'o/ /dge slong rnams
mchu rnon por byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mchu rnon por mi bya'o/ /dge slong rnams lag pa ma bkrus par ldugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
lag pa dag bkrus te byin len byas nas blug par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal pho'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i
bu gang nas rab tu byung ba de tshun chad rtag tu na nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams de'i drung du song ste gnas brtan/ bde'am zhes dris pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag na ste/ mi bde'o/ /
gnas brtan/ khyod ci na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /gnang ngo / /gnas brtan/ sman cung zad mdzod cig /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ bdag gis sngon phul ba'i btung phor bcangs so/ /gnas brtan/
da ci ste mi bcang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/
gnang gi /phul pa'i btung phor bcang bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /che dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu'i
gnyen dag 'ong ba dang / des 'ongs pa de dag la chos bstan nas de rnams khyim du song ste chung ma dag la smras pa/ 'phags pa pi lan da'i bus chos snyan cing snyan pa dag bshad de/ bdag
cag gis de mnyan nas 'ongs so/ /de dag gis smras so/ /khyod ni/ sangs rgyas byung ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyed kyis 'phags pa pi lin da'i
bu la chos snyan cing snyan pa dag mnyan pas so/ /khyod kyang ci'i phyir mi nyan/ bdag cag ni/ ngo dman pa ste/ ngo tsha'o/ /'on kyang gal te 'phags pa 'dir gshegs te bshad na/ bdag
cag gis kyang mnyan to/ /gal te de lta na/ 'phags pa la bya'o/ /de dag gis smras pa/ legs so/ /de rnams kyis de'i drung du song nas 'phags pa/ bud med dag chos nyan par 'tshal
lo| |zhes byas pa dang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /nyan la rag mod/ ci kho bos bkag gam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bud med kyi
mchid nas bdag cag ngo tsha ste/ gal te 'phags pa 'dir gshegs nas bshad na/ bdag cag kyang nyan to/ /zhes mchi'o/ /de smras pa/ zhes ldan dag /bdag na bas song ste
bshad mi nus so/ /'phags pa/ khyogs 'tshal te mchi'i/ des gshegs shig /bzhin bzang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang na/ ji ltar 'gro/ skabs de/ dge slong
rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ bzhon pas 'gro bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bzhon pas 'gro bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag gis bskor te khyogs su zhugs nas chos ston tu
chas pa drug sde rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis de'i lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag la dris pa/ shes ldan dag /'gro ba 'di su zhig /de rnams kyis smras pa/
mkhan po'o/ /ci/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyogs gnang ngam/ gnang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa ni/ bzang ste/ shAkya skyid de ba 'di rnams rkang gis 'gro bar mi nus
pas| rnam pa thams cad du bdag cag la brtse bar mdzad do/ /de dag song ba dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo/ bdag cag ci ste 'khod/ khyogs bya'o/ /legs
te| de bzhin bya'o/ /zhes de rnams kyis rnga ma dang / dril bu la sogs pas mdzes par byas pa'i khyogs byas so/ /de nas de rnams zhugs nas srang gi nang du 'jug rten la bu bzhin du rlom zhing
chas pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'di ci zhig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhon pa gnang ngo / /'phags pa/ ci/ dge sbyong khyed kyang 'dod pa'i
yon tan dag gis gnod dam/ de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
slong min pa bzhon pas 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong mi na ba bzhon pas 'gro na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang bzhon pas 'gro ba ni/ gnyis te/ rgas 'khogs pa
nyam chung ba dang / nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan
yod na khyim bdag dad pa can zhig 'dug pa de/ bram ze ma dad pa zhig dang lhan cig rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste dad pa can gyis de la nye ba'i tshal bstan par brtsams so/ /de
phan tshun 'khyams 'khyams shing drung na ngan skyugs shig mthong nas des smras pa/ grogs po/ dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams ni/ gtsang spra med pa ste/ me tog
dang / 'bras bu'i shing gi drung du bshang ba dang / gci ba byed do/ /des smras pa/ grogs po/ bdag nyid chen po de dag ni/ de ltar mi byed kyi/ gdon mi za bar khyim pa dga' zhig
gis byas so/ /de dag de skad du smras pa na/ rgan zhugs shing mgo gos kyi dkris nas shing drung du bshang ba bya bar brtsams pa dang / de bram ze ma dad pa des mthong nas smras pa/
grogs po/ khyod na re/ khyim pas byas so/ /zhes mi zer ram/ dge sbyong mgo gos kyis dkris te shing drung na bshang ba byed pa 'o ni la ltos zhes byas pa dang / de skyengs nas cang mi smra
bar 'dug go /des skabs de/ dge slong rnams la bsnyad de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs
gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams shing drung du bshang ba byed pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis shing drung du bshang ba dang / gci ba mi bya'o/ /byed na/ 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis shing drung du bshang ba dang / gci ba mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag lam du zhugs te dong ba dang / ji tsam na 'brog cig
tu phyin to/ /de na dge slong kha cig ni/ bshang pa bro'o/ /kha cig ni/ gci ba bro na/ de rnams shing 'di dag 'dab chags pa'o/ /snyam nas bshang ba yang ma byas/ gci ba yang ma byas
bas de rnams na bar gyur to/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgon pa'i shing 'dab chags pa gang yin
pa der ni/ bshang ba dang / gci ba bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgon par bshang ba dang / gci ba dag bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / grong mtha' pa'i
dge slong rnams mi byed de/ ji tsam na dpyid kyi dus la bab pa dang bshang ba dang / gci ba byed cing / nyi ma la bshang ba dang / gci ba byed pas rmya bar gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams
kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi shing tsher ma can gang dag yin pa de dag gi drung du bshang ba dang / gci ba bya
ste| 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gang gi tshe nye dgas la phug gi ra ba bshang pas ma rung bar byas pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis rtswa sngon po yod par bshang
pa dang / gci ba mi bya'o/ /dge slong rnams rtswa sngon po med pa'i phyogs su bshang ba dang / gci ba byas pas/ de mi gtsang bas gang bar gyur pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis
mthong nas 'phya bar byed/ smod par byed de/ dge sbyong shAkya'i bu 'di rnams kyi chos re bzang / ji ltar gcig tu 'dus nas za ba de kho na bzhin du
bshang ba dang / gci ba byed do/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/
gnang gi /bshad ba'i sa bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis byad dang nub kyi ngos su bshad ba'i khang pa bya bar brtsams pa dang / de dag gis ji lta bu bya ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ chab khungs ni/ rnam pa gnyis su bya ste/ khang bu lta bu dang / ba gam lta bu'o/ /de la khang bu lta bu ni/ gru bzhir byas la dbus su gdung bres nas khung bu
gdod cing wa gzhug par bya'o/ /ba gam lta bu yang gdung phyir phyung la bya ste/ de'i 'og tu tsher ma can bskyed do/ /chab khung sar chab khung sa'i khung bu'i steng du chab khung sa'i rkang
rten gzhag par bya/ ril pa spyi blugs gzhag pa'i gnas bya zhing / sgo snol mar gtod la sgo 'phar dang sgo gtan dag kyang gzhug par bya'o/ /gal te gcig nang du zhugs par
gyur na/ gcig shos kyis sgra dbyung bar bya zhing / gal te sdod na/ nang du 'jug par bya'o/ /nang na gnas pas kyang sgra dbyung bar bya'o/ /dri mi zhim par gyur na/ khang skyong gis
nyin gcig bzhin sbyang bar bya zhing / sa dang / lo ma dag kyang gzhag par bya ste/ de lta bas na/ chab khung 'khor dang bcas pa rjes su gnang ngo // //'dul ba phran tshegs
kyi gzhi/ bam po bcu pa/ sdom ni/ gci ba'i sa dang snod spyad dang / /ston pa la ni dga' nyid dang / /bza' ba lnga dang 'o ma dang / /zho dang zas dang gnang ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chab khung 'khor dang bcas pa bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal
pa dang / dge slong dag de nyid du gci bar byed pa na/ dge slong gzhan dag bshad ba bro bas mi bde zhing de dag bgags bas na bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gci
ba'i gnas logs shig tu bya'o/ /dge slong dag phyogs gang du ji lta bur bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nyid dang nye bar ba gam lta bu bya ste/ wa bcug la
sgo gdod cing sgo 'phar dang sgo gtan gzhug par bya ste/ chab khung sa ji lta bar thams cad snga ma bzhin du bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /so ga'i dus kyi tshe bram ze zhig skom pas nyam thag ste chu 'dod nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te dge slong zhig gi gan du song nas des smras
pa/ dge slong / bdag skom na/ chab stsal du gsol/ des ril ba blangs nas song ste des smras pa/ bram ze/ 'thungs shig /des smras pa/ 'phags
pa/ gtsang sbra ni/ tha dad pa lags na/ kye ma'o/ /khyod kyi chab snod bzhag la/ de nas dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze dag blud na/ ci nongs/ khyod bsod nams la mi sbyor ram/ skabs de/
dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi chu snod gzhag par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi chu
snod gzhag par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / khyim bdag cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi chu snod gzhag par gnang ngo / /zhes thos nas des rdza mkhan gyis
byas pa'i snod spyad gtsug lag khang gi nang du spungs te de las kun dga' ra ba pa dang / khyim pa gzhan dag gis kyang gang dang gang 'dod pa khyer nas dong ste dge slong rnams kyis
ma bkag pas snod spyad de dag zad nas dge slong dag gis khyim bdag de la smras pa/ bzhin bzang / snod spyad de dag zad kyi/ gzhan dag byin cig /des smras pa/ 'phags
pa dag /bdag gis mang po rab tu phul na/ ci'i slad du ring por ma thogs pa kho nar bas par gyur/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /
yal bar bor ba gang lags pa de ni/ ma legs pa zhig bgyis te/ de dag bdag gis khyim pa rnams la ni/ ma stsal to/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das
la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin yal bar dor bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang gnod spyad 'brub pa bsko bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis bye brag med par bskos
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod spyad 'brub pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni/ ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas
'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / gnod spyad brubs pa dang ma brubs pa mi shes pa'o/ /snod spyad 'brub pa chos lnga dang ldan pa
ni/ ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs
bas mi 'gro ba dang / snod spyad brubs pa dang ma brubs pa shes pa'o/ /bsko ba yang 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams pa byas la gaN+DI brdungs nas zhes bya ba nas spro bar bya ste zhes bya ba'i
bar snga ma bzhin no/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par spro'am/ gal te spro na/ des spro'o/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba
byas nas las bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par spro na/ gal te dge
'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par bsko bar
bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub bo/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las kyang 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge
slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa
gang dag /dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs
shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas
de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /des dge slong rnams la ni/ snod spyad rnying ba dag sbyin zhing / khyim pa rnams la ni/ gsar pa dag sbyin par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
ba/ dge slong rnams la gsar pa dag sbyin par bya zhing / khyim pa rnams la ni/ rnying pa dag sbyin par bya'o/ /de khyim pa rnams la byin pa ni/ phyir len par mi byed cing / dge slong rnams la
ni/ phyir len nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim pa rnams la byin pa ni/ blang bar bya'i/ dge slong rnams la ni/ ma yin no/ /phyi rol tu bzhag pas de dag 'khyams
par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod spyad kyi mdzod cig byas la der rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod spyad rnams gzhag par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis snod spyad
kyi mdzod cig byas la der rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod spyad rnams gzhag par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / ji tsam na byang phyogs nas 'gron po zhig 'ongs nas des dge 'dun la
zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs te des bsam pa/ bdag gis dge 'dun la yo byad brnyan pos ci'i phyir bsnyen bkur bya/ ma la bdag nyid kyi snod spyad kyis bsnyen bkur
bya'o/ /snyam nas des zangs kyi snod spyad mang po nye bar bzhag go /de nas yo byad mang pos bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig zla ba gsum du ston mo gsol nas mjug
gcod kyi ston mo byas nas chas so/ /de 'gro ba'i tshe zangs kyi snod spyad de dag thams cad dge 'dun la phul nas dge slong dag gis mdzod de nyid du rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod spyad dang lhan
cig bzhag pa dang / zangs kyi snod spyad kyis bsdos te rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod spyad rnams chag nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zangs
kyi snod spyad rnams gud du bzhag cing / rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod spyad rnams gud du gzhag par bya'o/ /ji tsam na bram ze zhig skom pas nyen nas dze ta'i tshal du song ste/ de
dge slong zhig gi gan du phyin nas smras pa/ kye dge slong / bdag skom na/ bdag la chab stsal du gsol/ des de la bum pa dang / srad bu dag byin pa dang / des smras pa/
'phags pa/ 'dis ci bgyi/ chab stsal du gsol/ des smras pa/ bram ze/ chu bcus zin pa med do/ /'phags pa/ khyed ni/ sems can thams cad la phan par zhugs pa lags
pas/ kye ma'o/ /khyed kyis chab nye bar bzhag kyang ci ma rung / des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyis chu nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis khyams dang / gnas khang dang / gtsug lag khang gi nang
dang / sgo khang dang / bang rim dag tu bab bab tu bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyams dang / gnas khang dang / gtsug lag khang gi nang dang / sgo khang
dang / bang rim dag tu bab bab tu gzhag par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang chu'i khang pa bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chu'i khang pa bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis phyogs
gang du ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang gi nang gi lho dang / nub kyi ngos su chu'i khang pa bya'o/ /mun gnag par gyur nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar khung gdod par bya'o/ /rdzab chags par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ so phag gi gcal dgram par bya zhing stor khung gdod
bar bya'o/ /sgo gdod par bya zhing sgo glegs dang / yang mig kyang gzhug par bya'o/ /chu sa la 'jog par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shing khri la gzhag par bya'o/ /
shing dag med nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ so phag gi stegs bu byas la de'i steng du rten ma bya zhing bum pa gzhag par bya'o/ /bum pa'i nang gi chu rul nas bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dus dus su bum pa bkru bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dus dus su bum pa bkru bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag cis bkru ba mi shes
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shing la bu shel tsi'i khrus shing ngam/ lo ma sbam pa'am/ ras ma'i thum bu bcing nas rung bar byas te bkru bar bya'o/ /'on kyang chu rul ba
nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bum pa dag la phyed ni/ bkru bar bya zhing / phyed du chu blug par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chu
blug par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis sus chu blug pa mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas pa dag gis chu blug par bya ste/ de lta
bas na/ chu'i khang pa 'khor dang bcas pa gnang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya go d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen
mo go'u ta mi 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo pos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /skye
rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das sbrid pa byung zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin
no/ /de nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gi bcom ldan 'das yun ring du 'tsho zhing / thub pa chen po bskal par
bzhugs par gyur cig /skye rgu'i bdag mo chen po go'u ta mi'i sgra thos nas dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gis kyang de kho na skad du bcom ldan 'das yun ring du 'tsho zhing / thub pa
chen po bskal par bzhugs par gyur cig /ces smras so/ /dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gi sgra sa bla ba'i gnod sbyin dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das yun ring du 'tsho zhing / thub pa chen
po bskal par bzhugs par gyur cig /ces sgra 'byin cing / dbyangs sgrog par byed do/ /sa bla ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sgra nam mkha' la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis thos nas skad cig de dang / thang gcig de dang /
yud tsam de dang / skad cig dang / thang gcig dang / yud tsam de la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar sgra grags par gyur nas tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das yun ring du 'tsho
zhing / thub pa chen po bskal par bzhugs par gyur cig /ces sgra 'byin cing dbyangs sgrog par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to/ /go'u ta mi/ khyod kyis sems can mang po'i bar chad byas te/ go'u ta mi/ khyod kyi sgra dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gis thos nas de kho na bzhin sgra sgrog par byed
cing / dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gi sgra/ sa bla ba'i gnod sbyin dang / nam mkha' gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /
'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis thos nas skad cig de dang / thang gcig de dang / yud tsam de

dang / skad cig dang / thang gcig dang / yud tsam de la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar sgras khyab par gyur cing / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang de kho na bzhin sgra phyung mod kyi/ go'u ta mi/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni/ de ltar phyag mi bya ste/ de ltar phyag byas pa ni/ legs par phyag byas pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag ji ltar bgyi/ phyag ji ltar bgyis na/ legs par phyag bgyis par 'gyur/ go'u ta mi/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni/ 'di ltar phyag bya ste/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas te mthun/ kun
tu dga'/ mi rtsod/ rtse gcig 'don pa gcig cing / chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/ ston pa'i bstan pa gsal ba mthong bar gyur cig /ces/ de ltar de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag bya ste/ de ltar phyag byas na/ legs par phyag byas par yang 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe dge slong zhig gis
tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ skye rgu'i bdag chen go'u ta mis/ /ston pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /bdag gi bcom ldan 'das ring du bzhugs/ /thub chen bskal bar bzhugs gyur cig /de yis
ston la de skad gsol/ /sru la 'di skad bka' stsal te/ /go'u tam ji ltar phyag byas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyag byas min/ /shes rab ldan pa ji ltar de/ /de bzhin gshegs la
phyag bgyis nas/ /ji ltar legs par phyag bgyis 'gyur/ /zhus pa bdag la bstan tu gsol/ /brtson 'grus brtsams pa bdag nyid brtson/ /rtag tu pha rol gnon brtan pa'i/ /nyan
thos mthun pa lta byed pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal yin/ /skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ dge 'dun mthun pa'i bsngags pa rjod par mdzad
de/ de'i phyir ji srid bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing dge slong gi dge 'dun mthun pa de'i tshe bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /snyam du rig nas stan las langs te bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag bsam bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo/ /
de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag bsam bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das lan gnyis lan gsum du cang mi
gsung bar bzhugs nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis yang btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag bsam bzhin du yongs su mya ngan 'da'
bar 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /go'u ta mi/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir
smra'am/ bcom ldan 'das/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o/ /go'u ta mi/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir smra'am/ bde bar gshegs pa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o/ /go'u ta
mi/ khyod mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir smra na/ go'u ta mi/ 'dus byas thams cad ni/ de lta bu'i chos can yin na/ ngas smra ci dgos/ dge slong ma lnga brgya po de dag gis kyang bcom ldan
'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol te/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag kyang bsam bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u ta mi dag /mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir smra'am/ bcom ldan 'das/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o/ /go'u ta mi/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir
smra'am/ bde bar gshegs pa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o/ /go'u ta mi/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir smra na/ 'dus byas thams cad ni/ de lta bu'i chos can yin pas ngas smra ci dgos/
de nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song

ngo tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / ma 'gag pa dang / sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal
te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag bsam bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo/ /go'u ta mi dag /mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir
smra'am/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o/ /go'u ta mi dag /mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir smra'am/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o/ /
go'u ta mi dag /khyod mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir smra na/ sring mo dag /'dus byas rnams ni/ de lta bu'i chos can yin pas/ nged kyis smra ci dgos/ de nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi
dang 'khor dge slong ma lnga brgya dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te dbyar khang du song ngo / /de 'khor gsum po dag gi rnam pa la brtags
nas nyin zhag bdun du gang thos nas sems can mang pos khyad par chen po thob par lta bu'i chos bstan to/ /de nas sa phyogs bar skabs yangs pa
zhig tu dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi gung la skyil mo krung phyed bcas nas 'dug go /dge slong ma de dag kyang de bzhin du 'dug go /de nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi ting nge
'dzin 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs te gang la sems mnyam par bzhag na/ rang gi stan las mi snang bar gyur cing / shar phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags
nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi po 'chag pa dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dag ston par byed cing / me'i khams la yang snyoms par zhugs so/ /me'i khams la snyoms
par zhugs nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi'i lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang /
shel gyi mdog lta bu dag stan par byed cing / cho 'phrul zung dag kyang ston par byed de/ lus kyi smad nas me 'bar la lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'byung ba dang / lus kyi stod
nas me 'bar la/ lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'byung bar byed do/ /shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su yang de bzhin byed de/ 'di ltar
phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi po dag ston par byed cing / bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/ /dge slong ma lnga brgya po de dag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms
par zhugs so/ /bsam gtan dang po las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la/ gnyis pa las gsum pa la/ gsum pa las bsam gtan bzhi pa la/ bzhi pa las nam mkha'
mtha' yas skye mched la/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las ci yang med pa'i skye mched la/ ci yang
med pa'i skye mched las 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug cing / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas yang ci yang med pa'i skye
mched la snyoms par zhugs so/ /ci yang med pa'i skye mched las rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la/ nam
mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las bsam gtan bzhi pa la/ bzhi pa las gsum pa la/ gsum pa las gnyis pa la/ gnyis pa las bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/ /
de nas bsam gtan dang po de nyid la brten nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /dge slong ma lnga brgya po de dag kyang de bzhin du lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs las ldog par snyoms
par zhugs nas bsam gtan dang po nyid la brten te yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi mya ngan las 'das ma thag
tu sa chen po g.yos par gyur cing / skar mda' ltung ba dang / phyogs dmar po dang / bar snang la lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag byung ngo / /de nas dge slong gang ri rab kyi bang rim dang / gzhan
yang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / dben pa'i gnas mal dag na bsam gtan byed pa de dag gis sa chen po g.yos par rig nas sa
chen po 'di ci'i phyir g.yos zhes bsam pa la zhugs na/ ji tsam na skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong nas de
dag 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi sru yongs su mya ngan las 'das na/ de'i lus la mchod pa lhag par bya ba la brtson par bya'i/ 'dong ngo / /snyam nas de dag shing dri zhim po
dag khyer nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi'i dbyar khang du dong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyang nyan thos chen po kun shes kauN+Din+ya dang / 'od srung chen po dang / rlangs pa dang /
ming chen dang / ma 'gag pa dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dag dang thabs cig tu skye rgu'i bdag mo chen
mo gau'u ta mi'i dbyar khang du gshegs so/ /de bzhin du yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang / gzhan nu dang / blon po dang / grong mi dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyi
'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba dang / ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang / bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang / rnying ba dang /
gzhan yang yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag kyang skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi'i dbyar khang du song ngo / /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rin po che dang / gos
sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i khyogs lnga brgya dang / dri dang / bdug spos dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs
dag phul lo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / ma 'gag pa dang / kun dga' bo dang / sgra gcan zin gyis skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi'i khyogs bteg go /bcom ldan 'das
kyis kyang phyag g.yas pas bzung ngo / /dge slong lhag ma rnams kyis kyang dge slong ma lhag ma rnams kyi khyogs bteg go /de nas mchod pa chen po byas te khyer nas sa phyogs bar skabs
dben sar khyogs rnams bzhag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi dang / dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gi lus las bla gos phud nas dge slong rnams
la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi dang / dge slong ma lnga brgya po 'di dag lo brgya nyi shu lon yang lus la gnyer ma dang / skra
dkar med cing bu mo lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu la ltos/ de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i tshogs dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / grong mi dang / yul mi
dang bcas pas dri sna tshogs kyi shing gi phung po spungs nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya po'i sku gdung dag bsregs so/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis kyang mi rtag pa dang ldan pa'i chos dag bshad nas gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/ /gshegs nas kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs
so/ /bzhugs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ 'di ltar sbrid pa byung ba la sos zhes zer ba la nyes dmigs 'di lta bu dang / gzhan dag kyang yod pas de
lta bas na/ dge slong gis sbrid pa byung ba la sos zhes brjod par mi bya'o/ /brjod na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod
pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gis las ci zhig bgyis na/ des 'di dag skyes nas
dgung lo brgya nyi shu lags kyang lus la gnyer ma dang / skra dkar ma mchis shing / bu mo dgung lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /skye
rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar myong bar
'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags te/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar
'gyur/ dge slong dag/ las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams
la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya
phrag rnams su yang / /las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/ /tshogs shing dus la bab ba na/ /las can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ /dge slong dag/ /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang

po 'di nyid la skye rgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas de grong khyer wA ra NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi gnas na brten cing
bzhugs so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag
mdzad nas bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe rgyal po kri kri zhes bya bas/ de'i sku la
sku'i mchod pa byas nas lam po che'i bzhi mdor rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ gnam 'phang du dpag tshad phyed yod pa byas
so/ /rgyal po kri kri'i btsun mo dam pa la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya po de dag rgas pa'i gnas skabs na lus la gnyer ma dang / skra dkar byung nas rgyal pos spangs pa dang / de dag
phan tshun smra bar brtsams pa/ grogs mo dag /lhas da bdag cag ci'i phyir spangs/ de dag las kha cig gis smras pa/ 'di la dpyad du ci yod/ bdag cag da lus gnyer ma dang /
skra dkar can du gyur pas/ de'i phyir bdag cag spangs mod/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ de ni/ de lta yin te/ da bdag cag lha la ji zhig bya/ bud med gzugs dang / na tshod
dang ldan pa gzhan dag yod pa de dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod grang / de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi mchod rten gyi drung du dong nas mchod pa byas la/ de nas bdag
cag phyin chad 'khor bar lus la gnyer ma dang / skra dkar can du ma gyur cig /ces smon lam gdab par bya'o/ /de dag gis smras pa/ legs kyi/ de bzhin bya'o/ /zhes de dag gis yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod pa byas nas me tog rnam pa sna
tshogs dri zhim zhing ma rnying pa'i chun po dang / phreng ba yid du 'ong ba dag btags nas bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa/ 'od
srung la mchod pa dgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa 'dis bdag cag skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon yang / lus la gnyer ma dang / skra dkar mchis par ma gyur cig /ces smon lam
btab bo/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ rgyal po kri kri'i btsun mo dam pa la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa dge slong
ma lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/ 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la mchod pa byas shing / smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par
smin bas da ltar skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon yang lus la gnyer ma dang / skra dkar med cing / bu mo lo bcu drug lon pa'i gzugs lta bur gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig
tu nag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas de ltar brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang ste mngon par bstod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi sbrid pa
byung ba la sos zhes brjod par mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse
bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed kyang bu pho yang med/ bu mo yang med la/ rgas pa'i
gnas skabs su nor zad cing longs spyod zad par gyur nas des chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo/ kho bo ni/ rgas shing bkren la bu pho yang med/ bu mo yang med pas rgyal byed kyi
tshal du rab tu 'byung du 'gro'o/ /des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ de bzhin rab tu 'byung bar mdzod cig /de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste rab tu byung ngo / /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de'i
chung ma blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa dang / de sbrid pa byung na/ dge slong gang gis kyang sos zhes ma byas so/ /de nas de'i sngon gyi chung mas lag pa g.yon pas sa blangs te/ sas
mtshams gcad pa byas nas yun ring du 'tsho bar gyur cig /ces smras so/ /dge slong dag gis de la brtags par brtsams pa dang / des de'i lag nas bzung ste drangs nas smras pa/
rje'i sras/ khyod dgra bo rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/ rgyal byed kyi tshal 'di gnod sbyin gos sngon po gyon pa lnga brgyas mi stong ste/ bdag 'ba' zhig gis khyod la sos zhes bgyis
pa des na/ de rnams kyis khyod kyi mdangs ma khyer te/ 'dir bzhugs par 'tshal gyi/ khyim nyid du bzhud kyi/ gshegs zhes des de'i lag pa nas bzung ste song ba dang / de la dge slong
rnams kyis smras pa/ rgan zhugs/ ma 'gro bar 'dug cig /de 'gro ba nyid du byed cing mi 'dug nas dge slong dag gis de'i lag pa ya gcig bzung ste drangs pa dang / des smras pa/ na'o/ /
na'o/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi lag pa gang na zhes dri bar bya ste/ gal
te khyod kyis bzung ba gang yin pa'o/ /zhes zer na/ rgan zhugs 'gro 'dod par nges kyi/ thams cad kyi thams cad du gtang bar bya'o/ /gal te sngon gyi chung mas bzung ba gang yin
pa'o/ /zhes zer na/ 'gro bar mi 'dod pas de gtang bar mi bya'o/ /'on kyang dge slong rgan zhugs ni/ 'tsho bar 'dod pa'i bsam pa can yin pas/ de lta bas na/ rgan zhugs sbrid
ba byung ba la sos zhes brjod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis de la smras pa/ rgan zhugs/ khyod kyi lag pa gang na/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag
khyed kyis bzung ba gang yin pa'o/ /de dag gis de btang nas rang gi khyim du song ste/ de nyid de'i rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po'i bar chad du gyur
to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na khyim bdag dad pa can zhig
'dug pa de/ bram ze ma dad pa zhig dang lhan cig rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / khyim bdag de sbrid pa byung na/ dge slong gang gis kyang sos zhes ma byas kyi/ bram ze de
nyid kyis sos zhes byas nas des smras pa/ grogs po/ khyod ni/ dgra bo rnams la dad de/ rgyal byed kyi tshal 'di ni/ gnod sbyin gos sngon po gyon pa lnga brgyas mi stong ste/
khyod la kho bo 'ba' zhig gis sos zhes byas pa des na/ de dag gis khyod kyi mdangs ma 'phrog gi /tshur shog /'dong zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyim pa rnams ni/ 'tsho ba'i bsam pa can yin pas/ de lta bas na/ khyim pa sbrid pa byung ba
la sos zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gzhan yang dge slong dag rgan pa sbrid pa byung ba la ni/ langs nas phyag bya zhing / gzhon pa sprid pa byung ba la ni/ rgan pas nad med cig /ces brjod par
bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer wA ra NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga tshan pa rnams nges pa la
zhugs pa dang ldan pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la btsun pa de'i tshe de dag gis bca' bar bya ba gang yin pa dang / bza' bar bya ba gang yin pa mi shes pa'i skabs de/
dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bca' ba ni/ lnga ste/ rtsa ba'i bca' ba dang / sdong bu'i bca' ba
dang / lo ma'i bca' ba dang / me tog gi bca' ba dang / 'bras bu'i bca' ba'o/ /bza' ba ni/ lnga ste/ phye ma dang / 'bras can dang / zan dron dang / sha dang / snum khur ro/ /de
dag gis tshod ma gang dag dang bza' bar bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar gsar dang / mar dang / nya dang / sha dang / sha skam
dang / gzhan yang rung ba gang yin pa ste/ tha na chus kyang brlan par byas te bza' bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag /brlan pa thams cad ni/ nyams skyed par byed pa yin no/ /sdom la/
sgo 'phar gyi ni lag zungs dang / /skar khung dag gi dra ba dang / /ma dpyis dang ni ya dpyis dang / /rked gtan dbyi gu skam kha'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams gnas khang dag rtsig cing sgo gdod par mi byed nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo gdod par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis sgo btod cing sgo 'phar 'jug par mi byed pas bsam gtan dang / 'don pa la zhugs pa dag snang
ste/ de dag bram ze dang / khyim bdag gis mthong nas nye bar 'ongs te/ de dag gtam brjod pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid du ma gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ dge slong dag /sgo 'phar gzhug par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis sgo 'phar bcug cing lag zungs yang mig ma btags pas dbye dka' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag zungs yang mig gdags par bya'o/ /de phye ba na sgra 'byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko ba'i dum bu gzhug par bya'o/ /skar khung
ma btod pas mun gnag par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar khung gdod par bya'o/ /ha cang yang dma' bar btod nas chom rkun pa dang g.yon can dag
gis bgrod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dma' bar gdod par mi bya'o/ /ha cang mtho bar btod pa dang / nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dkyil du gdod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gi nang rub la phyi yangs par byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi rub la nang yangs pa rgya
mtsho'i rnam pa lta bur gdod par bya'o/ /byi'u dang phug ron dag 'jug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dra ba bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis dra ba byas shing sgo glegs ma
bcug pas/ sbrul dang / sdig pa dang / srin bu tre ma bu ka dang / tre la ta dag 'jug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o/ /dge slong dag
gis sgo glags bcug pa dang / 'og mi chags nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma dpyis gzhug par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis ma dpyis bcug na steng 'dug tu mi
rung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ya dpyis gzhug par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis ya dpyis bcug na/ rlung gis phye nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
'phred gtan gzhug par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis 'phred gtan bcug pa dang / gcad dka' ba dang / dbye dka' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyi gu
skam kha bcang bar bya ste/ des gcad pa dang dbye bar bya'o/ /sdom la/ gsor dang lcags kyi thu lum dang / /phor pa shing gi thal phyags dang / /rto gu
khri dang rgyab rten dang / /rta re dang ni gzong bu 'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo 'phar la lag zungs kyi yang mig gdags par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis sgo 'phar la yang mig gis brkos te sgo
'phar gas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo 'phar la brko bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo 'phar la brko bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
dge slong dag gis yang mig btags te drangs na/ mi brtan zhing phyir byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ gsor ba bcang bar
bya zhing / des phug la yang mig gdags par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
so/ /tshe dang ldan pa pi lin nga'i bu gang gi tshe rab tu byung nas zhes bya ba nas tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag na ste/ mi bde'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /gnas brtan/
khyod ci na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag rlung nad na'o/ /gnas brtan/ sman cung zad mdzod cig /tshe dang ldan pa dag /sngon ni/ bdag gis lcags kyi thu lum bsregs te des chab bsros nas
lus rngul bar bgyis so/ /gnas brtan/ da ci'i slad du mi srel/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ rlung nad can gyis lcags kyi thu lum bcang bar bya ste/ des chu bsros la lus rdul bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
lcags kyi thu lum bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis de bsregs pa dbyung ma nus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lcags thag gis
gdags par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis lcags thag kyang mer bcug pas de yang tsha bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de der gzhug par mi bya'i/ de gsher ba'i
nang du bcug la lcags kyi thu lum bsreg par bya'o/ /de dag lcags kyi thu lum rtswa u Sha tu gas rung bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rung bar mi bya'i/ /bsregs
pa nyid de'i rung ba yin no/ /dge slong dag dang por yongs su spyad pa'i chu sro bar byed cing / phyis rung ba'i chu sro bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngar rung ba'i chu bsro
bar bya zhing / phyis yongs su spyad pa'i chu bsro bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da ka'i gnas na bzhugs
so/ /tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu gang gi tshe rab tu byung ba nas zhes bya ba nas tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag na ste/ mi bde'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /gnas brtan/ khyod
ci na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /'di dang / 'di na'o/ /gnas brtan/ sman cung zad mdzod cig /tshe dang ldan pa dag /sngon ni/ bdag gis sman phor bcangs so/ /gnas brtan/ da ci
ste mi bcang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas
na/ rjes su gnang ste/ sman phor bcang bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
khyim bdag cig gis dge 'dun gyi bsro khang byas na/ der sol ba dag bdal te 'jog nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsdu bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sol ba
dag bsdu bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag cis bsdu bar bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lcags kyi thal phyags byas la des bsdu bar
bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis thal phyags bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal na/ dge slong dgon pa bdag la de'i 'byor pa med pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis shing gi thal phyags byed du gzhug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis shing gi thal phyags byed du gzhug go /zhes bka' stsal pa dang
dge slong dag gis thal phyags ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mgo sbom por byas la de nas lci ba dang 'jim pas bskus te des sol ba bsdu bar bya'o/ /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig na nas sman pa'i gan du song ste smras pa/ bzhin
bzang / kho bo la nad 'di lta bu byung na/ sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di dang 'di mdzod cig dang / khyod sos par 'gyur ro/ /de la sman sbyar ba'i rto gu dgos nas de khyim
bdag cig gi gan du song ste rto gu brnyas pa dang / des de la rto gu byin no/ /des sman sbyar te slar khyim bdag de nyid la byin pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod kyi lags kyi/
bzhud cig /des smras pa/ khyim bdag /bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gal te de lta na zhog la gzhug go /skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das
la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ rto gu bcang bar bya'o/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa gas bcom ldan
'das kyis dge slong rnams la rto gu ji ltar 'chang du gnang ba thos nas des lcags kyi rto gu lnga brgya phul na/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin brim par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin brim par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / gzhon pa'i mthar ma khyed
pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma thob pa gang yin pa de dag la kham pa'i rto gu sbyin par bya'o/ /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig sa la nyal bas de'i kha zas ma zhu bar gyur
nas/ des khyim bdag cig gis gan du song ste khri brnyas nas de'i steng du nyal bas sos te slar de la byin pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod nyid kyi lags kyi/ bzhud cig/
khyim bdag /bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gal te de lta na/ zhog la bzhud cig /skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gis khri bcang bar bya'o/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa gas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams
la khri bog ri can ji ltar gnang ba thos nas des khri bog ri can lnga brgya phul na/ dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan rim ji lta ba
bzhin brim par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig la rgyab rten
dgos par gyur nas des khyim bdag cig la brnyas te des dgos pa byas nas slar byin pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod nyid kyi lags kyi/ bzhud cig /khyim bdag/
bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gal te de lta na/ zhog la bzhud cig /skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gis rgyab rten bcang bar bya'o/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa gas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
slong rnams la rgyab rten ji ltar gnang ba thos nas des rgyab rten lnga brgya phul na/ dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan rim bzhin
brim par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge
slong zhig btso blag gi las byed pa de la sta re dgos par gyur nas des khyim bdag cig la brnyas te/ des dgos pa byas nas slar byin pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/
khyod nyid kyi lags kyi/ bzhud cig /khyim bdag /bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gal te de lta na/ zhog la bzhud cig /skabs de/ dge
slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gis sta re bcang bar bya'o/ /sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig gi khri'i ya thog chag nas des khyim
bdag cig las gzong bu brnyas te/ des dgos pa byas nas slar byin pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod nyid kyi lags kyi/ bzhud cig /khyim bdag /bcom ldan
'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gal te de lta na/ zhog la bzhud cig /skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong dag gis gzong bu bcang bar bya'o/ /sdom la/ ste'u dang skas ni gsum dag dang / /sgre'u dang nad pa phan
gdags dang / /shing dang rdo dang sa dag gi /thang ma skas gsum gnang ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig gi khri'i rkang pa chag ste/ de la ste'u dgos nas des khyim bdag cig la ste'u brnyas nas/ des dgos pa byas nas slar byin pa dang / des smras
pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod nyid kyi lags kyi/ bzhud cig /des smras pa/ khyim bdag /bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gal te de lta na/ zhog la bzhud
cig /skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gis ste'u bcang
bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na shar gyi kun dga' ra ba na ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma'i khang bzang na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis
rtsig pa'i grogs bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pas/ dge slong dag mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang rtsig pa'i grogs byed do/ /ji tsam na ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma'i khang bzang mthon
por brtsigs pas/ de la 'dzeg dgos par gyur na/ dge slong dag gis ci las 'dzeg par bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
skas las 'dzeg par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis skas las 'dzeg par bya'o/ zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag skas du yod mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ skas ni/ rnam pa gsum ste/ shing gi dang / thag pa'i dang / smyug ma'i 'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis gcung po dge slong dga' bo zhes bya ba de'i lus gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing / skyes bu chen po mtshan sum cu can srid kyang bcom ldan 'das las sor bzhis thung
ba zhig yod pa de'i chung ma mdzes ma zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ skyes pa'i yid du 'ong ba zhig yod pa de la de lhag par chags pa dang / zhen pa dang /
'chums pa dang / mdud pa bor ba dang / brgyal ba dang / lhag par zhen pa dang / lhag par chags par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul ba'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas snga dro
sham thabs gsol/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong kun dga' bo dang ser skya'i gnas su bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /ser skya'i gnas
na bsod snyoms mdzad pa dang / dga' bo'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas bcom ldan 'das de'i sgor bzhugs te 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bu btang nas de dag gis khyim de gser
zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur to/ /des bsam pa/ nges par bcom ldan 'das gshegs te/ des na bdag gi khyim gser zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur to/ /snyam nas/ des mi zhig btang ste/
kye mi khyod song la/ sgo na mi su yod ltos shig /de phyir byung ba na/ ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das mthong nas de rings pa rings par nang du song ste des smras pa/ jo bo/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs
te chab sgo na bzhugs so/ /de gus pa dang bcas pas 'gro bar brtsams pa dang / mdzes mas bsam pa/ gal te 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song na/ 'di nges par bcom ldan 'das
kyis rab tu phyung ngo / /snyam nas des gos kyi mtha' ma nas bzung ste rje'i sras/ ma gshegs par bzhugs shig /des smras pa/ thong zhig /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas
slar 'ong ngo / /des de la mtshan ma btab nas smras pa/ rje'i sras/ gal te khyod 'di bskams te gshegs na/ bdag kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya dbang ngo / /des smras pa/ legs te/ de bzhin bya'i/ thong
zhig /des de dam bcas nas btang ste song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das las lhung bzed blangs nas slar song ngo / /de nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba
gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste byung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das bzhes pa nyid du mi mdzad par gshegs shing / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
la yang ma len cig pa'i brda mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bsnyen par dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bzhes
zhes smra ma nus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dbul bar brtsams pa dang / des smras pa/ dga' bo/ gang kho na las blangs pa de nyid la phul cig /de spobs pa med
par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed khyer nas chas te bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs te bzhugs pa dang / dga' bos lhung bzed phul lo/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zo zhig /bcom ldan 'das/ 'tshal lo/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma stsal nas des zos so/ /zos nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ khyod ci ste rab tu mi 'byung ngam/ 'di ltar
bcom ldan 'das kyis gdung rabs de dang de dag tu yab yum dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / gzhan yang bla ma'i gnas lta bu dag gis chos dang ldan pa'i tshig 'ga'
yang ma bcag pas/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rab tu 'byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/
song la dga' bo'i skra dang kha spu bregs shig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'breg mkhan gnyer te bregs
par brtsams pa dang / dga' bos 'breg mkhan la/ kwa'i 'breg mkhan/ nga ni/ ring po mi thogs par stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ gal te khyod kyis nga'i skra
dang kha spu bregs na/ ngas khyod kyi lag pa mkhrig ma man chad gcad do/ /zhes bsdigs pas/ de skrag ste/ 'breg spyad brtul te 'dug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom
ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ khyod rab tu mi 'byung ngam/ des gsol
pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rab tu 'byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kho nas chu snod nas mgor chu blugs shing / 'breg mkhan gyis skra dang / kha spu bregs pa dang / des bsam pa/ re
zhig bcom ldan 'das la gus par bya ba'i phyir rab tu byung la/ nam sros nas 'gro'o/ /snyam nas de nam sros nas song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yang sa zhig sprul to/ /dga'
bos bsam pa/ mdzes ma dang thag ring ba nyid du gyur cing / bdag gzhan kho nar mchi bar 'gyur gyi/ nam nangs te 'gro'o/ /snyam nas de shin tu bzang mo
la rnam par rtog cing sdug bsngal bas mtshan mo 'das so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
dga' bo/ khyod song la dga' bo la khyod khang skyong byos shig /ces sgos shig /des song nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod khang skyong byos shig /ces bka'
stsal to/ /zhes de la bsgo'o/ /des smras pa/ btsun pa/ kun dga' bo/ khang skyong zhes bya ba de ci lags/ de ji lta bu dag bgyi/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo/ gtsug lag
khang gi las bya ste/ dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la dong nas dang por je gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya zhing / de nas ba lang gi lci ba gsar pas skyang nul bya/ gtsug lag khang
bsrung bar bya/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa gang yin pa de brjod par bya/ dri dang / me tog dang / bdug spos la sogs pa ji yod pa de dag kyang dge 'dun la brim par bya/ nub
mo sgo gcad par bya zhing / nang par dbye bar bya/ bshang ba'i gnas dang / gci ba'i gnas dag kyang sbyang bar bya zhing / gzhan yang gtsug lag khang dang 'brel ba'i bya ba gang
yin pa de dag bya'o/ /des smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo/ /ji tsam na dge slong rnams snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung
bzed dang chos gos thogs te ser skya'i gnas su bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / dga' bos bsam pa/ gtsug lag khang phyags la 'gro'o/ /snyam nas des phyag dar byas pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe khyams gcig phyag pa de'i tshe gnyis pa phyag dar gyis gang bar gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/ /des bsam pa/ phyag dar bor la 'gro'o/ /snyam
na/ des phyags ma bzhag ste phyag dar dbo bar brtsams pa dang zad par ma gyur nas des bsam pa/ gnas khang rnams kyi sgo bcad la 'gro'o/ /snyam nas des gnas khang rnams kyi
sgo bcad par brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis des gang gi tshe gnas khang gcig gi sgo bcad pa de'i tshe gzhan bye bar gyur pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs pas de skyo nas smras
pa/ bdag rgyal por gyur nas 'di bas ches lhag pa'i gtsug lag khang bya'i 'gro'o/ /yang bsam pa/ gseb lam du 'gro'o/ /snyam nas des gseb lam du song nas bcom ldan
'das kyis de'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas lam de nyid du gshegs so/ /des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas de dang ha cang mi ring ba na/ shing
yal ga stug po thur du 'phyang ba zhig yod pa der myur ba myur ba nyid du song ste de'i 'og tu gab nas 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis shing de'i
yal ga rnams ji ltar gyen du 'phags par gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ khyod gar 'gro/ tshur shog /'dod
de spobs pa med par gyur cing ngo tsha ba'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ 'di shin tu bzang mo la lhag par chags pas
'di de dang 'bral bar bya'o/ /snyam du mkhyen nas de de dang dbral bar bya ba'i phyir ser skya'i gnas su ji tsam bzhed pa bzhugs nas mnyan yod ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs
te khad kyis mnyan yod du gshegs pa dang / ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung dga' bo zhes bya ba de'i lus gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing skyes bu
chen po'i mtshan sum cu can/ bcom ldan 'das pas sor bzhis thung ba de/ bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'dir 'ongs so/ /zhes thos nas de dag gis nam mthong
snyam mo// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dus gzhan zhig na snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung
bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas de khad kyis ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga'i khyim du song ngo / /des de'i gzugs bzang zhing kha dog shin tu
rgyas pa mthong nas bsam pa/ 'di ni/ nges par bcom ldan 'das kyi mched dga' bo yin no/ /snyam nas de dad pa skyes te de'i rkang pa la gtugs nas phyag byas so/ /des de'i
rkang pa la reg pa dang / bud med kyi reg pa ni/ dug yin pas/ de 'dod chags bdo bas de'i khu ba gtor nas sa ga'i mgor lhung ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/
bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de tu ru ka'i 'bru mar du byin gyis brlabs so/ /des bsam pa/ 'di na tu ru ka'i 'bru mar ga las 'byung / nges
par 'phags pa dga' bos mi gtsang ba shor la/ bcom ldan 'das bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can des/ 'di tu ru ka'i 'bru mar du byin gyis brlabs so/ /snyam du rig nas yid rangs
pas yi rang zhing / kye ma'o sangs rgyas/ kye ma'o chos/ kye ma'o dge 'dun/ kye ma'o chos legs par gsungs pa nyid/ 'di ltar da ni/ 'phags pa dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod
chags shas che ba dag kyang tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung bar ma gyur
tam snyam nas 'gyod pa skyes te/ des skabs de/ dge slong rnams la brjod pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dge slong dga' bo 'dod chags lhag par che ba 'di la ltung ba med do/ /de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ 'dod chags lhag par che bar gyur pa
de lta bu gang dag yin pa de dag gis 'dzag snod bcang bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod chags lhag par che bas sge'u bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes
bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams ci'i pags pa'i sge'u bcang ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ra dang / ri dwags dang / byi ba dang gsum gyi pags pa'i
sge'u bcang bar bya'o/ /de dag gis de bzhin bzhag pas dri mi zhim par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bkru bar bya/ mnye bar bya/ bskam par bya'o/ /de dag gis ji srid
bkrus nas skem par byed pa de'i bar du de dag bud med mthong nas khu ba gtor bas sham thabs dbra dbrer gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis byas la gcig
bskam par bya zhing / gcig gdags par bya'o/ /kha cig khu ba lhag par mang du byung bas de gsher bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der phru blug par bya'o/ /dge
slong dag gis so phag gi bur ma dag blugs pas sdug bsngal bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye ma'am sa'i phru blug par bya'o/ /dge slong dag de btags bzhin
du zas za bar byed cing mchod rten la phyag 'tshal bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag la khrus byas nas zas bza' ba dang / mchod
rten la phyag dag bya'o/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo phyogs gzhan zhig na rdo leb la 'dug pa dang / des shin tu bzang mo dran nas des de rdo leb de la ri lus bri bar
brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po yang der 'ongs te/ des de mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo/ khyod ci byed/ des smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ bdag
shin tu bzang mo 'bri'o/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi bya ba ni/ gnyis te/ bsam gtan dang / gdon pa'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ khyod rang gi chung ma
'bri zhing 'dug gam/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /skabs de/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs
gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag ri mo 'bri ba las gyur par mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag skyes bu gti mug dga' bos shin tu bzang mo la chags
pa'i sems kyis ri mo bris so/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis ri mo bri bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong ri mo 'bri bar byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ri mo bri bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la yang dris byug pa dang /
dris gtor bar mi byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du 'dri bar mdzad pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris
pa/ kun dga' bo/ ci'i phyir dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la dris byug pa dang / dris gtor bar mi byed/ des skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das
la rgyas par gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ dris byug pa dang / dris gtor ba dag bya'i/ sems can gyi gzugs ni/ bri bar mi
bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ skyes bu blun po dga' bo 'di ni/ da dung yang shin tu bzang mo la chags pa dang ldan zhing sems 'brel gyi/ 'di la thabs bsham pa zhig bya'o/ /
snyam du mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ khyod kyis ri spos kyi ngad ldang mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ ma mthong lags so/ /gal te de lta na/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i chos gos kyi mtha' ma nas zungs shig /des bcom ldan 'das kyi chos gos kyi mtha' nas bzung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang bltar nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags

te/ steng gi nam mkha' las ri spos kyi ngad ldan la gshegs nas de der tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang thabs cig de dang de dag tu gshegs pa na/ shing sa ha ka ra zhig gi drung du byon pa dang / de na spre'u
zhar ma zhig ci dgar rgyu zhing 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das mthong nas mi g.yeng par rtog par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ khyod
kyis spre'u zhar ma 'di mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /dga' bo/ khyod ji snyam du sems/ spre mo 'di dang / shin tu bzang mo gnyis gang gzugs bzang / gang mdzes pa dang / blta

na sdug pa yin/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa/ spre mo 'dis shAkya'i bu mo shin tu bzang mo'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi mchi/ stong gi char yang / brgya stong gi char yang / grangs dang / bgrang ba dang / cha
dang / rtsis dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi mchi ste/ btsun pa/ shAkya'i bu mo shin tu bzang mo ni/ lha'i bu mo dag dang 'gran pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/
gal te de lta na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi mtha' ma nas zungs shig /des bcom ldan 'das kyi chos gos kyi mtha' ma nas bzung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab
ma brkyang ba bzhin nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te/ steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs nas khad kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du byon to/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das dga' ba'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal du bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo khyod song la sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la ltos shig /de
nas lha rnams kyi rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / skyid pa dang / bsam pa'i gnas skyed mos tshal dang / dga' ba'i tshal dang / shing rta sna tshogs dang / rtsub 'gyur dang / 'dres pa dang / yongs
'du dang / chos bzang la sogs pa bltas na/ de dag gcig pas gcig bzang zhing spa ba/ mchog tu gyur pa mthong nas grong khyer blta na sdug tu phyin to/ /de der song ste bltas nas pi
wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / cang dang / sgra snyan la sogs pa rnam pa sna sogs bzhag cing / gnas dang gnas dag na lha'i bu rnams lha'i bu mo dag dang lhan
cig rtse zhing 'khod pa mthong ngo / /de 'byor pa de dag la lta zhing thog thag tu 'gro bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na phyogs gzhan zhig na lha'i bu med cing / lha'i bu mos gang ba'i gzhal
med khang zhig mthong nas des lha'i bu mo rnams la dris pa/ gang gis na/ gzhal med khang gzhan dag na ni/ lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo dag gis gang zhing rtse ba dang dga' ba nyams
su myong la/ khyed la ni/ lha'i bu dag med pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung dga' bo zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad
pa spyod pa de/ dus byas nas 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir gzhal med khang 'di 'dzin cing bdag cag kyang de la sdod cing 'khod do/ /des thos nas dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga'
nas rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i rnams mthong ngam/ des gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis der ci dag mthong smros shig /des ci dag mthong ba rgyas par gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ khyod kyis lha'i bu mo dag mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /dga' bo/ ji snyam du sems/ shin tu bzang mo dang / lha'i bu
mo de dag gang gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug pa yin/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa/ lha'i bu mo dag la shAkya'i bu mo shin tu bzang mos bcu'i char yang nye bar mi mchi/ stong
gi char yang / brgya stong gi char yang / grangs dang / bgrang ba dang / cha dang / rtsis dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi mchi'o/ /dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ tshangs par spyod pa la
gnas na/ phan yon 'di lta bu dang / gzhan dag kyang yod de/ khyod kyis de la mngon par dga' bas tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig dang / lha'i dpal
nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la sems kyis rjes su yi rang nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas nas mi
snang bar gyur nas mnyan yod du gshegs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo lha'i 'jig rten la mngon par dga' bas tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems
thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces/ dge slong dag /khyed cag gang gis kyang dga' bo dang
lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya/ 'chag sa gcig tu bcag par mi bya/ chos gos kyi gdang bu gcig la chos gos gzhag par mi bya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi gcig tu lhung
bzed gzhag par mi bya/ chu gzhag pa'i khri gcig la chu gzhag par mi bya/ bkag par mi bya/ gdon par mi bya'o/ /zhes sgros shig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe
dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas dge slong rnams la/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/
khyed kyis dga' bo dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya zhes bya ba nas gdon par mi bya zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /btsun pa kun dga' bo/ de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo/ /zhes de dag de dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi byed/ 'chags gcig tu 'chag par mi byed/ chos gos kyi gdang gcig la chos
gos 'jog par mi byed/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi gcig la lhung bzed 'jog par mi byed/ chu gzhag pa'i khri gcig la chu 'jog par mi byed/ de dang lhan cig klog pa dang / 'don par mi
byed de/ /de dge slong rnams kyis de ltar spangs pa na/ shin tu gnong bar byed/ ngo tsha bar byed/ khrel bar byed/ smod par byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
bo dge slong mang po rnams dang lhan cig rim gro'i gnas su chos gos kyi las byed pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bsam pa/ dge slong 'di dag ni/ bdag spangs grang na/ tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ni/ bdag gi phu nu bo yin na/ ci/ 'dis kyang bdag spang ngam snyam du rig nas des lhan cig 'dug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo myur ba myur ba kho
nar langs so/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'di dag gis re zhig bdag spang ba rig na/ khyod bdag gi phu nu bo lags na/ bdag ci'i
slad du spang / des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo/ de ni/ bden na/ 'on kyang khyod ni/ lam gzhan du zhugs pa yin la/ kho bo cag kyang lam gzhan du
zhugs pa yin pas/ spang dgos ches mod/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ khyed shul gang du zhugs pa dang / bdag gang du zhugs pa gsungs shig /des smras pa/
khyod ni/ lha'i 'jig rten la mngon par dga' bas tshangs par spyad pa spyod la/ kho bo cag ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pas tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /de skad ces smras
pa dang / de shin tu skyo bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ khyod kyis dmyal ba
rnams mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das/ /ma mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga'i chos gos kyi mtha' ma nas zungs shig /des bcom ldan 'das kyi
chos gos kyi tha ma nas bzung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo khrid de dmyal ba'i gnas su gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lhag pa'i phyogs shig
tu bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ song la dmyal ba rnams ltos shig /des bltas na/ chu bo rab med dang / lo ma ral gri lta bu'i nags
dang / ro myags dang / me ma mur dang / lhag pa'i gnas de dag gcig pas kyang gcig sdug bsngal gyi khyad par shin tu mi bzad pa mthong nas dmyal ba'i gnas su song na/ des de na
dbyung ba dang / gcad pa dang / gzhom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi khyad par gyis sems can rnams sdug bsngal zhing / kha cig ni/ skam pas mig dang / so dag phyung / kha cig ni/
sog les gshag /kha cig ni/ sta res rkang pa dag bcad/ kha cig ni/ mdung thung dang / mda' bo che dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dag gis phug /kha cig ni/ lcags kyi tho bas brdungs/ kha
cig ni/ lcags kyi zangs po che 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar la me lce gcig tu gyur cing bskol ba'i nang du bcug pa mthong ngo / /des sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs
de dag mthong nas phyogs gzhan zhig tu song ba dang / ji tsam na de na lcags kyi zangs po che khol ba zhig mthong ngo / mthong nas kyang mi dga' nas dmyal ba'i srung ma rnams la dris pa/ shes
ldan dag /gang gis na/ lcags kyi zangs po che gzhan dag tu ni/ sems can dag bcug la/ 'di gcig po khol zhing 'dug pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/ de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan
