stsal pa/ chus bkru bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang ras ma chus sbangs la phyi bar bya ste/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi /lham phyi ba bcang bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul tsam
pa na/ drang srong gar ga'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na bzhugs so/ /yul tsam pa na tsam pa'i klu'i bu mo dad pa can/ dge ba'i bsam pa bzang ba zhig yod pa de'i bu ma dad pa/ ma dul ba byed pa
zhig go /des de chos mnyan pa yang dag par len du bcug ste/ bu song la 'phags pa rnams kyi drung du phyin nas chos nyon cig dang / khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro/ /zhes byas
pa dang / de des yang dag par len du bcug pas/ rang bzhin gyi cha lugs kyis chos nyan par zhugs pa rnams kyi nang du song ngo / /de gzhon nu zhig gis mthong nas de sdangs te tshe dang
ldan pa dag /rgyab ring po/ /rgyab ring po/ /zhes smras pa dang / thos nas dge slong gang dag 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de dag sngar langs nas de dag gis de ske
nas rnga ma'i srad bus btags te gtsug lag khang gi steng nas 'phangs so/ /de nas mas mthong ste smras pa/ bu/ khyod kyis 'phags pa rnams las chos thos sam/ des smras
pa| ma de 'dra ba'i 'phags par ni/ su yang ma gyur cig /bu/ de dag gis khyod la ci zhig byas/ des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang / des smras pa/ bu/ de bas dang de dag
'phags pa yin no/ /gzhan dag cig gis khyod mthong du zin na/ bsad par gyur to/ /zhes byas pa dang / de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ de la ne'u ldang rnams kyis bzhad
gad du mgrin snad/ mgrin snad ces smras pa dang / de de dag gis ku re smras pas/ lus skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / sha bri ngan pa/ rke ba/ skem por rid par gyur to/ /de
la mas smras pa/ bu/ khyod ci ste lus skya bo/ /seng seng po/ sha bri ngan pa/ rke ba skem po gyur/ des smras pa/ ma/ bdag la klu gzhon nu 'di dag mgrin snad/ mgrin snad
ces co 'dri bar byed de/ ci bya'i gtol med do/ /bu/ khyod rang gi cha lugs kyis song bas des gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur gyi/ gal te khyod sprul pa'i gzugs kyis song
bar gyur na/ rnga ma'i rnyis btags par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /da sprul pa'i gzugs kyis song la chos nyon cig dang / khyod la thams cad legs par 'gyur ro/ /'on te rang gi gzugs
kyis nyan na/ khyod gnas na 'dug ste nyon cig ces byas pa dang / de ma dad pa'i phyir khas ma blangs te/ ma'i ngor cang mi zer bar 'dug go /des bsam pa/ 'phags pa dag klu gzhon
nu rnga ma'i rnyis 'dogs pa ni/ gang su yang rung / chos mnyan par 'dod pa de dag gi yang bar chad du 'gyur bas/ 'di kho na bdag gi bya ba yin no/ /snyam ste/ de kha dog 'phags pas
nam sros pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / de'i tshe tsam pa'i klu'i bu mo'i kha
dog gi mthus drang srong gar ga'i rdzing 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tsam pa'i klu'i bu mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
btsun pa/ bdag gi bu ma dad pa zhig mchis pa de bdag gi chos nyan pa yang dag par len du stsal nas de chos nyan du mchis pa dang / 'phags pa rnams kyi rnga ma'i rnyis ske nas btags te
bor bas de'i mgrin pa snad de/ de la ne'u ldang rnams kyis mgrin snad/ mgrin snad ces gtses lags so/ /de de ltar gtses pa na/ lus skya bo/ seng seng por gyur cing / sha bri ngan
pa/ rke ba skem por gyur na/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ gang gis na 'phags pa rnams klu gzhon nu rnga ma'i rnyis 'dogs par
mi 'gyur bar 'phags pa rnams dran par bgyid pa cung zad cig bcar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tsam pa'i klu'i bu mo la cang mi gsung bas gnang ba dang / de nas tsam
pa'i klu'i bu mo bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas dge slong gi dge
'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ma dad tsam pa'i klu'i
bu mo nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / de'i tshe tsam pa'i klu'i bu mo'i kha dog gi mthus/ drang srong gar ga'i
rdzing 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tsam pa'i klu'i bu mos nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gi bu ma dad pa zhig
mchis pa de/ bdag gis chos nyan pa yang dag par len du stsal nas de 'phags pa rnams kyi drung du chos nyan du mchis pa dang / de dag gis de rnga ma'i rnyis btags te bor bas de'i
mgrin pa snad nas de'i ne'u ldang rnams kyis mgrin snad/ mgrin snad ces co 'dri ba smras lags so/ /de la de skad bgyis pa na/ lus skya bo/ seng seng por gyur cing / lus sha bri ngan
pa| rke ba skem por gyur na/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis na/ 'phags pa rnams klu gzhon nu rnga ma'i rnyis 'dogs par mi 'gyur pa/ 'phags pa rnams dran par bgyid pa
cung zad cig bcar gsol zhes zer ro/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ gang la da ltar lha rnams kyang kye ma shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni/ dge ba'i chos rnams las yongs su nyams
par gyur to/ /zhes 'phya bar gyur pa 'di ni/ mdzes pa ma yin/ rung ba ma yin gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis klu gzhon nu rnga ma'i rnyis gdags par mi bya'o/ /'on kyang klu gzhon nu
mthong na/ se gol gyi sgra phyung ste/ bzhin bzang / mthong ba'i lam na ma 'dug cig /ces brjod par bya'o/ /gal te mthong ba'i lam na mi 'dug na/ de lta na legs/ ci ste 'dug na/
dbyug gu skam khas dal gyis blangs te bum pa'am/ rdza mar bcug la de la bu ga gtod de kha bcad nas dbyung bar bya'o/ /gal te dbyug gu skam kha med na/ shur bu'am/ lcags phod
dam/ rgya cang gi ske nas btags te dbyung bar bya'o/ /ci ste shur bu'am/ lcags phod dam/ rgya cang med na/ gdang thag gi rnyi'am/ gres thag gi rnyi la ras mas dkris nas des gdags
par bya zhing / de nas bum par bcug ste dbyung bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis de de bzhin du phyung nas nags kyi nang du bor ba dang / de khros pa'i mes nags
bsregs te de yang de nyid du tshig pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nags kyi nang du dor bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis snang ba'i gnas su bor ba dang / skad cig kyang
ma thogs par srog chags 'ol pas khyer nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i mod kho na la ldog par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang snang ba'i gnas su bzhag nas ji srid gnas sum
zhugs pa de srid du bsdad par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa
rdo'i las la mkhas pa zhig ste/ rdo phru dag byas shing byas shing 'tshong ngo / /dus gzhan zhig na de la rnyed pa mang du grub nas des bsam pa/ gang gis na/ bsod nams su yang 'gyur la/ rnyed
pa yang mang du 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs de gang zhig yin snyam pa dang / de dad pa can zhig pas/ de 'di snyam du/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs la rdo phru
dag nas bshos gsol na/ bdag gi bsod nams su yang 'gyur la/ rnyed pa yang mang du 'gyur ro/ /snyam du bsam mo/ /de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas dge
slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par
rig nas rang gi lag bstar te bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas kun tu tshim par byed/ kun tu stob par byed do/ /rnam grangs du mar rang gi lag bstar te bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang
zhing bsod pas kun tu tshim par byas/ kun tu bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol te phyag bcabs/ lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i
phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa de la rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do/ /mchod sbyin nang na sbyin sreg mchog/ sdeb sbyor nang

na skyong byed mchog/ mi yi nang na rgyal po mchog /chu bo'i nang na rgya mtsho mchog/ skar ma'i nang na zla ba mchog/ gsal ba'i nang na nyi ma mchog/ steng dang 'og dang thad kar yang / /skye bo'i 'gro
ba ji snyed pa/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /mchod bya dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te bzhud do/ /zhes bya
ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /des yang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du bshos la spyan drangs nas des rgan rabs bzhin rdo phru gsar pa brims nas spyad spyad pa de dag
nyid kyang brim par brtsams pa dang / dge slong rnams 'gyod de lan par mi byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim pas yongs su dag go/
zhes byas nas blang bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshon gyi las bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis tshon gsher ba bskol ba dang / de zho can yin pa'i phyir btsos pa dang mi sdug par gyur cing / de dag
kyang ma rung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskams nas bskol bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis nyi ma la bskams te/ de non chung bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ nyi ma la bskam par mi bya'o/ /dge slong dag grib ma la skem ste rlams khyer nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grib ma la bskam par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang nyi ma phyed
yod pa la bskam par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis tshon dang / chos gos dag lhan cig chur bcug ste btsos pa dang / de dag ma rung bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
tshon logs shig tu bskol bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag lan gcig kho na bskol te 'dor bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lan gsum gyi bar du bskol nas
dor bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis lan gsum gyi bar du bskol nas gcig kho nar bzhag pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod so sor gzhag par bya'o/ /dge slong dag
gis dang po ni/ gang yin/ gnyis pa ni/ gang yin/ gsum pa ni/ gang yin pa ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni/ dang po'o/ 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /'di ni/ gsum
pa'o/ /zhes yi ge bri bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis tshon nyid du chos gos dag bcug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshon nyid du chos gos dag gzhug par mi bya'i/ 'on
kyang gzhong khung du tshon blugs la bsug par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis ha cang gsher ba la bsugs pas de 'khrus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang gsher ba la
bsug par mi bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis ha cang skam po la bsugs pas chos gos dag khra bor gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang skam po la bsug par mi bya'i/
'on kyang ran tsam la bsug par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams chos gos dag sa la skem par byed de/ /de dag rdul gyis dri ma can du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa la
skam par mi bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis rtswa bting nas skam ste/ tshon phyogs gcig tu song nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzar thag la btags la der bskam par bya'o/ /
dge slong dag gis de bzhin du gzar thag la bkal bas bar du tshon ma chags nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gras nas tha gus btags la
rgyang zhing bres nas gzungs btab ste bskam par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis bsugs nas ma bzlog ste tshon phyogs gcig tu 'dril nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dang
yang du bzlog par bya'o/ /snam sbyar gzhan dag cig tshad che ste/ gzar thag la ma shong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtswa bting nas bskam par bya zhing yang dang yang du
bzlog par bya'o/ /dge slong dag chos gos rnying pa dag la ni/ tshon gsar pa ldugs/ chos gos gsar pa dag la ni/ tshon rnying pa ldugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshon
gsar pa yang gsar pa kho na dag la blug par bya zhing / rnying pa yang rnying pa dag la blug par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams chos gos gsar pa dag ni/ grib ma la skem/ rnying pa dag ni/ nyi ma
la skem nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsar pa dag ni/ nyi ma la bskam par bya zhing / rnying pa dag ni/ grib ma la bskam par bya'o/ /dge slong dag dang por ni/ tshon
gsum pa/ de'i 'og tu ni/ gnyis pa/ de'i 'og tu ni/ dang po ldugs pas dang po lhags par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dang por dang po dang gnyis pa blug
par bya zhing / phyis gsum pa blug par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis chu'i nang du ma bsugs pas chos gos dag khra bor gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu'i nang du bsug par bya'o/
dge slong dag gis de nyid kyi nyin par chu'i nang du bsugs pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi de nyin bsug par bya'o/ /dge slong gzhan dag cig tshon gyi las byed pa na/ rlung dang
char pa byung nas dge slong rnams phyogs gang du bskam zhes chos gos dag phan tshun sbed par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlung dang char pa byung na/ khang bzang du tshon
gyi las bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rlung dang char pa byung na/ khang bzang du tshon gyi las bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis khang bzang du tshon gyi las byas nas/ khang
bzang tshon gyis sbags/ nye bar sbags shing 'dug pa/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khrag 'di ga las so/ /dge slong dag gis smras pa/ 'di
khrag ma yin gyi/ kho bo cag gis phyogs 'dir tshon gyi las byas so/ /de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis khrag yin no/ /snyam du bsam mo/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom
ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs der ba lang gi lci ba'am/ 'jim pas byug par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu
rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong
gi dge 'dun la rgyal byed kyi tshal phul ba na/ de'i blo skyes pa/ bdag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul na/ der rtsig pa dag ri mo ma bris
pas/ song la bcom ldan 'das la bdas par gsol te bri'o/ /snyam nas/ de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'dir
rtsig pa dag ri mo ma bris te/ de'i slad du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ da rtsig pa ri mo bri bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /gnang gi/
bris shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsig pa'i ri mo bri bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis tshon sna dus ri mor bri ma shes nas/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la gnang ste rtsig pa ri mo bri bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa de/ tshon sna du zhig gis bri bar bgyi lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ma shes pa de/ khyed kyis dris pa legs so legs so/ /tshon sna bzhi po sngon po thams cad dang / ser
po thams cad dang / dmar po thams cad dang / dkar po thams cad kyis bri bar bya'o// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po bcu bdun pa/ sdom ni/ mkhar lan pa yi spyad dag dang /
bu gcan gyi khri'u dang ni/ /phyag dang skra rnams bzed pa dang / /phreng ba khab dang tsher ma'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gnas pa de'i khyim du bsod snyoms pa zhig dus dus su 'ong zhing / des de skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag
go /dus gzhan zhig na/ de la rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gis rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya
ba'i dngos po gang yang rung ba zhig bgyi'o/ /bsod snyoms pas smras pa/ khyim bdag/ legs kyi/ de bzhin gyis shig /'phags pa/ ci zhig bgyi/ khyim bdag/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang
gyis shig /'phags pa/ bdag la kaR+sha pa Na dag ni/ mchis na/ 'on kyang chos kyi grogs bgyid pa ma mchis so/ /khyim bdag/ kaR+sha pa Na dag byin cig dang / khyod kyi chos kyi grogs nga yin no/ /
'phags pa/ legs kyi/ kaR+sha pa Na 'di re zhes des de la kaR+sha pa Na dag byin no/ /bsod snyoms pa des bsam pa/ 'di phyogs bzhi'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa
rnams kyi nor yin pas/ 'di las ji ltar spyad par bya/ bzhag la re zhig gzhan bslang bar bya'o/ /snyam nas der kaR+sha pa Na mdzod du bcug ste bzhag go /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim
bdag des bsam pa/ 'phags pa bdag gi gtsug lag khang byed kyi/ re zhig song la de na ci dag byed blta'o/ /snyam mo/ /de song ba dang / ji tsam na ci yang mi snang nas des smras pa/ 'phags
pa| bdag gi gtsug lag khang cung zad kyang ma bgyis sam/ bsod snyoms pas smras pa/ re zhig gtsug lag khang gi mkhar lan pa'i lag spyad kyang med na/ cis bya/ 'phags pa/ kye
ma kaR+sha pa Na dag gar mchis/ khyim bdag/ mdzod na 'dug go /'phags pa/ de nyid las mkhar lan pa'i lag cha bgyid du stsol cag /khyim bdag /ngas ji ltar phyogs bzhi pa'i
nor gyis mkhar lan pa'i lag cha byed du gzhug /'phags pa/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang phyogs bzhi'i dge slong dag kho na'i slad du bgyid na/ 'di la ci zhig 'gal/ khyim bdag
bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/ /'phags pa/ de bzhin mdzod cig /des gnas skabs de/ dge slong rnams la bsnyad pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das gsol
to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nor de nyid las mkhar lan pa'i lag spyad bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bsod snyoms pa de/ gtsug lag khang byed cing bsod snyoms la yang
rgyu ba dang / khyim bdag des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gi gtsug lag khang mdzad cing bsod snyoms la yang rgyu'am/ 'di nyid las mkhar lan pa'i bsod snyoms su mdzod cig dang / bdag
gis kaR+sha pa Na gzhan dag kyang dbul lo/ /khyim bdag/ mkhar lan pa'i nor las ji ltar bsod snyoms su bya/ 'phags pa/ 'di bdag nyid kyi sems kyis bag yangs su bgyis pas mdzod
cig /'di la 'gal ba ci zhig mchis/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/ /'phags pa/ de bzhin mdzod cig /des gnas skabs de/ dge slong rnams la bsnyad pa dang / dge slong
rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mkhar lan byed pas mkhar lan gyi nor kho na las bsod snyoms yongs su spyad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis mkhar lan pa'i nor kho na las bsod snyoms yongs su spyad par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de ha cang ngan pa za nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang ngan pa
bza' bar mi bya'o/ /de ha cang bsod pa bza' bar brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang bsod par bza' bar mi bya'o/ 'on kyang gtsug lag khang gzhan gyi
thad tsam du yongs su spyad par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig 'khru bas na ba de yang dang yang du chab kung sar 'gro bas rmya'o/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ khri'u bu ga can bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khri'u bu ga can bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis khyad par med pa khri'u dag la mtshon gyis phug ste bu
ga btod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbas pa btags pa dang / 'breng bus btags pa gang yin pa de la ni/ phug nas bug gdod par bya'o/ /tha gus btags pa gang
yin pa de la ni/ bu ga btod la bcing bar bya'o/ /de bshang ba byed pa na/ rkub rus na nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs der lo ma'i khres gzhag par bya'o/ /bshang ba
sa la lhung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'og tu gyo mo gzhag par bya'o/ /ha cang mthon por 'jog par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang mthon
por gzhag par mi bya'o/ /de dri mi zhim par gyur te/ dge slong dag gis de phyung nas bor te gzhan bzhag pa dang / de yang dri mi zhim par gyur te de yang bor ba dang / gzhan ma rnyed nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad dor bar mi bya'i/ gnyis bcangs la/ gcig bkrus te bskam par bya zhing / gcig shos kyang de bzhin du bya'o/ /'on te gnyis su ma rnyed par
gyur na/ de'i steng du lo ma sbrel ba bzhag cing der bshang ba bya ste/ de lta bu gzhan yang gzhag par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gyo mo de bkru bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de bkrus kyang
dri mi zhim par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ til mar gyis bsku bar bya'o/ /'on kyang dri mi zhim par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yungs mar gyis bsku
bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis nad pa la blta bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal nas/ de'i drung du nad pa la lta ba'i dge slong rgan pa yang 'ong / gzhon nu dag kyang 'ong ngo / /de na gzhon nu gang dag
yin pa de dag ni/ de la phyag 'tshal bar byed/ rgan po gang dag yin pa de dag la ni/ nad pa de phyag 'tshal bar byed pas/ de skyo bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'bags pa la
phyag mi bya/ 'bags pas phyag mi bya/ 'bags pas phyag bdag gir mi bya/ 'bags pa las phyag bdag gir mi bya'o/ /'bags pa la phyag byed dam/ 'bags pas phyag byed dam/ 'bags pas
phyag bdag gir byed dam/ 'bags pa las phyag bdag gir byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis 'bags pa la phyag mi bya/ 'bags pas phyag mi bya/ 'bags pas phyag bdag gir mi bya/ 'bags pa las phyag bdag gir mi bya'o/ /zhes gang
gsungs pa/ btsun pa/ 'bags pa du zhig mchis lags/ nye bar 'khor/ 'bags pa ni/ gnyis te/ zas kyis 'bags pa dang / mi gtsang bas 'phags pa'o/ /de la zas kyis 'bags
pa ni/ so shing dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'bras bu dang / rtsab la sogs pa bza' bas brel ba'o/ /mi gtsang bas 'bags pa ni/ bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / de dag bkru ba mi
gtsang ba'i gnas kyi byi dor bya ba byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das la bram ze pad+ma'i snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nam bdag shing rta la 'tshal ba'am/
kha lo sgyur ba'am/ lcag bsgreng ba'am/ skad cher smra ba gzigs pa de'i tshe bdag phyag 'tshal bar go'u ta ma khyod kyis gzung du gsol/ nam srang na mchis sam/ lham 'bud dam/
shul las byol lam/ sug pa brkyang ba gzigs pa de'i tshe bdag phyag 'tshal bar go'u ta ma khyod kyis gzung du gsol/ nam 'khor gyi nang na mchis sam/ stan las 'phags sam/
gtsug tor dang / gdugs phog pa de'i che bdag phyag 'tshal bar go'u ta ma khyod kyis gzung du gsol zhes gsol ba gang lags pa/ btsun pa/ ci lags/ 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la de
lta bu dag phyag 'tshal bar chud dam/ nye bar 'khor/ phyag byas pa ma yin gyi/ nye bar 'khor/ de ni/ gus par smra ba'i tshig tsam du zad kyi/ lus 'dud pa dang / tshig tu 'byin pa gang yin pa de
ni/ mchod pa yin no/ /nye bar 'khor/ 'on kyang 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la ni/ phyag gnyis te/ yan lag lnga dang / byin pa la 'khyud pa'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong dag /chos
gos gang dag gyon nas skra dang / kha spu dag 'breg par byed pa de dag nyid gyon nas zan za bar byed/ de dag nyid dang / ston pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa dang / ma dad pa rnams 'phya bar byed

cing / shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni/ gtsang sbra med pa ste/ chos gos gang dag gyon nas skra dang / kha spu 'breg pa/ de dag nyid gyon nas zan za bar byed cing / de dag nyid dang ston pa la phyag
'tshal bar byed do/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gos dag gyon nas skra dang / kha spu
breg par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang skra bzed kyi gos bcang bar bya zhing / de bgos nas skra breg par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis skra bzed kyi gos bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / gzhan
dag cig la 'byor pa med nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag la 'byor pa med pa de dag gis rdul gzan
gyis lus dkris la skra breg par byed/ dge slong dag gis skra dang / kha spu bregs nas de bzhin du song ba dang / bram ze de dang khyim bdag de dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni/ spu gri'i
las byas nas khrus mi byed pas/ gtsang sbra med pa'o/ /zhes 'phya bar byed do/ /skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ spu gri'i las byas nas khrus bya'o/ /dge slong gzhan dag cig ni/ rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung bar gyur/ gzhan dag cig ni/ na nas khrus kyi sbyor ba mi bzod par gyur/ gzhan
dag cig la ni/ chu'i rnyed pa med nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis yan lag lnga tsam bkru bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu
rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong la me tog gi phreng ba 'bul ba dang / de dag gis ma blangs
nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas ci/ bdag cag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu dge ba'i
lam rgyags dang bral te mchi'am/ bzhes shig /ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

de lta bas na/ me tog gi phreng ba len par rjes su gnang ngo / /de dag gis blangs te de dag nyid kyi mdun du bor ba dang / de dag 'phya zhing / 'phags pa/ bdag cag gis ri ba'i rin gyis nyos pa yin na/ ci/
khyed kyis blangs te dor ram zhes zer nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis dbu skra dang / se mo'i mchod rten dag la btags pa dang / de dag gis
smras pa/ ci/ 'phags pa/ bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten ma mthong snyam mam/ bdag cag gis khyed la byin pa lags kyi/ bdag cag gis de
bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten dag la ni/ dang po nyid du phul lo/ /dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas gnas khang gi sgor bzhag pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad
pa can gyis mthong nas dri gtsang khang yan no/ /snyam ste phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang gi sgor gzhag par mi bya'i/ nang du gzhag par bya'o/ /dge slong
dag gis sgo'i drang thad du bzhag pas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri zhim po thams cad mig la phan pas/ phyogs dben par bzhag cing bsnam
par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dben par bzhag cing bsnam par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar gzhag pa mi shes nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngas logs su khab bam/ tsher ma btab la 'phyang du gzhug par bya'o/ /sdom ni/ stan bzang dang ni rgyab rten dang / /'bru mar snod ni gsum dag dang / /
gtur thag dang ni khron pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dge 'dun la ni/ 'byor na stan bzang po gnang gi/ gang zag la ni/ mi gnang ngo / /dge 'dun la ni/ 'byor na rgyab rten gnang
gi| gang zag la ni/ mi gnang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bram ze dang / khyim
bdag dad pa can dag gis/ dge slong rnams la dri phul ba dang / dge slong rnams kyis ma blangs nas de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig
rten du ma byung ba zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi /dri blang bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de rnams kyis blangs
nas de dag nyid kyi mdun du bor ba dang de dag gis/ 'phags pa dag /bdag cag gis ri ba'i rin gyis nyos pa yin na/ khyod kyis blangs te 'dor ram zhes 'phya bar byed do/ /skabs de/ bcom
ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor bar mi bya'o/ /de dag gis dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la phul ba dang / de dag gis smras
pa| 'phags pa dag /bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten ma mthong ngam/ bdag cag gis khyed la phul gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen
mo'i mchod rten la ni/ bdag cag gis dang po nyid du phul lags so/ /dge slong dag gis blangs nas gnas khang gi sgor bzhag pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis
mthong nas dri gtsang khang yin no/ /snyam ste zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang gi sgor mi gzhag gi /'on kyang nang du gzhag par bya'o/ /dge slong
dag gis sgo'i drang thad du bzhag nas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo'i drang thad du gzhag par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang dri zhim po thams cad ni/ mig la
phan pas/ sngas kyi thad kar dri'i lag ris bya zhing / de nas dus dus su bsnam par bya'o/ /gzhan dad pa can dag gis dge slong dag khyim du spyan drangs te mchod ston gsol nas de rnams
de dag gi rkang pa la dri'i lag ris skud pa dang / dge slong dag gis ma blangs nas de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gang dag bram ze la mngon par dad pa de
dag gis de dag la dang po dri dang / phreng ba dag phul nas de dag gis blangs te mgo dang / lus la nye bar sbyor bar bgyid na/ bdag cag ni/ khyed la mngon par dad de zhabs dag la 'bul
ba 'gal ba ci zhig mchis/ bzhes su gsol/ skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang pa dag la 'bul ba bdag
gir bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis blangs te de dag nyid kyi mdun du bor ba dang / de dag gis smras pa/ e ma 'phags pa/ khyed cag gtsug lag khang du gshegs te ci bder mdzod cig /
ji ltar bdag cag dad pa skyes pa de ltar ma dad pa'ang skyes so/ /skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag nyid
kyi mdun du dor bar mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong dag lhung bzed bab
col du 'jog par byed pas/ de dag ma rungs par gyur nas skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhung bzed
pa bcol du gzhag par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang lhung bzed gzhag pa'i bu ga byas la der gzhag par bya'o/ /dge slong dag rtsig pa rko bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsig pa brko
bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang gang gi tshe gtsug lag khang rtsig pa de kho na'i lhung bzed kyi bu ga bya ste/ de bzhin du 'khor gyi khang ba la'ang bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed gzhag pa'i bu gar
lhung bzed gzhag par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong dgon pa pa dag la lhung bzed gzhag pa'i bu ga med nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis lcug ma'am/ srad bu'i
skon bu byas te/ de la ba lang gi lci ba'am/ 'jim pas bskus la der gzhag par bya'o/ /rdul khyer nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la de dang 'dra ba'i kha gab bya'o/ /dge slong
dag gis de sa la bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa la mi gzhag gi/ 'on kyang gdang thag gam/ shing gi yal ga la spyad du gzhug par bya'o/ /de dag gang gi tshe ljongs
rgyu zhing 'gro ba de'i tshe de khyer zhing dong nas ma dad pa dag /'phags pa/ ci 'dir khyim bya'am/ spre'u khyer zhes 'phya bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gar 'gro rgur skon bu
khyer te 'gro bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang gang du 'gro ba der gzhan zhig gzhag par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig ljongs rgyu zhing ri brag cig tu phyin te des khyim zhig tu gnas brnyas nas rkang pa bkrus te 'bru mar bslang bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam
na bud med cig gis til mar khyer te 'ongs nas dge slong des lag pa brkyang ba dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ slong bar mdzad la snod mi mnga' ba de ga la gda'/ e ma'o/ /khyod kyi 'bru mar gyi
snod bcang bar mdzod cig /des smras pa/ sring mo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi /'bru mar gyi snod bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bru mar gyi snod bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / tshe
dang ldan pa nye dga'i dge tshul gnyis 'bru mar gyi 'brag khyer te 'bru mar gyi bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / bud med cig gis 'bru mar khyer te 'ongs pa dang / ji tsam na dge tshul gnyis
shig 'bru mar gyi 'brag thogs pa mthong nas des brang brdungs te smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyed kyi 'di su zhig gis 'gengs par byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ bkren pa mo/ khyod kyis re
zhig ci byin pa de lugs shig /lhag ma lha bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag 'gengs so/ /de cang mi zer bar gyur nas skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis 'bru mar gyi snod ha cang chen po bcang bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis 'bru mar gyi snod ha cang chen po bcang bar mi
bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / de dag gis ha cang chung ba bcangs pas des dgos pa mi chog nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang chung ngu yang mi bcang gi/ 'on kyang 'bru mar gyi snod ni/
gsum ste/ chen po dang / 'bring dang / chung ngu'o/ /de la chen po ni/ phul gang ba'o/ /chung ngu ni/ phul phyed pa'o/ /de dag gi bar ni/ 'bring ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal
bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rgan po dang / gsar bu zhig dang gnyis lam du zhugs te dong ba dang / de dag gtam bzang po ma yin
pa zer zhing 'gro ba/ ji tsam na gnod sbyin ma dad pa zhig gis thos nas des bsam pa/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di gnyis gtam bzang po ma yin pa zer zhing 'dong bas 'di dag gi mdangs
dbrog par bya'o/ /snyam bsam ste/ de de gnyis kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo / /yang bsam pa/ gang 'das pa de ni/ 'das su zad/ gal te gtam bzang po ma yin pa dag zer na/ nges par mdangs dbrog
par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de de ltar sems shing de dag gi phyi bzhin 'brangs pa las/ gnod sbyin dad pa can gzhan zhig phyogs der 'ongs te/ des de la grogs po/ gar 'gro zhes dris pa dang /
des ji ltar gyur pa de la smras so/ /des smras pa/ grogs po/ dge slong 'di dag ni/ dka' thub dang ldan pas/ gor ma chag par chos kyi gtam zer zhing 'dong ngo / /khyod la
dge slong dag gis ci zhig bya'i/ 'dug cig dang / bdag cag phan tshun yang dag par dga' ba'i gtam dag bya zhing 'dong ngo / /des smras pa/ grogs po/ bdag gis 'di gnyis nges par mi
gtang gi /tshur shog /'dong ngo / /de des dus kyis 'chu bar shes nas de dang lhan cig tu de gnyis kyi phyi bzhin du 'brangs pa dang / dge slong de gnyis gtam bzang po ma yin pa kho na zer
zhing 'dong ba las/ ji tsam na lam gnyis su gyur nas dge slong de gnyis las kyang gcig ni/ rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro'o/ /gcig ni/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma'i khang bzang du 'gro'o/ /
de gnyis las gsar bu gang yin pa des/ rgan po la phyag byas te des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bdag ni/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma'i khang bzang du mchi yi/ khyod bag yod par mdzod la nad med
par gshegs shig /ces smras nas de song ba dang / gnod sbyin ma dad pa de skra gyen du bslang ste mdangs dbrog ces byas pa dang / gnod sbyin dad pa can des smras pa/ grogs po/ gzu lum
ma byed cig /'di gnyis kyis chos bshad de/ gang nad med par gyur cig /ces smras pa/ nad med pa de ni/ rnyed pa'i mchog yin la/ gang bag yod par byos shig ces zer ba/ bag
yod pa ni/ chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / bag yod 'chi med gnas yin te/ /bag med pa ni 'chi ba'i gnas/ /bag yod 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ /bag med rtag
tu 'chi bar 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /zhes des de slar bzlog go/ /gnod sbyin dad pa can de/ 'di snyam du 'di kho na bdag gis bya ba yin no/ /snyam du bsam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin des 'di skad ces gsol
to/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa/ mi ma lags pa/ gnod sbyin gtum po rtag tu gnas shing mchis lags so/ /btsun pa/ mngon par dad pa gang dag
lags pa de dag ni/ nyung zad cig mchis lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa/ mi ma lags pa/ gnod sbyin gtum pa rtag tu gnas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa'i gnod sbyin gtum po rtag tu gnas pa ni/ ches mang du lags la/ btsun pa/ 'phags pa 'di dag ni/ gtam bzang po ma lags pa mchi zhing shul du zhugs
te mchi na/ kye ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyis brtse bar dgongs te/ gang gis na/ 'phags pa dag gtam bzang po ma lags pa mchi zhing shul du zhugs te mchi bar mi 'gyur ba/ 'phags
pa rnams dran par bgyid pa cung zad cig bcar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin de la cang mi gsung bas gnang nas/ de nas gnod sbyin de bcom
ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod
sbyin de song ste ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka'
stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ ngas gnod sbyin zhig las dge slong dag gtam bzang po ma yin pa zer zhing lam du zhugs te 'dong ba la gnod sbyin ma dad pa dag skabs tshol zhing glags lta
zhes thos so/ /dge slong dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba rnams 'di lta ste/ gtam bzang po ma yin pa zer ba de ni/ mdzes pa ma yin zhing 'tsham pa ma
yin no/ /de lta bas na/ ngas dge slong lam du 'jug pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ lam du 'jug pa'i dge slong gis chos kyi gtam dang / 'phags pa'i mi smra ba
dang rnam pa gnyis kyis lam du zhugs nas 'gro bar bya'o/ /ngal bso ba'i gnas kyi phyogs su gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad pa gdon par bya'o/ /chu 'chu ba na chu de gang gi yin pa
dang / de'i lha la tshigs su bcad pa gdon par bya'o/ /gang du gnas 'cha' ba der rgyud chags gsum pa gdon par bya'o/ /lam du zhugs pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas
pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'dug par mi byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong dag gis chos gos zin pa/ chos gos mthar phyin pa/ tshon gsar pa can dag phrag pa la bkal te lam du zhugs pa dang / de dag rdul dang / rdul gyis ma rung
bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtur bu byas la der gzhug ste bkur bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gos gtur bu bcug ste bkur bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs
pa dang / dge slong dag gis chos gos kyi gtur bu ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras gang chur ni/ khru gsum/ zheng du ni/ khru phyed dang do pa de gnyis su
bltab la drub par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis mtha' mar kha btod pas glang po che'i sna ltar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar kha mi gdod kyi/ 'on kyang dbus su gdod
bar bya'o/ /de dag gis kha thag ma btags pas de bzhin du rdul zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srad bus dra ba lta bu byas la de nas srad bu gzhan gyis brgyu bar bya'o/ /
de dag gis chos gos gang dag bgo ba dag ni/ 'og tu bzhag/ gzhan ni/ steng du phyung ba dang / de dag gtur bu yang dang yang du 'byed pa na/ 'chol bar gyur
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag bgo ba de dag ni/ steng du gzhag la/ lhag ma de dag ni/ 'og tu gzhag par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/
rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mi rgod dag gis 'gron po bcom nas phan tshun khus 'debs shing bros pa dang / so so'i grong na
gnas pa dag khyim nas lhags te mi rgod dag btags/ rab tu gtags nas mgon med cing skom pas gdungs te gcig nas gcig tu chu btsal ba'i phyir rmed cing khron pa zhig tu phyin
pa dang / rkun po'i sde dpon gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ 'dir chu snod dang / thag pa dag ltos shig /bltas na thag pa yang med/ chu snod kyang med do/ /shes ldan dag/ gal te
'gron po 'ga' zhig 'ong na/ de las thag pa dang / chu snod brnyas/ shing la 'dzegs te ltos shig /de dag gis shing la 'dzegs te blta bar brtsams na/ ji tsam na thag ring po zhig
nas dge slong dag cig 'ong ba mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ sde dpon/ shAkya'i bu mang zhig 'ong ngo / /des smras pa/ shes ldan/ de dag ni/ mkhas pa yin pas gdon mi za bar
de dag la gdang thag dang / chu snod yod do/ /de dag gis smras pa/ sde dpon/ gal te de dag la yod na/ de lta na legs/ ci ste med na/ de dag gi lto dral te khrag btung bar bya'o/ /de dag gis de ltar
gros byas te bsdad pa dang dge slong dag kyang lhags so/ /mi rgod dag gis dris pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag skom na/ khyed la gdang thag dang / chu snod yod dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang / med
do/ /mi rgod dag 'khrugs par gyur te/ mtshon cha la nom pa dang / de na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dgra bcom pa zhig gis ci'i phyir 'di dag 'khrugs shing mtshon cha la nom zhes bsam pa la
zhugs pa dang / dge slong dag gsad par 'dod par mthong nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ khyed ci'i phyir 'khrugs par gyur/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang
ldan pa dag/ thabs yod kyi/ tha mal par 'dug la chu 'thung zhig/ de dag tha mal par 'dug pa dang / dge slong dag gis lhas ma dang / lcag phod dang / rgya cang dag mthud de lhung bzed khron
par dpyang la btang nas de nas chu bcus te btags so/ /btags nas mi rgod thams cad ngom par byas pa dang de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ gal te khyed kyis bdag cag la chu ma stsal
bar gyur na/ bdag cag gis khyed tha mal bsad par gyur to/ /e ma khyed gdang thag 'chang ba mdzod cig /de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ de bzhin bya'o/ /mi rgod dag gis
phyag byas te dong ngo / /dge slong dag gis kyang ji tsam ngom par chu 'thungs nas ril ba dang / bya ma bum dag bkang ste dong nas de rim gyis mnyan yod du lhags so/ /
dge slong dag gis 'ongs pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i kun tu spyod pas kun tu spyad nas tshe dang ldan pa dag/ ci bde bar spyad dam zhes dris pa dang / de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ /skabs
de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ dge slong gis gdang thag bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong dag gis gdang thag bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis shin tu ring po dag 'chang nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin tu ring po
yang bcang bar mi bya'o/ /de dag gis shin tu thung ngu dag bcangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin tu thung ngu yang bcang bar mi bya'o/ /'on kyang gdang thag gsum bcang
bar bya ste/ ring po dang / 'bring dang / thung ngu'o/ /ring po ni/ khru brgya lnga bcu'o/ /thung ngu ni/ khru brgya'o/ /de dag gi bar ni/ 'bring ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis gdang thag gsum bcang bar
bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams 'chad bar gyur te/ yul gzhan zhig na chu mod pa der yang dge slong dag gdang thag khyer te dong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ gdang thag ni/ yul rnams dang sbyar zhing bcang bar bya'o/ /sdom ni/ spu gri rdar dang sen gri dang / /smad tsher dang ni sngas shing dang / /bad tsha'i rigs las 'jim pa ni/ /dri yis yongs su
bsgos pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig gi skra ring po ring por gyur te de 'breg
mkhan gyi gan du song nas bzhin bzang / bdag gi skra bregs shig /des bsam pa/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni/ nan che ste rngan pa med par las byed du 'jug pas/ gal te 'di'i skra
bregs nas thos pa dang / gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur bas/ dus ring du bsgyangs te bzhag pa dang / 'di rang gi blos ldog go/ snyam nas des dus btab pa/ 'phags pa/ gshegs
la sang gnangs snga dro'am/ phyi dro'am/ gdugs kyi gung zhig la spyon cig/ de des bslus pas yang dang yang du 'gro'o/ /de la dge slong mdza' bshes shig yod pa des/ de yang dang yang du 'gro ba
mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod ci'i phyir 'dir yang dang yang du 'gro/ ci/ 'di gnyen gyi khyim mam/ rigs kyi khyim yin/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ de ni/ gnyen gyi khyim dang /
rigs kyi khyim yang ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gi skra ring po ring por gyur nas bdag gis 'breg mkhan de la 'di skad du/ bdag gi skra ring po bregs shig dang / khyod la bsod nams su
'gyur ro/ /zhes byas pa dang / des dus btab ste ma bregs so/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bzo bo la bden par smra ba dkon no/ /zhes khyod kyis ma thos sam/ kho
bo ni/ skra 'breg kyang mkhas na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /des skabs de/ dge slong dag la bsnyad pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ dge slong gang zhig shes pa des phyogs dben par skra breg par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
gang zhig mkhas pa des phyogs dben par skra breg par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dge slong de'i drung du song nas tshe dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang gi/ skra bregs
shig /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba ni/ legs na/ de ci/ mdzub mos breg par bya'am/ 'di la spu gri dang / rdar dang / sen gri dang / smang tsher dag kyang dgos
so/ /des skabs de/ dge slong dag la smras nas dge slong dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ dge 'dun gyi
phyir spu gri'i lag cha bcang bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ser skya na gnas pa'i
shAkya'i rigs las re re rab tu phyung ba na/ de dag rab tu gzhon pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas/ de dag sngas shing med par bab bab tu nyal nas gnyid log go /de dag de bzhin du gnyid log pas khams

ma snyoms te drod chung bar gyur nas de dag sman pa'i drung du song ste smras pa/ bzhin bzang / bdag cag drod chung bar gyur na/ sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bzhud cig dang / khyed cag ci 'dra bar

nyal zhing 'dug pa bltar 'dong ngo / /de song ba dang ji tsam na sngas shing med par khas bub tu nyal ba mthong nas des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyed cag khas bub tu nyal ba de'i phyir khyed khams ma snyoms la
drod chung bar gyur gyi/ sngas shing chug la nyol cig/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyed kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar
'gyur ro/ /skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ sngas shing btsugs te nyal bar bya'o/ /de dag gis
sngas shing btsugs te nyal na/ 'on kyang sos par ma gyur nas de dag gis yang sman pa la smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ sngas nang tshangs can bcug ste nyal bar bya'o/ /bzhin bzang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa/ khyed kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ sngas nang tshangs can bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sngas nang tshangs can bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs

pa dang / dge slong dag gis ci 'dra ba zhig bcang bar bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras de ni/ srid du khru bzhi/ zheng du khru dor byas la drub ste/ de nas shing bal gyis bkang
la sngas su gzhug par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa pi linada'i bu rab tu byung tshun chad ces bya ba
nas gnas brtan/ khyod kyis ci bcangs zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dris bsgos pa'i 'jim pa dag bcangs so/ /gnas brtan/ da ci'i phyir mi bcang / tshe
dang ldan pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong nad pas
dris bsgos pa'i 'jim pa bcang bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi las/ sgo gsum pa rdzogs so// //bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ gnas
brtan ra ba lhan pa dang / /nad pa dang ni rigs ngan phag/ ri mo lhung bzed med pa dang / /gnas bca' ba dang shing bskyed pa'o/ /sdom ni/ gnas brtan res mos gzhan dang ni/ /gso sbyong
mtshams ni sbyar ba dang / /ltung ba rnam gnyis ldan pa dang / /gtsug lag khang ni dus kun pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
dga' rab na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing gso sbyong gi tshe kha ton gdon par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis gang gis kha ton gdon par bya ba mi
shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kha ton gdon par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kha ton gdon par bya'o/ /zhes
bka' stsal nas/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan zla ba phyed phyed cing gso sbyong gi tshe kha ton 'don par zhugs so/ /re zhig cig gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig na/ gnas brtan zhig 'dug pa de kha
ton 'don mi nus pa dang / de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan/ gso sbyong nye bar gnas na/ ci mi sems par 'dug gam/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ bdag gis mi nus na/ ji
ltar bya/ skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis mi nus na/ gnas brtan gnyis
pas kha ton gdon par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan gnyis pas kha ton gdon par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / re zhig cig na gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig na/ gnas brtan
gnyis pas kyang ma nus nas skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te gnas brtan gnyis
pas kyang ma nus na/ gnas brtan gsum pas kha ton gdon par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan gsum pas kha ton gdon par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / re zhig cig na gtsug
lag khang gzhan zhig na/ gnas brtan gsum pas kyang ma nus nas/ skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal
te gnas brtan gsum pas kyang ma nus na/ dge slong rnams kyis res su bklags te kha ton gdon par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis res su bklags te kha ton gdon
par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong rnams res su bklags te kha ton gdon par brtsams pa dang / res su bklags te kha ton 'don pa de dag las/ kha cig ni/ nus pa la res bab/ kha
cig ni/ mi nus pa la res bab nas de la nus pa gang yin pa de ni/ res bab na/ zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed/ mi nus pa gang yin pa de ni/ res bab pa na/
mi shes na ji ltar bya zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des kyang nus pa gang yin pa de la bcol
bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mi nus pa la res bab pa gang yin pa des kyang gzhan la bcol bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / re zhig cig na gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig na/ mi nus pa la
res bab pa des gang la bcol ba de ma btub nas skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nus pa gzhan gang yin pa de kho na la
rtag tu bcol bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon par bya'o/ /de med na/ gnas brtan gnyis pas so/ /de yang med na/
res su bklags te kha ton gdon par bya ba'am/ gzhan nus pa gang yin pa de la bcol bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig na/ so so thar pa'i mdo 'don pa ril
thon pa ni/ 'ga' yang med kyi/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis phas pham par gyur pa'i chos bzhi bton te lhag ma ma thon nas dge slong de dag gis gso sbyong bzhag go /skabs de/ dge slong rnams
kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gso sbyong gzhag par mi bya'o/ /'on kyang gang gis gang thon pa des de gdon par bya ste/ gal te dge 'dun gyi
gnas brtan gyis phas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi thon na/ des de dag gdon par bya zhing / gzhan gyis dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum/ gzhan gyis ma nges pa'i chos gnyis/
gzhan gyis spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu/ gzhan gyis ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu/ gzhan gyis so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi/ gzhan gyis bslab pa
mang po'i chos rnams/ gzhan gyis rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bdun te/ de ltar gso sbyong gi mtshams sbyar na/ gso sbyong gi bar chad du 'gyur bar nga mi smra'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod
na'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dus su rung ba'i btung ba zhes kyang bka' stsal/ dus ma lags par rung ba zhes kyang bka'
stsal na/ btsun pa/ dus su rung ba ni/ gang lags/ dus ma lags par rung ba ni/ gang lags/ nye bar 'khor/ ma btsags pa ni/ dus su rung ba'o/ /btsags te chu dang bsres pa ni/ dus
ma yin par rung ba'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /drug sde rnams sdig pa 'dod pa/ ser snas mi rigs par gtsug lag khang la yongs su spyod par byed de/ kha cig la ni/ dus thams
cad pas/ kha cig la ni/ gnas res su gcod pas/ kha cig la ni/ dus re zhig pas/ kha cig la ni/ rting gnon pas yongs su spyod par byed do/ /ji ltar dus thams cad pas yin zhe na/ 'di
ni| bdag gi dgun gyi gtsug lag khang ngo / /'di ni/ dpyid kyi'o/ /'di ni/ dbyar gyi'o/ /zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar dus thams cad pas yin no/ /ji ltar na/ gnas res su gcod pas yin
zhe na/ 'di ni/ bdag gi sang gi gtsug lag khang ngo / /'di ni/ gnangs kyi'o/ /'di ni/ gzhes kyi'o zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar na/ gnas res su gcod pas yin no/ /ji ltar na/ dus re zhig pas
yin zhe na/ 'dir ni/ snga dro gnas so/ /'dir ni/ phyi dro'o/ /zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar na/ dus re zhig pas yin no/ ji ltar na/ rting gnon pas yin zhe na/ 'di ni/ bdag gi slob dpon gyi gtsug
lag khang ngo / /'di ni/ mkhan po dang / lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dang / gtam 'dres pa dang / phebs par smra ba'i'o/ /zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar na/ rting gnon pas yin no/ /yul sna tshogs
na gnas pa'i dge slong dag lhags pa dang phongs par gyur nas skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge
slong gis gtsug lag khang dag la dus thams cad pa dang / gnas res su gcod pa dang / dus re zhig pa dang / rting gnon pas yongs su spyad par mi bya ste/ spyod na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /
sdom ni/ ra ba dang ni shing thags dang / /lam dang 'obs dang skar rgyal dang / /chos gos bcags shing phyis pa dang / /cha ga dang ni bram ze'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu
rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba de'i
tshe| 'jig rten dag rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi nang du dga' mgur 'gro zhing 'ong nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsam pa/ bdag gi gtsug lag khang lam
po cher gyur gyi/ de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gi ra bas bskor ro/ /snyam du bsam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/
gtsug lag khang 'di shul po cher gyur te/ de'i slad du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis 'dir bas bskor bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim
bdag/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ skor cig /des ra bas bskor ba dang / gang gi tshe dbyar gyi dus la bab pa de'i tshe rgyal byed kyi tshal chus sbyang bzhin gang ste 'dug go /ji tsam na khyim
bdag mgon med zas sbyin/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du song ba dang / des rgyal byed kyi tshal chus sbyang bzhin du gang ba mthong nas des bsam pa/ bdag gis rgyal
byed kyi tshal ra bas bskor gyi/ stor khung ma btod pas/ des na 'di chus sbyang bzhin du gang ste 'dug go/ de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ stor khung gdod do/ /snyam
du bsam nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal ra bas bskor gyi/ stor khung ma btod pas/ des na 'di chab kyis sbyang bzhin gtams te mchis
so| |de'i slad du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis stor khung gdod par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ thod cig/
des stor khung btod do/ /ba lang dag 'ongs shing 'ongs nas rtsig pa la lus kyis snyogs shing rwas drud pa dang / ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mthong nas des bsam pa/ bdag
gis rgyal byed kyi tshal ra bas bskor gyi/ shing thags ma bres pas/ des na ba lang dag 'ongs shing 'ongs nas 'di la lus kyis snyogs shing rwas drud do/ /de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis
gnang na/ bdag gis 'di shing thags kyis bskor bar bya'o/ /snyam du bsam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal ra bas bskor
gyi| shing thags ma bres pas/ ba lang dag mchis shing mchis nas de la lus kyis snyogs shing rwas drud de/ de'i slad du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ shing thags bre bar bgyi'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ shing thags bres shig /des shing thags bres pa dang / ma byin par len pa
dag gis/ shing thag dral te brkus so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'chag cing song ba dang shing thags bar bar nas dral zhing / shing de yang brkus
par mthong ngo / /des bsam pa/ bdag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal ra bas bskor nas shing thags bres na/ 'di bar bar nas dral te shing yang brkus kyi/ de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das
kyis gnang na/ bdag gis 'obs kyis bskor ro/ /snyam du bsam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal ra bas
bskor cing shing thags bres na/ de 'obs kyis ma bskor bas/ bar bar nas dral nas shing brkus na/ de'i slad du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis 'obs kyis bskor bar
bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ 'obs kyis skor cig/ des 'obs kyis bskor to/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /mnyan
yod na dge slong ma skar rgyal zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa de/ skra ring po ring por gyur nas de 'breg mkhan gyi drung du song ste/ bu/ skra bregs shig/ khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro/ /zhes byas pa
dang / des bsam pa/ ji ltar shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag nan che ba de ltar 'di dag kyang rngan pa med par las byed du 'jug ste/ gal te 'di'i skra bregs na/ gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang 'ong bar
'gyur bas/ dus ring du bshol te gzhag dang / 'di rang gi blos ldog par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas des 'phags ma/ bzhud la sad gnangs snga dro'am/ nyi ma'i gung ngam/ slad dro spyon cig /ces
dus btab bo/ /de des bslus pas yang dang yang du 'gro ba dang / de'i smos 'drin dge slong ma zhig yod pa des/ de yang dang yang du 'gro ba mthong nas des smras pa/ 'phags ma/ khyod ci'i phyir 'dir
yang dang yang du 'gro/ ci/ 'di khyod kyi nye du'i khyim mam/ rigs kyi khyim yin/ des smras pa/ 'phags ma/ 'di ni/ bdag gi nye du'i khyim yang ma yin/ rigs kyi khyim yang ma yin mod kyi/ 'on
kyang bdag gi skra ring po ring por gyur nas bdag gis 'breg mkhan 'o ni la/ bu/ bdag gi skra ring po ring po bregs shig dang / khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro/ /zhes byas na/ des ma bregs
te dus btab bo/ /des smras pa/ 'phags ma/ khyod kyis bzo bo la bden par smra ba dkon par ma thos sam/ kho mo ni/ skra 'breg mkhas na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /des
skabs de/ dge slong ma rnams la bsnyad pa dang / dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong ma gang zhig mkhas pa des phyogs dben par skra breg par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma gang zhig mkhas pa des phyogs dben
par skra breg par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong ma de/ dge slong ma de'i drung du song ste/ 'phags ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang gi/ tshur spyon/ skra bregs shig/ des
smras pa/ 'phags ma/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba ni legs na/ de ci/ sor mos breg gam/ 'di la spu gri dang / rdar dang / sen gri dang / smad tsher dag dgos so/ /des
skabs de/ dge slong ma rnams la bsnyad pa dang / dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ dge slong ma rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi phyir spu gri'i spyad dag bcang bar bya'o// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po bco brgyad pa/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo rab tu
byung ba de'i tshe/ de la bzang mos chos gos bcags shing rab tu bcags pa dag mnyan yod du bskur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos chos gos bcags shing rab tu bcags pa gsar pa/ ba
sos phyis pa dag bgos/ lhung bzed 'tsher ba thogs nas dge slong rnams kyi mdun na 'gying bag tu rlom nas skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag chos gos bcags pa dang / rab tu bcags pa dag gyon pa las gyur to/ /snyam du mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na skyes bu gti mug can dga' bo chos gos bcags shing rab tu bcags pa/ gsar pa/ ba sos phyis pa dag bgos/ lhung bzed 'tsher ba thogs nas
dge slong rnams kyi mdun du 'gying bag tu rlom pa 'di ni/ mdzes pa ma yin zhing / 'tsham pa ma yin no/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis chos gos bcags shing rab tu bcags pa dag bcang
bar mi bya ste/ 'chang na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis chos gos bcags shing rab tu bcags pa dag bcang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa
dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la chos gos bcags shing rab tu bcags pa dag 'bul ba na/ dge slong rnams kyis ma blangs nas de dag gis smras pa/
'phags pa dag /gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe ni/ mu stegs can rnams sbyin gnas lags/ da bcom ldan 'das
'jig rten du byung nas da ltar khyed sbyin gnas lags na/ gal te khyed mi bzhes na/ ci/ bdag cag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu dge ba'i lam rgyags ma mchis par mchi'am
zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ blang bar bya zhing / blangs nas 'tsher ba
yal bar byas te yongs su longs spyad par bya'o/ /de dag gis lag pas mnyes nas yal bar ma nus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zil pa la bzhag ste yal bar bya'o/ /
zil pa la bzhag ste yal bar byas na/ 'on kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du yal bar ma gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu'i nang du bsug par bya'o/ /dge slong dag
gis chu'i nang du bsugs na/ 'on kyang yal bar ma gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar byas kyang ma yal na/ yongs su longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /
de bzhin du bram ze dang / khyim bdag /dad pa can dag gis dge 'dun la chos gos bcags pa dang / rab tu bcags pa dag phul na/ de la yang rim pa 'di nyid kyis yongs su longs
spyad par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag
rnams rtog khang du 'dus shing 'khod nas bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma bcom ldan 'das kyang bgo bsha' byed pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin la/ de'i nyan thos
rnams kyang bgo bsha' byed pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pas/ nyis na/ mu stegs can dag rung gi/ dge sbyong mgo reg de dag ni/ ma yin no/ /zhes zer ro/ /de na bram ze gcig cig gis smras
pa/ kho bos dge sbyong go'u ta ma bgo bsha' byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ 'on te bgo bsha' byed pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin/ de'i nyan thos rnams bgo bsha' byed pa'i rang bzhin
can yin nam/ 'on te ma yin pa sang khyod kyi mngon sum du gyur par bya'o/ /de dag gis smras pa/ legs te/ de bzhin du gyis shig dang blta'o/ /des ras yug cig khyer nas rgyal byed kyi
tshal du song ste/ des ras yug de rgan pa'i mtha' logs su bzhag nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul te/ 'phags pa/ bdag gis ras yug 'di dge 'dun la phul gyi/ ci
bder mdzod cig ces byas pa dang / de la dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ bram ze chen po nad med par gyur cig /sbyin pa 'di khyod kyi sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang /
rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog thob pa dang / lha dang mi'i gos dag thob par gyur cig ces byas pa dang / des bcom mar mgos phyag byas nas song
ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la dge slong rnams la ras yug 'o ni bram zes glags btsal ba'i phyir phul
gyi/ de lta bas na/ khyed kyis mnyam par bgos la/ la las ni/ cha gar thob cig /la las ni/ sgrog gzungs su/ la las ni/ lhan par/ la las ni/ chos gos kyi sgrog gur gyis shig ces sgos
shig /btsun pa/ de ltar 'tshal lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas dge slong rnams la/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas/ ras
yug 'o ni bram zes glags btsal ba'i phyir phul gyi/ de lta bas na/ khyed kyis mnyam par bgos la/ la las ni/ cha gar thob cig /la las ni/ sgrog gzungs su/ la las ni/ lhan
par/ la las ni/ chos gos kyi sgrog gur gyis shig /ces de skad bka' stsal to/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal
pa de bzhin 'tshal lo/ /zhes de rnams kyis de mnyam par gses nas de bzhin du bgos so/ /ji tsam na bram ze de nang par sngar la ngas nas mnyan yod kyi sgo na 'dug go /dge slong dag
kyang snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug par brtsams pa dang / bram ze des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gis dge 'dun la ras
phul ba gang lags pa de/ khyed kyis cir bgyis/ de na dge slong gcig cig gis smras pa/ bram ze chen po/ de dge 'dun gyis mnyam par gses nas bgos te/ kho bo'i skal pa gang yin pa de ni/
cha gar btab pa 'di yin no/ /gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ kho bo'i ni/ sgrog gzungs su btab pa 'di yin no/ /gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ kho bo'i ni lhan par btab pa 'di yin no/ /gzhan zhig
gis smras pa/ kho bo'i ni/ chos gos kyi sgrog gur byas pa 'di yin no/ /bram ze des bsam pa/ bram ze rnams/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can ma yin no/ /
zhes zer ba ni/ gyi na zhig brdol te/ bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni/ bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can yin pas/ 'di dag kho na'i nang du rab tu byung ngo / /snyam nas/ de dad pa skyes te/ bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos
'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
bram ze/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis sems bskyed pa ni/ bzang ste/ rab tu 'byung ba ni/ mchog go /phan yon lnga mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba
kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs te/ lnga gang zhe na/ bdag gis rang gi don ma 'dres pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas/ rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so/
bdag gang dag gi bran dang / mngag gzhug pa dang / bsgo ba bzhin byed pa dang / rang dbang med pa dang / dga' mgur byed pa de dag gi yang mchod par bya ba dang / bsngags par bya bar 'gyur
ro/ /zhes bya bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so/ /grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bar mthong
pa'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so/ /bdag grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa las nyams kyang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
zhes bya bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dam pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa
rnams kyis rab tu byung ba rnam grangs du mar bsngags so/ /zhes bya bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so/ /de lta bas na/ legs kyis rab tu
byung zhig /de bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog /ces bya bas rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas gdams ngag gnang ba dang / des 'bad/ brtsal/ bsgrims pas 'khor
ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang / 'gyes pa dang / 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis 'joms par rtogs
te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te dgra bcom pa khams gsum la 'dod chags dang bral ba/ sems bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam
mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa/ ste'u dang tsan+dan du mtshungs pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral ba/ mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa
dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /tshod zin pa la phan yon 'di dang / gzhan dag kyang yod do/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ zas kyi rnyed pa zhig byung na/ 'u
su'i lo ma tsam du yang mnyam par byas te bgo bar bya'o/ /gos kyi rnyed pa zhig byung na/ mar me'i snying po tsam du yang mnyam par byas te bgo bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod
na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na bram ze gtsang sbra 'dod pa zhig rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa
des bsam pa/ gang zhig gis gtsang sbras bdag gi sems rangs pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu 'byung ngo / /snyam nas/ de mu stegs can gyi gnas de dag byul na/ de dag gi gtsang sbras
de'i sems ma rangs so/ /des bsam pa/ bdag gis mu stegs can thams cad bgams na gang gis kyang bdag gi sems ma rangs kyi/ da ni/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag lus pas/ song ste de dag

bgam par bya'o/ /snyam nas de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ril ba thogs te phyi rol tu chab khung sar chas pa mthong nas des bsam pa/ dge sbyong go'u
ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'di yin pas/ re zhig 'di kho na gtsang sbra ji ltar byed pa blta'o/ /snyam mo/ /de de'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing song ba dang / dgra bcom pa rnams ni/ ma bsam par ye
shes mthong ba mi 'jug pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems pa la zhugs te/ bram ze 'di ci'i phyir bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang snyam na/ ji tsam na gtsang sbra 'dod par mthong ngo / /yang
bsam pa la zhugs te/ ci/ 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba 'ga' zhig yod dam/ 'on te med snyam na/ yod par mthong ngo / /su la rag las snyam na/ bdag kho na la yin par mthong ngo / /des bsam
nas lham phud/ chos gos dag bzhag ste de nas phyogs gcig tu sa phung bu bdun bzhag /gzhan zhig tu bdun/ gzhan zhig tu yang sa'i phung bu gnyis bzhag go /de nas sa phung bu gsum zhig khyer
nas ci nas bram ze des mthong ba de ltar bshang ba bya bar brtsams so/ /de nas bshang ba zin nas sa phung gcig gis rkub phyis/ gnyis kyis khrus byas so/ /de nas dal gyis langs nas phyogs der
'ongs te phyin nas lag pa g.yon pas sa phung bu bdun gyis khrus byas so/ /de nas gnyi gas phung bu bdun gyi khrus byas so/ /de nas sa phung bu gcig gis dpung pa man chad bkrus so/ /lag pa
dag bkrus nas gnyis pas ril ba bkrus so/ /de nas dal gyis langs te spyod lam zhi bas chos gos bgos nas rkang pa dag bkrus pa dang / bram ze des mthong nas mngon par dad par gyur te/
des bsam pa/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi sa'i phung bu gcig ni/ mchog yin gyi/ mu stegs can rnams kyi brgya yang de lta ma yin no/ /snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa
la gtugs nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa shA ri'i bu/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi
dngos po 'thob na/ bdag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bram ze/ legs so/ /khyod kyi sems bskyed pa ni/ bzang ste/ rab tu 'byung ba ni/
mchog go /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / phan yon lnga mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs te zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas
rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dam pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis rab tu byung ba rnam grangs du mar bsngags so/ /zhes bya bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu
'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so/ /zhes gsungs zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de lta bas na/ legs kyi/ rab tu byung zhig/ des de rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas
te gdams ngag byin pa dang / des 'bad/ brtsal/ bsgrims pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rig nas zhes bya ba nas gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /
zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
bus gtsang sbras bram ze 'di dad par bgyis nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te/ grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa shin tu mthar thug pa mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa la gzigs bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis 'di rkun po las bzlog ste brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga la bzhag pa de nyon cig
dge slong dag /sngon byung ba ri brag cig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /
de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/ /de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta
na sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu rgya cher byas nas rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags so/ /de bskyed bsrings te chen mor gyur pa dang / re
zhig cig na ri brag der rkun po lnga brgya zhig 'joms 'dod cing lhags so/ /de dag gi sde dpon gang yin pa de skom pas gdungs nas bram ze de'i khyim du zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na bu mo de mthong ngo
mthong nas kyang smras pa/ bu mo/ chu byin cig /des smras pa/ re zhig cung zhig gzhes shig /de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /des myur ba myur bar mar me bus pa dang / rkun po'i sde dpon bu mo de la
mig gtad de rtog go /bu mo des mar me bus nas chu la blta ba dang / rkun po'i sde dpon gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ ci la lta/ des smras pa/ chu la lta'o/ /des smras pa/ de la bltar ci yod/ des smras

pa/ 'dir spur ma'am skra song du 'ong bas so/ /des smras pa/ bu mo/ kho bo ni/ khyed la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin pas/ kho bo la dug blud par bya ba yin na/ khyod ko de skad smra ba lta zhig
des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gzhan gyi nor 'phrog g.yon can gyis/ /bya ba gang de rkun po rnams/ /byed dam 'on te min yang rung / /bdag gis chos ni
rtag bsrung bya/ /de shin tu dga' nas smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod bdag gi sring mor bya na/ ci zhig bya smros shig/ des smras pa/ khyod gzhan gyi nor la mngon par chags pa bskyed pas/ mdas
gnad du bsnun nas dus byas par gyur na/ bdag ming po dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing cho nges 'debs na/ dga' bar mi 'gyur bas/ rkun po byed pa'i ming po gang yin
pa de lta bu ni/ bdag la mi dgos so/ /de lta bas na/ gal te khyod kyis brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang dag par len nus na/ de lta na/ bdag gis khyod kyi sring mo bya'o/ /des mi 'dod
bzhin du tshig yid du 'ong ba snyan pa'i tshul gyis smras pa dang / des de sring mo bya bar shin tu dga' zhing 'dod par gyur te/ des smras pa/ sring mo/ legs te/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /des de
chom rkun las bzlog ste brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga la bzhag go/ /dge slong dag/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rkun po'i sde dpon de ni/ bram ze 'di nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i
dus kyi bram ze'i bu mo de ni/ dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe yang 'dis de rkun po las bzlog ste bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bzhag go/ /da ltar yang 'di gtsang sbras dad par byas
nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te grub pa dang / bde ba bla na med pa shin tu mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa yin no/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar na/ gtsang sbra la phan yon
'di dang / gzhan dag kyang yod do/ /de lta bas na/ ji ltar shA ri'i bus byas pa ltar/ dge slong dag gis rnam pa des gtsang sbra bya'o/ /sdom ni/ cha ga gzungs dang rdul zan dang / /dge slong ma ni
zla ba dang / /gnas ni bca' ba drug ldan dang / /khri la gsum ni 'dug bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong dag gis dus su bgos pa'i chos gos rnams mi bsri bar spyad pas/ de dag gi mtha' ma'i rkud pa rnams zegs so/ /skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag
gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gos zegs pa rnams kyi mthar chag gdab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos zegs pa rnams kyi mthar chag gdab
par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis cha ga btab nas spyad par brtsams na/ 'on kyang rkud pa rnams zegs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bar bar du
gzungs gdab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis snam sbyar ni/ pags
pa dang 'dra bar bsrung bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong gzhan dag cig la gos spyad par 'os pa gzhan med nas/ de dag gis rtag par snam sbyar
bgos pas/ de so ga tsha ba'i dus su mchan khung gi phyogs kyi rdul zags pas/ dri ma can du gyur cing dengs pa dang / dri mi zhim par gyur nas skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong
dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mchan khung gi phyogs su rdul gzan gzhug par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mchan khung gi
phyogs su snam sbyar gyi rdul gzan gzhug par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis rdul gzan ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gos chur
khru phyed dang do/ /zheng du mtho gang yin pa de/ phyogs der gzhug par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis drubs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drub par mi bya'o/ /de dri ma can du
gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dus dus su bkru zhing kha bsgyur bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis ngos gcig tu bcug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngos
gnyi gar gzhug par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kha bsgyur bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis ngur smrig tu bcos nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
ngur smrig tu btso bar mi bya'i/ btsag gis kha bsgyur bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan
yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga'
mgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/ /de zla ba dgu 'das pa dang bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas de'i ming zla ba
zhes bya bar btags te/ de bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / de nas
skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la 'khor lnga brgyas bskor te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag
bar len du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/ /rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par
bstan/ yang dag par bskul/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas skye rgu'i
bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan
'das kyis dge slong rnams la dge slong gi 'dul ba bstan lags na/ kye ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bas nye bar bzung ste dge slong ma rnams la dge slong ma'i 'dul ba bstan
du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u ta mi/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos tshig re nas gsungs pa de ni/ gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/ /'on kyang gal te dge
slong ma 'ga' zhig ngas lan gcig bshad pa 'dzin par spro na/ de lta na/ ngas bstan par bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe dge slong ma zla ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas dge slong ma
zla ba stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gcig bka'
stsal pa bdag gis gzung bar 'tshal na/ bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bstan pa dang / des lan gcig gsungs pa bzung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das
