kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma rnams kyi nang na thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin no/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ thams cad du dge slong ma zla ba'am/ zla ba lta bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang dge slong ma'i 'dul ba bzung nas bcang bar
bya zhing / dge slong ma rnams la yang bstan par bya/ kha ton byed pa dang / 'dri bar byed pa dag la yang sbyin par bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/
gal te dge slong ma zla bas/ nga las dge slong ma'i 'dul ba lan gcig bshad pa blangs mod kyi/ 'on kyang thams cad du dge slong ma zla ba'am/ zla ba lta bu mi 'byung bas/ dge slong dag/
gis kyang dge slong ma'i 'dul ba gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya zhing / dge slong ma rnams la yang bstan par bya/ kha ton byed pa dang / 'dri bar byed pa dag la yang sbyin par bya'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims la brten cing tshul khrims la gnas nas zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi chos gnyis bsgom par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong ma zla bas 'dul ba'i
rjes su mthun par tshul khrims la brten cing tshul khrims la brten cing tshul khrims la gnas nas bsam gtan dang / 'don pa'i sbyor bas 'bad/ brtsal/ bsgrims bas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang / mi
g.yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang / 'gyes pa dang / 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis 'joms par rtogs te/
nyon mongs thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ sems gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha'
dang lag mthil du mnyam pa/ ste'u dang tsan+dan du mtshungs pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bral ba/ mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams thob pa/ srid pa
dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis bltas pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ nga'i nyan thos dge slong ma rnams kyi nang na/ shes rab che ba dang / spobs pa che ba dang / thos pa 'dzin
pa'i mchog ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag/ the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das/ dge slong ma zla bas las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas shes rab che zhing spobs ba che ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tu
bstan la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
slong dag/ dge slong ma zla ba nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /dge slong dag/ sngon
byung ba bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na skye rgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba/ ston pa 'jig rten
du byung ste/ de 'khor dge slong drug khri nyis stong dang rgyal po'i khab gnyen ldan du gshegs te gnyen ldan gyi tshal na bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab gnyen ldan na/ khyim bdag cig
'dug pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur
spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/ /des zla ba dgu 'das nas bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas rigs dang mthun
pa'i ming btags te/ de bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur pa dang / khyim bdag de dad pa can zhig pas/ dgag dbye'i tshe de khrid nas dge slong ma'i dbyar khang
du song ste/ des dge slong ma rnams la so sor khab dang / gri la sogs pa'i yo byad kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye byed do/ /bu mo des mdzes par mthong nas dad pa skyes
te pha la smras pa/ yab/ bdag gis kyang ji zhig cig gis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyi'o/ /khyim bdag des smras pa/ bu mo/ legs te/ de bzhin dgag dbye gyis
shig /des khab dang / gri dang / gser dang / dbyig la sogs pa yo byad kyi khyad par dag gis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye byas te rab tu dang ba drag pos rgan pa'i mtha'
nas rkang ba la phyag byas nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis sems bskyed de sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su btang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ shes rab che zhing spobs pa che ba dang / thos pa
'dzin par gyur cig/ ces byas so/ /dge slong dag/ ji snyam du sems/ khyim bdag gi bu mo gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong ma zla ba 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis gang yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la khab dang / gri dang / gser dang / dbyig la sogs pa yo byad kyi khyad par dag gis dgag dbye byas nas bdag gis
sems bskyed cing sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su btang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag shes rab che zhing spobs pa che ba dang / thos pa 'dzin par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa de'i las
kyi rnam par smin pas/ da ltar shes rab che zhing spobs pa che ba dang / thos pa 'dzin par gyur to/ /yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /des de na tshe gcig
tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur to/ /mkhan po gang las rab tu byung ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis
thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tu bstan to/ /de na 'dis/ 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung gi spyan sngar tshe gcig gi bar du

tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang / yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur gyi/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya

ba la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye rgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan
pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung
gis thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/ shAkya'i rgyal po'i gtso bo des/ thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tu
bstan par gyur cig /ces smon lam btab bo/ /de'i smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tu bstan pa yin no/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/
las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nag /gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag gis
de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /

de'i tshe dge slong gzhon nu zhig dge slong zhig dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing mnyan yod du phyin nas dge slong de ni/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma'i khang bzang du song / gzhon nu de yang rgyal byed kyi tshal
du song ste/ des dge slong zhig la gnas bcas nas de de'i thad na cung zad cig 'dug nas smras pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig tu lhung bzed dang / chos gos
bzhag ste mchis la de blangs nas slar mchi'o/ /des smras pa/ bu/ song la myur du shog cig /des smras pa/ slob dpon/ bdag de na ci zhig bgyid de/ bdag myur du mchis par bgyi'o/ /
zhes rkang pa la phyag byas te song nas rim gyis gtsug lag khang der phyin to/ /ji tsam na dge 'dun dag gis gtsug lag khang der gnas med par nub gcig kyang mi gnas par khrims su bya ba
bcas so/ /de khrims bzhin du dge slong zhig gnas bcas nas de nub mo nyal lo/ /nam langs nas bsam pa/ bdag song la slob dpon de blta'o/ /snyam nas de'i gnas khang du song ste sgo la
brdabs te slob dpon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khams bde'am zhes byas pa dang / bu/ bdag na ste/ mi bde'o/ /de 'di snyam du/ bdag slob dpon na ba bor te 'gro ba gang yin pa ni/ bdag gi tshul
ma yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de'i phyir gcig gis gcig bstang zhing na ba'i nad g.yog bya ba'i phyir gnas bca' bar gnang bas/ de'i phyir de'i nad g.yog byas te sos nas 'gro bar
bsam mo/ /des de'i nad g.yog byas nas sos par gyur pa dang des smras pa/ slob dpon/ mkhyen par mdzod cig /mchi'o/ /des smras pa/ bu/ cung zad mi bde ba lta med grang / slob dpon/
mi bde ba ni/ cung zad kyang ma mchis na/ 'on kyang bdag 'dir gnas su mchis pa ma lags kyi/ bdag gis chos gos dang / lhung bzed bzhag pa de len du mchis pa las/ dge 'dun gyis
gnas med par nub gcig kyang mi gnas par khrims su bya ba bcas so/ /de'i slad du bdag gis khrims bzhin du gnas bcas pa dang khyod na bar gyur nas bdag gis bsam pa/ bdag slob
dpon bor nas 'gro ba gang yin pa ni/ bdag gi tshul ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de'i phyir gcig gis gcig bstang zhing / na ba'i nad g.yog bya
ba'i phyir gnas bca' bar gnang bas/ de'i phyir nad g.yog byas la sos na 'gro'o/ /snyam pa las/ da ni/ khyod sos par gyur pas/ mkhyen par mdzod cig /mchi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa/
legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod ji ltar zhugs pa de ltar lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag gis mkhan po dang / slob dpon dag la bsgrub par bya'o/ /lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas
rnams kyis mkhan po dang / slob dpon dag la de ltar bsgrubs na/ de ltar ut+pa la chu nas 'byung ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod bag
yod par byos la song zhig /des de la phyag byas nas rim gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang / de'i slob dpon gyis mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ 'ongs pa legs na/ ci ste ring
zhig thogs nas 'ongs/ des ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod ji ltar zhugs pa de ltar gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag gis mkhan
po dang / slob dpon dag la bsgrub par bya'o/ /de ltar bsgrubs na/ ji ltar ut+pa la chu nas 'byung ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong de 'gyod
pa skyes te/ 'di'i gnas de nyid kyis chog gam/ 'on te gzhan zhig sbyin dgos snyam nas des skabs de/ dge slong dag la smras te/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /des re zhig pa'i gnas bcas par zad de/ de lta bas na/ de'i gnas de kho nas chog gi /gzhan ni/ ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong spong ba pa zhig la dge slong gzhon nu zhig gis gnas
bcas pa dang / de 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas gdams ngag ma byin zhing / rjes su ma bstan pas ni/ shan pa byed
kyang bla'o/ /zhes gsungs te/ 'di ltar nye gnas kyang de bzhin du slob ma yin la/ bdag kyang spong ba pa zhig pas 'di gang zhig smin par byed pa 'ga' zhig la gtad do/ /snyam bsam nas/ da
dge slong zhig gi thad du song nas tshe dang ldan pa/ gzhon nu 'di bslab par gyis shig /des smras pa/ gal te khyod bdag gi g.yog byed na/ dam bcas te bslab par bya'o/ /des smras pa/
bslab tu gsol/ bgyi'o/ /des de bslab par brtsams so/ /dus gzhan zhig na de na bar gyur nas gnas bcas pa'i slob dpon des de'i nad g.yog byas so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/
gnas bcas pa'i slob dpon de na bar gyur te/ des de slar ma bltas shing / de bzhin lan gsum gyi bar du yang ma bltas nas des de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
pa| khyod gzhan zhig gi drung du song la gnas chos shig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag khyod kho na'i drung na mchis te/ bdag la phongs pa cung zad kyang ma mchis so/ /des smras pa/
tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod la phongs pa med pa ni/ bden na/ 'on kyang kho bo phongs te/ khyod na bar gyur pa na/ ngas khyod kyi nad g.yog byas na/ nga lan gsum gyi bar du na bar gyur pa na/ ci
ste khyod kyis nga slar ma bltas/ song la gang zhig khyod 'dra ba'i ma gus pa la gnas ster ba de la gnas 'chos te 'dug cig /de spobs pa med de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas skabs de/
bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas pas slob dpon la rim gro bya'o/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ klog pa'i slob
dpon na bar gyur nas des slar ma bltas kyi/ gang gi tshe sos par gyur pa de'i tshe drung du song ste des smras pa/ slob dpon/ bdag la lung phog cig /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ kho
bo na ba khyod kyis res 'ga' yang slar ma bltas kyi/ khyod song la gang zhig khyod lta bu ma gus pa la klog tu 'jug pa de las lhogs shig/ des spobs pa med de cang mi zer bar 'dug
nas skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klog pa'i slob dpon la rim gro bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis klog pa'i slob dpon
la rim gro bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na klog pa'i slob dpon dang / gnas kyi slob dpon de gnyi ga na bar gyur nas/ des gang gi rim gro bya ba mi shes nas skabs de/
bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te nus na/ gnyi ga'i bya'o/ /ci ste mi nus na/ gnas kyi slob dpon la bya ste/ 'di ltar
klog pa med par ni/ 'dug tu rung gi /gnas pa med par ni/ ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na

bzhugs so/ /rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa zhig dge slong zhig gi drung du song ba dang / des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo / /lhan cig gnas pa de la zang zing
gis bsdu ba ni/ byas na/ chos kyis ma byas pas de gzhan zhig la gnas te 'dug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don
mthun pa zhes gsungs pas/ des de la chos dang zang zing dag gis kyang sdud pas/ de slob dpon de la rtag tu lta zhing sems la 'dzin to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ de'i mkhan po ci 'dod
par ljongs rgyus nas slar mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / de mthong nas de la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gsar bu gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ stan las ldang bar
byed/ gang dag rgan pa de dag gis ni/ 'ongs pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i kun tu spyod pas kun tu spyad do/ /de'i lhan cig gnas pa de stan las kyang ma langs pa dang / de la dge slong
dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod kyi mkhan po 'ongs na/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa kha cig ni/ ldang bar byed/ kha cig gis ni/ mngon du ldang bar byas/ kha cig gis ni/ legs
par 'ongs so/ /zhes kun tu spyod pas kun tu spyad na/ khyod de mthong bzhin du stan las kyang ma langs pa de ni/ rigs pa ma yin no/ /des smras pa/ bdag 'dis rab tu phyung nas ci zang zing
gis bsdu ba byas sam/ 'on te chos kyis bsdu ba byas/ gang zhig dran nas ldang bar bya/ de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ de skad ma zer cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang zag
cig /gang zag gang zhig la brten nas de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la skra dang / kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim
med par rab tu phyung ba'i gang zag des ni/ gang zag de la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yang 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / nad kyi gsos sman dang / mal stan dang / yo byad
dag gis lan glan par sla ba ma yin no/ /zhes ma gsungs sam/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod de skad zer ba de ni/ legs pa ma yin no/ /de spobs pa med de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas skabs de/ bcom
ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas kyi dge slong rnams kyis mthong ma thag tu stan las ldang ba bya ste/
mkhan po mthong ma thag tu gnas bcas pa yang med par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhan po mthong ma thag tu gnas bcas pa med par 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / gzhan
dag cig gi mkhan po 'dug mi phod pa dag cig 'ongs shing / de dag dus cung zad 'dug nas 'gro bar byed do/ /de la kha cig la ni/ mkhan po dang / slob dpon rnams gshe /kha cig la ni/
dga' bar gyur cing / de rnams gang dag la gshe pa de dag la ni/ sngon gnas bcas pa yang mi ster cing / bdag nyid kyang sdud par mi byed/ gang dag la dga' ba de dag ni/ sdud par byed pa
nas sngon gyi slob dpon rnams 'khrugs par gyur cing song ba de dag yang sdud pa mi byed pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ 'dug mi phod pa gang dag yin pa de dag la yang thams cad bya zhing / sngon gyi slob dpon rnams la yang thams cad bya mod kyi/ 'on kyang gnyis ka'i sems kyang mgu ba lhur blang
bar bya zhing / gnyi ga la yang dri bar bya'o/ /gal te thams cad kyi thams cad du mkhan po dag 'dug na/ de nyid du dri bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig gis gzhon nu gcig cig la gnas byin te/ de zla ba phyed cing gso sbyong gi
tshe de'i thad du song nas smras pa/ slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhu'o/ /gso sbyong byin gyis brlab bo/ /des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / kho bo ji ltar khyod kyi slob dpon du 'gyur/ des smras pa/
bdag ni/ khyod nyid la gnas bcas te mchis pas so/ /des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / gang zhig khyod lta bu ma gus shing zhes med pa la gnas ster ba de la gnas te 'dug la/ de nyid la zhus
shig /de spobs pa med de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad
byung ba ni/ dge slong dag dus gsum du mkhan po dang / slob dpon rnams la bltar mi 'gro ba las gyur to/ /de lta bas na/ lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas rnams kyis dus gsum du
mkhan po dang / slob dpon rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas
rnams kyis dus gsum du mkhan po dang / slob dpon dag blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig gis dge slong gzhon nu gcig cig la gnas byin nas des de bu bzhin bskyangs so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na ljongs rgyu bar chas te smras pa/ slob dpon phyag
'tshal lo/ /mkhyen par mdzod cig /ljongs rgyur mchi'o/ /des smras pa/ bu/ mi bde ba cung zad med dam/ des smras pa/ slob dpon/ mi bde ba ni/ cung zad kyang ma mchis na/ 'on kyang
bdag ljongs rgyu bar spro ste/ slar yang mchi'o/ /des smras pa/ bu/ de lta na song la lam kar 'gyod par gyur na/ slar ldog par gyis shig /des smras pa/ slob dpon/ legs kyi/ slar
ldog par bgyi'o/ /zhes de chas pa dang / ji tsam na de lam gar 'gyod pa skyes te des bsam pa/ bdag la slob dpon des yo byad thams cad sbyar ba las/ bdag song ba ma legs kyi/ slar
ldog par bya'o/ /snyam bsam nas/ de slar log pa dang / slob dpon gyis mthong nas des smras pa/ bu/ ci ste slar log /cung zad brjed pa lta med dam/ des smras pa/ slob dpon/ brjed
pa la ci yang ma mchis na/ 'on kyang bdag gis bsam pa/ bdag la slob dpon gyis yo byad thams cad sbyar na/ don ci zhig la 'gro snyam nas bdag slar log pa lags so/ /des smras
pa| bu/ gal te slar log na legs so/ /khyod kyi slob dpon ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /zhes smras nas bsam pa/ ci/ 'di gnas bcas pa de kho nas chog gam/ 'on
te gdod sbyin par bya snyam ste/ des skabs de/ dge slong dag la smras nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /
gal te slob dpon gyis ma btang la nye gnas kyis btang na/ gnas bcas pa ma zhig pa zhes brjod do/ /slob dpon gyis btang la nye gnas kyis ma btang na/ gnas bcas pa ma zhig pa zhes
brjod do/ /slob dpon gyis kyang ma btang la nye gnas kyis kyang ma btang na/ gnas bcas pa ma zhig pa zhes brjod do/ /slob dpon gyis kyang btang la nye gnas kyis kyang btang na/ gnas
bcas pa zhig pa zhes brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge
slong tshogs la ston pa zhig 'dug pa de gzhon nu mang po dag klog tu 'jug go /de dus gzhan zhig na na bar gyur pa dang / de dag gis de slar ma bltas shing / de bzhin du lan gsum na
par gyur kyang de dag gis slar ma bltas so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na sos par gyur pa dang / nye gnas dag de'i drung du 'ongs te/ de na gcig gis smras pa/ slob dpon/ bdag la lung dbog
tu gsol/ gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bdag la g.yar ston dbog tu gsol/ gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ zhu bar 'tshal lo/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag lan gsum gyi bar du na bar
gyur kyang khyed gang gis kyang slar ma bltas pas/ gang zhig khyed lta bu ma gus pa la gdams ngag kha ton dag 'bog par byed pa de'i thad du dengs shig /skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong
dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klog pa'i slob dpon la rim gro bya'o/ /de dag thams cad kyis byas pa dang / de rnams kyi dge ba'i phyogs nyams par gyur nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ res su bcad de bya'o/ /de dag gis res kyis bya bar brtsams pa dang / rgan po rab tu byung ba zhig de la gnas te 'dug pa de la de dag gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs/ sang
khyod la res bab po/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /ci/ slob dpon la res kyis g.yog bya'am/ kho bo kho nas g.yog bya'i/ khyed cag sems las chung ngur gyis shig /de dag gis smras pa/
rgan zhugs/ gal te de lta na legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang nad pa la rim gro byed pa de ni/ nga la rim gro byed pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pas/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis gyis shig /
des de'i rim gro byed par brtsams nas des sos par gyur to/ /de'i lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas smras pa/ slob dpon/ bdag la gdams ngag dbog tu gsol/ des smras pa/ khyod res lam
bab pas/ re zhig sdod cig /yang smras pa/ slob dpon/ kha ton dang / zhu ba dag gnongs shig /khyod kyi res lam bab pas re zhig sdod cig /des smras pa/
slob dpon/ rim gro byed pa ni/ bdag la res bab na/ klog pa dang / 'don pa ni/ 'di dag la res bab pa ci'i slad du/ bdag mchi yi/ mkhyen par mdzod cig /des smras pa/ bu/ thams
cad bya'i/ ma 'gro bar sdod cig /de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig
rtag tu g.yog byed pa de/ mi dga' bar ma gyur par gzhan dag la lung dang / kha ton dang / zhu ba dag sbyin par bya'o/ /mkhas pa dang / mi mkhas pa kha cig klog pa na/ mkhas pa dag la ni/
lung byin pas/ mi mkhas pa dag la gnod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams la yang lung dang / kha ton dang / dri ba dag skabs su sbyin par bya'o/ /bar sdom ni/
nad pa spong ba mkhan po dang / /zla ba phyed cing 'ong ba dang / /tshogs dag klog tu 'jug byed pa/ /bar sdom dag tu yang dag bstan/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal
bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra na ba bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams rigs kyi khyim du song ba dang / de dag gis khri phyung ste 'phags pa/ ci bder bzhugs
shig |de rnams gcig car 'khod nas khri de chag par gyur te/ de dag gis rta gad kyis btab pa dang / dge slong gzhan dag kyang der 'ongs te/ de dag gis de rnams mthong nas des smras pa/ tshe
dang ldan pa/ khyed 'di lta bu'i 'phyar po byas nas dgod dam zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ ci/ chang 'thungs sam/ sgog skya zos/ des smras pa/ ci/ de dag kyang byed dam/ gzhan ci zhig
byas| khri ma bcag gam/ ci/ shing zad dam/ shing mkhan dag shi'am/ de dag ma rangs bzhin cang mi zer bar 'dug nas skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ khri gcig la drug 'dug par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khri gcig la drug 'dug par mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / lnga 'dug ste nyes dmigs
de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lnga yang 'dug par mi bya'o/ /bzhi 'dug ste nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhi yang 'dug
par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang khri la ni/ gsum 'dug par bya'o/ /khri'u la gnyis so/ /khri'u chung la ni/ gcig go /sdom ni/ nad pa yi ni nad g.yog dang / /shing la 'dzeg par mi bya dang / /bkrabs
pa bsnyen rdzogs mi bya dang / /lag pa gcad par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nad pa'i rim gro bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa
gang lags pa de/ yo byad ji lta bu dag gis bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor/ rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dag ma gtogs par gzhan
dag gis bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye dga'i dge tshul
bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod nas des bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i ched du las byed pa'i dge slong dang / gsang ste ston pa dang / dge slong gang dag dkyil 'khor du 'ong ba la gsol
ba btab ste/ de nas dge tshul stan khyer te dkyil 'khor du sngar song nas/ dkyil 'khor phyag dar byas te stan bshams na/ dge slong dag ma 'ongs te/ nye dgas phan tshun du bltas
na| des me tog gi shing zhig mthong ste/ des smras pa/ dge tshul/ re zhig me tog dag lhogs la dge slong rnams la brims shig /des 'dzegs pa dang ma stes te lhung nas lag
pa chag ste/ de nyid de'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po'i bar chad du gyur nas skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu thu bo dbang bskur bar 'os pa/ dbang ma bskur bar 'dug cing / mtshams la bab pa bsrung bar bya ba dang / bskyang
bar bya ba yin pa de bzhin du dge slong gis dge tshul bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa yang bsrung zhing bskyang bar bya ba yin no/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa'i
dge tshul shing la 'dzeg tu mi gzhug ste/ 'dzeg tu 'jug na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po bcu dgu pa/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la nang mi gcugs pa chen
po zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ /de dus gzhan zhig na rgyal pos spyos nas des bsam pa/ rgyal po dag ni/ ji ltar byas kyang mgu dga' bas/ song la rab tu 'byung bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de

rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stong ba yin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' sgo na 'dug go/
des de snga na ngo shes pas/ des de la 'ongs pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba kun tu spyad nas/ chen po/ khyod zla ba lta bur gnas na/ ring mo zhig lon te ga las 'ongs zhes byas pa dang / des
smras pa/ 'phags pa/ yang dang yang mthong bas ni/ brnyas par 'gyur gyi/ yun ring zhig lon te mthong ba ni/ legs pa yin no/ /chen po/ dgos pa
ci zhig la 'ongs/ 'phags pa/ rgyal po ni/ mgu dga' bas/ lha'i thugs mnyes par bya mi nus te/ rab tu 'byung ngo / /chen po/ khyod kyi sems bskyed pa ni/ bzang ste/ legs so/ /
rab tu 'byung ba ni/ mchog yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phan yon rnam pa lnga mthong ba zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dam pa yang dag par zhugs
pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis rab tu byung ba rnam grangs du mar bsngags pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /legs kyi/ rab tu byung zhig /ces des de rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs
par byas so/ /rgyal pos blon po dag la bka' stsal pa/ shes ldan dag /chen po mi snang na /mi na grang / de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ de bro 'tshal ba ni/ ma mchis mod kyi/ lhas ci zhig
bka' stsal na/ rgyal byed kyi tshal du mchis nas rab tu byung lags so/ /sus rab tu phyung / 'phags pa nye dgas so/ /rgyal pos de thos nas khros te/ des de la pho nya btang nas/
'phags pa/ bdag gis spyos na/ khyod kyis rab tu 'byung ngam/ khyod kyis chen po rab tu phyung na/ da bdag dang / 'phags skyes po dang / phreng ldan ma dang / dbyar byed ma dag kyang rab

tu phyung la/ rang rgyal srid gyis shig /des kyang de la lan spring pa/ lto sgye tshur shog /khyod dang / 'phags skyes po dang / phreng ldan ma dang / dbyar byed ma rab tu phyung la nga nyid rgyal srid byed do/ /'di
ltar ngas khyod kyi chen po'am/ gzhan yang rung / bslus te rab tu phyung ngam ci/ nged ni/ gang zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs nas nged la gsol pa 'debs pa de/ rab tu 'byin to/ /rgyal pos thos te
ma dad par gyur nas de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag rgyal pos bkrabs
pa rab tu 'byin pa las gyur gyi/ de'i phyir dge slong gis rgyal pos bkrabs pa rab tu mi 'byung bar dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ skyes bu gti mug nye
dgas blon po rab tu phyung bas/ rgyal po ma dad par gyur to/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong dag gis rgyal pos bkrabs pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /gang yang rung ba zhig gi drung du rab tu 'byung
bar 'dod pa zhig nye bar 'ongs nas/ des de la rgyal pos bkrabs pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya ste/ ma dris par rab tu 'byin na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis rgyal pos bkrabs pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / kha cig yul ring po dag nas kyang 'ong / rgyus mi shes pa yang 'ong / ma gnang ba dag kyang 'ong nas dge
slong dag the tshom du gyur te/ de dag kyang rab tu ma phyung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang yul ring po dang / rgyus mi shes pa dang / ma gnang ba dag 'ong
ba de dag rab tu dbyung bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo/ skra dang / kha spu bregs nas ring po ma lon par snga dro chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /de rim gyis srang
du song ba dang / ji tsam na bram ze zhig bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug ste/ de yang gtum po gzu lum can/ rtsub mo zhig yin pas/ des bram ze'i
khye'u zhig la smras pa/ kye bram ze'i khye'u/ khyod dge sbyong mgo reg 'di'i mgor ltag dbyug snun nus sam/ des smras pa/ mkhan po/ te por rngo thogs so/ /zhes de de'i drung du song nas
de'i mgor ltag dbyug gis brgyab bo/ /tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo log ste bram ze de la bltas pa dang / de je khros nas des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u yang rgyob cig/ des de la lan
gnyis su ltag dbyug gis brgyab pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bsam pa/ bdag gis bltas te ci rung 'gro'o/ /snyam nas de song ngo / /rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin nas zas kyi bya
ba byas te lhung bzed bkrus nas dge slong dag la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ srang che ge mo zhes bya bar ma 'dong zhig/ dge slong dag gis smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ des smras pa/ de na bram ze gtum
po gzu lum can/ rtsub mo zhig bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam zhig la bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug ste/ des bdag la ltag dbyug gnyis bsnun no/ /de dag gis smras pa/ khyod kyis ci nyes/
des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /gcig ni/ nyes/ gnyis pa ni/ ma nyes so/ /ji ltar ni/ nyes/ ji ltar ni/ ma nyes/ gcugs med par des kho bo la ltag dbyug gis bsnun nas kho bos log
ste bltas pa dang / des lan gnyis bsnun pas/ kho bos de la log ste bltas pa gang yin pa de ni/ nyes so/ /snga ma ni/ ma nyes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye das thos nas des smras pa/ 'phags
pa/ ci zhig gsung / des smras pa/ chen po ma lags so/ /nye dgas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ de bdag gis thos kyi/ yang gsungs shig/ des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / nye dgas mgo
lan gsum lcog nas 'jal to/ /zhes byas te mi dga' bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de mgo bzlas te bregs nas til mar gyis bskus te bkrus nas snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang
chos gos thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /de rim gyis srang du phyin na/ bram ze de gzhan du yengs pa des de ma mthong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' de'i mdun du
'chag par brtsams pa dang / bram ze des mthong nas/ des bram ze'i khye'u zhig la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ song la dge sbyong mgo reg 'di'i mgor ltag
dbyug gis snun cig /tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas de thos nas des smras pa/ bkren pa/ 'o ni btang ci dgos/ khyod nyid tshur/ de skad smras pa dang / bram ze de khros te/ des bdag nyid song
nas nye dga' la ltag dbyug gis bsnun nas nye dgas bram ze de'i dpung pa nas bzung ste/ bkren pa/ nye dga' la yang rdeg gam/ tshur/ rgyal po'i pho brang du 'dong ngo / /zhes des de'i
dpung ba nas bzung ste drangs pa dang / des bram ze'i khye'u de dag la bos nas de dag gis kyang de'i dpung pa ya gcig nas bzung ste drangs so/ /nye dga' tshan po che chen po'i stobs can des/
bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag dang / bram ze de drangs nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor song ste 'dug go/ 'di ni/ chos nyid yin te/ gang gi tshe drug sde rnams khros nas rgyal po'i pho
brang gi sgo na 'dug pa de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi khang bzang g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos bltas te mthong nas mi zhig la bsgo ba/ kye skyes bu/ sgor 'phags pa drug sde 'ga'
zhig byon par ma gyur grang / song la ltos/ des byung ste bltas na/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam dang sgo na 'dug nas/ des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ 'phags
pa nye dga' chab sgo na mchis so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de nang du spyan drongs shig/ de nang du 'ongs te smras pa/ lha/ 'phags pa dga' po rab tu byung bar ma gyur na/ ci zhig tu 'gyur/ 'phags
pa| stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /'o na/ khyod de'i cir 'gyur/ 'phags pa/ g.yog tu 'gyur ro/ /lha/ khyod kyis dge slong rnams ni/ gzhon nu'i thabs su
gnang / dge slong ma rnams ni/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi thabs su gnang ste/ de ltar bdag cag la byams na/ bram ze gcig cig gis lha khyad du bkum ste/ slob dpon dga' bo la ltag
dbyug gnyis bsnun/ bdag la yang ltag dbyug gis brgyab po/ /rgyal po khros te/ des blon po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ song la bram ze de'i lag pa chod cig/ des de khrid de srang du song
na/ bram ze de'i pha ma gnyis kyis thos nas de dag mdza' bo dang / phu nu dang / gnyen dag dang 'dus shing snying rje rje ltar sma bab pa'i tshig dal gyis smra zhing / kyi hud bu zhes cho nges 'debs
bzhin srang du song nas de dag dang / skye bo'i tshogs des blon po de la smras pa/ kye dge ba/ lha la nyes pa byas pa lag pa bcad pa'i ni/ rigs na/ bram ze 'di lag pas 'tsho ba zhig pas/
lag pa g.yon pa gcad pa'i rigs so/ /des de'i lag pa g.yon pa bcad pa dang / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ bram ze de de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa g.yogs nas g.yas pas klog par
byed do/ /re zhig cig na nye dgas mthong nas de shin tu khros te rgyal po'i thad du song nas smras pa/ rgyal po rnams kyi bde ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ bka'i 'bras
bu btsan pa 'dir zad na/ de yang lha la med do/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci zhig byas/ nye dgas smras pa/ lha/ bram ze de'i lag pa ma bcad do/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams bos te smras
pa| khyed kyis bram ze de'i lag pa ma bcad dam/ des smras pa/ lha/ bkum lags so/ /de lta na/ 'o na 'phags pa nye dga' 'di skad zer ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas smras pa/ lha/ bram
ze de de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pas sgyur sgyur bgyid cing bram ze'i khye'u rnams klog tu 'jug go/ blon pos smras pa/ lha/ de'i pha ma dag gis mchid nas/ bram ze 'di lag pas 'tsho ba
zhig pas lag pa g.yon pa chod cig ces mchi ste/ de'i slad du bdag gis de'i sug pa g.yon pa bkum mo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de'i pha ma dag gis lag pa g.yon pa gcod du
bcug na/ ngas g.yas pa gcod du gzhug gi/ song la chod cig/ des de'i drung du song nas lag pa g.yas pa bcad pa dang / de lag pa gnyi ga 'phyang zhing 'dug go/ de sdug bsngal
zhing 'dug pa dang nye dga' bos smras pa/ bram ze/ ci ste kho bo cag la ltag dbyug gis mi rdeg par lag pa dpyangs te 'dug/ de sma bab nas dregs pa dang / nga rgyal bcag ste cang mi

zer bar 'dug pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams ni/ snying rje med pa ste/ chad pas bcad nas kyang zhe gcod par byed do/ /zhes 'phya bar byed/ smod par byed/ kha zer
bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag lag pa yang gcod
du 'jug pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis lag pa dang / rkang pa dag gcad par mi bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /skyes bu
gti mug can nye dgas dge sbyong gi las ma yin pa byas te/ dge slong dag/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba rnams las de lta bu byed du 'jug pa de ni/ mdzes pa ma yin/ 'tsham pa ma yin
no| |de lta bas na/ dge slong gis lag pa dang / rkang pa dag gcad par mi bya'o/ /gcod par byed na/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag/ the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad
gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bram ze de/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos ni/ bsrungs/ nye dgas ni/ yongs su btang ba la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang dga' bos ni/ bsrungs/ nye dgas ni/ btang ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba
skyed mos tshal/ shing sna tshogs kyi tshal gyis brgyan pa/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig na drang srong 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba
dang | chu za zhing 'thung ba/ g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun gyon pa zhig gnas te/ de shing bil ba'i drung na 'dug cing rang gi don sems par byed do/ /de'i steng nas spre'u zhig gis pil
ba'i 'bras bu zhig 'phangs pa des drang srong de'i mgo snad nas des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod med 'gyur ba gang yin pa/ /de ni kho bo mi byed kyi/ /khyod med 'gyur ba gang yin
pa| |de ni khyod nyid byed cing 'jug/ drang srong de'i smon 'drin rngon pa zhig 'dug pa de/ ri dwags 'chor du song ba las/ bsti gnas der phyin to/ /drang srong de ni/ bya ba 'ga' zhig gi
phyir shing bil ba'i drung de nas gzhan zhig tu song ngo / /rngon pa de de mi snang nas te por lta zhing shing bil ba de'i drung na 'dug go /spre'u des rngon pa de'i mgor bil ba'i 'bras bu gcig
'phangs pa dang / rngon pa de spyi cer zhig pas/ de'i klad pa snad nas bil ba'i 'bras bus bsnun pas bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde bas gyen du blta bar brtsams pa dang / ji
tsam na spre'u mthong nas de khros pas gzhu rna drung du bkang ste dug mda' gcig de'i gnad du bsnun pa dang / sa la lhung nas dus las 'das so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i

tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong dga' bo 'di nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi spre'u gang yin pa de ni/ bram ze 'di nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rngon pa gang yin pa de ni/ nye
dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe yang 'di dga' bos ni/ bsrungs la/ nye dgas ni/ yongs su btang ngo / /da ltar yang dga' bos ni/ bsrungs la/ nye dgas ni/ yongs su btang ngo / /sdom ni/ rigs
ngan dang ni 'char kar bcas/ /snam sbyar dang ni brnyas pa dang / /mtshams bzang dang ni bzang sbyin dang / /bdag gis 'du shes lhung bzed blangs/ /ma pham pa dang zla srung gi /rang gi btsos bu'i
ras brkus pa'o/ /sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni/ phas pham pa gnyis las ji skad 'byung ba de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar bar bya ste/ khyad par cung zad kyang med do/ /sdom ni/ phag dang bu ram
shing dang ni/ /ta la chos gos gnag dga' bo/ /spra tshil gyis ni byugs pa'i snod/ /mching bu'i phor ba sbom dga' mo'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mu ge'i dus la bab nas ma byin par len pa rnams kyis phag dag cig brkus te tshal stug po'i nang du dong ste/ der de dag
gis de bsad do/ /bsad nas sha bzang po rnams zos te mgo dang / rus thogs dang / sug pa rnams bor ro/ /drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ nang par sngar langs nas khang pa'i steng
'dzegs te phyogs bzhir lta zhing / de dag gis gang na dud pa 'thul ba dang / bya rgod lding ba dag mthong ba der thams cad 'dus te 'dong bas/ nang par sngar
langs nas khang pa'i steng du 'dzegs te phyogs bzhir blta bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na tshal stug po'i nang na dud pa dang / bya rgod lding ba mthong nas smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga'/
tshal gyi nang na dud pa 'thul zhing bya rgod lding bas/ gal te cung zad rnyed kyang srid pas 'dong ngo / /de dag myur ba myur bar dong ba dang / phag gi mgo bo dang / rus thogs dang / sug
pa bor ba dag mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga'/ phyag dar lta bu zhig rnyed kyi/ btsos te bza' bar bya'o/ /de dag gis bsdus nas 'tshed pa na/ phag bdag rnams
tshol zhing der lhags pa dang / ji tsam na drug sde rnams/ phag sha 'tshed pa mthong ste/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /drang srong gi rgyal mtshan yang thogs la/ bya ba 'di lta
bu yang byed dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang / kho bo cag srog gcod du rung na lta/ bdag cag gis ri dwags bzang po bzang po dag bsad nas sha bzang po dag bza' mi nus
sam ci/ ci'i phyir kho bo cag mgo dang / rus pa dang / sug pa dag bsdus nas 'tshod/ ma byin par len pa 'ga' zhig gis brkus te zos nas bor ba 'di dag kho bo cag gis
phyag dar bor ba lta bu blangs bar zad do/ /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gal te de lta na/ 'on kyang 'di ltar khyed rab tu byung ba yin pas/ 'di ni/ 'tsham pa ma yin no/ /zhes zer
ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ dge slong gis de lta bu'i phyag dar blang par mi bya'o/ /blangs
na| 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ma byin par len pa
rnams kyis bu ram gyi shing dag brkus te zos nas de rtsa ba dang / thor to ro chung ba dag bor ba dang / drug sde rnams phan tshun 'phyan zhing phyogs der phyin pa dang / de dag gis mthong nas
smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga'/ phyag dar lta bu 'di rnyed kyi/ blang bar bya'o/ /de dag dis blang bar brtsams pa na/ bu ram shing srung ba dag tshol zhing der lhags pa dang / ji tsam na drug ste
rnams/ bu ram shing gi rtsa ba dang / thor to ro chung ba dag len pa dag mthong nas des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ drang srong gi rgyal mtshan yang thogs la/ 'di lta bu'i sdig pa'i las
kyang byed dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang / gal te bdag cag ma byin par len du rung na lta/ bdag cag gis bdams shing bdams nas bu ram shing bzang po'am/ gzhan nor bu
dang / mu tig la sogs pa rin po che dbrog par mi nus sam ci/ ma byin par len pa 'ga' zhig gis brkus te zos nas da gzod kho bo cag gis rtsa ba dang / rtse
mo ro chung ba dag bsdus par zad do/ /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gal te de lta na/ 'on kyang 'di ltar khyed rab tu byung ba yin pas/ 'di ni/ 'tsham pa ma yin no/ /de dag cang mi zer
bar 'dug nas skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ dge slong gis de lta bu'i phyag dar blang bar
mi bya'o/ /dge slong de lta bu'i phyag dar len na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ma byin pa len pa rnams kyis shing ta la'i 'bras bu dag brkus nas nags stug po'i nang du khyer nas bdams shing bdams te zos te snyigs ma dag bor ba dang /
drug sde rnams phan tshun 'khyams pa las phyogs der phyin nas de dag gis de mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga'/phyag dar lta bu 'di rnyed kyi/ bsdu bar bya'o/ /de rnams kyis de
bsdu bar brtsams pa na/ shing ta la'i srung ma tshol zhing der son pa dang / ji tsam na drug sde rnams shing rta la'i mgo thogs dang / snyigs ma dag sdud pa mthong nas des smras pa/ 'phags
pa| drang srong gi rgyal mtshan yang thogs la/ 'di lta bu'i sdig pa'i las kyang byed dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang / gal te kho bo cag ma byin par len du rung na lta/ bdams shing
bdams te shing ta la'i 'bras bu bzang po dag dang / gzhan yang nor bu dang / mu tig la sogs pa rin po che dag dbrog par mi nus sam ci/ ma byin par len pa 'ga' zhig gis 'di dag brkus
pa las kho bo cag gis nyal nyil bsdus par zad do/ /des smras pa/ gal te de lta na yang 'di ltar khyed rab tu byung ba yin pas/ 'di ni/ 'tsham pa ma yin no/ /de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug nas
skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis de lta bu'i phyag dar blang bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong gis de lta bu'i phyag
dar blangs na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan

yod na spos tshong gi khye'u zhig 'dug pa de la/ lwa ba bzang po zhig bdog nas de de la shin tu chags so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na/ na bar gyur pa dang lwa ba de la ji lta bar dbyig dag la ni mya ngan mi

byed do/ /de rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman dag byas kyang phan par ma gyur te/ des gang gi tshe lus kyi gnas skabs shes pa de'i tshe/ nye du rnams bsags te
smras pa/ gang gi tshe kho bo shi bar gyur na de'i tshe khyed cag gis ma bsregs par 'on kyang lwa ba 'dis dkris nas 'or cig/ de dag gis de dbugs phyung ste smras pa/ ji
snyed nad kyis btab pa thams cad 'chi'am ci/ sos par 'gyur bas ma 'jigs shig/ de tshe zad pa zhig pas rim gro dang / gsos byas kyang ma phan te shi nas lwa ba la lhag par chags pas/
yi dwags wa ba can rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /de nye du rnams kyis gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag gis khyogs brgyan nas lwa ba de nyid kyis dkris te dur khrod du
bor ba dang / de dge slong dag gis mthong nas de dag gis dge slong dur khrod pa gnag dga' bo/ /zhes bya ba de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ spos tshong gi khye'u zhig shi ba de/ nye du dag gis
lwa bas dkris nas dur khrod du bor gyi/ song la phyag dar khrod longs shig/ de myur ba myur bar dur khrod du song nas lwa ba blangs pa dang / mi ma yin pa des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gnag dga'
bo/ bdag gi lwa ba ma snams shig/ dur khrod pa phal cher snying stobs can yin pas des de la smras pa/ bkren pa/ khyod lwa ba 'di la lhag par chags pas/ yi dwags wa ba can rnams kyi nang du
skyes na/ da yang ci dmyal bar skye 'dod dam/ thong zhig ces byas nas/ 'on kyang des ma btang ngo / /de lhag par chags pas/ des de la rdog pas bsnyun nas bshus te des de khyer nas
rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /de yang cho nges 'debs shing de'i phyi bzhin du 'brangs te 'phags pa/ gnag dga' bo/ /lwa ba 'o ni stsol cig/ ces byas na/ de khyad du bsad de rgyal byed kyi tshal
du song ba dang / rgyal byed kyi tshal na sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dag 'dug pas/ dbang chu ngur gags pas nang du 'jug ma nus nas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo
na cho nges 'debs shing 'dug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa yin pas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo/ ci'i phyir
rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na mi ma yin pa ngu / des gsol pa/ btsun pa gnag dga' bos de'i lwa ba blangs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ mi ma yin pa 'di chags pa de lta bus ngu ste/
gal te lwa ba ma thob na/ khrag dron du skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do/ /snyam du dgongs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/
song la dge slong gnag dga' bo la mi ma yin pa 'di la lwa ba byin cig/ gal te 'di la lwa ba ma byin na/ gdon mi za bar 'di khrag dron du skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe byin pa

de'i tshe yang mdun du song zhig ces smra bar bya'o/ /gang gi tshe dur khrod du son pa de'i tshe yang nyol cig ces brjod par bya zhing / gang gi tshe nyal ba de'i tshe de'i steng du dgab par bya'o/ /zhes gyis
shig/ btsun pa/ de ltar 'tshal lo/ /zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas tshe dang ldan pa gnag dga' bo ga la ba der song
ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa gnag dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gnag dga' bo/ shes par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas/ mi ma yin pa 'di la lwa ba byin cig/

gal te 'di la lwa ba ma byin na/ gdon mi za bar khrag dron du skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe byin pa de'i tshe yang mdun du song zhig ces brjod par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe dur khrod du phyin pa
de'i tshe yang nyol cig/ ces brjod par bya zhing / gang gi tshe nyal ba de'i tshe de'i steng du dgab par bya'o/ /zhes de skad bka' stsal to/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji
skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo song ba dang / gnag dga' bos mi ma yin pa de la smras pa/ gal te khyod lwa ba 'dod na/ mdun du song zhig dang sbyin no//
de mdun du song ba dang yang smras pa/ gal te khyod lwa ba 'dod na/ nyol cig ces byas pa dang / de nyal nas de'i steng du bkab bo/ /mi ma yin pas kyang de la rdog pas bsnun pa dang / de stobs
dang ldan pa yin pas des mnags so/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams la bsnyad pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag

gya tsom du ro'i gos blang ba'am sbyin par mi bya'i/ len na/ des rkang pa'i mtha' nas mgo bo'i mthar song ste blang bar bya'o/ /gang zhig sbyin pa des kyang mgo'i mtha' nas rkang pa'i mthar song ste sbyin

par bya'o/ /dge slong dag /ro'i gos la nyes dmigs lnga yod do/ /lnga gang zhe na/ kha dog ngan pa dang / dri mi zhim pa dang / rnying pa dang / shig mang ba dang / gnod sbyin mi srun pa mang ba'o/ /'on kyang

phyag dar khrod pas ji srid du rma ma phyung ba de srid du ro'i gos blang bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rma ma phyung bar shi ba'i gos blang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis khyi
khrid de dong ba dang / ma dad pa dag gis mthong nas 'phags pa/ khyod ci ste khyi khrid nas dgon par 'dong / /ci srog gcod par byed dam zhes kha zer bar byed pa dang / de dag gis lan gzhan du
glan no/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyi khrid de 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /de dag gis mtshon gyis rma phyung ste blangs

pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshon gyis rma phyung ste blang bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang gang gi tshe srin bu phre'u dang / grog mas zos kyang rung / de'i tshe blang bar bya'o/ /de dag gis
blangs te de bzhin du gyon nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du bgo bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang zhag bdun nam/ brgyad du dben par bzhag la/ gang gi tshe rlung dang / nyi mas
gdungs par gyur pa de'i tshe bkrus nas btsos la bgo bar bya'o/ /de dag gis gos de bgos te gtsug lag khang du 'jug cing mchod rten dag la phyag 'tshal bar byed
nas skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas dge slong ngur khrod pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong
dur khrod pas ro'i gos bgos te gtsug lag khang du 'gro bar mi bya/ mchod rten la phyag 'tshal bar mi bya/ de ste phyag byed na yang 'dom gang 'khor yug las nye bar 'gro bar mi bya/ gnas
khang la longs spyad par mi bya/ gnas mal la yang 'dug par mi bya/ dge slong gi nang du 'dug par mi bya/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'ong zhing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par mi bya/
bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/ gal te 'gro na yang sgor bsdad par bya'o/ /gal te 'phags pa nang du gshegs zhes zer na/ bdag ni/ dur khrod pa'o/ /zhes
smra bar bya'o/ /ci ste 'phags pa/ gal te khyed lta bu sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs te 'jug pa dag khyim gyi nang du byon na/ bdag gis rnyed pa dag legs par rnyed ma lags
sam zhes zer na/ nang du 'gro bar bya zhing / stan la ni/ 'dug par mi bya'o/ /gal te 'phags pa gdan la bzhugs shig ces zer na/ bdag ni/ dur khrod pa'o/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /
ci ste 'phags pa/ gal te khyod lta bu sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs te 'dug pa dag/ stan dang khyim la yongs su longs spyod na/ bdag gis rnyed pa dag legs par rnyed pa ma lags sam
zhes zer na/ der 'dug par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /dge slong dur khrod pas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te mi 'jug na/ 'gal tshabs can
du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams gri dang / khab dag bab col
du 'jog pas de dag btsas zos nas skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bab col du gzhag par mi bya'i/ 'on
kyang snod du gzhag par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis snod du gzhag par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis snod ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ ras la spra tshil gyis byugs nas der khab dang / gri dag gzhug par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong ma sbom dga' mo zhes bya ba de la mching phor zhig yod do/ /ji tsam na dge slong ma gzhan zhig skom pas nyam thag ste chu 'thung 'dod
nas de de'i drung du song nas smras pa/ 'phags ma/ skom ste chu btung gi/ mching phor g.yor cig/ des smras pa/ 'di ni 'dug gi/ longs la song zhig/ des blangs
te song ba dang / lag nas lhung ste chag nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /dus gzhan zhig na sbom dga' mos de dran nas de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ 'phags ma/ mching phor bsnams
pa de stsol cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags ma/ 'tshal na/ 'on kyang lag nas lhung ste chag gi/ gzhan zhig nyos te dbul lo/ /des smras pa/ de nyid byin cig/ ces des de ring zhig tu gtses/
te btang ngo / /skabs de/ dge slong ma dag gis dge slong rnams la bsnyad do/ /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs
gang cung zad byung ba ni/ mching phor nas chu 'thung ba las gyur gyi/ de'i phyir dge slong mas mching phor du chu btung bar mi bya'o/ /snyam du mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/
nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong ma dag mching phor nas chu 'thung ba las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong mas mching phor nas chu btung bar mi bya zhing / gzhan yang
btung ba dang / bza' bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong ma mching phor nas chu'am/ gzhan du yang rung / 'thung ngam/ za na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sdom ni/ ri mo'i mkhar lan me dang
ni| |khrus dang 'gag dang lhung bzed kyi/ /lhag rol ma yin lhung bzed gzhir/ /rkang pa mi gzhag lham dag go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la rgyal byed kyi tshal phul ba de'i tshe/ de'i blo skyes pa/ 'dir ri mo ma bris
pas mi sdug ste/ de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ 'dir ri mo bri'o/ /snyam du rig nas de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gis rgyal byed
kyi tshal 'dir ri mo ma bris pas mi sdug ste/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis 'dir ri mo bri bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag/ de lta
bas na/ gnang gi/ ri mo bris shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ri mo bris shig ces bka' stsal nas des tshon rtsi dag kyang bsags/ ri mo mkhan rnams kyang bos te smras pa/ shes ldan dag/
bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang gi/ de'i phyir tshon 'di dag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal ri mo bris shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag/ ri mo bri na phyogs gang du ci zhig bri ba gsungs shig/
des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ bdag gis mi shes kyi/ sdod cig dang bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/ /de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag/ legs te/ de bzhin du
mdzod cig dang sdod do/ /de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshon rtsi dag kyang bsags/ ri mo mkhan rnams kyang
bos na/ de dag gi mchid nas khyim bdag/ phyogs gang du ci zhig bri ba smros shig/ ces mchi na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste phyogs gang du ci zhig
bri ba bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag/ gal te de lta na/ song la re zhig phyi sgor gnod sbyin lag na dbyug thogs 'brir bcug nas sgo khang du ni/
cho 'phrul chen po dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa/ khyams su ni/ skyes pa'i rabs kyi phreng ba/ dri gtsang khang gi sgor ni/ gnod sbyin lag na phreng ba thogs pa dag/ rim gro'i khang
par ni/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag chos rnam par gtan la 'bebs par byed pa/ bkad sar ni/ gnod sbyin lag na zas thogs pa dag/ mdzod kyi sgor ni/ gnod sbyin
lag na lcags kyu thogs pa dag/ chu'i khang par ni/ klu lag na bum pa thogs pa/ brgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag/ khrus khang ngam/ bsro khang du ni/ lha'i mdo las 'byung ba'am/
gzhan dmyal ba'i rabs/ nad pa'i sman khang du ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nad g.yog mdzad pa/ chab khung sar ni/ dur khrod shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/ gnas gang gi sgor ni/ rus pa'i keng rus dang
mgo'i thod pa bri'o/ /btsun pa/ de ltar 'tshal lo/ /zhes khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas thams cad de kho na bzhin du 'brir bcug go /gang gi tshe khyim
bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal ri mo bris pa de'i tshe dge slong shes bzhin med par gnas pa kha cig gis der me bus pas/ du bas ri mo ma rung bar gyur nas skabs de/ dge slong
rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ ngas me'i khang pa gnang gi/ dge slong gang zhig la me dgos pa des/ me'i khang
par me 'bud par bya'i/ khang bzang du ni ma yin no/ /khang bzang du me 'bud na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis me'i khang par me 'bud par bya'i/ khang bzang du ni
ma yin no/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong gzhan nad pa dag cig 'khod pa de dag mes phongs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad pa gang dag mes phong pa de dag
gis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol lam/ rdzing drung du me bus la mdag ma du ba med pa nang du gzhag par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams khang bzang du khrus byed pas ri mo byed nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ khang bzang du khrus mi bya'i/ 'on kyang rdzing gi gra gcig tu ston pa'i spyan sngar ma bab pa'am/ khrus kyi khang pa byas nas der khrus
bya'o/ /'dam du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs der so phag gi bcal 'gram par bya'o/ /chu 'khyil nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu'i gtor khung
gdod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chu'i stor khung gdod par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / chu'i stor khung gi kha 'gag par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dus
dus su bsal bar bya zhing / chu'i stor khung gi kha nyid du khrus bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
so| |mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gi bu na bar gyur nas de'i sman pa'i drung du song ste smras pa/ bkra shis par gyur cig /bkra shis par gyur cig /sman pas smras pa/ jo bo/ ci bzhed gsungs
shig /des smras pa/ kye dge ba cung zad kyang mi 'dod mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo'i bu nad 'di dang 'dis thebs kyi/ sman ston cig /sman pa de dad pa can zhig pas des smras pa/ bram ze/
'phags pa rnams kyi drung du bzhud la/ lhung bzed kyi chu bslangs te de khrus shig dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /des bram ze bkra shis par gyur cig ces smras nas chas te rgyal byed kyi tshal

du song ngo / /drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis/ rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stong pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag pa des/
bram ze de mthong nas smras pa/ bram ze chen po/ 'ongs pa legs so/ /'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod zla ba lta bu gnas pa yin na/ ring mo zhig ste ga las 'ongs/ 'phags pa/ phyag 'tshal lo/ /
ring mo zhig ste mthong ba ni/ legs te/ yang dang yang du mthong bas ni/ brnyas par 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/ 'phags pa/ bdag gi bu bro tshabs chen po zhig gis thebs te/ de la
sman pas 'phags pa rnams kyi thad nas lhung bzed kyi chu bslangs te des bkrus dang / sos par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bstan nas/ bdag lhung bzed kyi chu bslang ba'i slad du 'dir mchis kyi/ stsol
cig /des smras pa/ khyod ko lhung bzed kyi chu'i phyir 'dir 'ongs pa lta/ 'phags pa/ de lta lags te/ dgos pa ni/ de mchis so/ /gal te de lta na/ sdod cig dang / kho bos lhung bzed kyi chu blang

ngo| |zhes byas nas de nang du song ngo / /des zan zos nas lhung bzed bkrus te der rus pa dang / sha'i kham tshad dang / nya'i gra ma dang / 'bras chan gyi brul ma dang / phye dang / tshod shol dang / khur
ba cung zad cig blugs so/ /de nas phyir byung nas smras pa/ bram ze/ lhung bzed kyi chu 'di re/ khyer cig /bram zes mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gi bu gum bla'i/ chu 'di lta bu
mi gtsang bas khrus bgyid pa ni/ mi rung ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas smras pa/ khyod dad pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pas khyod kyi bu sos zin du zad do/ /bram ze de 'phya ba la
zhugs nas skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag lhung bzed nas
lhag rol 'dor ba las gyur gyi/ de'i phyir dge slong gi lhung bzed nas lhag rol dor bar mi bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs te dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ dge
slong gis lhung bzed nas lhag rol dor bar mi bya'o/ /dor na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang ngas dge slong gis lhung bzed kyi chu sbyin par byed pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca'
bar bya ste/ dge slong lhung bzed kyi chu sbyin par byed pas lhung bzed lan gsum bkrus te/ lhung bzed kyi chu la gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bsngags nas sbyin par
bya'o/ /dge slong lhung bzed kyi chu sbyin par byed pas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te mi 'jug na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong dag lhung bzed kyi gzhi la rkang pa bzhag ste zan za ba bram
ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni/ gtsang sbra med pa ste/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi la rkang pa bzhag ste zan za'o/ /zhes bya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams
kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni/ thog tu bab bo/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong
gis lhung bzed kyi gzhi la rkang pa bzhag ste zan bza' bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong lhung bzed kyi gzhi la rkang pa bzhag ste zan za na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/ /dge slong dag lham ma phud par zan za ba bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas shAkya'i bu'i dge slong
rnams ni/ gtsang sbra med pa ste/ lham ma phud par zan za'o/ /zhes 'phya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
slong dag /bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni/ thog tu bab bo/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis lham ma phud par zan bza' bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong lham ma phud par zan za na/ 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lham ma phud par zan za bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag gis lham phud de zan bza' bar brtsams pa dang
de dag na bar gyur ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis
ni/ ma phud par zan bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sdom ni/ lhung bzed med dang grags pa dang / /dbyar gnas pa dang gnas med dang / /lo lnga rnyed pa gcig pa dang / /glo
dang rgyab dang rked pa mgo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /nye dga' bos gcig cig
rab tu phyung ba de la snga nas lhung bzed nye bar ma bzhag go /ji tsam na dge slong rnams zas kyi dus la bab ste rang rang gi lhung bzed bkrus nas lhung bzed kyi gzhi la bzhag ste mchod rten la
phyag 'tshal du dong ba dang / des bsam pa/ lhung bzed 'di dag mang mo zhig 'dug pas/ gdon mi za bar gang gis ji ltar blangs pa des zos shing zos nas 'di nyid du 'jog go /de
lta bas na/ re zhig bdag gis kyang blangs la slar gzhag go /snyam nas des gnas brtan kun shes ko'u di n+ya'i lhung bzed blang bar brtsams pa dang / gzhan zhig gis de la smras
pa| tshe dang ldan pa/ lhung bzed 'di ni/ gnas brtan kun shes ko'u di n+ya'i yin gyi/ 'di ma len cig /des de bzhag nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / bzang po dang / rlangs pa dang / ming
chen dang / gang po dang / dri ma med pa dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzang dang / dge slong gzhan dag gcig gi lhung bzed dag blang bar brtsams pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe
dang ldan pa/ khyod la lhung bzed med na/ lhung bzed med pa khyod sus rab tu byung / des smras pa/ mkhan po nye dgas so/ /dge slong rnams 'phya bar byed de/ gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa de ma
yin pa gzhan su zhig lhung bzed med pa rab tu 'byin ces zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
gis lhung bzed med pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya ste/ rab tu 'byin na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /rab tu 'byin par byed pas yo byad drug gis mi brel bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ re zhig dge slong dag gis lhung bzed med pa zhig bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyid na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes brjod par
bgyi'am/ nye bar 'khor/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong dag gis lhung bzed chung ngu'am/
lhung bzed chen po'am/ lhung bzed skya bos bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyid na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ nye bar 'khor/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs
par byed pa rnams ni/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe chom rkun par grags pa zhig rkun po byed pa tshor nas des bzung ba dang brkus pa bor nas bros so/ /de lam gyi ngal bas dub nas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi
lam ga shing zhig gi drung na lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan
yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir chas pa des de mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod su'i/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag ni/ mgon med pa zhig ste/ bdag la ci yang ma mchis so//
des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / gal te de lta na/ ci ste rab tu mi 'byung / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod rab tu byung ba lags pas re zhig drang por smra bar bgyi ste/ bdag ni/ chom
rkun par grags pa lags na/ su zhig bdag rab tu 'byin/ bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ni/ thugs rjes rab tu phye ba yin pas/ su zhig rab tu mi 'byin/ sems rton cig
dang ngas rab tu dbyung ngo / /'phags pa/ legs te/ rab tu 'byung ngo / /des de rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang / ri dwags kyis ri dwags mi sos
kyi| mnyan yod rgya chen por rang gi spyod yul pha yul du bsod snyoms la rgyus la 'tsho bar gyis shig /de snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod
snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis ngo shes nas de na kha cig na re/ shes ldan dag /'di ni/ chom rkun par grags pa de yin/
na| rab tu byung ngo / /zhes zer/ gzhan dag na re/ dge sbyong shAkya'i bu pa rnams kyi chos ni/ bzang ste/ chom rkun par grags pa yang rab tu 'byin par byed do/ /'di dag ni/ nyin mo bsod
snyoms pa'i cha byad kyis khyim dag tu glags bcad nas nub mo rkur 'ong ngo / /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag chom rkun par grags pa rab tu 'byin pa las gyur te/ de'i phyir dge slong gis chom rkun par grags pa rab tu dbyung bar mi
bya'o| /snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni/ thog tu bab po/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis chom rkun par grags
pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis chom rkun par grags pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis chom rkun pa yin par
mngon pa med pa dag kyang rab tu ma phyung bas de dag gis rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge
slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chom rkun pa yin par mngon pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'i/ mngon pa med pa ni/ rab tu dbyung
bar bya'o/ /de lta bas na/ gang yang rung ba zhig gi drung du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa zhig nye bar 'ongs na/ des de la chom rkun par grags pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /ma dris par rab tu
'byin na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po nyi shu pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe gnas shig na/ dge slong mang po zhig gcig cig la gnas bcas te 'dug pa las ji tsam na/ de dag gi gnas kyi
slob dpon de dus las 'das pa dang / de dag gis su zhig la bdag cag gi 'phral gyi bya ba zhu bar bya ba dang / gang la gnas bcas te 'dug par bya ba mi shes nas skabs de/ dge slong rnams
la bsnyad do/ /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de dag gis dge slong zhig las su bsko ba spang ba dang / gnas

khang spang ba dang / mal stan spang ba dang / rim gro pa spang bas btsal bar bya ste/ ci ste rnyed na/ de lta na legs/ ci ste ma rnyed na/ dge slong de dag gis gnas der gso sbyong gnyis pa'i bar du 'dug par
mi bya ste/ 'dug na/ 'gal chabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gzhan dag cig gnas shig tu gnas kyi slob dpon gcig cig dang dbyar gnas par khas blang bar 'dod pa las/ de dag gi
gnas kyi slob dpon de yang dus las 'das nas de dag gis kyang ji ltar sgrub pa mi shes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ dge slong de dag gis kyang dge slong zhig /las su bsko ba spang ba dang / gnas khang spang ba dang / mal stan spang ba dang / rim gro pa spang bas btsal bar bya ste/ gal te rnyed na/ de lta na
legs/ ci ste ma rnyed na/ dge slong de dag gis gnas der dbyar snga mar gnas par dam bca' bar mi bya ste/ gnas par dam 'cha' na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ dge slong gzhan
dag cig gnas shig tu gnas kyi slob dpon gcig cig dang dbyar snga mar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ de dag gi slob dpon de yang dus las 'das nas/ de dag gis kyang ji ltar sgrub pa
mi shes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de dag gis kyang dge slong zhig /las su bsko ba spang
pa dang / gnas khang spang ba dang / mal stan spang ba dang / rim gro pa spang bas btsal bar bya ste/ gal te rnyed na/ de lta na legs/ ci ste ma rnyed na/ dge slong de dag
gis der gnas par mi bya'i/ gzhan du song la dbyar nye bar sbyor ba gnyis par dbyar gnas par khas blang bar bya'o/ /der gnas na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gzhan dag
cig gnas shig tu gnas kyi slob dpon gcig cig dang dbyar gnas par khas blang bar 'dod pa las/ de dag gi gnas kyi slob dpon de yang dus las 'das nas de dag gis kyang ji ltar
sgrub pa mi shes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de dag gis kyang dge slong zhig las su bsko

ba spang ba dang / gnas khang spang ba dang / mal stan spang ba dang / rim gro pa spang bas bcal bar bya ste/ gal te rnyed na/ de bstan legs/ ci ste ma rnyed na/ dge slong de dag gis der dbyar phyi mar
gnas par dam bca' bar mi bya ste/ gnas par dam 'cha' na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gzhan dag cig gnas shig tu gnas kyi slob dpon gcig cig dang dbyar
phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa las de dag gi slob dpon de yang dus las 'das nas de dag gis kyang ji ltar sgrub pa mi shes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de dag gis zla ba gnyis kyi bar du gcig la gcig dri zhing so sor brtags pas gnas par bya'o/ /zla ba gnyis 'das
nas dge slong zhig las su bsko ba spang ba dang / gnas khang spang ba dang / mal cha spang ba dang / rim gro pa spang bas btsal bar bya ste/ gal te rnyed na/ de lta na legs/ ci ste ma rnyed na/
dge slong de dag gis gnas der gso sbyong gnyis pa'i bar du 'dug par mi bya ste/ 'dug na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gzhan dag cig gnas shig tu dge slong gcig cig
gis rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa las/ de dag gi mkhan po de dus las 'das pa dang / de dag gis kyang ji ltar sgrub pa mi shes zhes bya ba thams cad slob dpon la ji lta bar
snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ri bor zhig na khyim bdag
cig gnas pa des gtsug lag khang byed du bcug ste yo byad thams cad kyis bkang nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ khyim bdag de rgyal
po'i pho brang du bzung ba dang / dge slong rnams kyis thos so/ /de dag gis thos nas gtsug lag khang bor te bros pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor ma byin par len pa rnams kyis
brkus so/ /ji tsam na khyim bdag de slar btang ste/ dge slong rnams kyis gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de ji ltar slar btang bar thos nas de dag khyim de'i drung
du song ba dang / khyim bdag des ji ltar dge slong dag gtsug lag khang bor te bros nas dkon mchog gi dkor ma byin par len pa rnams kyis brkus pa snga nas thos pas/ des de dag
skyengs pa/ 'phags pa/ khyed ci'i phyir bros/ de dag gis smras pa/ kho bo cag gis khyod rgyal po'i pho brang du ji ltar bzung ba thos te thos nas/ de nas bdag cag skrag ste bros so/ /'phags
pa dag /gal te bdag rgyal po'i pho brang du bzung yang khyed ka ci'i slad du 'bros/ bdag gi nye du dag ni/ ma bzung na/ ci/ de dag kyang khyed kyi yo byad sbyor bar mi 'gyur ram/ de dag spobs
pa med par cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin 'bros par mi bya'i/
'on kyang gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i nye du dag la/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po ni/ rgyal po'i khab tu bzung na/ ci/ khyed kyis bdag cag gi bsod snyoms kyi yo byad sbyar nus sam
zhes dri bar bya ste/ gal te de dag sbyor na/ de lta na legs/ ci ste mi sbyor na/ lo lnga'i bar du bsod snyoms bya zhing 'dug par bya'o/ /lo lnga 'das nas gal te gtsug lag khang gi bdag
por slar btang na/ de lta na legs/ ci ste ma btang na/ gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las byas nas gtsug lag khang de'i nye 'khor gyi gtsug lag khang dag yongs su skyong bar byed pa rnams dang rnyed pa
thun mong dang / gso sbyong tha dad pa dag gis lo gzhan lnga'i bar du 'dug par bya'o/ /las ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ nye 'khor gyi gtsug lag khang dag tu gnas mal bshams te gaN+Di brdungs nas
dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang / dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
gsan du gsol/ gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig gi bdag po rgyal pos bzung ste/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun
gyis gtsug lag khang de/ gtsug lag khang 'di dag dang rnyed pa thun mong dang / gso sbyong tha dad par bgyi'o/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
gsan du gsol/ gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig gi bdag po rgyal pos bzung ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gtsug lag khang de/ gtsug lag khang 'di dag dang rnyed pa thun mong dang / gso
sbyong tha dad par mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gtsug lag khang de/ gtsug lag khang 'di dag dang rnyed pa thun mong dang / gso sbyong tha dad par mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni /cang ma gsungs
shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig rnyed pa thun mong
dang / gso sbyong tha dad par mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /gal te rnam pa des lo bcu'i bar du gnas pa rnams la gtsug lag khang gi bdag po
'ongs na/ de lta na legs/ ci ste ma 'ongs na/ nye 'khor gyi gtsug lag khang dag tu gnas mal dang / snod dang / yo byad dag bzhag nas nang sgo bcad de 'gro bar bya'o/ /gang gi tshe gtsug
lag khang gi bdag po slar btang ba de'i tshe nye 'khor gyi gtsug lag khang dag nas rdzas ji ltar bzhag pa rnams phyir blangs te de nyid du sbyin par bya'o/ /gal te nye 'khor gyi gtsug lag
khang na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis byin na/ de lta na legs/ ci ste ma byin na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams lus kyis khur khyer ba bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya bar byed de/ 'phags pa/ re zhig bdag

cag ni/ khyim pa khyim na gnas pa lags pas pha ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / bran mo dang / bran po dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / rgyal po dang / lha dang / gshin ngog dang / dge
sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyi don du lus kyis khur 'khur 'tshal na/ khyod ko su'i don du khur snom/ de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni /thog tu bab po/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis lus kyis khur bkur
bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong lus kyis khur khyer na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lus kyis khur bkur bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug
sde rnams kyis rgyab dang / rked pa dang / glo dang / mgos khur bkur bar brtsams te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyab kyis ma yin/ rked pas ma
yin/ glos ma yin/ mgos khur bkur bar mi bya ste/ khur na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sdom ni/ gnas dang yo byad drug dang ni/ /de nas de las 'phrog pa dang / /yid gcugs
len pa lnga dang ni/ /btso blag sgo khang 'chag sa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe
bram ze rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / ji tsam na dge slong lag na lhung bzed thogs pa rab tu mang po 'khar gsil thogs nas bsod snyoms la chas pa
de dag des mthong nas des bsam pa/ re zhig de dag gang du 'gro dri'o /snyam nas des de dag la dris pa/ 'phags pa/ gang du bzhud/ de dag gis smras pa/
bram ze/ bsod snyoms la 'gro'o/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ dge slong thams cad bsod snyoms la rgyu'am/ de dag gis smras pa/ bram ze/ dge slong shes nyen can gang dag yin pa de
dag la ni/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams bsod snyoms gtsug lag khang du khyer te 'ongs nas 'bul lo/ /shes nyen med pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ bsod snyoms la 'gro'o/ /des
bsam pa/ dge sbyong shAkya'i bu pa rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ba dang khyad par ci yod kyi/ bdag gis 'dir yang de bzhin du bsod snyoms la 'gro bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /des yang bsam
pa/ re zhig dge slong gzhan zhig la yang ci 'di dag bsod snyoms kho na la gnas te rab tu byung ngam/ 'on te gnas gzhan yang yod dri bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de dge slong zhig gi drung du
song ba dang / des de la 'ongs pa legs zhes bya ba'i kun tu spyod pa kun tu spyad nas smras pa/ bram ze/ khyod gang gi ci'i phyir 'dir 'ongs/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod blta ba kho na'i
phyir 'ongs te/ re zhig khyod ci la gnas nas rab tu byung ba dri'o/ /des smras pa/ bram ze/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyi brtag pa ni/ bzang ste/ 'dug cig dang gtam bya'o/ /bram
ze rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa des/ rkang pa la phyag byas nas de'i mdun du 'dug pa dang / des smras pa/ bram ze/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
la rab tu byung ba/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi gnas sus bcad pa yin no/ /bram ze/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gos rnams kyi nang na phyag dar khrod ni/ rung ba/
rnyed kyang sla ba ste/ de la gnas na/ dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ro/ /zas rnams kyi nang na bsod
snyoms dang / gnas mal rnams kyi nang na shing drung dang / sman rnams kyi nang na bkus te bor ba ni/ rung ba/ rnyed kyang sla ba ste/ de la gnas na/ dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
ba la rab tu byung / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ro/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /bram ze/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la gnas su bcad pa ni/ bzhi po 'di dag yin te/
