la ni/ mig mchi mas gang bar gyur to/ /de so so'i skye bo yin pas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po smre zhing 'dug pa thos nas/ de yang mig mchi mas gang zhing 'dug pa dang / de la khyim tshes kyi
bud med cig gis smras pa/ bu/ mya ngan ma byed cig/ khyod kyi pha de bsod nams byas pas lha yul du song ngo / /khyod la yang phas mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / phu nu bo dang / khyim tshes rnams
bsdus te nor gyi sum cha gcig kyang byin no/ /des bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga 'das nas 'di la byin cig/ ces zer ba ni/ med pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta
bu yin no/ /snyam du rig nas nga de'i phyir mya ngan byed pa ni/ ma yin gyi/ nga'i pha de dka' ba byed byed pas dbang med par mchi ma byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das
kyis kyang pha ma ni/ bu la dka' ba byed de/ snyod pa dang / gso ba dang / skyed pa dang / 'dzam bu gling sna tshogs ston pa yin te/ bu'i phrag pa gcig gis pha blangs shing / gcig shos kyis

ma blangs te lo brgya tshang bar bkur bar byas pa dang / sa chen po 'di la nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUR+Ya dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / dngul dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug
dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / g.yas su 'khyil ba de lta bu'i dbang phyug gi bdag por bzhag kyang 'di tsam gyis/ bus pha dang ma la phan thogs pa dang / lan lon par mi 'gyur gyi/ gang zhig
gis pha ma de dag ma dad pa las dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par len du 'jug/ gzengs bstod par byed/ 'dul bar byed/ 'jog par byed/ rab tu 'jog par byed cing / tshul
khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa/ 'jungs pa gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / shes rab 'chal pa shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par len du 'jug/ gzengs
bstod par byed/ 'dul bar byed/ 'jog par byed/ rab tu 'jog par byed na/ de tsam gyis na/ bus pha ma la phan btags pa dang lan glan par 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang
bcom ldan 'das kyis nga 'das nas de la byin cig ces zer ba ni/ sbyin pa yang ma yin no/ /zhes bkag go /bud med de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom
ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ ngas ni/ khyim pa la dgongs te gsungs pa ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang rab tu byung ba la dgongs pa yin no/ /
khyim pa dag ni/ chags pa dang bcas bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur la/ rab tu byung ba ni/ ma yin no/ /de lta bas na/ de'i phyir khyim pa 'di snyam du/ nga 'das nas 'di la sbyin no/ /snyam du sems
pa ni/ byin pa yin gyi/ rab tu byung ba ni/ ma yin pas blang bar bya zhing / blangs nas kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin longs spyod du yongs su spyad par bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong
zhig gis/ dge slong zhig la chos gos dag bsngos so/ /des de dag bsngos nas dus las 'das pa dang / dge slong de dag gis de khyer nas bsreg tu song ngo / /de'i bar du dge slong des de'i
gnas khang nas de'i chos gos de dag blangs te rang gi gnas khang du bzhag go/ de nas dge slong de dag gis de'i rim gro byas nas gtsug lag khang du log pa dang / dge bskos kyis de'i
gnas khang du brtags na/ ji tsam na lhung bzed dang / chos gos gsum dang / chu tshags mthong nas des rgan pa'i mthar khyar ba dang / de la dge slong de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
pa| khyod kyis de'i chos gos gsum po 'di khyer te 'ongs sam/ de la chos gos rung bar byas pa gzhan yang mang du yod na/ de dag kyang khyer te shog cig /
des smras pa/ de'i gnas khang na ni/ 'dir zad kyi/ gzhan cung zad kyang med do/ /dge slong dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ de'i smos 'drin dge slong che ge mo zhes bya ba de la dris
shig/ des de la dris pa dang / smras pa/ bdag gis khyer te/ des bdag la bsngos so/ /skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ rung bar bya ba'i phyir ngas bsngo bar gnang ste/ gang gis de dag khyer ba de la 'di skad ces gyis shig/ shi ba'i yo byad kyi rnyed pa de dag dge 'dun la
phul la/ rang gi skal bas chog pa gyis shig ces sgos shig/ gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong gzhan zhig gis/ dge slong zhig la chos gos dag bsngos pa dang / gang la
bsngos pa de dus las 'das so/ /dge slong rnams kyis ngur khrod du khyer nas bsregs te slar 'ongs nas de'i chos gos de dag rgan pa'i mthar khyer ba dang / de la dge slong gis smras
pa| tshe dang ldan pa/ 'di dag su'i yin/ des smras pa/ 'di dag ni/ bdag gi lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gis de la bsngos so/ /dge slong dag gis de ji ltar bsgrub pa mi
shes nas skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ rung bar bya ba'i phyir ngas bsngo bar gnang mod
kyi| 'on kyang gang gis bsngos pa de nyid kyi yin no/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge slong zhig la chos gos dag bsngos pa dang / gang la bsngos pa de babs
nas des bsam pa/ bdag la dge slong des chos gos dag bsngos pas/ bdag babs mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag bdag dbang gi/ len du 'gro'o/ /snyam nas de dge slong de'i drung du song ste
des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod kyis chos gos dag bdag la bsngos na/ de dag bdag la stsol cig/ de dge slong dag la brjod pa dang / de dag gis ji ltar bsgrub pa mi shes nas skabs
de| dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong gang kho na la yid brtan te
chos gos dag gtams pa de kho na'i mdun du bsngo ba las gyur gyi/ de'i phyir dge slong gis gang la yid brtan te chos gos dag gtams pa de kho na'i mdun du bsngo bar mi bya'o/ /snyam du
dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis yid brtan zhing chos gos gtams pa de nyid kyi mdun du chos gos bsngo bar mi bya'i/ de'i
mngon sum du bsngo ba ma byas na/ des na/ nyes dmigs der mi 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge slong zhig la chos
gos dag bsngos te gang la bsngos pa de 'thab krol can zhig ste/ rtag tu dge slong dang lhan cig 'thab krol byed pa las/ de gzhan zhig dang 'thab mo byas nas 'gro bar chas pa dang /
gang gis de la chos gos dag bsngos pa des mi btang bar brtsams te tshe dang ldan pa/ ma 'gro zhig/ ces des de bzung ba dang / 'dug tu ma gtub bo/ /des yang dang yang du bzlog pa dang /
de la dge slong zhig gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ 'di ni/ 'thab krol can zhig ste/ rtag tu dge slong rnams la mi bde bar byed pa yin gyi/ thong zhig/ des smras pa/ gzhan gyi phyir
'di mi gtong ba ma yin gyi/ nga nyid kyi chos gos dag 'di la bsngos pas 'di 'dzin to/ /skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ gal te yid brtan pa'i dge slong rgya mtsho'i pha rol na 'dug pa zhig yin na/ de la yid brtan te bsngo ba byas nas gzung bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis gal te yid brtan pa'i dge slong rgya mtsho'i pha rol na 'dug pa zhig yin na/ de la yang chos gos dag bsngo bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong gzhan zhig
gis dge slong yul shin tu thag ring po na 'dug pa zhig la chos gos bsngos te de dus las 'das par gyur pa dang / dge slong des dge slong de ji ltar dus las 'das pa ring zhig lon nas
thos pa dang / dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes so/ /skabs de/ dge slong dag la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe
thos pa de'i tshe gzhan la bsngo bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sdom ni/ mtshams kyi phyi rol 'dug pa yis/ /dad pa mi dbul sbyin mi bya/ /gcig la gcig ni mi bya dang / /
gso sbyong dang ni dgag dbye'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong drug sde dag
mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas kyang dad pa 'bul ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams kyi phyi rol na
gnas pas dad pa dbul bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas dad pa dbul bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong gzhan dag cig mtshams
kyi phyi rol tu song ngo / /de dag chas pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bya ba zhig byung nas drug sde rnams kyis de dag las dad pa blangs so/ /skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las dad pa blang bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams kyi phyi rol na
gnas pas dad pa dbul bar mi bya/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las dad pa blang bar yang mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas bzhin du
gcig la gcig dad pa sbyin par byed de/ dga' bos ni/ nye dga' la/ nye dgas kyang dga' bo la/ 'dun pas ni/ 'char ka la/ 'char kas kyang 'dun pa la/ 'gro mgyogs kyis ni/ nab
so la/ nab sos kyang 'gro mgyogs la dad pa byin pa dang / skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis
gcig la gcig dad pa sbyin par mi bya ste/ byin na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing gso sbyong gi tshe so sor
thar pa'i mdo gdon pa thon cig/ ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas shing gso sbyong la 'dun pa dang / yongs su dag pa 'bul lo/ /skabs de/ dge
slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas gso sbyong la 'dun pa dang / yongs su dag pa dbul
bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas gso sbyong la 'dun pa dang / yongs su dag pa dbul bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong gzhan dag cig
mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ngo / /de dag chas pa dang / dge 'dun gso sbyong bya bar bzhed nas 'dus pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis de dag las 'dun pa dang / yongs su dag pa blangs so/ /skabs
de| dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las 'dun pa dang / yongs su dag pa blang bar mi bya'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas dad pa dang yongs su dag pa dbul bar mi bya/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa blang bar yang mi bya'o/ /
zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas bzhin du gcig la gcig dad pa sbyin par byed de/ dga' bos ni/ nye dga' la/ nye dgas kyang dga' bo la/ 'dun
pas ni/ 'char ka la/ 'char kas kyang 'dun pa la/ 'gro mgyogs kyis ni/ nab so la/ nab sos kyang 'gro mgyogs la dad pa byin pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis gcig la gcig gso sbyong gi dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa sbyin par mi bya'o/ /dge slong gis gcig la
gcig gso sbyong gi dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa sbyin na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gnas
par khas blangs pa'i dge slong gis gnas gsum po mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dogs pas dgag dbye bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa/ drug sde dag mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas shing
dgag dbye'i dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa 'bul ba rgyas par thams cad gso sbyong bzhin no/ /sdom ni/ dge slong bgrang bar bya ba dang / tshul shing dag dang gang 'dod dang / /stan gcig
khyim na gnas pa dang / /dge tshul gsar bu mi 'dug pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
so/ /mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de bya ba cung zad cig la phyir byung nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / de re zhig 'di na dge slong du zhig gnas dri'o/ /snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes
nas des dge slong rnams la dris pa/ 'phags pa dag /'di na dge slong du zhig gnas/ de dag gis smras pa/ bram ze/ ma shes so/ /bram zes smras pa/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal po
gsal rgyal gyi khrom gyi ru'i grangs kyang shes na/ khyed kyis dge slong dag mi shes pa lta/ de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / bram ze de song ngo / /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bgrang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag bgrang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal
pa dang / dge slong dag gis gcig ces bya ba la sogs pas bgrangs pa dang / phyis brjed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gcig ces bya ba la sogs pas bgrang bar mi bya'o/
dge slong dag gis sor mos 'dzugs shing bgrang na/ 'on kyang brjed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mos gzugs shing bgrang bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
dag gcig ces bya ba la sogs pas bgrang bar mi bya/ sor mos btsugs shing bgrang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar bgrang ba ma shes so/ /skabs de/
dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul shing brim par bya zhing brims nas bgrang bar bya/ bgrangs nas dge 'dun la dge
slong 'di snyed do/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul shing brim par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis nyi ma'am/ zla ba'am/ lo gang la brim pa mi
shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyar nye bar gtod pa'i tshe tshul shing brim par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag bgrang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa
dang / mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gnas pa de dus dus su rgyal byed kyi tshal du nye bar 'ongs te/ des de na dge slong dag/ bsam gtan dang / 'don pa dang /
yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa mthong nas de dag gi spyod lam dang / spyod pa dang / sgrub pa des mngon par dad de/ des bsam pa/ re zhig 'di na dge slong ji snyed cig yod pa
dris la phyis spyan drangs te bshos gsol lo/ /snyam nas des dge slong rnams la dris pa/ 'phags pa/ dge slong ji snyed cig bzhugs/ dge slong dag gis smras pa/ 'di snyed cig go/
des rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song nas rang gi khyim du phyin te nang mi la smras pa/ sang kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol gyi/ khyed kyis dge slong 'di
snyed cig gi bshos sbyor cig /de dag gis smras pa/ rje'i sras/ legs te/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes de dag gis hwags dang / bu ram dang / sha kha ra la sogs pa sta gon bya bar
brtsams so/ khyim bdag de yang mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / phu nu rnams sbran nas bshams zin pa'i dus su de dag dang lhan cig rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste rgan pa'i mtha' nas
rkang pa la phyag byas nas dge bskos la smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyim bdag che ge mo zhig /sang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren
to/ /zhes de skad gsungs shig /dge bskos kyis smras pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gnang nas de rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song ngo / /dge slong gzhan dag cig kyang ljongs rgyu ba
rgyu zhing mnyan yod du phyin to/ /de nas khyim bdag de de nyid kyi nub mo bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams/ chu ra bzhag
nas bcom ldan 'das la pho nya bas/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod bshams lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes gdugs tshod gdas par gsol
to/ /dge slong rnams snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te khyim bdag de'i khyim du dong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das ni/ gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing gdugs
tshod der drangs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rgyu lngas gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing gdugs tshod 'dren te/ lnga gang zhe na/ nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed pa yin/
lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa yin/ gnas mal la gzigs par bzhed pa yin/ nad pa la gzigs par bzhed pa yin/ nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed
pa yin no/ /don 'di la ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul pa la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing / der gdugs tshod drangs so/ /khyim
bdag des dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshad bzhin stan bshams/ zan sta gon byas pa las/ ji tsam na/ dge slong rab tu mang bar mthong nas des smras pa/ 'phags
pa/ bdag gis khyed kyis dge slong ji snyed yod pa bstan pa de snyed kyi dge slong gi gdan bshams/ bshos sta gon byas na/ dge slong mang du byon to/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim
bdag /dge slong glo bur ba dag lhags kyi/ rab tu dga' ba skyed cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ kye ma khyed kyis dge slong gzhan dag kyang 'ongs so/ /zhes bgyis pa dang / bdag gis
bshos kyang mang du sta gon bgyis/ gdan yang mang du bshams pa zhig /dge slong dag spobs pa med nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /de na kha cig/ tha ma ma smyungs tsam du gyur te de dag la
dge slong rnams gshe bzhin du kha ma zin tsam za bar gyur to/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge bskos
kyis dge slong glo bur pa 'di snyed cig lhags so/ /zhes dge slong glo bur pa rnams shes par byas nas khyim bdag la sbran par bya'o/ /dge slong gzhan dag cig zan gyi thad ka kho nar 'ongs
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag kyang sbran par bya'o/ /dge slong gzhan dag cig sngar pos pa las gud du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag
kyang sbran par bya'o/ /gzhan yang ngas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong gi kun tu spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun blta bar bya zhing
gal te dge slong ni/ mang / zan ni/ nyung na/ sbyin bdag la/ bzhin bzang / zan ni/ nyung / dge slong ni/ mang gi /snyoms par brims shig /ces brjod par bya'o/ /'on te zan ni/ mang / dge
slong ni/ nyung na/ des bzhin bzang / zan ni/ mang gi /ci 'byor pa bzhin brims shig /ces brjod par bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong gis kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar
bcas pa rnams yang dag par blangs te mi 'jug na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang
chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la rgyus nas btsun mo phreng ldan ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas btsun mo phreng ldan ma la
chos bstan par brtsams so/ /des de la chos ston pa na/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi na ba'i sman khyer nas glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / rgyal byed kyi tshal du chas
pa btsun mo phreng ldan mas thos nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ glu dang / rol mo'i sgra grag pa'o ni/ su'i lags/ des smras pa/ btsun mo/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dge slong gi dge
'dun gyi na ba'i sman khyer nas 'gro ste/ sgra 'o ni/ /de'i yin no/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gal te de lta na/ btsun mo phreng ldan gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun
la na ba'i sman gyis bstab bo/ /zhes bdag gi ming gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la brjod pa'i rigs so/ /des smras pa/ btsun mo/ legs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang zhig
nad pa la rim gro byed pa de ni/ nga la rim gro byed pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pas/ khyod kyi ming gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la bstab par bya'o/ /zhes smras nas btsun mo phreng ldan ma la
nad med par gyur cig /ces byas te stan las langs nas song ngo / /de nas gtsug lag khang du song ste rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas smras pa/ btsun mo phreng ldan mas dge slong gi
dge 'dun la na ba'i sman gyis bstab kyi/ gang zhig sman gang 'dod pa de song la slongs shig /dge bskos kyis bsgos pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
'char ka /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba la nyes dmigs bcu yod do/ /zhes ma gsungs sam/ de ji ltar bdag cag gis sman gyi phyir bslab pa las 'da'
bar bya/ de spobs pa med nas cang mi zer bar 'dug ste/ dge slong 'ga' yang phreng ldan ma las sman mi slong ngo / /ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka/ yang btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i
der song ba dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod kyis bdag gi ming gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la na ba'i sman gyis ma bstabs sam/ btsun mo/ bstabs so/ /'phags pa/ gal te de lta
na/ ci'i slad du dge slong dag mi byon/ /btsun mo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba la nyes dmigs bcu yod do/ /zhes ma gsungs sam/ dge slong dag 'dir ji ltar 'ong /
'phags pa/ gal te de lta na/ bdag gis 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ btsun mo/ tshong 'dus pa'i tshong pa'i lag tu kaR+sha pa Na dag gtad na/ dge slong gang zhig gang 'dod pa de/ de
las de dag slong grang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ legs te/ de ltar bgyi'o/ /zhes des tshong 'dus pa'i tshong ba'i lag tu kaR+sha pa Na dag gtad nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag rgyal po'i
pho brang du mi 'ong gi /dge slong gang zhig gang 'dod pa de la de byin cig /tshong pas rgyal po'i bkas kaR+sha pa Na dag blangs te bzhag pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis lha mo phreng ldan mas spos
'tshong che ge mo zhig la kaR+sha pa Na dag gtad de dge slong gang zhig gang 'dod pa de khyod kyis sbyin par bya'o/ /zhes bsgo ba thos nas song la bslang ngo / /snyam mo/ de nas dge slong kha cig ni/
song nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang / kho bo cag la khur skam dang / khur ba dang / sha khu dag byos la byin cig /kha cig gis smras pa/ kho bo cag la khur ba dang / sha skam byin cig /kha cig
gis smras pa/ kho bo cag la sha khu khrol bu dang / tshog pa byin cig /de de dag gis gtses pa dang smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag ni/ khur mkhan yang ma lags/ sha
g.yos mkhan yang ma lags pas/ dbyig 'di snoms te bzhud la gang zhig gang bzhed pa des de bgyid du stsol cig /de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyig
ma gnang ngo / /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag ni/ spos 'tshong ste/ tshong 'dus kyis 'tsho ba lags na/ de lta na/ bdag gis 'tsho ba 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /skabs de/ dge slong
rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin bdag la yid brtan te kaR+sha pa Na dag blangs nas ci 'dod par yongs su spyad par bya ste/
'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /drug sde rnams khyim pa dag dang lhan cig stan cig la 'dug pa bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis mthong nas
'phya bar byed cing / 'phags pa/ khyed rab tu byung ba tshangs par spyod pa yin na/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod spyod pa 'di dag dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug ces byas pa dang /
de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ bram ze dang / khyim
bdag dad pa can dag 'phya ba ni/ thog tu bab bo/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis khyim pa dag dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya ste/ 'dug na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis khyim pa dag dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge tshul dag dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug pa dge bsnyen dag gis mthong nas smras
pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod ni/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags na/ ji ltar dge tshul dag dang lhan cig stan gcig la bzhugs/ de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dang / 'di dag ni/ khyim pa ma
yin te/ 'di dag dge sbyong yin na/ 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya'o/ /zhes
bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rgan pa rgan pa dag /gsar bu gsar bu dag dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug pas gsar bu rnams/ rgan pa rnams la ma gus par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge
slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan pa dang / gsar bu lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang bar na lo gsum
zhugs pa dang lhan cig 'dug par bya ste/ lor ma lon pa dang / lo gsum lon pa yang lhan cig 'dug par bya zhing / lo gcig lon pa dang / lo bzhi lon pa dang /
de bzhin du lo dgu lon pa dang / lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i bar yang lhan cig 'dug par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bar na lo gsum zhugs pa dang lhan cig 'dug par bya ste/ lor ma
lon pa dang / lo gsum lon pa yang lhan cig 'dug par bya zhing / lo gcig lon pa dang / lo bzhi lon pa nas de bzhin du lo dgu lon pa dang / lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i bar yang lhan
cig 'dug par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bar na lo gsum zhugs pa dang lhan cig 'dug par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag khyim gyi nang du yang
bar na lo gsum zhugs pa dang lhan cig 'dug par byed pas/ des stan dag ma 'byor nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim gyi nang du ni/ slob dpon dang / mkhan po dag
dang yang lhan cig 'dug par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sdom ni/ dge tshul khri'u g.yogs mi sbyin dang / /dge tshul kha drang mi bya dang / /mna' dang skugs gzugs mi bya dang / /
stag gi god ma mi bza' ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis chos nyan pa'i stan bsham par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge tshul dag kyang khri'u g.yogs ma can la 'dug nas chos nyan par byed do/ /de dag gnyid log nas de nyid du bshang
gci shor te khri'u g.yogs ma can dag ma rung bar gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul la
khri'u g.yogs ma can sbyin par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul la khri'u g.yogs ma can sbyin par mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i dge tshul

skul byed ces bya ba de chos nyan du song ba dang / de la dge slong dag gis khri'u rkyang pa zhig byin pa dang / des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /ci'i phyir bdag la khri'u rkyang pa sbyin/ de dag gis
smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul rnams la khri'u g.yogs ma can bkag go /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /ci/ kho bo yang nyes dmigs de byed dam/ skabs de/ dge slong
rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul gang dag dran pa nye bar 'jog pa de dag la khri'u g.yogs ma can sbyin par bya'i/
gzhan dag la ni/ ma yin no/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong zhig la dge tshul zhig yod pa de la des nan tur byas pa dang / de rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na ngu zhing 'dug go /
drug sde las gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stong ba yin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' sgo na 'dug pa des/ de mthong nas des smras pa/
dge tshul/ ci'i phyir du/ des smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga'/ bdag mkhan pos nan tur byas so/ /bu/ tshur/ ngas khyod kyi lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / pher bu dang / ska
rags dang / khyod gang dang gang gis phongs pa de dang des mi phongs par bya'o/ /zhes des de gnas khang du khrid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis nan tur byas nas yal bar dor bar mi bya'i/
'on kyang slar dgug par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pas/ dge slong des dge sbyong de la dge slong zhig mngags nas des de la smras pa dang / des smras pa/ kho bo la mkhan po ci dgos/
nye dgas kho bo'i yo byad thams cad sbyar bas mi 'gro'o/ /dge slong 'phya bar byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ smod par byed de/ bdag gis rab tu phyung ba nye dgas kha phyung ngo / /zhes
zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gzhan gyi dge tshul kha drang bar mi bya ste/ kha
'dren na/ dbyen dang nye ba'i nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /drug sde rnams gang dang gang du dgos par mna' 'dor bar byed de/ sangs rgyas la mna'
'dor/ chos dang / dge 'dun la mna' 'dor/ slob dpon dang / mkhan po la mna' 'dor ba dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/ slob dpon dag /bdag
cag khyim pa lags kyang / ston pa la mna' 'dor bar mi bgyid na/ khyed rab tu byung ba lags na/ ji ltar ston pa la mna' 'dor/ 'di ni/ 'tsham pa ma lags so/ /zhes byas pa dang /
de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bram ze dang / khyim
bdag dad pa can rnams 'phya ba ni/ thog tu bab bo/ /rab tu byung ba ni/ bden pa'i bsam pa can yin te/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis mna' 'dor bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong mna' 'dor
na| 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /drug sde dag gang dang gang du dgos par lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phur bu dang / ska rags dang /
gzhan yang dge sbyong gi yo byad gang yang rung ba dag skugs su 'dzugs par byed pa bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya bar byed cing / 'phags pa/ khyed ci khyim pa
dag bzhin du lhung bzed la sogs pa yo byad skugs su 'dzugs sam/ de ni/ 'tsham pa ma yin no/ /de dag gis smras pa/ sgog skya zos sam/ chang 'thungs sam/ 'di la mi 'tsham
pa ci zhig yod/ de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| dge slong dag /bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni/ thog tu bab po/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis skugs gzugs par mi bya ste/ dge slong skugs gzugs na/ 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ nang par sngar langs nas khang thog tu 'dzegs te phyogs bzhir lta zhing de dag gang na du ba
'thul ba'am/ bya rgod lding ba snang ba der myur du gom pa bslang ste 'gro bar byed de/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na nye dga' nang par sngar khang thog tu 'dzegs te blta bar brtsams na/
des bya rgod lding ba mthong nas de rings pa rings par song ba dang / ji tsam na stag gis nags thibs po'i sa phyogs shig tu god ma zhig sbas pa mthong nas de dga' ste/ de khyer nas
rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / stag dri snom zhing phyi bzhin 'brangs nas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na sgra 'byin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin
du rmed par mdzad pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/ stag 'o ni ci ste skad 'byin/ des gsol ba/ btsun pa/ des god ma sbas pa de/ btsun
pa nye dgas 'tshal te mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ dge slong dag stag gi god ma za'am/ btsun pa/ 'tshal lags so/ /kun dga'
bo| ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge ni/ ri dwags bzang po bzang po dag bsad nas sha bzang po dag zos shing khrag bzang po dag 'thungs nas bor te 'gro'i/ stag god ma sbed par byed pas/
de lta bas na/ dge slong gis stag gi god ma bza' bar mi bya ste/ za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /gzhan yang ngas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi kun tu spyad pa'i
chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong gis sha 'brim pa'i tshe/ 'di ci'i sha/ stag gi god ma ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /ma dris par len na/ 'gal tshabs
can du 'gyur ro/ /sdom ni/ tshul shing rnams ni brims pa na/ spun gnyis dag ni gab pa dang / la ba bsgyur bar bya ba dang / /de lta bu la sogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ri bor zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig yod de/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dga' bo dang nye
dga' ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las ri bor der phyin to/ /de dag der phyin pa na/ dge 'dun la yang rnyed pa zhig grub na de dag gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa yin pas dge slong gang gis kyang
ma bcar ba dang nye dga' bos dga' bo la smras pa/ slob dpon/ lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag /khengs pa nga rgyal can dag cig pas gtse'i/ chur spyon/
gab ste bzhugs la 'di dag rnyed pa ji ltar bged pa gzigs so/ /des smras pa/ legs te/ de bzhin bya'o/ /zhes de dag gab ste 'dug pa dang / dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa de bgos so/ /
gang gi tshe rnyed pa de bgos zin pa de'i tshe de dag 'ongs nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa grub pa bgo'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ khyed ga las da gzod 'dir
'ongs kyi/ rnyed pa de 'brim pa'i tshe ma yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ ci/ khyed bgod rgyu zhig yin nam/ bgos par mi chud kyi/ bgo nyes te/ ci/ khyod kyis go bar byas nas bgos sam/
skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun la deng dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'brim na/ dge slong gang yang
gang du yang ma 'gro zhig /ces go bar byas nas rnyed pa brim par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis rnyed pa de slar bsdus so/ /bsdus nas dge 'dun la dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'brim na/ dge
slong gang yang gang du yang ma 'gro zhig /ces bsgos nas de dag gis bgo bar brtsams pa dang / dga' bo dang nye dga' de bzhin du gab ste 'dug go/ //'dul ba
phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po nyi shu rtsa gsum pa/ gang gi tshe dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa de bgos zin pa de'i tshe de dag yang 'ongs nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /tshur/ rnyed pa de bgo'o/ /dge
slong dag gis smras pa/ khyed gang nas da gzod 'dir 'ongs kyi/ rnyed pa de dge 'dun la go bar byas nas 'brim pa'i tshe ni ma yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ gal te khyod kyis go bar byas kyang bgos
par mi tshud kyi/ bgo nyes te/ ci/ khyed kyis go bar byas nas gaN+DI brdungs sam/ skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| go bar byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dge 'dun la rnyed pa de brim par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis yang rnyed pa de slar bsdus so/ /bsdus nas de bzhin du go bar byas te gaN+DI brdungs nas bgo
bar brtsams pa dang / de dag de kho na bzhin du gab ste 'dug go/ gang gi tshe rnyed pa de bgos zin pa de'i tshe yang 'ongs te de kho na bzhin du smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ dge
'dun la yang go bar byas/ gaN+DI yang brdungs nas khyed ga las da gzod 'dir 'ongs/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyed kyis go bar yang byas/ gaN+DI de yang brdungs kyang cig /khyed kyis tshul shing
brims sam/ bgos par mi tshud kyi/ bgo nyes so/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go bar byas
te gaN+DI brdungs nas tshul shing brim par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis yang rnyed pa de bsdus so/ /bsdus nas go bar byas/ gaN+DI brdungs tshul shing brims te
bgo bar brtsams pa dang / de dag de kho na bzhin du gab ste 'dug go /gang gi tshe rnyed pa de bgos zin pa de'i tshe de dag 'ongs nas de kho na bzhin du smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis
smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyed kyis dge 'dun la de ltar co 'dri'am/ dge 'dun la go bar byas/ gaN+DI brdungs/ tshul shing brims na/ khyed ga las da gzod 'dir phyin/ de dag gis
smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /rnyed pa lta bar shog /gal te de lta na/ kho bo cag gis dge 'dun ji ltar co dris pa smros shig /gal te khyed kyis dge 'dun la go bar byas/ gaN+DI
brdungs/ tshul shing brims na/ de ci/ khyed kyis kho bo cag gi bgo skal bstan tam/ der zad/ rnyed pa med kyang bla/ 'gro'o/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom
ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun la go bar byas/ gaN+DI brdungs/ tshul shing brims nas gang zhig mi snang ba de'i bgo skal bstan
nas bgo bar bya'o/ /bgos zin te 'ong ba gang yin pa de la ni/ rnyed pa sbyin par mi bya ste/ gal te de ltar bgos na/ legs par bgos pa yin pas/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /
dge slong gis ched du bsam ste de ltar dge 'dun la co 'dri bar yang mi bya'o/ /dge slong ched du bsam ste dge 'dun la co 'dri bar byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan

yod na'o/ /gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas tshon rtsi'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phyi nang bcas te ri mo bris

pa de'i tshe mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis ji ltar khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal tshon rtsi'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phyi nang bcas te ri mo bris nas mchog

tu phun sum tshogs par byas pa thos te/ de'i tshe srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma rgyal byed kyi tshal blta ba'i phyir nye bar song ngo / /yang de'i tshe mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gnas pa de la rgyal po
dang / blon po dang / grong mi rnams bram ze 'di mdzes so/ /zhes mngon par dad de/ des rgyal po'i pho brang nas chen po la 'os pa'i la ba zhig thob bo/ /des de bgos nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du ltad
mo bltar song ba dang / de mthong ma thag kho nar dad pa chen po skyes nas des la ba de phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gos kyi rnyed pa byung na/ tha na
me mar gyi snying po'i rgyu tsam du yang mnyam par bgo'o/ /zhes gsungs pas/ dge slong rnams kyis de tshal bu tshal bur byas nas mnyam par bgos so/ /bram ze des bsam pa/ la ba de
chen po la 'os pa zhig pas/ bdag gis 'phags pa rnams la kaR+sha pa Na dag phul la slar blang ngo / /snyam ste/ de nang par sngar langs nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du
song ba dang / rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na dge slong mang po gcig 'dug go /des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ phyag 'tshal lo/ /bram ze chen po/ nad med cig/ 'phags pa/ bdag
gis khyed la la ba phul ba de/ khyed kyis cir bgyis/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bram ze chen po/ rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /kho bo cag gis mnyam par bgos so/ /gcig
cig gis smras pa/ bdag gis ni/ bgo skal zhwa la glan to/ /gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bdag gis ni/ lham yu thung la glan to/ /gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bdag gis ni/ stod
kor la glan to/ /gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bdag gis lhung bzed phyi bar byas so/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ la ba chen po la 'os pa zhig na/ kye ma khyed kyis de kaR+sha pa Na dag
tu bsgyur la kaR+sha pa Na dag bgo 'dod ces zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/
bram ze de zer ba bden te/ de lta bas na/ dge 'dun la gos kyi rnyed pa de lta bu grub pa gang yin pa de/ kaR+sha pa Na dag tu bsgyur la kaR+sha pa Na dag bgo bar bya'o/ /sdom ni/ rung ba ma
yin lnga dag gi /lham ni dgag pa mdzad pa dang / /dom lpags kyi ni lham dag dang / /de yi steng gi rim pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo/ bdag cag gis mnyan yod du skye bo mang po thams cad la ma lus par bza' ba'i rin
bslangs na/ rgyal po'i glang po che 'dul ba de dag gis bdag cag la cung zad kyang ma byin gyi/ tshur shog /'dong ngo / /cung zad cig bslang ngo / /de na kha cig gis smras pa/ legs te/ de ltar
bya mod kyi/ 'on kyang thabs shig bsham par bya'o/ /ci zhig bya/ seng ge'i pags pa las lham byas la de bgos te rdzi kar 'dug nas glang po che rnams dkrog par bya'o/ /gzhan dag gis smras
pa| re zhig de bzhin du bslangs la/ gal te ma ster na/ phyis de ltar bya'o/ /zhes de rnams nang par sngar langs te de dag gi drung du song nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag /gtum po khyed kyis kho
po cag la zas kyi rin mi sbyin nam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyed la kho bo cag ci rag lus na/ gang gi phyir kho bo cag gis zas kyi rin sbyin/ drug sde rnams kyis 'jal to/ /zhes
byas nas song ngo / /de dag gis sngar gros byas pa bzhin seng ge'i pags pa las lham byas nas bgos te/ de dag glang po che rnams rgyu ba'i rdzi kar dong ste 'dug pa dang / glang po che rnams kyis
seng ge'i dri tshor te bred nas gcin rtug gtor te 'bros par brtsams so/ /glang po che 'dul ba rnams kyis lcags kyu dag gis zho sha yod med kyis gzung na/ ma
thub pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /ma gtang zhig/ ma gtang zhig/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ mi thub na/ ji ltar mi gtang / drug sde rnams kyis smras
pa| kho bo cag gis glan nam/ 'phags pa/ de ltar gnang na/ sman che'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /gal te bza' ba'i rin ster bar dam 'cha' na/ glan no/ /'phags pa/ dbul lo/ /bden
grang zhes byas nas de dag rdzi phyogs ma yin par dong ste 'dug pa dang / seng+ge'i dri ma mnam pas glang po che rnams sdod do/ /glang po che 'dul ba rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci/ khyed
rig sngags mkhyen tam/ bzhin bzang / kho bo cag rig sngags mi shes so/ /'phags pa/ gal te de lta na/ khyed kyis ji ltar bzlog/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang / de
dag gis smras pa/ khyod kyis gnod pa 'di lta bu yang byas pa lta/ gal te rgyal po'i glang po che dam pa/ yan lag mchog can 'di lta bu dag nags kyi nang du shor bar gyur na/ khyed kyis
rgyal po la rku byas par ma gyur tam/ de dag 'dzum dmul nas cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag seng ge'i pags pa'i lham gyon pa las gyur gyi/ de'i phyir dge slong gis seng ge'i pags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya'o/ /snyam
du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis seng ge'i pags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya ste/ dge slong seng ge'i pags pa'i lham 'chang
na| 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis seng ge'i pags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis stag lpags
kyi lham bcang bar brtsams pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ sen mo dang / mche ba'i
stobs can lnga po glang po cang shes dang / rta cang shes dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / gung gi pags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sen mo dang / mche ba'i stobs
can lnga'i pags lham bcang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ sen mo dang / mche ba'i stobs can gzhan
dag kyang mchis na/ ci lags/ de dag gi pags pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ de dag gi pags pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi bya ste/ 'chang na/ 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /mnyan yod na dge slong zhig gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis thebs pa de sman pa'i drung du song nas bzhin
bzang / bdag gzhang 'brum gyis thebs na/ sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ dom lpags kyi lham nobs shig dang / khyod sos par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ bcom ldan
'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa/ khyod kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ dge slong gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis thebs pas dom lpags kyi lham bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gzhang
'brum gyi nad kyis thebs pas dom lpags kyi lham bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / rim pa mang po ma rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te rim pa mang por
ma rnyed na/ steng rim gcig spun bag tu glan par bya'o/ /'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi las/ sgo lnga pa rdzogs so// //bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ rgyus pa rab snang drag po dang / /
bran dang de bzhin btsod ka dang / /babs pa mdun dang tshong dpon dang / /dge slong lhag ma mi dor ba'o/ /sdom ni/ de yi rgyus pa 'breng bu dang / /de bzhin brang lhan rting lhan dang / /yu chad
dang ni yu thung dang / /sgrog gu can dag mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis dge slong gis sen mo dang / mche ba'i stobs can lnga'i pags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi rgyus pas lham btsems te nyes
dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gi rgyus pas lham btsem par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi rgyus pas lham btsem par mi bya'o/ /zhes
bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi pags pa'i 'breng bus btsams te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gi pags pa'i 'breng
bus lham btsem par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi rgyus pa dang / pags pa'i 'breng bus lham btsem par mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis de dag
gi pags pa las brang lhan byas te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gi pags pa las brang lhan mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag
gi pags pa las brang lhan mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi pags pa las rting lhan byas te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ de dag gi pags pa las rting lhan mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi pags pa las brang lhan dang / rting lhan mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa
dang / drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi pags pa las lham yu chad byas te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gi pags pa las lham yu chad mi
bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi pags pa las brang lhan dang / rting lhan dang / lham yu chad mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi pags pa
las lham yu thung byas te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gi pags pa las lham yu thung mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag
gi pags pa las lham yu thung mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi pags pa las lham sgrog gu can byas te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gi pags pa las lham sgrog gu can mi bya'o/ /sdom ni/ rab snang 'dod pa thams cad dang / /dge 'dun bshos dang bzo sbyangs dang / /mgon med
zas sbyin khri'u rnams dang / /gtsug lag khang dang bzang po'o/ /bar sdom ni/ bltams dang rgyal po che dang bdag gi mthu/ /de bzhin mi dkar rab byung rgyal tshab dang / /sangs
rgyas rgyal srid nyid dang yan lag mchog /de bzhin rmi lam sa 'dzin skyes dang gnas/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po
pad+ma chen po zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste chos kyi rgyal po/ rgyal srid 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod
pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'khrug long rab tu zhi ba/ chom rkun dang / nad med pa/ sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ chos dang mthun pas byed du 'jug go /mnyan
yod na ni/ rgyal po tshangs byin ring du 'phur/ 'phags rgyal na ni/ mu khyud mtha' yas/ ko'u sham+b+hi na ni/ dmag brgya pa zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ rgyal srid rgyas pa dang
zhes bya ba nas chos dang mthun par byed du 'jug go/ zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na gzigs
pa lnga po rigs la gzigs pa dang / dus la gzigs pa dang / yul la gzigs pa dang / rus la gzigs pa dang / bud med la gzigs pas 'jig rten la gzigs te 'dod pa na spyod pa
lha drug kyang lan gsum du sbyang ba mdzad nas glang po cher bstan pas yum gyi lhums su zhugs so/ /de'i tshe sa chen po g.yos par gyur/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad kyang snang ba rgya chen
pos sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi kha dog gi mthu yang zil gyis mnan nas khyab par gyur te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun gnag
thibs po smag tu gyur pa gang du nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di dag gi 'od kyis kyang snang bar ma nus pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba
rgya chen pos khyab par gyur te/ der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi lag nas bzung yang mi mthong ba de dag kyang 'od des sems can phan tshun mthong nas shes ldan dag/
sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta/ shes ldan dag/ sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhes bya bar shes so/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das
bltams pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bu yang btsas te/ rgyal po'i khab tu ni/ rgyal po pad+ma chen po'i bu btsas so/ /mnyan yod du ni/ tshangs byin gyi/ 'phags rgyal du ni/ mu khyud
mtha' yas kyi/ ko'u sham+b+hir ni rgyal po dmag brgya pa'i bu btsas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa na/ sa chen po 'di gser zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur pa dang / rgyal po
so so nas bsam pa/ bdag gi bu'i mthu'o/ /bdag gi bu'i mthu'o/ /snyam nas de dag so so nas ming 'dogs par byed de/ rgyal po pad+ma chen pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /nga'i bu
btsas pa na nyi ma'i gzugs bzhin du 'jig rten snang bar byas pas/ de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming gzugs can snying po zhes gdags so/ /rgyal po tshangs byin ring du 'phur gyis smras pa/
nga'i bu btsas pa na ljongs rnams gsal zhing gsal ba lta bur snang bas/ de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar gdags so/ /rgyal po bu khyud mtha' yas kyis smras pa/ nga'i
bu btsas pa na 'jig rten rab tu snang ba kho nas snang bar byas pas/ de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar gdags so/ /rgyal po dmag brgya bas smras pa/ nga'i bu btsas pa na 'jig
rten nyi ma shar ba bzhin du snang bar byas pas/ de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming shar par gdags so/ /de'i tshe ri ki skin da la drang srong mi dkar ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten de'i 'jig pa la mkhas

pa/ 'chags pa la mkhas pa zhig gnas so/ /de'i tsha bo na la da zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de/ de'i drung du yang dang yang du nye bar 'gro'o/ /de nye bar 'ongs pa de la rtag tu 'jig pa dang / 'chags pa'i

gtam byas te/ de 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i gtam thos nas skyo ste de'i thad du rab tu byung ngo / /des dus gzhan zhig na drang srong mi dkar ba'i phug snang ba rgya chen pos khyab pa mthong ngo / /mthong
nas kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ nyi ma thams cad gcig car du/ /'dir ni shar pa 'gyur tam ci/ 'di ltar ri dang phug bcas par/ /'od zer dag gis 'bar ba bzhin/ /mi dkar
ba yis de smras pa/ /nyi ma'i 'od tsha 'od 'di bsil/ /lus 'dir snang ba 'jug pas na/ /'di ni nges par thub pa'i 'od/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od po che/ /gdon
mi za bar lhums nas 'byung / /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' de/ /'byung ba'i 'od ni dri med pa/ /'jig rten gsum po dag tu ni/ /gser dang 'dra ba bkye ba yin/ /na la das smras pa/
mkhan po/ gal te de lta na/ tshur spyon/ byang chub sems dpa' gzigs kyi/ bzhud do/ /des smras pa/ bu/ da lta byang chub sems dpa' lha dbang che bar grags pa/ dbang che bar grags
pa rnams kyis bskor cing bzhugs te/ de bdag cag gis mthong bar sla ba ma yin gyi/ gang gi tshe pho brang du gshegs nas mtshan btags te phyir byung ba de'i tshe bltar 'dod do/ /gang
gi nyin par byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa de nyid kyi nyin mo 'dun pa la sogs pa rim gro pa lnga brgya dang / 'dun ma la sogs pa rim gro ma lnga brgya dang / glang po che mo lnga brgya dang / rta
rgod ma lnga brgya yang bcas shing 'brangs/ gter lnga brgya yang kha bye ste snang ngo / /blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la sbran pa/ lha/ zhal rjes dgyes pa mdzad du gsol/ gzhon nu

bltams pa na don 'di snyed grub ste/ rim gro pa lnga brgya dang / rim gro ma lnga brgya yang btsas/ glang po che mo lnga brgya dang / rta rgod ma lnga brgya yang btsas shing 'brangs/ gter lnga brgya yang
kha bye ste bstan lags so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas yid bde ba skyes te smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gzhon nu btsas pa na/ nga'i don thams cad dang / las kyi mtha' thams cad grub
pas/ de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes de na byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan 'di lta ste/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba der btags so/ /byang
chub sems dpa' rin po che sna bzhi'i khyogs la bzhag ste sems can stong phrag du mas bskor nas lha dang mi'i bkur sti chen pos ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer du zhugs so/ /byang chub sems
dpa' grong khyer du zhugs pa na/ shAkya nga rgyal can/ mu cor smra ba/ thugs thub can rnams thub pa bzhin du cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ shAkya nga rgyal
can/ mu cor smra ba/ thugs thub can 'di dag gzhon nu grong khyer du zhugs pa dang / thub pa bzhin du cang mi smra ba 'dug pa de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming shAkya thub par gdags so/ /zhes de na
byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan gnyis pa 'di lta ste/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba der btags so/ /shAkya rnams la gnod sbyin gzhug mar gnas pa shAkya spel ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/
shAkya su'i bu'am/ bu mo btsas kyang rung / de dang por gnod sbyin shAkya spel ba'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du khrid pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /deng la gzhon nu
gnod sbyin shAkya spel ba'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du chug cig /blon po rnams kyis de'i mdun du khrid pa dang / gnod sbyin shAkya spel bas byang chub sems dpa' thag
ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de brtad de rings par gom pa bslang nas byang chub sems dpa' bsus te rkang pa la phyag byas pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ shes
ldan dag/ gnod sbyin shAkya spel ba yang / gzhon nu'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ de lta bas na/ 'di ni/ lha'i yang lha yin pas/ de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes gdags
so| |zhes de na byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan gsum pa 'di lta ste/ lha'i yang lha zhes bya bar btags so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' bram ze rnams dang /
mtshan mkhan rnams dang / skar mkhan rnams la bstan nas shes ldan dag/ gzhon nu ci gang dag dang ldan na/ skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du ma yin
te/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos dang mthun pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par
'gyur zhing / de'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di lta bu dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / btsun mo
rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che'o/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig dag bgos te dad pas yang dag par khyim nas khyim med
par rab tu byung na/ 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
gnyis dang ldan nam/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ de lta lags te/ gzhon nu ni/ gang dag dang ldan na/ skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du ma lags te zhes bya ba
nas 'jig rten na sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan lags so/ /na la das smras pa/ mkhan po/ byang chub sems dpa' ser skya'i
grong khyer du gshegs te de'i mtshan yang btags lags kyi/ tshur gshegs/ gzigs su bzhud do/ /des smras pa/ bu/ legs te/ de bzhin bya'i/ 'dong ngo / /zhes de gnyis rdzu 'phrul
gyis chas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthus de'i rdzu 'phrul nyams te rkang pa kho nas ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer du zhugs nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi pho brang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na sdod do/ /de nas drang srong mi dkar bas mi zhig la smras pa/ kye skyes bu/ khyod tshur shog /song la rgyal po zas gtsang la drang srong mi dkar ba lha la blta bar
'dad de sgo na 'dug go/ zhes sbron cig /des song nas rgyal po zas gtsang la/ lha/ drang srong mi dkar ba lha la blta bar 'tshal te chab sgo na mchis so/ /zhes
sbran pa dang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ drang srong mi dkar ba la su 'gog /nang du shog cig /de nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis byon pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i
kun tu spyod pas kun tu spyad nas rkang pa la mchod yon phul te seng ge'i khri la 'dug tu bcug go/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ drang
srong chen po/ ci zhig gi slad du byon/ des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rgyal chen bdag ni khyod kyi sras/ /blta bar 'tshal nas mchis lags te/ /'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/ /
thub pa de ni blta 'tshal lo/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ gzhon nu gnyid log go /des smras pa/ mnal bzhin blta bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang
gis smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ legs kyi/ de bzhin du mdzod/ gzigs shig /des song nas byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzum par gzugs rnams la gzigs pa mthong ngo //
mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rigs pa rta pho rnam dag ni/ /nam gyi gung la nyal ba ltar/ /dgos pa don du gnyer rnams kyi/ /mig la yun ring gnyid mi gnas/ /
zhes smras nas smras pa/ lha/ ci/ gzhon nu bram ze rnams dang / mtshan mkhan rnams dang / skar mkhan rnams la bstan tam/ des smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ bstan to/ /lha/ de dag gis
ci zhig tu lung bstan/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes mchi'o/ /des byang chub sems dpa' la yan man brtag par brtsams pa/ ji tsam
na byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rnams mthong nas dus ji tsam gyis bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur zhes bsam pa la zhugs nas des lo nyi shu rtsa dgu lon pa dang / khyim nas byung
ste lo drug tu dka' ba spyad nas bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur bar mthong ngo / /des bdag nyid kyi rgyud bsam pa la zhugs pa dang / bar skabs su 'chi bar mthong nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sred pa byung
ba de/ mig mchi mas gang bzhin tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sa bdag rtog ge rnams kyi blo gros 'khrul/ /dus kyi mthar ni 'khor los bsgyur mi 'byung / /bsod nams mchog can
'di ni chos kyi mdzod/ /nyes pa rnams las rgyal te sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /mi yi dbang po mtshan gsal min rnams kyis/ /gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag por dbang phyug 'gyur/ /shin tu
mtshan gsal thub dbang rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /mi mchog chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal pos de mig mchi mas gang ba mthong nas bag tsha ste mi dga' nas slar tshigs
su bcad de smras pa/ skyes pa bud med dag ni gang 'phrad nas/ /ngoms par mi 'gyur dga' ba thob 'gyur ba/ /lus bzang dga' byed de ni 'dir gzigs nas/ /ci
slad khyod kyi zhal ni mchi mar bcas/ /bdag gi gzhon nu 'ga' las 'jigs pa'am/ /tshe zad nye bar gnas par ma gyur grang / /de slad dge ba 'di myur bdag la gsungs/ /khyod kyi bshums
mo byung bas bdag 'dar to/ /des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gal te 'di yi steng du mkha' las ni/ /rdo rje'i char drag rab tu bab gyur kyang / /thub pa chen po'i sku yi spu nyag gcig/
kun tu bskyod par nus pa ma yin no/ /tshan chen rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa yi/ /shin tu mi bzad mtshon rnon rnams dag dang / /sprul gdug rnams dang shin tu gdug pa'i dug /gzhon
nu'i lus la bab kyang rmas mi nus/ /mi dbang bdag ni chos mchog mdzod 'di dang / /'phrad nas don ma grub par 'chi 'gyur te/ /zhi ba mi 'thob rang gi nyes mthong nas/ /de yi slad du
bdag ni ngu bar bas/ /'jig rten dag ni gang rnams dus su ni/ /smra ba'i dam pa mtshungs med 'di yi chos/ /nyan cing thos nas rab zhi mchog 'gro ba/ /bde skyid bsod nams can de
rims nad bral/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpas bdud rtsi 'thob par thos nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go /log pa'i lta bas nyams pa ni/ phal cher rdzun smra ba

dang / g.yo kun tu spyod pa la zhugs pa yan pas/ drang srong mi dkar bas smras pa/ lha/ khyod kyi grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di snyam du/ kye ma drang srong mi dkar ba rkang gis ser skya'i

bzhi'i grong khyer du 'ongs kyang ci ma rung snyam du yun ring po nas smon pas/ bdag skye bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rkang kho nas ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer du 'ongs te rkang kho nas 'byung gi /grong khyer
mdzes par bgyid du stsol cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag/ drang srong mi dkar ba rkang gis grong khyer nas 'byung gi/ grong khyer dang lam mdzes
par byed du chug la dril bsgrags te 'di skad du/ ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang / yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa gzhan gyis kyang drang srong mi dkar ba grong khyer nas
'byung ba bsus shig ces kyang sgos shig/ lha/ de ltar 'tshal lo/ /zhes blon po rnams kyis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas/ tsan+dan gyi chus
chag chag btab/ dri zhim po'i phog phor bzhag/ dar gyi lnga ldi mang po bres/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng / me tog sna tshogs bkram ste lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal/ dga' ba'i tshal
bas kyang lhag par dga' dga' ltar grong khyer mdzes pa dang / lam mdzes par byas nas dril bsgrags te 'di skad ces/ shes ldan dag /grong khyer na gnas pa rnams dang / pho brang
'khor ba rnams dang / yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs nyon cig/ lhas 'di skad ces/ drang srong mi dkar ba sang rkang gis ser skya'i gzhi'i
grong khyer nas 'byung gi/ de'i phyir khyed thams cad kyis de bsus shig ces bka' stsal te/ ji tsam nam nangs pa dang drang srong mi dkar ba mi'i mchog stong phrag du mas bkur sti chen
pos bskyal nas rkang gis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer nas byung ngo / /des ri ki skin dar song nas yang bsam gtan dag kyang bskyed/ rdzu 'phrul yang bsgrubs so/ /de'i tshe rnam par smin
pa'i las yongs su zad pas nad kyis thebs te rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / me tog dang / 'dab ma dang / 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis rim gro byas kyang nad nye bar zhi bar ma gyur to/ /na la das
de'i lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ mkhan po/ gang cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad ni/ bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba dang / bdud rtsi tshol ba lags
te| de'i slad du gal te khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed na/ bdag la yang bdud rtsi'i bgo bsha' mdzad du gsol/ des smras pa/ bu/ nga yang gang cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad bdud rtsi don

du gnyer ba dang / bdud rtsi tshol ba yin na/ ngas kyang bdud rtsi ma rnyed do/ /'on kyang khyod shAkya rnams kyi nang du gzhon nu 'khrungs pa de'i spyan sngar rab tu byung la rigs kyi rlom pa ma byed/ rus
kyi rlom pa ma byed/ bram ze'i bu'i rlom pa ma byed par nga rgyal chog la tshangs pa spyad pa spyod cig dang / des na/ khyod bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras nas/ bsags pa kun gyi mtha'
'dzad cing / /mthon po'i mtha' ni bsnyil bar 'gyur/ /'phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/ gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/ /zhes bya bas dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/ /des de'i rus bu
la rus bu'i mchod pa byas nas grong khyer wA ra NA sir song ste drang srong gi nang na 'dug go /de na la da dang rus mthun pas de'i ming drang srong na la da zhes bya bar chags so/ /gzhon nu rab
snang ma ma brgyad po/ pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma
dang / zho dang / mar gsar dang / mar dkar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par gtso bo gtso bo dag gis bskyed bsrings pas/ mtshe'u na 'dug pa'i pad+ma bzhin du skyed
drag par gyur to/ /de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / lag rtsis dang / rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ yul gyi dbang phyug la gnas
pa'i mthu thob pa/ sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rnal du phab ste gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas tha dad pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang / rta la
zhon pa dang / shing rta'i thabs dang / ral gri'i thabs dang / 'phong dpyad dang / phyir snur ba dang / mdun du snur ba dang / lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang / zhags
pas gdab pa dang / mda' bo che 'phen pa dang / gcad pa dang / dral ba dang / 'dzin stangs dang / gom stabs dang / thor tshugs dang / rgyang nas phog pa dang / sgra grag par phog pa dang /
gnad du phog pa dang / mi 'chor bar phog pa dang / tshabs chen po de dag la mkhas par gyur te/ gnas lnga la yang byang bar gyur to/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan
'das gzhon nu'i rol pa la rol pa de'i tshe gzhon nu rab snang yang gzhon nu'i rtse ba la rtse'o/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba de'i tshe gzhon nu rab snang yang
rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur to/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgan po dang nad pa dang shi ba gzigs nas skyo ste sa 'tsho ma dang / ri dwags skyes dang / grags 'dzin ma la sogs pa bud
med drug khri spangs nas nam gyi gung la dka' thub kyi nags su gnas te gong ma dang 'og ma'i rnam pa las grol ba'i drang srong rnams kyi thad nas 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags
dang bral ba dang / gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi thad nas gzugs med pa'i khams/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar las
'dod chags dang bral bar byas te lung 'bog pa med pa'i phyir dka' ba spyad pa rung ngo / /snyam nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad na/ khyad par rtogs pa thob par ma gyur te/ dbugs kyang ci
bder rngubs shing / ci bder phyung / zhal zas rags pa 'bras chan dang / zan dron yang gsol/ mar dkar dang til mar gyis kyang sku byugs/ chu grang dro ran pas kyang sku khrus mdzad nas
sde grong zhes bya ba'i grong du gshegs nas bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs las 'o thug sbrang rtsi can lan bcu drug tu nying khur byas pa bzhes te gsol nas klu'i rgyal po nag pos bstod
cing / rtswa tshong bkra shis las rtswa dag bzhes nas byang chub kyi shing drung ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas nyid kyis rtswa ma 'khrugs ma 'dzings par bting ste bzhugs nas skyil mo krung bcas te
sku drang por bsrang / dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas ji srid zag pa zad pa ma thob pa de srid kyi bar du skyil mo krung mi gzhig go /snyam du thugs bskyed cing tshig tu yang gsungs te/ des
ji srid du zag pa zad pa ma brnyes pa de srid du skyil mo krung ma bshig go /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud 'byung po dkrigs phrag drug cu'i 'khor can byams pa'i mtshon gyis
pham par mdzad nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes te tshangs pas bskul nas yul wA ra NA sir gshegs te lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang
mthun pa bskor ba de'i tshe gzhon nu rab snang yang rgyal po chen por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ /de na yul 'phags rgyal na rgyal po rab snang zhes bya ba/
chos kyi rgyal po/ rgyal srid 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'khrug long rab tu zhi
ba| chom rkun dang / nad med pa/ sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ chos dang mthun pas byed du 'jug ste/ de'i mthus rtag tu dga' ston gyis rab tu dga'o/ /

grong khyer 'phags rgyal de na dbang po lnga dang / nye dbang lnga yod do/ /rdzing bu lnga brgya las wa nas 'bab pa'i chu lnga brgya rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer mdzes pa zhes bya ba de nyid du 'bab
bo| |rgyal po rab snang yan lag mchog lnga po/ glang po che 'dam bu'i ri dang / glang po che mo bzang ldan dang / rnga mo rgya mtsho'i rkang dang / rta gos mgrin dang / 'phar ma pa khwa zhes bya ba
yod de/ de dag las 'dam bu'i ris ni/ nyin zhag gcig la dpag tshad brgya chod do/ /bzang ldan gyis ni/ dpag tshad brgyad cu'o/ /rgya mtsho'i rkang gis ni/ dpag tshad bdun cu'o/ /
rta gos mgrin gyis ni/ dpag tshad lnga bcu'o/ /khwas ni/ dpag tshad nyi shu'o/ /de de ltar 'byor ba phun sum tshogs pa de/ khams ma mnyam pas/ nad gnyid med pa zhes bya bas

thebs so/ /rgyal po de ni/ mar la sdang zhing chang la dga' ba zhig ste/ de la sman pa rnams kyis rdzas kyi tshogs rnams kyi khyad par sna tshogs dang sbyar ba'i mar blud na/ de 'thung du ma thub bo/ /de la
btsun mo'i 'khor dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis mar blud par byas na/ mar la je khro bar rtsom zhing gang zhig mar gyi ming byin pa de'i mgo drungs nas bcad
nas sa la 'dor bar byed do/ /de gnyid med pas nam gyi thun dang po la ni/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byed do/ /gnyis pa la ni/ glang po che dang / rta
dag la lta'o/ /gsum pa la ni/ 'bangs mel tshe ba rnams la de ltar mel tshe su byed mel tshe su byed ces 'dri zhing / de gang zhig tshig dang po la ni/ lan mi glon pa de la yang bzod do/ /
gnyis pa la lan mi glon pa de la yang bzod do/ /gang zhig gsum pa la lan mi lon pa de'i ni/ mgo drungs nas bcad nas sa la 'dor bar byed pas/ de'i ming rgyal po rab snang / rgyal po rab
snang zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nub nas ming gtum po rab snang / gtum po rab snang zhes bya bar chags so/ /des dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la smras pa/ bud med dag /
nga ni/ mel tshe byed na khyed ci'i phyir mel tshe mi byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ bdag cag kyang zhugs tshe bgyid do/ /de dag gis mel tshe cung zad cig byas nas smras pa/ lha/ gal te
bdag cag gis rtag tu zhugs tshe bgyi na/ lha'i thugs srung bar bgyi ba'i rngo mi thogs kyi steng du 'di ni/ bdag cag gi sug las ma lags so/ /des smras pa/ gal
te 'di khyed kyi las ma yin na/ 'o na 'di su'i las yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu rnams kyi lags so/ /des de dag btang nas gzhon nu rnams kyi drung du song ste smras pa/ gzhon
nu dag /nga yang mel tshe byed na/ khyed ci'i phyir mel tshe mi byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ bdag cag kyang zhugs tshe bgyid do/ /de dag gis kyang mel tshe cung zad cig byas nas smras pa/ lha/
gal te bdag cag gis rtag tu zhugs tshe bgyis na/ rgyal po'i bya ba gang dag lags pa zhes bya ba nas gnas lnga la zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/ byang bar bgyi ba'i rngo mi thogs kyi steng du
'di ni/ bdag cag gi sug las ma lags so/ /des smras pa/ gal te 'di khyed kyi las ma yin na/ 'o na 'di su'i las yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ blon po rnams kyi lags so/ /
des de dag btang nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /nga yang mel tshe byed na/ khyed ci'i phyir mel tshe mi byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ bdag cag kyang zhugs tshe bgyid do/ /
de dag gis kyang mel tshe cung zad cig byas nas smras pa/ lha/ gal te bdag gis rtag tu zhugs tshe bgyi na/ chos dang mthun par rgyal srid bgyi pa'i rngo mi thogs pa'i steng du 'di ni/ bdag
cag gi sug las ma lags so/ /des smras pa/ gal te 'di khyed kyi las ma yin na/ 'o na 'di su'i las yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ khrom gyi ru'i lags so/ /des de dag btang nas khrom gyi

ru'i drung du song ste smras pa/ shes ldan dag /nga yang mel tshe byed na/ khyed ci'i phyir mel tshe mi byed/ khrom gyi rus smras pa/ bdag cag kyang zhugs tshe bgyid do/ /de dag gis kyang mel tshe cung
zad cig byas nas smras pa/ lha/ bdag cag gis rtag tu zhugs tshe bgyi na/ lha la rgol ba rnams dang / phyir rgol ba rnams dang lhan cig g.yul sprad pa'i rngo mi thogs pa'i steng du 'di ni/
bdag cag gi sug las ma lags so/ /des smras pa/ 'di khyed kyi las ma yin na/ 'o na 'di su'i las yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ grong mi dang / yul mi rnams kyi lags so/ /des de
dag btang nas grong mi dang / yul mi rnams kyi drung du song ste smras pa/ shes ldan dag /nga yang mel tshe byed na/ khyed ci'i phyir mel tshe mi byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ bdag cag kyang
zhugs tshe bgyid do/ /des de dag rtag tu mel tshe byed par bgos nas de dag res su bcad de mel tshe bya bar brtsams so/ /ji tsam na spos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig la res bab pa dang / de rgyal
po de dag gtum pas gsad du dogs te/ yid mi dga' zhing lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang / de sems khong du chud pa grogs po zhig gis mthong nas smras
pa/ grogs po/ ci ste lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug /des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang / de'i khyim drung na sa 'dzin pa zhig yod
de| des de la smras pa/ grogs po/ khyod kyi khyim drung na sa 'dzin pa zhig yod na/ ci'i phyir de la mi 'chol/ des smras pa/ grogs po/ ji ltar kho bo'i srog phangs pa ltar/ de'i yang de dang
'dra na/ de ci'i phyir kho bos bcol bar byed/ des smras pa/ grogs po/ de la kaR+sha pa Na dag byin dang / gdon mi za bar mel tshe byed do/ /des de la bcol ba dang / des smras pa/ kaR+sha
pa Na lnga brgya byin cig dang mel tshe bya'o/ /des sbyin no/ /zhes dam bcas pa dang / des smras pa/ re zhig nyis brgya lnga bcu zhig byin cig /lhag ma ni/ gal te kho bo gson por slar 'khor
na| byin cig /ci ste ma yin na/ khyod nyid kyi yin gyi/ ci bder gyis shig /des smras pa/ legs ta/ de bzhin bya'o/ /zhes des de la kaR+sha pa Na nyis brgya lnga bcu byin pa dang / des de dag
blangs nas srang du song ste/ des de la sha dang / chang dang / khur ba mang du nyos so/ /de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi nang mi thams cad mgron du bos ta zan byin/ chang yang ci 'dod pa
blud nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /kho bo la mel tshe'i res bab na/ rgyal po 'di'i spyod pa ci 'dra ba smos shig /de dag gis de la ji lta bu yin pa thams cad bsnyad pa dang / des
smras pa/ shes ldan dag /kho bos cung zad byas pa dran par gyis shig /de dag gis smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ da dung khyod kyis zan byin pa dang / skom blud pa yang ma zhu na/ ci ste mi dran/ ci bya
ba smros shig /des smras pa/ gal te ma stes te kho bo nyal ba la rgyal pos mel tshe pa dag byung na/ khyed kyis kho bo slongs shig /de dag gis smras pa/ legs te/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /de la bas
smad dkris nas mel tshe byed pa na thal byung gnyid kyis log go /ji tsam na rgyal po de kho na bzhin du thun dang po la btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig rtses/ dga' bar byas/ dga' mgur spyad
de| thun bar ma la glang po che dang / rta dag la bltas nas thun tha ma la mel tshe ba rnams la brtag par brtsams na/ de dag gis sa 'dzin pa de la/ sa 'dzin pa/ lha gshegs kyi/ longs shig /
ces bslang ba dang / de myur ba myur ba kho nar langs nas de bzhin du la bas smad dkris te 'dug go /rgyal pos su mel tshe byed ces sgra phyung ba dang / sa 'dzin pas bsam pa/ gal te tshig dang po
kho na'i len glan te/ phyis lan ma glan dang / rgyal po 'dis gdon mi za bar bdag gi mgo drung nas bcad de sa la 'dor ro/ /snyam du rig nas/ cang mi zer bar 'dug go /lan gnyis kyi
bar du rgyal pos su mel tshe byed sgra phyung na yang de bzhin cang mi zer bar 'dug go /lan gsum du rgyal po su mel tshe byed ces sgra phyung ba dang / des smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa bdag go /rgyal
pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ ci sems/ de sems ngan la 'jig rten gyi sgrung gtam la yang mkhas pa zhig pas/ des smras pa/ 'jig rten gyi bsam pa sems lags
so| |bar sdom ni/ 'ug pa khrung khrung mun dza dang / /nag mo sreg pa bum pa dang / /lan tshwa phye dang shi ba dang / /dong thags rdza ma sdig pa'o/ /sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi bsam pa ji lta bu zhig
sems/ lha/ srog chags 'ug pa sgro dang bcas pa dang / sgro ma mchis pa srang la gzhal na/ mnyam pa kho nar 'gyur te/ de ngo mtshar che lags so/ /sa 'dzin pa/ ci/ de ltar 'gyur ram/
lha/ spyan sngar dbab par bgyi'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ legs so/ /des phyi de nyin 'ug pa zhig khyer te 'ongs nas/ de rgyal po'i mdun du sgro dang bcas te bcal nas yang sgro btogs te bcal
na| de kho na dang mnyam mo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ des smras pa/ lha/ 'di'i sgro dag gis rlung 'dzin pa'i slad du'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/
khyod ni/ mkhas pa zhig go /des/ lha/ khyod kyi bka' drin lags so/ /zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go /sa 'dzin pa nam ngo ma langs te langs nas mgo la
byugs te rgyal po'i pho brang nas byung ba dang / spos 'tshong gi khye'u des kaR+sha pa Na nyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag kyang de la byin no/ /yul 'phags rgyal na gang dang gang la res bab pa des

kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgyas de glas te gtong gtong bas de rtag tu mel tshe kho na byed par gyur te/ yang rgyal pos de kho na bzhin du su mel tshe byed ces smras pa/ des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/ lha/
bdag zhugs tshe bgyid do/ /rgyal pos de kho na bzhin du sa 'dzin pa/ ci sems zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa/ lha/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa sems lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin
pa| 'jig rten gyi bsam pa ji lta bu zhig sems/ lha/ khrung khrung zhes bya ba'i bya de dag la 'o ma dang chu bsres te stsal na/ de dag 'o ma ni/ 'tshal/ chab ni/ 'dor ro/ /sa 'dzin pa/ ci/ de de

ltar 'gyur ram/ lha/ spyan sngar dbab par bgyi'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ legs so/ /des phyi de nyin khrung khrung zhig khyer te 'ongs nas de rgyal po'i drung du 'o ma dang chu bsres te blud pa dang / des 'o ma
ni| 'thungs/ chu ni/ bor ro// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ des smras pa/
lha| 'di'i mchu la skyur mchis te/ des na/ de 'tshal ba'i 'o ma zhor gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ khyod ni/ mkhas pa zhig go/ des/ lha/ khyod kyi bka' drin lags
so/ /zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go /yang rgyal pos de bzhin du su mel tshe byed ces smras pa dang / des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/ lha/ bdag zhugs tshe bgyid do/ /rgyal
pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ ci sems/ des smras pa/ lha/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa sems lags so/ /sa 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig
sems| lha/ rtswa mun dza tho bas brdungs pa dang / ma brdungs pa srang la bcal na/ mnyam pa kho nar 'gyur lags so/ /sa 'dzin pa/ ci/ de de ltar 'gyur ram/ lha/ spyan sngar dbab par bgyi'o//
sa 'dzin pa/ legs so/ /des phyi de nyin rtswa mun dza khyer te 'ongs nas rgyal po'i mdun du ji ltar bstan pa bzhin byas na/ thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin
pa| 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ lha/ tho bas brdungs bas/ rlung bsdus pa'i slad du'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ khyod ni/ mkhas pa zhig go /des/ lha/ khyod kyi bka' drin lags so/ /zhes byas pa
dang | rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go /yang rgyal pos de bzhin du su mel tshe byed ces smras pa dang / des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/ lha/ sa 'dzin pa bdag go /rgyal pos smras pa/
sa 'dzin pa/ ci sems/ lha/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa sems lags so/ /sa 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig sems/ lha/ shing spra mgo nag mo zhes bya ba de'i
lus ji tsam pa mjug ma yang de tsam mo/ /sa 'dzin pa/ ci/ de de ltar 'gyur ram/ lha/ spyan sngar dbab par bgyi'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ legs so/ /des phyi de nyin spra mgo nag mo zhig
khyer te 'ongs nas rgyal po'i mdun du ji lta ba bzhin du bstan na/ thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ khyod kyis ji ltar shes/ lha/ bdag gis so ga'i dus na 'di
'jug pa'i tshe mjug mas mgor sleb ba mthong lags so/ /sa 'dzin pa/ khyod ni/ mkhas pa zhig go /lha/ khyod kyi bka' drin lags so/ /zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
yang rgyal pos su mel tshe byed ces smras pa dang / des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/ lha/ sa 'dzin pa bdag go /rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ ci sems/ lha/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o/ /sa 'dzin
pa| 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig /lha/ sreg pa'i gshog pa bkra ba ji snyed pa mi bkra ba yang de kho na nyid mchis so/ /sa 'dzin pa/ ci/ de de ltar 'gyur ram/ lha/ spyan sngar dbab par
bgyi'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ legs so/ /des phyi de nyin rgyal po'i mngon sum du byas na/ de thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ khyed kyis ji ltar shes/ lha/ sngon
bdag gis bgrangs lags so/ /sa 'dzin pa/ khyod ni/ mkhas pa zhig go /lha'i dka' drin lags so/ /zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go /rgyal pos yang de bzhin du
su mel tshe byed ces smras pa dang / des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/ lha/ sa 'dzin pa bdag go /rgyal pos smras pa/ ci sems/ lha/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten
pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig /lha/ bye ma bum pa gang gi nang du chab bum pa gang blugs na/ chab de thams cad de'i nang du shong ngo / /sa 'dzin pa/ ci/ de de ltar
'gyur ram/ lha/ spyan sngar dbab par bgyi'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ legs so/ /des phyi de nyin mngon sum du byas na/ thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/
khyod kyis ji ltar shes/ lha/ bye ma chu las byung ba'i slad du'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ khyod ni/ mkhas pa zhig go /lha/ khyod kyi bka' drin lags so/ /zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po cang mi zer
bar 'dug go /yang rgyal pos de bzhin du su mel tshe byed ces smras pa dang / des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/ lha/ sa 'dzin pa bdag go /rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ ci sems/ lha/
'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig sems/ lha/ chab phul gang gi nang du lan tshwa phul gang stsal na/ chab phul gang kho nar 'gyur ro/ /
sa 'dzin pa/ ci/ de de ltar 'gyur ram/ lha/ spyan sngar dbab par bgyi'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ legs so/ /des phyi de nyin mngon sum du byas na/ thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang / rgyal
pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ 'di la rgyu ci yod/ lha/ lan tshwa chab las byung ba'i slad du'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ khyod ni/ mkhas pa zhig go /lha/ khyod kyi bka' drin lags so/ /zhes byas pa
dang / rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go /yang rgyal pos de bzhin du mel tshe su byed ces smras pa dang / des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/ lha/ sa 'dzin pa dag go /rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/
ci sems/ lha/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig /lha/ zhib phul gang gi nang du chab phul gang stsal na/ sla bar yang mi 'gyur gar bar
yang mi 'gyur ro/ /sa 'dzin pa/ ci/ de de ltar 'gyur ram/ lha/ spyan sngar dbab par bgyi'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ legs so/ /des phyi de nyin mngon sum du byas na/ thams cad de bzhin du gyur
pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ lha/ bdag cag sa 'dzin pa rnams ni/ phye 'tshal ba lags pas/ bdag gis lan du ma mthong lags so/ /sa 'dzin pa/
khyod ni/ dran pa can zhig go /lha/ khyod kyi bka' drin lags so/ /zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go /yang rgyal pos de bzhin du mel tshe su byed smras pa dang / des snga
ma'i tshul du smras pa/ lha/ sa 'dzin pa bdag go /rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ ci sems/ lha/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig /
lha/ gum pa dang / gson po gnyis srang la bcal na/ mi mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /sa 'dzin pa/ ci/ de de ltar 'gyur ram/ lha/ spyan sngar dbab par bgyi'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ legs
so| |des phyi de nyin mngon sum du byas na/ thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ de la rgyu ci yod/ lha/ gum pa mi ma lags
pas mdangs 'phrog pa'i slad du'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ khyod ni/ mkhas pa zhig go /lha/ khyod kyi bka' drin lags so/ /zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ yang rgyal
pos de bzhin du mel tshe su byed ces smras pa dang / des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa dang / lha/ sa 'dzin pa bdag go /rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ ci sems/ lha/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam
pa'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig /lha/ dong brkos pa las de de nyid du stsal na/ mnyam par mi 'gyur lags so/ /sa 'dzin pa/ ci/ de de ltar 'gyur ram/
lha| spyan sngar dbab par bgyi'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ legs so/ /des phyi de nyin mngon sum du byas na/ thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ 'di la rgyu
ci yod/ lha/ mi ma lags pas mdangs 'phrog pa'i slad du'o/ /sa 'dzin pa/ khyod ni/ mkhas pa zhig go /lha/ khyod kyi bka' drin lags so/ /zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po cang mi zer
